GP12nardp1_u:4112: yāni kāni ca pāpāni kṛtāni subahūni ca /
GP12nardp1_u:4118: dharmarāja uvāca śṛṇudhvaṃ madvaco dūtā hitaṃ vakṣyāmyanuttamamam /
GP12nardp1_u:4121: nārāyaṇācyutahare śaraṇaṃ bhaveti śāntā vadanti satataṃ tarasātyajadhvam
GP12nardp1_u:4122: nārāyaṇācyuta janārdana kṛṣṇa viṣṇo padmeśa padmajapitaḥ śiva śaṅkareti /
GP12nardp1_u:4123: nityaṃ vadantyakhilaloka hitāḥ praśāntā dūradbhaṭāstyajatā tānna mamaiṣu śikṣā // NarP_1,23.76
GP12nardp1_u:4127: śaṃbhau harau ca samabuddhimatastathaiva dūtāstyajadhvamupakāraparāñjanānām // NarP_1,23.78
GP12nardp1_u:4133: grāmasya nāśakaramuttamavairayuktaṃ dūtāḥ samānayata vipradhaneṣu lubdham
GP12nardp1_u:4134: ye viṣṇubhaktivimukhāḥ praṇamanti naiva nārāyaṇaṃ hi śaraṇāgatapālakaṃ ca /
GP12nardp1_u:4135: viṣṇavālayaṃ ca nahi yānti narāḥ sumūrkhāstānānayadhvamatipāparatānprasāhya // NarP_1,23.82
GP12nardp1_u:4136: evaṃ śrutaṃ yadā tatra yamena paribhāṣitam /
GP12nardp1_u:4139: tatraiva sarvapāpāni niḥśeṣāṇi gatāni me // NarP_1,23.84 //
GP12nardp1_u:4145: sadyaḥ saṃpreṣayāmāsa tadviṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padam // NarP_1,23.87 //
GP12nardp1_u:4147: karmaṇā tena viprarṣe viṣṇuloke mayoṣitam // NarP_1,23.88 //
GP12nardp1_u:4157: atra svenāpi yatkarma kṛtaṃ tasya phalaṃ tvidam // NarP_1,23.93 //
GP12nardp1_u:4161: ekādaśīvrataṃ yattu kurvanti śraddhayā narāḥ // NarP_1,23.95 //
GP12nardp1_u:4163: evaṃ putravacaḥ śrutvā saṃtuṣṭo gālavo muniḥ // NarP_1,23.96 //
GP12nardp1_u:4165: majjanma saphalaṃ jātaṃ maddhaṃśaḥ pāvanīkṛtaḥ // NarP_1,23.97 //
GP12nardp1_u:4167: iti saṃtuṣṭacittastu tasya putrasya karmaṇā // NarP_1,23.98 //
GP12nardp1_u:4171: iti śrībṛhannāradīye purāṇe pūrvabhāge prathamapāde vratākhyāne ekādaśīvratamahimānuvarṇanaṃ nāma trayoviṃśo 'yāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:4172: sūta uvāca etanniśamya sanakoditamaprameyaṃ puṇyaṃ harerdinabhavaṃ nikhilottamaṃ ca /
GP12nardp1_u:4173: pāpaughaśāntikaraṇaṃ vratasāramevaṃ brahmātmajaḥ punarabhāṣata harṣayuktaḥ // NarP_1,24.1
GP12nardp1_u:4174: nārada uvāca kathitaṃ bhavatā sarvaṃ mune tattvārthakovida /
GP12nardp1_u:4180: sanaka uvāca śṛṇuṣva muniśārdūla yathā bhaktapriyaṅkaraḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:4184: brāhmaṇāḥ kṣatriyā vaiśyāḥ śūdrāścatvāra eva te /
GP12nardp1_u:4185: varṇā iti samākhyātā eteṣu brāhmaṇo 'dhikaḥ // NarP_1,24.7 //
GP12nardp1_u:4207: kriyāḥ sāmānyato vakṣye tacchṛṇuṣva samāhitaḥ // NarP_1,24.18 //
GP12nardp1_u:4219: duṣṭānāṃ śāsanaṃ kuryyācchiṣṭānāṃ pālanaṃ tathā // NarP_1,24.24 //
GP12nardp1_u:4233: nāśrayecchūdravṛttiṃ tu atyāpadyapi vai dvijaḥ // NarP_1,24.31 //
GP12nardp1_u:4237: brahmacārī gṛhī vānaprastho bhikṣuśca sattama // NarP_1,24.33 //
GP12nardp1_u:4241: tato yāti paraṃ sthānaṃ yato nāvarttate punaḥ // NarP_1,24.35 //
GP12nardp1_u:4242: iti śrībṛhannārāyaṇapurāṇe pūrvabhāge prathamapāde sadācāro nāma caturviśo
GP12nardp1_u:4247: pāṣaṇḍaḥ sa hi vijñeyaḥ sarvadharmabahiṣkṛtaḥ // NarP_1,25.2 //
GP12nardp1_u:4251: ṣaṣṭe vā satpame vāpi aṣṭame vāpi kārayet // NarP_1,25.4 //
GP12nardp1_u:4252: jāte putre pitā snātvā sacailaṃ jātakarma ca /
GP12nardp1_u:4255: annena kārayedyastu sa caṇḍāla samo bhavet // NarP_1,25.6 //
GP12nardp1_u:4259: na dadyānnāma viprenda tathā ca viṣathamākṣaram // NarP_1,25.8 //
GP12nardp1_u:4261: satpame cāṣṭame vāpi kuryād gṛhyoktamārgataḥ // NarP_1,25.9 //
GP12nardp1_u:4263: kartavyaḥ pādakṛcchro vai caule tvarddhaṃ prakalpayet // NarP_1,25.10 //
GP12nardp1_u:4274: sāṃtapanadvayaṃ caiva kṛtvā karma samācaret // NarP_1,25.15 //
GP12nardp1_u:4276: rmauñjī viprasya vijñeyā dhanurjyā kṣattriyasya tu // NarP_1,25.16 //
GP12nardp1_u:4278: viprasya coktamaiṇeyaṃ rauravaṃ kṣatriyasya tu // NarP_1,25.17 //
GP12nardp1_u:4281: bailvaṃ vaiśyasya vijñeya tatpramāṇaṃ śṛṇuṣva me /
GP12nardp1_u:4282: viprasya keśamānaṃ syādālalāṭaṃ nṛpasya ca // NarP_1,25.19 //
GP12nardp1_u:4284: tathā vāsāṃsi vakṣaghyāmi viprādīnāṃ yathākramam // NarP_1,25.20 //
GP12nardp1_u:4285: kaṣāyaṃ caiva māñjiṣṭaṃ hāridraṃ ca prakīrtitam /
GP12nardp1_u:4286: upanīto dvijo vipra paricaryāparo guroḥ // NarP_1,25.21 //
GP12nardp1_u:4291: naṣṭe bhraṣṭe navaṃ mantrāddhṛtvā bhraṣṭaṃ jale kṣipet /
GP12nardp1_u:4294: bhavatpūrvaṃ brāhmaṇasya bhavanmadhyaṃ nṛpasya ca // NarP_1,25.25 //
GP12nardp1_u:4310: abhivādanaśīlaḥ syād vṛddheṣu ca yathākramam // NarP_1,25.33 //
GP12nardp1_u:4312: ādhyātmikā diduḥkhāni nivārayati yo guruḥ // NarP_1,25.34 //
GP12nardp1_u:4318: pāṣaṇḍaṃ patitaṃ vrātyaṃ tathā nakṣaghatrajīvinam // NarP_1,25.37 //
GP12nardp1_u:4320: unmattaṃ ca śaṭhaṃ dhūrttaṃ dhāvantamaśuciṃ tathā // NarP_1,25.38 //
GP12nardp1_u:4324: bhartṛnghīṃ puṣpiṇīṃ jārāṃ sūtikāṃ garbhapātinīm // NarP_1,25.40 //
GP12nardp1_u:4327: pratyekaṃ tu namaskāro hṝnti puṇyaṃ purākṛtam /
GP12nardp1_u:4328: śrāddhaṃ vrataṃ tathā dānaṃ devatābhyārcanaṃ tathā // NarP_1,25.42 //
GP12nardp1_u:4329: yajñaṃ ca tarpaṇaṃ caiva kurvantaṃ nābhivādayet /
GP12nardp1_u:4330: kṛte 'bhivādane yastu na kuryā tprativādanam // NarP_1,25.43 //
GP12nardp1_u:4331: nābhivādyaḥ sa vijñeyo yayā śūdrastathaiva saḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:4333: tasya pādau ca saṃgṛhya adhīyīta vicakṣaṇaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:4338: pariveṣaṃ gate sūrye śrotriye gṛhamāgate // NarP_1,25.47 //
GP12nardp1_u:4340: saṃdhyāyāṃ garjite meghe hyakāle parivarṣaṇe // NarP_1,25.48 //
GP12nardp1_u:4342: manvādiṣu ca devarṣe yugādiṣu caturṣvapi // NarP_1,25.49 //
GP12nardp1_u:4344: tṛtīyā prādhave śuklā bhādre kṛṣṇā traghayodaśī // NarP_1,25.50 //
GP12nardp1_u:4345: kārttike navamī śuddhā māghe pañcadaśī tithiḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:4353: kārtikī phaālgunī caighatrīṃ jyaiṣṭhī pañcadaśī sitā /
GP12nardp1_u:4358: galagrahe durddine ca nādhīyīta kadācanā // NarP_1,25.57 //
GP12nardp1_u:4362: anadhyāye tu yo 'dhīte taṃ vidyādvrahmaghātakam // NarP_1,25.59 //
GP12nardp1_u:4363: na taṃ saṃbhāṣayedviprana tena saha saṃvaset /
GP12nardp1_u:4366: anadhītya tu yo vedamanyatra kurute śramam // NarP_1,25.61 //
GP12nardp1_u:4370: nityaṃ naimittikaṃ kāmyaṃ yaccānyatkarma vaidikam // NarP_1,25.63 //
GP12nardp1_u:4374: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge prathamapāde smārtācāreṣu varṇāśramadharmeṣvadhyayanādidharmanirupaṇaṃ nāma pañcaviṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:4378: adhītya gurave dattvā dakṣiṇāṃ saṃviśedvṛham // NarP_1,26.2 //
GP12nardp1_u:4380: dvijaḥ samudvahetkanyāṃ suśīlāṃ dharma cāriṇīm // NarP_1,26.3 //
GP12nardp1_u:4392: atikṛṣṇāṃ raktavarṇāṃ dhūrtāṃ naivodvahe dvudhaḥ // NarP_1,26.9 //
GP12nardp1_u:4393: sadā rodanaśīlāṃ ca pāṇḍurābhāṃ ca kutsitām /
GP12nardp1_u:4398: garvitāṃ bakavṛttiṃ ca sarvathā nodvahedvudhaḥ // NarP_1,26.12 //
GP12nardp1_u:4400: pragalbhāṃ vāguṇāṃ jñātvā sarvathā tāṃ parityajet // NarP_1,26.13 //
GP12nardp1_u:4401: bharttṛputreṣu yā nārī sarvadā niṣṭhurā bhavet /
GP12nardp1_u:4402: parānukūlinī yā ca sarvathā tāṃ parityajet // NarP_1,26.14 //
GP12nardp1_u:4404: pūrvaḥ pūrvo varo jñeyaḥ pūrvābhāve paraḥ paraḥ // NarP_1,26.15 //
GP12nardp1_u:4407: brāhmeṇa ca vivāhena vaivāhyo vai dvijottamaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:4410: abhāveṣu tu pūrveṣāṃ kuryādeva parānbudhaḥ // NarP_1,26.18 //
GP12nardp1_u:4414: dhārayedvaiṇavaṃ daṇḍaṃ sodakaṃ ca kamaṇḍalum // NarP_1,26.20 //
GP12nardp1_u:4418: parānnaṃ naiva bhuñjīta paravādaṃ ca varjayet // NarP_1,26.22 //
GP12nardp1_u:4420: na saṃhatābhyāṃ hastābhyāṃ kaṇḍūyedātmanaḥ śiraḥ // NarP_1,26.23 //
GP12nardp1_u:4424: nāroheduṣṭrayānaṃ ca śuṣkavādaṃ ca varjayet // NarP_1,26.25 //
GP12nardp1_u:4425: anya striyaṃ na gacchecca paiśunyaṃ parivarjayet /
GP12nardp1_u:4428: asūyāṃ matsaratvaṃ ca divāsvāpaṃ ca varjayet // NarP_1,26.27 //
GP12nardp1_u:4430: svakaṃ nāma svanakṣatraṃ mānaṃ caivātigopayet // NarP_1,26.28 //
GP12nardp1_u:4431: na durjanaiḥ saha vase nnāśāstraṃ śṛṇuyāttathā /
GP12nardp1_u:4432: āsavadyūtagīteṣu dvijastu na rartiṃ caret // NarP_1,26.29 //
GP12nardp1_u:4433: ārdrāsthi ca tathocchiṣṭaṃ śūdraṃ ca patitaṃ tathā /
GP12nardp1_u:4434: sarpaṃ ca bhaṣaṇaṃ spṛṣṭvā sacailaṃ snānamācaret // NarP_1,26.30 //
GP12nardp1_u:4435: citiṃ ca citikāṣṭaṃ ca yūpaṃ cāṇḍālameva ca /
GP12nardp1_u:4436: spṛṣṭvā devalakaṃ caiva savāsā jalamāviśet // NarP_1,26.31 //
GP12nardp1_u:4444: tāṃbūlamaśuciṃ nādyāttathā suptaṃ na bodhayet // NarP_1,26.35 //
GP12nardp1_u:4446: na vāmahastenaikena pibedvakreṇa vā jalam // NarP_1,26.36 //
GP12nardp1_u:4450: darśe ca paurṇamāsyāṃ ca yāgaṃ kuryādyathāvidhi // NarP_1,26.38 //
GP12nardp1_u:4454: darśe ca pretapakṣe ca śrāddhaṃ kuryādgṛhī dvijaḥ // NarP_1,26.40 //
GP12nardp1_u:4455: manvādiṣu mṛdāhe ca aṣṭakāsu ca nārada /
GP12nardp1_u:4456: nāvadhānye samāyāte gṛhī śrāddhaṃ samācaret // NarP_1,26.41 //
GP12nardp1_u:4458: puṇyakṣetreṣu tīrtheṣu gṛhī śrāddhaṃ samācaret // NarP_1,26.42 //
GP12nardp1_u:4459: yajño dānaṃ tapo homaḥ svādhyāyaḥ pitṛtarpaṇam /
GP12nardp1_u:4460: vṛthā bhavati tatsarvamūrddhapuṇḍraṃ vinā kṛtam // NarP_1,26.43 //
GP12nardp1_u:4461: urddhapuṇḍraṃ ca tulasīṃ śrāddhe necchanti kecana /
GP12nardp1_u:4465: sadā cāraparā ye tu teṣāṃ viṣṇuḥ prasīdati /
GP12nardp1_u:4466: viṣṇau prasannatāṃ yāte kimasādhyaṃ dvijottama // NarP_1,26.46 //
GP12nardp1_u:4467: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge prathamapāde smārttadhermaṣu vedādhyayanādikasya gṛhasthadharmasya ca nirupaṇaṃ nāma ṣaḍviṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:4468: sanaka uvāca gṛhasthasya sadācāraṃ vakṣyāmi munisattama /
GP12nardp1_u:4469: yadrūtāṃ sarvapāpāni naśyantyeva na saṃśayaḥ // NarP_1,27.1 //
GP12nardp1_u:4477: tathā vṛkṣasya cchāyāyāṃ kāntāre vahnisannidhau // NarP_1,27.5 //
GP12nardp1_u:4479: brāhmaṇānāṃ samīpe ca tathā goguruyoṣitām // NarP_1,27.6 //
GP12nardp1_u:4481: evamādiṣu deśeṣu malamūtraṃ na kārayet // NarP_1,27.7 //
GP12nardp1_u:4482: śauce yatnaḥ sadā kāryaḥ śaucamūlo dvijaḥ smṛtaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:4484: śaucaṃ tu dvividhaṃ proktaṃ brāhmamābhyāntaraṃ tathā /
GP12nardp1_u:4487: na mūṣakādikhanitāṃ phaālotkṛṣṭāṃ tathaiva ca // NarP_1,27.10 //
GP12nardp1_u:4489: śaucaṃ kuryātprayatnena samādāya śubhāṃ mṛdam // NarP_1,27.11 //
GP12nardp1_u:4490: liṅge mṛdekā dātavyā tisro vā meḍhrayordvayoḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:4492: ekā liṅge gude pañca daśa vāme tathobhayoḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:4493: satpa tisraḥ pradātavyāḥ pādayormṛttikāḥ pṛthak // NarP_1,27.13 //
GP12nardp1_u:4498: āture niyamo nāsti mahāpadi tathaiva ca /
GP12nardp1_u:4503: evaṃ śaucaṃ tu nirvartya paścādvai susamāhitaḥ // NarP_1,27.18 //
GP12nardp1_u:4516: āyurbalaṃ yaśo varcaḥ prajāḥ paśuvasūni ca /
GP12nardp1_u:4517: brahma prajñāṃ ca medhāṃ ca tvanno dhehi vanaspate // NarP_1,27.25 //
GP12nardp1_u:4525: jihvāmullikhya tābhyāṃ tu dalubhyāṃ niyatendriyaḥ // NarP_1,27.29 //
GP12nardp1_u:4527: tataḥ snānaṃ prakurvīta nadyādau vimale jale // NarP_1,27.30 //
GP12nardp1_u:4529: praṇamya tatra tīrthāni āvāhya ravimaṇḍalāt // NarP_1,27.31 //
GP12nardp1_u:4532: gaṅge ca yamune caiva godāvari sarasvati /
GP12nardp1_u:4535: āgacchantu mahābhāgāḥ snānakāle sadā mama // NarP_1,27.34 //
GP12nardp1_u:4536: ayodhyā mathurā māyā kāśīṃ kāñcī hyavantikā /
GP12nardp1_u:4537: purī dvārāvatī jñeyā satpaitā mokṣadāyikāḥ // NarP_1,27.35 //
GP12nardp1_u:4541: paridhāyāhataṃ dhautaṃ dvitīyaṃ parivīya ca // NarP_1,27.37 //
GP12nardp1_u:4543: īśānābhimukho vipra gāyatryācamya vai dvija // NarP_1,27.38 //
GP12nardp1_u:4545: tatastu vāriṇātmānaṃ veṣṭayitvā samukṣya ca // NarP_1,27.39 //
GP12nardp1_u:4549: vinyasya hṛdaye tāraṃ bhūḥ śirasyatha vinyaset // NarP_1,27.41 //
GP12nardp1_u:4551: bhūrbhuvaḥ svastathātrāstraṃ dikṣu tālatrayaṃ nyaset // NarP_1,27.42 //
GP12nardp1_u:4553: āgaccha varade devi tryakṣare brahmavādini // NarP_1,27.43 //
GP12nardp1_u:4559: tāraṃ ca vyāhṛtīḥ satpa tripadāṃ ca samuccaran // NarP_1,27.46 //
GP12nardp1_u:4560: śiraḥ śikhāṃ ca saṃpūrya kubhayitvā virecayet /
GP12nardp1_u:4563: āpaḥ punantu madhyāhne sāyamagniścameti ca // NarP_1,27.48 //
GP12nardp1_u:4565: sumutriyā na ityuktvā nāsāspṛṣṭajalena ca // NarP_1,27.49 //
GP12nardp1_u:4567: ṛtaṃ ca satyametena kṛtvā caivādhamarṣaṇam // NarP_1,27.50 //
GP12nardp1_u:4569: tataḥ sūryāya vidhivadgandhaṃ puṣpaṃ jalāñjalim // NarP_1,27.51 //
GP12nardp1_u:4576: brahmaṇī caturānanākṣavalayā kumbhaṃ karaiḥ srukstravau bibhrāṇā tvaruṇendukāntivadanā ṛgrūpiṇī bālikā /
GP12nardp1_u:4577: haṃsārohaṇakelikhaṇkhaṇmaṇerbibārcitā bhūṣitā gāyatrī paribhāvitā bhavatu naḥ saṃpatsamṛddhyai sadā // NarP_1,27.55 //
GP12nardp1_u:4578: rudrāṇī navayauvanā trinayanā vaiyāghnacarmāṃbarā khaṭvāṅgatraghiśikhākṣasūtravalayābhītiśriyai cāstu naḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:4579: vidyuddāmajaṭākalāpavilasadvārledumaulirmudā sāvitrī vṛṣavāhanā sitatanurdhyeyā yajūrūpiṇī dhyeyā sā ca sarasvatī bhagavatī pītāṃbarālaṅkṛtā śyāmā śyāmatanurjaroparilasadgātrāñcitā vaiṣṇavī /
GP12nardp1_u:4580: tārkṣyasthā maṇinūpurāṅgadalasadgraiveyabhūṣojjvalā hastālaṅkṛtaśaṅkhacakrasugadāpahmāśriyai cāstu naḥ // NarP_1,27.57 //
GP12nardp1_u:4586: gṛhasthasya sattāraḥ syājjapya evaṃvidho mune // NarP_1,27.60 //
GP12nardp1_u:4587: tato japtvā yathāśakti savitre vinivedya ca /
GP12nardp1_u:4588: gāyatryai ca savitre ca prakṣipedañjalidrūyam // NarP_1,27.61 //
GP12nardp1_u:4589: tato visṛjya tāṃ vipra uttare iti mantrataḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:4592: prātarādeḥ paraṃ karma kuryādapi vidhānataḥ // NarP_1,27.63 //
GP12nardp1_u:4595: āturāṇāṃ tu rogadyaiḥ pānthānāṃ ca sakṛnmatam /
GP12nardp1_u:4598: śarvaryāḥ prathame yāme tāni kuryādyathākramam // NarP_1,27.66 //
GP12nardp1_u:4600: pāṣaṇḍaḥ sa hi vijñeyaḥ sarvadharmabahiṣkṛtaḥ // NarP_1,27.67 //
GP12nardp1_u:4620: dvijānāṃ bhojyamaśrī yātpātraṃ naiva parityajet // NarP_1,27.77 //
GP12nardp1_u:4621: saṃsthāpya svāsame pādau vastrārddhaṃ paridhāya ca /
GP12nardp1_u:4622: mukhena vamitaṃ bhuktvā surāpītyucyate budhaiḥ // NarP_1,27.78 //
GP12nardp1_u:4624: pratyakṣaṃ lavaṇaṃ caiva gomāṃsaśīti gadyate // NarP_1,27.79 //
GP12nardp1_u:4626: śabda na kārayedviprastaṃ kurvannārakī bhavet // NarP_1,27.80 //
GP12nardp1_u:4636: putreṣu bhāryāṃ niḥkṣipya vanaṃ gacchetsahaiva vā // NarP_1,27.85 //
GP12nardp1_u:4641: varjaye dgrāmajātāni puṣpāṇi ca phalāni ca /
GP12nardp1_u:4642: aṣṭau grāsāṃśca bhuñjīta na kuryādrātribhojanam // NarP_1,27.88 //
GP12nardp1_u:4644: vyavāyaṃ varjayeccaiva nidrālasye tathaiva ca // NarP_1,27.89 //
GP12nardp1_u:4648: yadā manasi vairāgyaṃ jātaṃ sarveṣu vastuṣu // NarP_1,27.91 //
GP12nardp1_u:4654: samaḥ śatrau ca mitre ca tathā mānāpamānayoḥ // NarP_1,27.94 //
GP12nardp1_u:4660: japecca praṇavaṃ nityaṃ jitātmā vijitendriyaḥ // NarP_1,27.97 //
GP12nardp1_u:4670: nirguṇaṃ paramaṃ dhyāyedātmānaṃ parataḥ param // NarP_1,27.102 //
GP12nardp1_u:4672: sahasraśīrṣaṃ devaṃ ca sadā dhyāyejjitendriyaḥ // NarP_1,27.103 //
GP12nardp1_u:4674: sa yāti paramānandaṃ paraṃ jyotiḥ sanātanam // NarP_1,27.104 //
GP12nardp1_u:4676: sa yāti paramaṃ sthānaṃ yatra gatvā na śocayati // NarP_1,27.105 //
GP12nardp1_u:4678: nārāyaṇaparā yānti tadviṣṇaḥ paramaṃ padam // NarP_1,27.106 //
GP12nardp1_u:4679: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge prathamapāde sadācāreṣu gṛhasthaāvānaprasthayatidharmnirupaṇaṃ nāma satpaviṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:4680: sanaka uvāca śṛṇuṣva muniśārdūla śrāddhasya vidhimuttamam /
GP12nardp1_u:4681: yacchrutvā sarvapāpebhyo mucyate nātra saṃśayaḥ // NarP_1,28.1 //
GP12nardp1_u:4683: adhaḥ śāyī brahmacārī niśi viprānnimantrayet // NarP_1,28.2 //
GP12nardp1_u:4686: adhvānaṃ kalahaṃ krodhaṃ vyavāyaṃ ca dhuraṃ tathā /
GP12nardp1_u:4687: śrāddhakarttā ca bhoktā ca divāsvāpaṃ ca varjayet // NarP_1,28.4 //
GP12nardp1_u:4688: śrāddhe nimantrito yastu vyavāyaṃ kurute yadi /
GP12nardp1_u:4698: ete niyojitavyā vai śrāddhe viprā munīśvara /
GP12nardp1_u:4701: kuṣṭī ca kunakhī caiva laṃbakarṇaḥ kṣatavrataḥ // NarP_1,28.11 //
GP12nardp1_u:4703: kuvādī parirvattā ca tathā devalakaḥ khalaḥ // NarP_1,28.12 //
GP12nardp1_u:4707: kuṇḍaśca golakaścaiva hyayājyānāṃ ca yājakaḥ // NarP_1,28.14 //
GP12nardp1_u:4720: tataḥ prātaḥ samutthāya prātaḥ kṛtyaṃ samāpya ca /
GP12nardp1_u:4723: sa kālaḥ kutapastatra pitṝṇāṃ dattamakṣayam // NarP_1,28.22 //
GP12nardp1_u:4724: aparāhnaḥ pitṝṇāṃ tu dattaḥ kālaḥ svayaṃbhuvā /
GP12nardp1_u:4725: tatkāla eva dātavyaṃ kavyaṃ tasmāddvijottamaiḥ // NarP_1,28.23 //
GP12nardp1_u:4727: rākṣasaṃ taddhi vijñeyaṃ pitṝṇāṃ nopatiṣṭati // NarP_1,28.24 //
GP12nardp1_u:4728: kāvyaṃ prattaṃ tu sāyāhne rākṣasaṃ tadbhavedapi /
GP12nardp1_u:4729: dātā narakamānpoti bhoktā ca narakaṃ vrajet // NarP_1,28.25 //
GP12nardp1_u:4731: viddhāparāhni kāyāṃ tu śrāddhaṃ kāryaṃ vijānatā // NarP_1,28.26 //
GP12nardp1_u:4733: pūrvā kṣaye tu karttavyā vṛdvau kāryā tathottarā // NarP_1,28.27 //
GP12nardp1_u:4735: tithiḥ sāyāhnagā yatra parā kāvyasya viśrutā // NarP_1,28.28 //
GP12nardp1_u:4737: naitanmataṃ hi sarveṣāṃ kāvyadāne munīśvara // NarP_1,28.29 //
GP12nardp1_u:4741: ubhau ca viśvedevārthaṃ pighatrarthaṃ trīnyathāvidhi // NarP_1,28.31 //
GP12nardp1_u:4745: vaiśyasya vartulaṃ jñeyaṃ śūdrasyābhyābhyukṣaṇaṃ bhavet // NarP_1,28.33 //
GP12nardp1_u:4747: ātmānaṃ vā niyuñjīta na vipraṃ vedavarjitam // NarP_1,28.34 //
GP12nardp1_u:4750: brāhmaṇānāṃ tu madhye ca dvāradeśe tathaiva ca /
GP12nardp1_u:4751: apahatā ityṛcā vai karttā tu vikirettilān // NarP_1,28.36 //
GP12nardp1_u:4753: dattveti bhūyo dadyacca daive kṣaṇapratīkṣaṇam // NarP_1,28.37 //
GP12nardp1_u:4755: annadāne caturthī syāccheṣāḥ saṃpuddhayaḥ smṛtāḥ // NarP_1,28.38 //
GP12nardp1_u:4758: yavosīti ti yavān kṣitpvā gandhapuṣpe ca vāgyataḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:4760: yā divyā iti mantreṇa dadyādarghyaṃ samāhitaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:4765: śannodevyā jalaṃ kṣiptvā tilosīti tilānkṣaghipet // NarP_1,28.43 //
GP12nardp1_u:4767: yā divyā iti mantreṇa dadyādarghyaṃ ca pūrvavat // NarP_1,28.44 //
GP12nardp1_u:4771: agnau kariṣya ityuktvā tebhyo 'nujñāṃ samāharet // NarP_1,28.46 //
GP12nardp1_u:4773: kuruṣva kriyatāṃ veti kurviti brūyureva ca // NarP_1,28.47 //
GP12nardp1_u:4775: sāmāya ca pitṛmate svadhā nama itīrayet // NarP_1,28.48 //
GP12nardp1_u:4776: agnaye kavyavāhanāya svadhā nama itīha vā /
GP12nardp1_u:4779: agnyabhāve tu viprasya pāṇau homo vidhīyate // NarP_1,28.50 //
GP12nardp1_u:4780: yathācāraṃ prakurvīta pāṇāvagnau ca vā dvija /
GP12nardp1_u:4782: saṃdhāyāgniṃ tataḥ kāryaṃ kṛtvā taṃ visṛjetkṛtī /
GP12nardp1_u:4785: kṣayāhe caiva saṃprātpe svasyāgnirdūrago yadi // NarP_1,28.53 //
GP12nardp1_u:4788: yadyagnau juhuyādvāpi pāṇau vā sa hi pātakī /
GP12nardp1_u:4789: upāsanāgnā dūrasthe kecidicchanti vai dvijāḥ // NarP_1,28.55 //
GP12nardp1_u:4794: ye yatra vihitāḥ śrāddhe sāvadhānāṃ bhavantu te /
GP12nardp1_u:4795: iti saṃprārthayeddevānye devāsa ṛcā nu vai // NarP_1,28.58 //
GP12nardp1_u:4797: amūrtānāṃ mūrtānāṃ ca pitṝṇāṃ dītpatejasām // NarP_1,28.59 //
GP12nardp1_u:4801: tataste brāhmaṇāḥ sarve bhuñjīranvāgyatā dvijāḥ // NarP_1,28.61 //
GP12nardp1_u:4803: yathaācāra pradeyaṃ ca madhunāṃsādikaṃ tathā // NarP_1,28.62 //
GP12nardp1_u:4805: yadi pātraṃ tyajetko 'pi brāhmaṇaḥ śrāddhayojitaḥ // NarP_1,28.63 //
GP12nardp1_u:4807: bhañjāneṣu ca vipreṣu hyanyonyaṃ saṃspuśedyadi // NarP_1,28.64 //
GP12nardp1_u:4813: trimadhu trisuparṇaṃ ca pāvamānaṃ yajūṃṣi ca // NarP_1,28.67 //
GP12nardp1_u:4817: brāhmaṇeṣu ca bhukteṣu vikiraṃ vikṣipettathā // NarP_1,28.69 //
GP12nardp1_u:4818: śeṣamannaṃ vadeccaiva madhusūktaṃ ca vai japet /
GP12nardp1_u:4819: svayaṃ ca pādau prakṣaghālya samyagācamya nārada // NarP_1,28.70 //
GP12nardp1_u:4823: acālayitvā pātraṃ tu svasti kurvanti ye dvijāḥ // NarP_1,28.72 //
GP12nardp1_u:4827: dadyācca dakṣiṇāṃ śaktyā tāṃbūlaṃ gandhasaṃyutam // NarP_1,28.74 //
GP12nardp1_u:4830: bhoktā ca śrāddhakṛttasyāṃ rajanyāṃ maithunaṃ tyajet /
GP12nardp1_u:4835: paitṛkena tu sūktena homaṃ kuryādvicakṣaṇaḥ // NarP_1,28.78 //
GP12nardp1_u:4837: snātvā ca vidhivadvipra kuryādvā tilataparṇam // NarP_1,28.79 //
GP12nardp1_u:4840: paredyuḥ śrāddhakṛnmartyo yo na tarpayate pitṝn /
GP12nardp1_u:4841: tatkulaṃ nāśamāyāti brahmahatyāṃ ca vindati // NarP_1,28.81 //
GP12nardp1_u:4842: śrāddhaṃ kurvanti ye martyāḥ śraddhāvanto munīśvara /
GP12nardp1_u:4843: na teṣāṃ saṃtaticchedaḥ saṃpannāste bhavanti ca // NarP_1,28.82 //
GP12nardp1_u:4844: pitṝnyañjati yeṃ śrāddhe taistu viṣṇuḥ prapūjitaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:4847: yakṣāśca siddhā manujā harireva sanātanaḥ // NarP_1,28.84 //
GP12nardp1_u:4849: tasmāddātā ca bhoktā ca sarvaṃ viṣṇuḥ sanātanaḥ // NarP_1,28.85 //
GP12nardp1_u:4850: yadasti vipra yannāsti dṛśyaṃ cādṛśyameva ca /
GP12nardp1_u:4851: sarvaṃ viṣṇumayaṃ jñeyaṃ tasmādanyanna vidyate // NarP_1,28.86 //
GP12nardp1_u:4855: karttā kārayitā caiva sarvaṃ viṣṇuḥ sanātanaḥ // NarP_1,28.88 //
GP12nardp1_u:4857: kathitaḥ kurvatāmevaṃ pāpaṃ sadyo vilīyate // NarP_1,28.89 //
GP12nardp1_u:4858: ya idaṃ paṭhate bhaktyā śrāddhakāle dvijottamaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:4860: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge prathamapāde śrāddhakriyāvarṇanaṃ nāmāṣṭāviṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:4861: sanaka uvāca tithīnāṃ nirṇayaṃ vakṣye prācaścittavidhiṃ tathā /
GP12nardp1_u:4863: śrautaṃ smārttaṃ vrataṃ dānaṃ yaccānyatkarma vaidikam /
GP12nardp1_u:4864: anirṇītāsu tithiṣu na kiñcitphalati dvija // NarP_1,29.2 //
GP12nardp1_u:4868: nāgaviddhā tu yā ṣaṣṭī śivaviddhā tu satpamī // NarP_1,29.4 //
GP12nardp1_u:4870: darśaṃ ca paurṇamāsīṃ ca satpamīṃ pitṛvāsaram // NarP_1,29.5 //
GP12nardp1_u:4872: kṛṣṇapakṣe pūrvaviddhāṃ satpamīṃ ca caturdaśīm // NarP_1,29.6 //
GP12nardp1_u:4874: vratādīnāṃ tu sarveṣāṃ śuklapakṣo viśiṣyate // NarP_1,29.7 //
GP12nardp1_u:4876: asaṃbhave vratādīnāṃ yadi paurvāhnikī tithiḥ // NarP_1,29.8 //
GP12nardp1_u:4882: arddharātrādadho yā tu nakṣatravyāpinī tithiḥ // NarP_1,29.11 //
GP12nardp1_u:4886: arddharātradvaye syātāṃ nakṣatraṃ ca tithiryadi // NarP_1,29.13 //
GP12nardp1_u:4887: kṣaye pūrvā praśastā syādrṛddhau kāryā tathottarā /
GP12nardp1_u:4892: tataḥ syustithayaḥ puṇyāḥ karmānuṣṭānato divā // NarP_1,29.16 //
GP12nardp1_u:4895: tasyāṃ tu tadvataṃ kāryaṃ saiva kāryā vicakṣaṇaiḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:4902: vṛṣabhe vṛścike caiva siṃhe kumbhe tathaiva ca // NarP_1,29.21 //
GP12nardp1_u:4904: tulāyāṃ caiva meṣe ca pūrvataḥ paratastathā // NarP_1,29.22 //
GP12nardp1_u:4906: kanyāyāṃ mithune caiva mīne dhanuṣi ca dvija // NarP_1,29.23 //
GP12nardp1_u:4912: dṛṣṭacandrā sinīvālī naṣṭacandrā kuhūḥ smṛtā // NarP_1,29.26 //
GP12nardp1_u:4917: kṣaye pūrvā tu karttavyā vṛddhau kāryā tathottarā /
GP12nardp1_u:4929: tatrecchayā ca saṃgrāhyā pūrvā vātha parāthavā /
GP12nardp1_u:4935: paredyureva viprendra sadyaḥ kālo vidhīyate // NarP_1,29.38 //
GP12nardp1_u:4937: sadyaḥ kālaḥ paredyuḥ syājjñeyamevaṃ tithikṣaye // NarP_1,29.39 //
GP12nardp1_u:4941: dvādaśī ca trayodaśyāmasti cetsā parā smṛtā // NarP_1,29.41 //
GP12nardp1_u:4943: traghayodaśī ca rātryante tatra vakṣyāmi nirṇayam // NarP_1,29.42 //
GP12nardp1_u:4944: pūrvā gṛhasthaiḥ sā kāryyā hyuttarā yatibhistathā /
GP12nardp1_u:4945: gṛhasthāḥ siddhimicchanti yato mokṣaṃ yatīśvarāḥ // NarP_1,29.43 //
GP12nardp1_u:4946: dvādaśyāṃ tu kalāyāṃ vā yadi labhyeta pāraṇā /
GP12nardp1_u:4948: śulke vā yadi vā kṛṣṇe bhavedekādaśīdvayam /
GP12nardp1_u:4949: gṛhasthānāṃ tu pūrvoktā yatīnāmuttarā smṛtā // NarP_1,29.45 //
GP12nardp1_u:4952: viddhāpyekādaśī grāhyā parato dvādaśī na cet /
GP12nardp1_u:4953: aviddhāpi niṣiddhaiva parato dvādaśī yadi // NarP_1,29.47 //
GP12nardp1_u:4957: dvādaśī ca trayodaśyāṃ nāsti vā vidyate 'thavā // NarP_1,29.49 //
GP12nardp1_u:4961: dvādaśī ca trayodaśayāmasti tatra kathaṃ bhavet // NarP_1,29.51 //
GP12nardp1_u:4965: dvādaśī ca trayodaśyāmasti tatraiva cāpare // NarP_1,29.53 //
GP12nardp1_u:4966: upoṣyā dvādaśī śuddhā sarvaireva na saṃśayaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:4967: kecidāhuśca pūrvāṃ tu tanmataṃ na samañjasam // NarP_1,29.54 //
GP12nardp1_u:4969: pāraṇaṃ copavāsaṃ ca na kuryātputravāngṛhī // NarP_1,29.55 //
GP12nardp1_u:4973: nādyādvai yadi bhuñjīta surāpena samo bhavet // NarP_1,29.57 //
GP12nardp1_u:4975: prāyaścittaṃ muniśreṣṭha karttavyaṃ tatra yājñikaiḥ // NarP_1,29.58 //
GP12nardp1_u:4977: āpyāyasva ṛcā caiva somapāsta iti dvija // NarP_1,29.59 //
GP12nardp1_u:4981: yaḥ karoti vratādīni tasya syādakṣayaṃ phalam // NarP_1,29.61 //
GP12nardp1_u:4983: tasmāddharmaparā yānti tadviṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padam // NarP_1,29.62 //
GP12nardp1_u:4986: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge prathamapāde tithyādinirṇayo nāma ekonatriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:4987: sanaka uvāca prāyaścittavidhiṃ vakṣye śṛṇu nārada sāṃpratam /
GP12nardp1_u:4990: tatsarvaṃ niṣphalaṃ proktaṃ rākṣasaiḥ parisevitam // NarP_1,30.2 //
GP12nardp1_u:4995: brahmahā ca surāpī ca steyī ca gurutalpagaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:5002: taddravyaṃ dhvajadaṇḍe tu dhṛtvā vanacaro bhavet // NarP_1,30.8 //
GP12nardp1_u:5008: yadi vanyairna jīveta grāme bhikṣāṃ samācaret // NarP_1,30.11 //
GP12nardp1_u:5012: gonimittaṃ dvijārthaṃ vā prāṇānvāpi parityajet // NarP_1,30.13 //
GP12nardp1_u:5019: hatvā tu vipramātraṃ ca caretsaṃvatsaraṃ vratam /
GP12nardp1_u:5021: dviguṇaṃ kṣatriyasyoktaṃ triguṇaṃ tu viśaḥ smṛtam /
GP12nardp1_u:5022: brāhmaṇaṃ hṝnti yaḥ śūdrastaṃ muśalyaṃ virdurbudhāḥ // NarP_1,30.18 //
GP12nardp1_u:5023: rājñaiva śikṣā kartavyā iti śāsteṣu niścayaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:5024: brāhmaṇīnāṃ vadhe tvarddhaṃ pādaḥ syātkanyakāvadhe // NarP_1,30.19 //
GP12nardp1_u:5026: hatvā tu kṣatriyaṃ vipraḥ ṣaḍabdaṃ kucchramācaret // NarP_1,30.20 //
GP12nardp1_u:5027: saṃvatsaraṃ trayaṃ veśyaṃ śūrdraṃ hatvā tu vatsaram /
GP12nardp1_u:5028: dīkṣitasya striyaṃ hatvā brāhmaṇī cāṣṭavatsarān // NarP_1,30.21 //
GP12nardp1_u:5030: prāvaścittaṃ vidhānaṃ tu sarvatra munisattama // NarP_1,30.22 //
GP12nardp1_u:5032: gauḍī paiṣṭī ca mādhvī ca vijñeyā trividhā surā // NarP_1,30.23 //
GP12nardp1_u:5034: kṣīraṃ ghṛtaṃ vā gomūtrameteṣvanyatamaṃ mune // NarP_1,30.24 //
GP12nardp1_u:5038: tāmreṇa vāthaṃ pātreṇa tatpītvā maraṇaṃ vrajet // NarP_1,30.26 //
GP12nardp1_u:5040: ajñānādātmabuddyā tu surāṃ pītvā dvijaścaret // NarP_1,30.27 //
GP12nardp1_u:5046: tālaṃ ca pānasaṃ caiva drākṣaṃ khārjūrasaṃbhavam // NarP_1,30.30 //
GP12nardp1_u:5048: gauḍī mādhvī surā madyamevamekādaśa smṛtāḥ // NarP_1,30.31 //
GP12nardp1_u:5052: samakṣaṃ vā parokṣaṃ vā balāccauyaṇa vā tathā // NarP_1,30.33 //
GP12nardp1_u:5054: suvarṇasya pramāṇaṃ tu manvādyaiḥ paribhāṣitam // NarP_1,30.34 //
GP12nardp1_u:5064: guruṇāṃ yajñakatṝṇāṃ dhārmiṣṭānāṃ tathaiva ca // NarP_1,30.39 //
GP12nardp1_u:5066: kṛtānutāpo dehe ca saṃpūrṇe lepayed dhṛtam // NarP_1,30.40 //
GP12nardp1_u:5068: brahmasvaṃ kṣatriyo hṛtvā paścāttāpamavāpya ca // NarP_1,30.41 //
GP12nardp1_u:5078: gaurasarṣapamānaṃ tu hṛtvā hema vicakṣaṇaḥ // NarP_1,30.46 //
GP12nardp1_u:5082: hema kṛṣṇalamātraṃ tu hṛtvā sāṃtapanaṃ caret // NarP_1,30.48 //

GP12nardp1_u:5365: sthāvaratve pṛthivyāmutpabījāni jalasekānupadaṃ susaṃskārasāmagrīvaśādantaruṣmaprapācitānyucchūnatvamāpadya tato mūlabhāvaṃ tanmūlādaṅkurotpattistasmādapi parṇakāṇḍanālādikaṃ kāṇḍeṣu ca prasavamāpadyante teṣu ca puṣpasaṃbhavaḥ // NarP_1,32.2 //
GP12nardp1_u:5366: tāni puṣpāṇi kānicidaphalāni kānicitphalahetubhūtāni teṣu puṣpeṣu vṛddhabhāveṣu satsu tatpuṣpamūlatastuṣotpattirjāyate teṣu tuṣu bhoktṝṇāṃ prāṇināṃ saṃskārasāmagrīvaśāddhimaraśmikiraṇāsannatayā tadoṣadhirasastuṣāntaḥ praviśya kṣīrabhāvaṃ sametya svakāle taṇḍulākāratāmupagamya prāṇināṃ bhogasaṃskāravaśātsaṃvatsare phalinaḥ syuḥ // NarP_1,32.3 //
GP12nardp1_u:5369: tataśca krimayo bhūtvā sadāduḥkhabahulāḥ kṣaṇārdhdaṃ jīvantaḥ kṣaṇārdhdaṃ mriyamāṇā balavatprāṇipīḍāyāṃ nivārayitumakṣamāḥ śītavātādikleśabhūyiṣṭhā nityaṃ kṣudhākṣudhitā malamūtrādiṣu sacaranto duḥkhamanubhavanti //
GP12nardp1_u:5370: tata eva padmayonimāgatya balavadvādhodvejitā vṛthodvegabhūyiṣṭhāḥ kṣutkṣāntā nityaṃ vanacāriṇo mātṛṣvapi viṣayāturā vātādikleṣabahulāḥ kaśmiṃścijjanmani tṛṇāśanāḥ kasmiṃścijjanmani māṃsāmedhyādyadanāḥ kasmiṃścijjanmani kandamūlaphalāśanā durbalaprāṇipīḍāniratā duḥkhamanubhavanti // NarP_1,32.5 aṇḍajatve 'pi vātāśanāmāṃsāmedhyādyaśanāśca parapīḍāparāyaṇā nityaṃ
GP12nardp1_u:5373: evaṃ bahuyoniṣu saṃbhrāntāḥ krameṇa mānuṣaṃ janma prāpnuvanti /
GP12nardp1_u:5375: manuṣyajanma nāpi ca carmakāracaṇḍālavyādhānāpitarajakakuṃbhakāralohakārasvarṇakāratantuvācasaucikajaṭilasiddhadhāvakalekhakabhṛtakaśāsanahārinīcabhṛtyadraridahīnāṅgādhikāṅgatvādi duḥkhabahulajvaratāpaśītaśleṣmagulmapādākṣiśirogarbhapārśvavedanādiduḥkhamanubhavanti // manuṣyatve 'pi yadā strīpuruṣayorvyavāyastatsamayereto yadā jarāyuṃ praviśati tadaiva karmavaśājjantuḥ śukreṇa saha jarāyuṃ praviśya śukraśoṇitakalale pravarttate // NarP_1,32.9 //
GP12nardp1_u:5378: tataḥ prabhṛti vāyuvaśāccaitanyābhāve 'pi māturuhye duḥsahatāpalkeśatayaikatra sthātumaśakyatvād bhramati // NarP_1,32.11 //
GP12nardp1_u:5379: māse dvitīye pūrṇe puruṣākāramātratāmupagamaya māsatritaye pūrṇe karacaraṇādyavayavabhāvamupagamya caturṣu māseṣu gateṣu sarvāvayavānāṃ saṃdhibhedaparijñānaṃ pañcasvatīteṣu nakhānāmabhivyañjakakatā ṣaṭsvatīteṣu nakhasaṃdhiparisphuṭatāmupagamya nābhisūtreṇa puṣyamāṇamamedhyamūtrasiktāṅgaṃ jarāyuṇā bandhitaraktāsthikrimivasāmajjāsnāyukeśādidūṣite kutsite śarīre nivāsinaṃ svayamapyevaṃ paridūṣitadehaṃ mātuśca kaṭvamlalavaṇātyuṣṇabhuktadahyamātmānaṃ dṛṣṭvā dehī pūrvajanmasmaraṇānubhāvātpūrvānubhūtanarakaduḥthāni ca smṛtvāntarduḥkhena ca paridahyamāno māturdehātimūtrādirukṣeṇa dahyamāna evaṃ manasi pralayati aho 'tyantapāpo
GP12nardp1_u:5381: kalatrapoṣaṇārthaṃ paradhanakṣetrādikaṃ paśyato haraṇādyupāyairapahyatya kāmāndhatayā parastrīharaṇādikamanubhūya mahāpāpānyācaraṃstaiḥ pāpairahameka evaṃvidhanarakānanubhūya punaḥ sthāvarādiṣu mahāduḥkhamanubhūya saṃprati jarāyuṇā pariveṣṭito 'ntardukhena bahistāpena ca dahyāmi // NarP_1,32.13 //
GP12nardp1_u:5382: mayā poṣitā dārāśca svakarmavaśādanyato gatāḥ // NarP_1,32.14 //

GP12nardp1_u:5391: evaṃ bahuvidhaṃ garbhastho janturvilapya svayameva vā // NarP_1,32.19 //
GP12nardp1_u:5392: ātmānamāśvāsya utpatteranantaraṃ satsaṃgena viṣṇoścaritaśravaṇena ca viśuddhamanā bhūtvā satkarmāṇi nirvartya akhilajagadantarātmanaḥ satyajñānānandamayasya śaktiprabhāvānuṣṭitaviṣṭapavargasya lakṣmīpaternārāyaṇasya sakalasurāsurayakṣagandharvarākṣasapanna gamunikinnarasamūhārcitacaraṇakamalayugaṃ bhaktitaḥ samabhyarcya duḥsahaḥ saṃsāracchedasyakāraṇabhūtaṃ vedarahasyopaniṣadbhiḥ parisphuṭaṃ sakalalokaparāyaṇaṃ hṛdinidhāya duḥkhataramimaṃ saṃskārāgāramatikramiṣyāmīti manasi bhavayati yatastanmātuḥ prasūtisamaye sati garbhasthodehī nāradamune vāyunāparipīḍito mātuścāpi duḥkhaṃ kurvankarmapāśena balādyonimārgānniṣkrāmansakalayātanābhogamekakālabhavamanubhavati //
GP12nardp1_u:5395: bāhyavāyusparśasamanantarameva naṣṭasmṛtipūrvānubhūtākhiladuḥkhāni varttamānānyapi jñānābhāvadavijñāyātyantaduḥkhamanubhavati evaṃ bālatvamāpanno jantustatrāpi svamalamūtralitpadeha ādhyātmikādipīḍyamāno 'pi vaktumaśaktakṣuttṛṣāpīḍito rudite sati
GP12nardp1_u:5398: bālyabhāvamāsādya mātāpitrorupādhyāyasya tāḍanaṃ sadā paryaṭanaśīlatvaṃ pāṃśubhasmapaṅkādiṣukrīḍanaṃ sadā kalahaniyatatvāma śucitvaṃ bahuvyāpārābhāsakāryaniyatatvaṃ tadasaṃbhava ādhyātmikaduḥkhamevaṃvidhamanubhavati tatastu taruṇabhāvena dhanārjanamarjitasya rakṣaṇaṃ tasya nāśavyayādiṣu cātyantaduḥkhitā māyayā mohitāḥ kāmakrodhādiduṣṭamanasāḥ sadāsūyāparāyaṇāḥ parasvaparastrīharaṇopāyaparāyaṇāḥ putramitrakalatrādibharaṇopāyacintāparāyaṇā vṛthāhaṅkāradūṣitāḥ putrādiṣu vyādhyādi pīḍiteṣu satsu sarvavyātpiṃ parityajya rogādibhiḥ kleśitānāṃ samīpe svayamādhyātmikaduḥkhena pariplutā vakṣyamāṇaprakāreṇa citāmaśnuvate gṛhakṣetrādikaṃ kama kiñcinnāpi vicāritam /
GP12nardp1_u:5399: samṛddhasya kuṭumbasya kathaṃ bhavati varttanam // NarP_1,32.28 //
GP12nardp1_u:5400: mama mūladhanaṃ nāsti vṛṣṭiścāpi na varṣati /
GP12nardp1_u:5401: aśvaḥ palāyitaḥ kutra gāvaḥ kiṃ nāgatā mama // NarP_1,32.29 //
GP12nardp1_u:5402: bālāpatyā ca me bhāryā vyādhito 'haṃ ca nirdhanaḥ /

GP12nardp1_u:5404: bhagnaṃ chinnaṃ tu me sadma bāndhavā api dūragāḥ /

GP12nardp1_u:5949: kālena gacchatā vipra jātau tasya sutāvubho /
GP12nardp1_u:5963: jīryanti jīryataḥ keśāḥ dantā jīryanti jīryataḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:5964: cakṣuḥśrotre ca jīryete tṛṣṇekā taruṇāyate // NarP_1,35.21 //
GP12nardp1_u:5966: balaṃ hataṃ ca jarasā tṛṣṇā taruṇatāṃ gatā // NarP_1,35.22 //
GP12nardp1_u:5967: kaṣṭāśā varttate yasya sa vidrānatha paṇḍitaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:5971: balaṃ tejoḥ yaśaśvaiva vidyāṃ mānaṃ ca vṛddhatām /
GP12nardp1_u:5972: tathaiva satkule janma āśā hatyativegataḥ // NarP_1,35.25 //
GP12nardp1_u:5976: avamānādikaṃ duḥkhaṃ na jānanti kadāpyaho // NarP_1,35.27 //
GP12nardp1_u:5978: śarīramapi jīrṇaṃ ca jarasāpahataṃ balam // NarP_1,35.28 //
GP12nardp1_u:5980: evaṃ niścitya viprendra dharmamārga rato 'bhavat // NarP_1,35.29 //
GP12nardp1_u:5982: svayaṃ tu bhāga dvitaya svārjitārthādapāharat // NarP_1,35.30 //
GP12nardp1_u:5986: annādīnāṃ ca dānāni gaṅgātīre cakāra saḥ // NarP_1,35.32 //
GP12nardp1_u:5988: nāranārāyaṇa sthānaṃ jagāma tapase vanam // NarP_1,35.33 //
GP12nardp1_u:5993: śiṣyaiḥ parivṛtaṃ tatra muniṃ jānanti saṃjñakam /
GP12nardp1_u:5994: gṛṇantaṃ paramaṃ brahma tejorāśiṃ dadarśa ha // NarP_1,35.36 //
GP12nardp1_u:6000: vinayāvanato bhūtvā provāca vadatāṃ varam // NarP_1,35.39 //
GP12nardp1_u:6007: bhaja viṣṇuṃ paraṃ nityaṃ smara nārāyaṇaṃ prabhum /
GP12nardp1_u:6008: parāpavādaṃ paiśunyaṃ kadācidapi mā kṛthāḥ // NarP_1,35.43 //
GP12nardp1_u:6011: kāmaṃ krodhaṃ ca lobhaṃ ca mohaṃ ca madamatsarau /
GP12nardp1_u:6013: asūyāṃ paranindāṃ ca kadācidapi mā kuru /
GP12nardp1_u:6015: dayāṃ kuruṣva bhuteṣu śuśrūṣāṃ ca tathā satām /
GP12nardp1_u:6016: tvayā kṛtāṃśca dharmānvai mā prakāśaya pucchatām // NarP_1,35.47 //
GP12nardp1_u:6026: mārgaśobhāṃ ca dīpaṃ ca viṣṇorāyatane kuru // NarP_1,35.52 //
GP12nardp1_u:6030: vedāntapaṭhanaṃ caiva pratyahaṃ kuru śaktitaḥ // NarP_1,35.54 //
GP12nardp1_u:6036: ko 'haṃ mama kriyā keti svayameva vyaktintayat // NarP_1,35.57 //
GP12nardp1_u:6037: mama janma kathaṃ jātaṃ rūpaṃ kīdṛgvidhaṃ mama /
GP12nardp1_u:6041: vedamāliruvāca mama cittamatibhrātaṃ guro brahmavidāṃ vara /
GP12nardp1_u:6042: ko 'haṃ mama kriyā kā ca mama janma kathaṃ vada // NarP_1,35.60 //
GP12nardp1_u:6043: jānantiruvāca satyaṃ satyaṃ mahābhāgaṃ cittaṃ bhrātaṃ suniścitam /
GP12nardp1_u:6046: ahṝṅkāro manodharma ātmano nahi paṇḍita // NarP_1,35.62 //
GP12nardp1_u:6047: punaśca ko 'hamityuktaṃ vedamāle tvayā tu yat /
GP12nardp1_u:6048: mama jātyādi śūnyasya kathaṃ nāma karomyaham // NarP_1,35.63 //
GP12nardp1_u:6052: avicchinnasvabhāvasya kathyate ca kathaṃ kriyā // NarP_1,35.65 //
GP12nardp1_u:6054: anantasya kriyā caiva kathaṃ janma ca kathyate // NarP_1,35.66 //
GP12nardp1_u:6058: jñāne tvanāhate siddhe sarvaṃ brahmamayaṃ bhavet // NarP_1,35.68 //
GP12nardp1_u:6064: guruṃ praṇamya jānanti sadā dhyānaparo 'bhavat // NarP_1,35.71 //
GP12nardp1_u:6069: iti śrībṛhannārādīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge prathamapāde jñānanirūpaṇa nāma pañcatriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:6070: sanaka uvāca vedamāleḥ sutau proktau yāvubhau munisattama /
GP12nardp1_u:6071: yajñamālī sumālī ca tayoḥ karmādhunocyata // NarP_1,36.1 //
GP12nardp1_u:6073: dhanaṃ dvidhā kaniṣṭasya bhāgamekaṃ dadau tadā // NarP_1,36.2 //
GP12nardp1_u:6074: sumālī ca dhanaṃ sarvaṃ vyasanābhirakataḥ sadā /
GP12nardp1_u:6075: apādānā dibhiścaiva nāśayāmāsa bho dvija // NarP_1,36.3 //
GP12nardp1_u:6091: ādade svayamarddhaṃ ca dadāvarddhaṃ yavīyase // NarP_1,36.11 //
GP12nardp1_u:6096: bhrātrā dattaṃ dhanaṃ tañca sumālī nāśayanmune /
GP12nardp1_u:6099: rājñāpi bādhito vipraprapede nirjanaṃ vanam // NarP_1,36.15 //
GP12nardp1_u:6111: yajñamālī sumālī ca hyekakāle mṛtāvubhau // NarP_1,36.21 //
GP12nardp1_u:6113: hariḥ saṃpreṣayāmāsa vimānaṃ pārṣadā vṛtam // NarP_1,36.22 //
GP12nardp1_u:6123: krośantaṃ ca sudantaṃ ca dṛṣṭvā manasi vivyathe // NarP_1,36.27 //
GP12nardp1_u:6127: asau sumālī bhrātā te pāpātmeti samabruvan // NarP_1,36.29 //
GP12nardp1_u:6129: manasā duḥkhamāpannaḥ punaḥ papraccha nārada // NarP_1,36.30 //
GP12nardp1_u:6131: tadupāyaṃbadadhvaṃ me yūyaṃ hi mamabāndhavāḥ // NarP_1,36.31 //
GP12nardp1_u:6133: satāṃ sāptapadī maitrī satsatāṃ tripadī tathā // NarP_1,36.32 //
GP12nardp1_u:6134: satsatāmapi ye saṃtasteṣāṃ maitraghī pade pade // NarP_1,36.33 //
GP12nardp1_u:6135: tasmānme bāndhavā yūyaṃ māṃ netuṃ samupāgatāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:6136: yato 'yaṃ mama bhrātāpi mucyate tadihocyatām // NarP_1,36.34 //
GP12nardp1_u:6143: purā tvaṃ vaiśyajātīyo nāmnā viśvaṅghabharaḥ smṛtaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:6144: tvayā kṛtāni pāpāni ahantyagaṇitāni vai // NarP_1,36.38 //
GP12nardp1_u:6148: tadā vṛṣṭirabhūttatra tatsthānaṃ paṅkilaṃ hyabhūta // NarP_1,36.40 //
GP12nardp1_u:6152: daṃśitaścaiva sarpeṇa prāptaṃ pañcatvameva ca // NarP_1,36.42,1 //
GP12nardp1_u:6154: viprajanma tvayā prāptaṃ hari bhaktistathācalā // NarP_1,36.42,2 //
GP12nardp1_u:6156: vasādya jñānamāsādya paraṃ mokṣaṃ gamiṣyasi // NarP_1,36.43 //
GP12nardp1_u:6158: upāyaṃ tava vakṣyāmastaṃ nibodha mahāmate // NarP_1,36.44 //
GP12nardp1_u:6162: tatphalaṃ pradadau tasmai bhrātre pāpavimuktaye // NarP_1,36.46 //
GP12nardp1_u:6164: babhūva yamadūtāstu taṃ tyaktvā prapalāyitāḥ // NarP_1,36.47 //
GP12nardp1_u:6166: tadā sumālī svaryānamāruhya mumude mune // NarP_1,36.48 //
GP12nardp1_u:6176: sthitvā bhūmiṃ punaḥ prāpya vipratvaṃ samupāgataḥ // NarP_1,36.53 //
GP12nardp1_u:6180: tatra snātaśca gaṅgāyāṃ dṛṣṭvā viśveśvaraṃ prabhum // NarP_1,36.55 //
GP12nardp1_u:6184: akāmādapi ye viṣṇoḥ sakṛtpūjāṃ prakurvate // NarP_1,36.57 //
GP12nardp1_u:6191: śuśrūṣāniratā yānti pāpino 'pi parāṃ gatim // NarP_1,36.61 //
GP12nardp1_u:6192: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge prathamapāde viṣṇusevāprabhāvo nāma ṣaṭtriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:6193: sanaka uvāca bhūyaḥ śṛṇuṣva viprendra māhātmyaṃ kamalāpateḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:6194: kasya no jāyate prītiḥ śrotuṃ harikathāmṛtam // NarP_1,37.1 //
GP12nardp1_u:6197: sakṛdvā na namedyastu viṣṇuṃ pāpaharaṃ nṛṇām /
GP12nardp1_u:6200: śmaśānasadṛśaṃ taddhi kadācidapi no viśet // NarP_1,37.4 //
GP12nardp1_u:6203: yo vā ko vāpi viprendra vipradveṣaparāyaṇaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:6204: samarcayati govindaṃ tatpūjā viphalā bhavet // NarP_1,37.6 //
GP12nardp1_u:6206: sā pūjaiva mahābhāga pūjakānāśu hṝnti vai // NarP_1,37.7 //
GP12nardp1_u:6212: dṛḍhabhaktimatāṃ viṣṇau pāpabuddhiḥ kathaṃ bhavet // NarP_1,37.10 //
GP12nardp1_u:6214: kṣayaṃ yāti kṣaṇādeva teṣāṃ syātpāpadhīḥ katham // NarP_1,37.11 //
GP12nardp1_u:6216: caṇḍālā api vai śreṣṭhā haribhaktiparāyaṇāḥ // NarP_1,37.12 //
GP12nardp1_u:6222: sa snātaḥ sarvatīrtheṣu viṣṇoḥ priyataro bhavet // NarP_1,37.15 //
GP12nardp1_u:6226: ye prapannā mahātmānasteṣāṃ muktirhi śāśvatī // NarP_1,37.17 //
GP12nardp1_u:6236: na teṣāṃ śakyate vaktuṃ saṃkhyā vatsarakoṭibhiḥ // NarP_1,37.22 //
GP12nardp1_u:6242: chaditaṃ hemakalaśairdṛṣṭvā vyādho mudaṃ yayau // NarP_1,37.25 //
GP12nardp1_u:6248: cauryāntarāyakartāraṃ taṃ dṛṣṭvā lubdhako mune // NarP_1,37.28 //
GP12nardp1_u:6252: hṝntuṃ kṛtamatiṃ vyādhamuttaṅkaḥ prekṣya cābravīt // NarP_1,37.30 //
GP12nardp1_u:6253: uttaṅka uvāca bho bho sādho vṛthā māṃ tvaṃ haniṣyasi nirāgasam /
GP12nardp1_u:6254: mayā kimaparāddhaṃ te tadvadasva mahāmatte // NarP_1,37.31 //
GP12nardp1_u:6256: nahi saumya vṛthā ghnanti sajjanā api pāpinaḥ // NarP_1,37.32 //
GP12nardp1_u:6258: virodhaṃ nahi kurvanti sajjanāḥ śāntacetasaḥ // NarP_1,37.33 //
GP12nardp1_u:6260: tamuttamaṃ naraṃ prāhurviṣṇoḥ priyataraṃ sadā // NarP_1,37.34 //
GP12nardp1_u:6262: chede 'pi candanataruḥ surabhayati mukhaṃ kuṭhārasya // NarP_1,37.35 //
GP12nardp1_u:6263: aho vidhiḥ subalavānbā dhate bahudhā janān /
GP12nardp1_u:6265: aho niṣkāraṇaṃ loke bādhante bahudhā janān /
GP12nardp1_u:6273: ante tatsarvamutsṛjya eka eva prayati vai // NarP_1,37.40 //
GP12nardp1_u:6274: mama mātā mama pitā mama bhāryā mamātmajāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:6275: mamedamiti jantūnāṃ mamatā bādhate vṛthā // NarP_1,37.41 //
GP12nardp1_u:6279: mṛtamagnimukhe hutvā ghṛtānnaṃ bhuñjate hi te // NarP_1,37.43 //
GP12nardp1_u:6280: gacchantaṃ paralokaṃ ca naraṃ tu hyanutiṣṭataḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:6281: dharmādharmauṃ na ca dhanaṃ na putrā na ca bāndhavāḥ // NarP_1,37.44 //
GP12nardp1_u:6284: vṛthaiva vyākulā lokā dhanādānāṃ sadārjane // NarP_1,37.46 //
GP12nardp1_u:6286: iti niścitabuddhīnāṃ na cintā bādhate kvacit // NarP_1,37.47 //
GP12nardp1_u:6288: tasmājjanma ca mṛtyuṃ ca daivaṃ jānāti nāparaḥ // NarP_1,37.48 //
GP12nardp1_u:6289: yatra kutra sthitasyāpi yadbhāvyaṃ tadbhaved dhruvam /
GP12nardp1_u:6290: lokastu tatra vijñāya vṛthāyāsaṃ karoti hi // NarP_1,37.49 //
GP12nardp1_u:6293: arjitaṃ ca dhanaṃ sarvaṃ bhuñjate bāndhavāḥ sadā /
GP12nardp1_u:6296: gulikaḥ prāñjaliḥ prāha kṣamasveti punaḥ punaḥ // NarP_1,37.52 //
GP12nardp1_u:6299: mayā kṛtā ni pāpāni mahānti subahūni ca /
GP12nardp1_u:6300: tāni sarvāṇi naṣṭāni viprendra tava darśanāt // NarP_1,37.54 //
GP12nardp1_u:6302: kathaṃ me niṣkṛtir bhūyo yāmi kaṃ śaraṇaṃ vibhoḥ // NarP_1,37.55 //
GP12nardp1_u:6304: atrāpi pāpajālāni kṛtvā kāṃ gatimāpnuyām // NarP_1,37.56 //
GP12nardp1_u:6305: aho mamāyuḥ kṣayameti śīghraṃ pāpānyanekāni samarjjitāni /
GP12nardp1_u:6306: prātikriyā naiva kṛtā mayaiṣāṃ gatiśca kā syānmamajanma kiṃ vā //
GP12nardp1_u:6307: aho vidhiḥ pāpaśatā kulaṃ māṃ kiṃ sṛṣṭavānpāpataraṃ ca śaśvat /
GP12nardp1_u:6308: kathaṃ ca yatpāpaphalaṃ hi bhokṣye kiyatsu janmasvahamugrakarmā //
GP12nardp1_u:6311: uttaṅkaḥ patitaṃ prekṣya lubagdhakaṃ taṃ dayāparaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:6315: gulika uvāca uttaṅka muniśārdūla gurustvaṃ mama suvrata /
GP12nardp1_u:6320: prāpito 'smi tvayā tasmāttadviṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padam // NarP_1,37.64 //
GP12nardp1_u:6322: tasmānnato 'smi te vidvanmatkṛtaṃ tatkṣamasva ca // NarP_1,37.65 //
GP12nardp1_u:6324: pradakṣiṇātrayaṃ kṛtvā namaskāraṃ cakāra saḥ // NarP_1,37.66 //
GP12nardp1_u:6330: vareṇa tenoktaṅko 'pi prapede paramaṃ padam // NarP_1,37.69 //
GP12nardp1_u:6332: nārada uvāca kintatstotraṃ mahābhāga kathaṃ tuṣṭo janārdanaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:6334: sanaka uvāca uttaṅkastu tadā vipro haridhyānaparāyaṇaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:6335: pādodakasya māhātmyaṃ dṛṣṭvā tuṣṭāva bhaktitaḥ // NarP_1,38.2 //
GP12nardp1_u:6336: uttaṅka uvāca nato 'smi nārāyaṇamādidevaṃ jagannivāsaṃ jagadekabandhum /
GP12nardp1_u:6338: yannibhijābja prabhavo vidhātā sṛjatyamuṃ lokasamuñcayaṃ ca /
GP12nardp1_u:6339: yatkrodhajo hṝnti jagañca rudrastamādidevaṃ praṇato 'smi viṣṇum //
GP12nardp1_u:6341: vedāntavedyaṃ pukuṣaṃ purāṇaṃ taijonidhiṃ viṣṇumahaṃ prapannaḥ //
GP12nardp1_u:6345: nityaḥ prapannārti haraḥ parātmā dayāṃbudhirme varadastu bhaghūyāt //
GP12nardp1_u:6347: tvameva tatsarvamanantasāraṃ tvattaḥ paraṃ nāsti yataḥ parātman //
GP12nardp1_u:6351: tathaiva sarveṣvara eka eva pradṛśyate bhinna ivārivalātmā // NarP_1,38.10
GP12nardp1_u:6353: ta eva māyārahitāstadeva pasaayanti sarvātmakamātmarupam // NarP_1,38.11
GP12nardp1_u:6365: indriyāṇi mano buddhiḥ sattvaṃ tejo balaṃ dhṛtiḥ // NarP_1,38.17 //
GP12nardp1_u:6369: ye prapannā mahātmānasteṣāṃ muktirhi śāśvatī // NarP_1,38.19 //
GP12nardp1_u:6370: varaṃ vareṇyaṃ varadaṃ purāṇaṃ sanātanaṃ sarvagataṃ samastam /
GP12nardp1_u:6371: nato 'smi bhūyo 'pi nato 'smi bhūyo 'pi nato 'smi bhūyaḥ // NarP_1,38.20
GP12nardp1_u:6381: viṣṇusaṃjñaṃ jagaddhāma tamasmi śaraṇaṃ gataḥ // NarP_1,38.25 //
GP12nardp1_u:6382: yaṃ bhajanti kriyāniṣṭāyaṃ paśyanti ca yoginaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:6383: pūjyātpūjyataraṃ śāntaṃ gato 'smi śaraṇaṃ prabhum // NarP_1,38.26 //
GP12nardp1_u:6384: yaṃ na paśyanti vidvāṃso ya etadvyāvya tiṣṭati /
GP12nardp1_u:6390: sarvajñaṃ sarvagaṃ śāntaṃ sarvāntayā miṇaṃ harim /
GP12nardp1_u:6391: jñānātmakaṃ jñānanidhiṃ jñānasaṃsthaṃ vibhuṃ bhaje // NarP_1,38.30 //
GP12nardp1_u:6397: yaḥ pāti lokānparipūrṇabhāvastamaprameyaṃ śaraṇaṃ prapadye // NarP_1,38.33
GP12nardp1_u:6398: sahasraśīrṣaṃ ca sahasrapādaṃ sahasrabāhuḥ ca sahasranetram /
GP12nardp1_u:6403: vijñānabhedaṃ pratipannakalpaṃ na vāṅmayaṃ prāṇamayaṃ bhajāmi //
GP12nardp1_u:6404: na yasya rūpaṃ na balaprabhāvo na yasya karmāṇi na yatpramāṇam /
GP12nardp1_u:6406: saṃsārasidhau patitaṃ kadaryaṃ mohākulaṃ kāmaśatena baddham /
GP12nardp1_u:6407: akīrtibhājaṃ piśunaṃ kṛtaghnaṃ sadāśuciṃ pāparataṃ pramanyum /
GP12nardp1_u:6408: dayāṃbudhe pāhi bhayākulaṃ māṃ punaḥ punastvāṃ śaraṇaṃ prapadye //
GP12nardp1_u:6422: varaṃ vṛṇuṣva vatseti provāca munipuṅgavam // NarP_1,38.45 //
GP12nardp1_u:6423: asādhyaṃ nāsti kiñcitte prasanne mayi sattama /
GP12nardp1_u:6425: punaḥ praṇamya taṃ prāha devadevaṃ janārddanam // NarP_1,38.46 //
GP12nardp1_u:6426: kiṃ māṃ mohayasīśa tvaṃ kimanyairdeva me varaiḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:6428: kīṭeṣu pakṣiṣu mṛgeṣu sarīsṛpeṣu rakṣaḥ piśācamanujeṣvapi yatra tatrajajātasya me bhavatu keśava te prasāddāttvayyeva bhaktiracalāvyabhicāraṇī ca // NarP_1,38.48 //
GP12nardp1_u:6429: evamastviti lokeśaḥ śaṅkhaprāntena saṃspṛśan divyajñānaṃ dadau tasmai yogināmapidurlamabhagham puḥ stuvantaṃ viprendraṃ devadevo janārddanaḥ idamāha smitamukho hastaṃ tacchirasi nyasan śrībhagavānuvāca ārādhaya kriyāyogairmāṃ sadā dvijasattam /
GP12nardp1_u:6431: tvayā kṛtamidaṃ stotraṃ yaḥ paṭhetsatataṃ naraḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:6440: āvāpa duravāpaṃ vai tadviṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padam // NarP_1,38.56 //
GP12nardp1_u:6441: pūjito namito vāpi saṃsmṛto vāpi mokṣadaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:6446: so 'pi sarvāghanirmuktaḥ prayāti bhavanaṃ hareḥ // NarP_1,38.59 //
GP12nardp1_u:6447: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge prathamapāde viṣṇumāhātmyaṃ nāmāṣṭatriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:6448: sanaka uvāca bhūyaḥ śṛṇuṣva viprendra māhātmyaṃ parameṣṭinaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:6451: śṛṇvatāṃ vadatāṃ caiva tadbhaktānāṃ viśeṣataḥ // NarP_1,39.2 //
GP12nardp1_u:6455: durvṛttā vā suvṛttā vā tebhyo nityaṃ namonamaḥ // NarP_1,39.4 //
GP12nardp1_u:6458: dṛṣṭaḥ smṛtaḥ pūjito vā dhyātaḥ praṇamito 'pi vā /
GP12nardp1_u:6461: cintayedyo harernāma tasmai nityaṃ namo namaḥ // NarP_1,39.7 //
GP12nardp1_u:6463: yeṣāṃ muktiḥ karasthaiva yogināmapi durlabhā // NarP_1,39.8 //
GP12nardp1_u:6465: vadatāṃ śṛṇvatāṃ caiva sarvapāpa praṇāśanam // NarP_1,39.9 //
GP12nardp1_u:6472: sa tatra nṛpaśārdūlaḥ sadā saṃmārjane rataḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:6483: tanme vada mahābhāga kiṃ tvayā viditaṃ phalam // NarP_1,39.18 //
GP12nardp1_u:6487: tathāpi kiṃ mahābhāga etayoḥ satatodyataḥ // NarP_1,39.20 //
GP12nardp1_u:6488: sarvātmanā mahāpuṇyaṃ nareśa vidita ca yat /
GP12nardp1_u:6489: tad brūhi me guhyatamaṃ prītirmayi tavāsti cet // NarP_1,39.21 //
GP12nardp1_u:6492: jayadhvaja uvāca śṛṇuṣva vipraśārdūla mayaivācaritaṃ purā /
GP12nardp1_u:6497: piśuno niṣṭhuraścaiva hyapaṇyānāṃ ca vikrayī // NarP_1,39.25 //
GP12nardp1_u:6500: sa kadāciddharthaṃ tu pṛthivyāṃ paryaṭan dvijaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:6502: tasminmṛte tasya bhāryā nāmnā bandhumatī mune /
GP12nardp1_u:6503: kāmacāraparā sā tu parityaktā ca bandhubhiḥ // NarP_1,39.28 //
GP12nardp1_u:6507: gāvaśca viprā bahavo nihatā mṛgapakṣiṇaḥ // NarP_1,39.30 //
GP12nardp1_u:6511: kadācitkāmasaṃtapto gantu kāmo ratiṃ striyaḥ // NarP_1,39.32 //
GP12nardp1_u:6512: śūnyaṃ viṣṇugṛhaṃ dṛṣṭvā praviṣṭaśca striyā saha /
GP12nardp1_u:6513: niśi rāmopabhogārthaṃ śayitaṃ tatra kāminā // NarP_1,39.33 //
GP12nardp1_u:6519: evaṃ sthite viṣṇugṛhe hyāgatāḥ purapālakāḥ // NarP_1,39.36 //
GP12nardp1_u:6520: jāro 'yamiti māṃ tāṃ ca hatavantaḥ prasahya vai /
GP12nardp1_u:6521: āvāṃ nihatya te sarve nivṛttāḥ purakṣakāḥ // NarP_1,39.37 //
GP12nardp1_u:6527: tatra sthitvā brahmakalpaśataṃ sāgraṃ dvijottama // NarP_1,39.40 //
GP12nardp1_u:6529: tataśca bhūmibhāgeṣu devayogeṣu vai kramāt // NarP_1,39.41 //
GP12nardp1_u:6533: bhaktyā kurvanti ye saṃtasteṣāṃ puṇyaṃ na vedyaham // NarP_1,39.43 //
GP12nardp1_u:6535: yatiṣye parayā bhaktyā hyahaṃ jātismaro yataḥ // NarP_1,39.44 //
GP12nardp1_u:6539: bhaktibhadbhiḥ praśāntaiśca kiṃ punaḥ samyagarcanāt // NarP_1,39.46 //
GP12nardp1_u:6544: anityā bāndhavāḥ sarve vibhavo naiva śāśvataḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:6545: nityaṃ sannihito mṛtyuḥ kartavyo dharmasaṃgrahaḥ // NarP_1,39.49 //
GP12nardp1_u:6546: ajño loko vṛthā garvaṃ kariṣyati mahoddhataḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:6553: sarvabhūtadayā vāpi sulabhā yasya kasya cit // NarP_1,39.53 //
GP12nardp1_u:6555: durlabhaṃ prāpyaṃ mānuṣyaṃ na tathā gamayed budhaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:6559: bhrātarāśraya govindaṃ mā vilaṃbaṃ kuru priya /
GP12nardp1_u:6560: āsannameva nagaraṃ kṛtāntasya hi dṛśyate // NarP_1,39.57 //
GP12nardp1_u:6564: ye prapannā mahātmānaste kṛtārthā na saṃśayaḥ // NarP_1,39.59 //
GP12nardp1_u:6570: pānīyaṃ vā phalaṃ vāpi sa eva bhagavatpriyaḥ // NarP_1,39.62 //
GP12nardp1_u:6571: viṣṇubhaktiparāṇāṃ tu śuśrūṣāṃ kurvate tu ye /
GP12nardp1_u:6573: ye yañjati spṛhāśūnyā haribhaktān hariṃ tathā /
GP12nardp1_u:6574: ta eva bhuvanaṃ sarvaṃ puṃnati svāṅghripāṃśunā // NarP_1,39.64 //
GP12nardp1_u:6577: pūjyamānā ca tulasī yasya tiṣṭati veśmani /
GP12nardp1_u:6580: na bādhante grahāstatra bhūtavetāla kādayaḥ // NarP_1,39.67 //
GP12nardp1_u:6586: sāṃgā vedāstathā sarve viṣṇorūpaṃ prakīrtitam // NarP_1,39.70 //
GP12nardp1_u:6588: te 'pi yānti paraṃ sthānaṃ sarvakarmanibarhaṇam // NarP_1,39.71 //
GP12nardp1_u:6589: iti bṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge prathama pāde viṣṇumāhātmyaṃ nāma ekonacatvāriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:6590: sanaka uvāca ataḥ paraṃ pravakṣyāmi vibhūtiṃ vaiṣṇavīṃ mune /
GP12nardp1_u:6591: yāṃ śṛṇvatāṃ kīrtayatāṃ sadyaḥ pāpakṣayo bhavet // NarP_1,40.1 //
GP12nardp1_u:6597: atītabrahmaṇaḥ kalpe sṛṣṭiḥ kīdṛgvidhā prabho // NarP_1,40.4 //
GP12nardp1_u:6598: indrastu kīdṛśaḥ prokto vivudhāḥ kīdṛśāḥ smṛtāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:6599: teṣāṃ ca kīdṛśaṃ karma yathāvadvaktumarhasi // NarP_1,40.5 //
GP12nardp1_u:6600: bṛhaspatiruvāca na jñāyate mayā śakra pūrvedyuścaritaṃ vidheḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:6603: yo vijānāti taṃ te 'dya kathayāmi niśāmaya // NarP_1,40.7 //
GP12nardp1_u:6604: sudharma iti vikhyātaḥ kaścidāste pure tava /
GP12nardp1_u:6606: sa vā eta dvijānāti kathayāmi niśāmaya /
GP12nardp1_u:6610: dṛṣṭvā yathārhaṃ devarṣe pūjayāmāsa sādaram // NarP_1,40.11 //
GP12nardp1_u:6613: indra uvāca atītabrahmakalpasya vṛttāntaṃ vetsi cedbudha /
GP12nardp1_u:6618: dānena vā tapobhirvā kathametādṛśaḥ prabho // NarP_1,40.15 //
GP12nardp1_u:6622: ekasmin divase śakra manavaśca caturdaśa // NarP_1,40.17 //
GP12nardp1_u:6624: indrāṇāṃ caiva sarveṣāṃ manvādīnāṃ ca vāsava // NarP_1,40.18 //
GP12nardp1_u:6625: tulyatā tejasā lakṣmyā prabhāveṇa balena ca /
GP12nardp1_u:6626: teṣāṃ nāmāni vakṣyāmi śṛṇuṣva susamāhitaḥ // NarP_1,40.19 //
GP12nardp1_u:6633: bhautyaścaturdaśaḥ prokta ete hi manavaḥ smṛtāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:6644: amitābhādayo devāḥ ṣaṣṭhe 'pi ca tathā śṛṇu /
GP12nardp1_u:6645: āryādyā vibudhāḥ proktāsteṣā mindro manojavaḥ // NarP_1,40.28 //
GP12nardp1_u:6653: vihṝṅgṝmādyā devāśca teṣāmindro vṛṣaḥ smṛtaḥ // NarP_1,40.32 //
GP12nardp1_u:6655: krabhuvanāmā ca devendro harinābhāstathā surāḥ // NarP_1,40.33 //
GP12nardp1_u:6658: caturdaśe cākṣupādyā devā indraḥ śuciḥ smṛtaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:6659: evaṃ te manavaḥ proktā indrā devāśca tattvataḥ // NarP_1,40.35 //
GP12nardp1_u:6662: karttāro bahavaḥ saṃti tatsaṃkhyāṃ vetti kovidaḥ // NarP_1,40.37 //
GP12nardp1_u:6663: mayi sthite brahmaloke brahmāṇāṃ bahavo gatāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:6664: teṣāṃ saṃkhyā na saṃkhyātu śakto 'smyadya dvijottama // NarP_1,40.38 //
GP12nardp1_u:6668: tataḥ paraṃ gamiṣyāmi karmabhūmiṃ śṛṇuṣva me // NarP_1,40.40 //
GP12nardp1_u:6669: mayā kṛtaṃ purā karma vakṣyāmi tava suvrata /
GP12nardp1_u:6671: ahamāṃsa purā śakra gṛdhraḥ pāpo viśeṣataḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:6678: gataḥ pradakṣiṇā kāraṃ viṣṇostanmandiraṃ prabho // NarP_1,40.45 //
GP12nardp1_u:6680: mama cāpi śunaścāpi dattāvanparamaṃ padam // NarP_1,40.46 //
GP12nardp1_u:6682: saṃprāptaṃ vibudhaśreṣṭha kiṃ punaḥ samyagarcanāt // NarP_1,40.47 //
GP12nardp1_u:6690: ye mānavāḥ pratidinaṃ parimuktasaṅgā nārāyaṇaṃ garuḍavāhanamarcayanti /
GP12nardp1_u:6691: te sarvapāpanikaraiḥ parito vimuktā viṣṇoḥ padaṃ śubhataraṃ pratiyānti hṛṣṭāḥ // NarP_1,40.51
GP12nardp1_u:6692: ye mānavā vigatarāgaparāvarajñā nārāyaṇaṃ suraguruṃ satataṃ smaranti /
GP12nardp1_u:6693: dhyānena tena hatakilbiṣacetanāste mātuḥ payodhararasaṃ na punaḥ pibanti // NarP_1,40.52
GP12nardp1_u:6695: te vā puṃnati ca jaganti śarīrasaṃgāt saṃbhāṣaṇādapi tato harireva pūjyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:6697: tatraiva sakalaṃ bhadraṃ yathā nimne jalaṃ dvija // NarP_1,40.54 //
GP12nardp1_u:6701: pṛjyasya muniśreṣṭha paraṃ śreyo bhaviṣyati // NarP_1,40.56 //
GP12nardp1_u:6702: pūjayanti hariṃ ye tu niṣkāmāḥ śuddhamānasāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:6703: teṣāṃ viṣṇuḥ prasannātmā sarvānkāmān prayacchati // NarP_1,40.57 //
GP12nardp1_u:6708: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge prathamapāde viṣṇumāhātmye catvāriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:6709: nārada uvāca ākhyātaṃ bhavatā sarvaṃ mune tattvārtha kovida /
GP12nardp1_u:6711: sanaka uvāca sādhu sādhu mahāprājña mune lokopakāraka /
GP12nardp1_u:6714: tathā vināsamāyāti dharṃma eva mahītale // NarP_1,41.3 //
GP12nardp1_u:6715: kṛtaṃ tretā dvāparaṃ ca kaliśceti caturyugam /
GP12nardp1_u:6718: kālato veditavyāni ityuktaṃ tattvā darśibhiḥ // NarP_1,41.5 //
GP12nardp1_u:6720: tataśca dvāparaṃ prāhuḥ kalimantyaṃ viduḥ kramāt // NarP_1,41.6 //
GP12nardp1_u:6722: nāsankṛtayuge vipra sarve devasamāḥ smṛtāḥ // NarP_1,41.7 //
GP12nardp1_u:6723: sarve hṛṣṭāśca dharmiṣṭā na tatra krayavikrayau /
GP12nardp1_u:6724: vedānāṃ ca vibhāgaśca na yuge kṛtasaṃjñake // NarP_1,41.8 //
GP12nardp1_u:6736: haristu raktātāṃ yāti kiñcitkleśānvitā janāḥ // NarP_1,41.14 //
GP12nardp1_u:6739: dvipādo vartate dharmo dvāpare ca munīśvara /
GP12nardp1_u:6746: adharmasya prabhāveṇa kṣīyante ca prajāstathā // NarP_1,41.19 //
GP12nardp1_u:6748: kecitpuṇyaratān dṛṣṭvā asūyāṃ vipra kurvate // NarP_1,41.20 //
GP12nardp1_u:6750: dharmaḥ kaliyuge prāpte pādenaikena vartate // NarP_1,41.21 //
GP12nardp1_u:6752: yaḥ kaścidapi dharmātmā yajñācārānkaroti ca // NarP_1,41.22 //
GP12nardp1_u:6754: naraṃ dharmarataṃ dṛṣṭvā sarve 'sūyāṃ prakurvate // NarP_1,41.23 //
GP12nardp1_u:6758: prajāścālpāyuṣaḥ sarvā bhaviṣyanti kalau yuge // NarP_1,41.25 //
GP12nardp1_u:6759: nārada uvāca yugadharmāḥ samākhyātāstvayā saṃkṣepato mune /
GP12nardp1_u:6760: kaliṃ vistarato brūhi tvaṃ hi dharmavidāṃ varaḥ // NarP_1,41.26 //
GP12nardp1_u:6762: kimāhārāḥ kimācārāḥ bhaviṣyanti kalau yuge // NarP_1,41.27 //
GP12nardp1_u:6768: ghore kaliyuge prāpte dvijā vedaparāṅmukhāḥ // NarP_1,41.30 //
GP12nardp1_u:6772: adharmalolupāḥ sarvale tathā vaitaṃhikā narāḥ // NarP_1,41.32 //
GP12nardp1_u:6773: ataḥ svalpāyuṣaḥ sarve bhaviṣyanti kalau yuge /
GP12nardp1_u:6776: vyātkrameṇa prajāḥ sarvā mniyante pāpatatparāḥ // NarP_1,41.34 //
GP12nardp1_u:6779: śūdratulyā bhaviṣyanti sarve varṇā kalau yuge /
GP12nardp1_u:6780: uttamā nīcatāṃ yānti nīcāścottamatāṃ tathā // NarP_1,41.36 //
GP12nardp1_u:6785: dviṣanti pitaraṃ putrā bhartāraṃ ca striyo 'khilāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:6788: ghore kaliyuge vipra sarve pāparatā janāḥ // NarP_1,41.40 //
GP12nardp1_u:6791: pṛthvī niṣphalatāṃ yāti bījaṃ puṣpaṃ vinaśyati /
GP12nardp1_u:6795: sādhūnāṃ vidhavānāṃ ca vittānya paharanti ca /
GP12nardp1_u:6796: na vratāni cariṣyanti brāhmaṇā dravyalolupāḥ // NarP_1,41.44 //
GP12nardp1_u:6798: dvijāḥ kurvanti daṃbhārthaṃ pitṛśrāddhādikāḥ kriyāḥ // NarP_1,41.45 //
GP12nardp1_u:6800: dugdhalobhanimittena goṣu prītiṃ ca kurvate // NarP_1,41.46 //
GP12nardp1_u:6801: na kurvanti tathā viprāḥ snānaśaucādikāḥ kriyāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:6804: na kasyāpi mano vipra viṣṇubhaktiparaṃ bhavet // NarP_1,41.48 //
GP12nardp1_u:6807: dānahīnā narāḥ sarve ghore kaliyuge mune /
GP12nardp1_u:6834: bhaviṣyanti narā vipra kalau cādharmabāndhavāḥ // NarP_1,41.63 //
GP12nardp1_u:6836: ghore kaliyuge vipra pañcavarṣā prasūyate // NarP_1,41.64 //
GP12nardp1_u:6842: nidāṃ kurvanti satataṃ pitṛmātṛsuteṣu ca // NarP_1,41.67 //
GP12nardp1_u:6846: prapuṣyanti vṛthaivāmī na vicārya ca duṣkṛtam // NarP_1,41.69 //
GP12nardp1_u:6848: dharmakārye rataṃ caiva vṛthāviśraṃbhiṇo janāḥ // NarP_1,41.70 //
GP12nardp1_u:6850: śūdrā bhaikṣyaratāścaiva teṣāṃ śuśrūṣaṇe dvijāḥ // NarP_1,41.71 //
GP12nardp1_u:6851: na śiṣyo na guruḥ kaścinna putro lana pitā tathā /
GP12nardp1_u:6852: na bhāryā na patiścaiva bhavitāro 'tra saṃkare // NarP_1,41.72 //
GP12nardp1_u:6853: kalau gate bhaviṣyanti dhanāḍhyā api yācakāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:6858: śūdravṛttyaiva jīvanti narakārhā dvijā mune // NarP_1,41.75 //
GP12nardp1_u:6864: kalau sarve bhaviṣyanti svalpabhāgyā bahuprajāḥ // NarP_1,41.78 //
GP12nardp1_u:6872: nidhāya hṛdyakarmaṇi prerayanti vacaḥ śubham // NarP_1,41.82 //
GP12nardp1_u:6879: yadā dvijā bhaviṣyanti tadā vṛddhiṃ kalirvrajet // NarP_1,41.86 //
GP12nardp1_u:6880: yadā prajā na yakṣyanti na hoṣyanti dvijātayaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:6883: sarvadharmeṣu naṣṭeṣu yāti niḥśrīkatāṃ jagat // NarP_1,41.88 //
GP12nardp1_u:6884: evaṃ kaleḥ svarūpaṃ te kathitaṃ viprasattama /
GP12nardp1_u:6886: tataḥ paraṃ kṛtayuge tretāyuge tretāyāṃ dhyānameva ca /
GP12nardp1_u:6889: dvāpare yañca māsena hyahorātreṇa tatkalau // NarP_1,41.91 //
GP12nardp1_u:6891: yadāpnoti tadāpnoti kalau saṃkīrtya keśavam // NarP_1,41.92 //
GP12nardp1_u:6892: ahorātraṃ harernāma kīrtayanti ca ye narāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:6893: kurvanti haripūjāṃ vā na kalirbādhate ca tān // NarP_1,41.93 //
GP12nardp1_u:6894: namo nārāyaṇāyeti kīrtayanti ca ye narāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:6895: niṣkāmā vā sakāmā vā na kalirbādhate ca tān // NarP_1,41.94 //
GP12nardp1_u:6896: harināmaparā ye tu ghore kaliyuge dvija /
GP12nardp1_u:6897: ta eva kṛtakṛtyāśca na kalirbādhate hi tān // NarP_1,41.95//.
GP12nardp1_u:6899: ta eva śivatulyāśca nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // NarP_1,41.96 //
GP12nardp1_u:6901: ghore kaliyuge prāpte viṣṇuṃ dhyāyanna sīdati // NarP_1,41.97 //
GP12nardp1_u:6907: itīrayanti ye nityaṃ nahi tānbādhate kaliḥ // NarP_1,41.100 //
GP12nardp1_u:6909: iti jalpanti ye vāpi kalistānnāpi bādhate // NarP_1,41.101 //
GP12nardp1_u:6911: itthaṃ vadanti ye vipra te kṛtārthā na saṃśayaḥ // NarP_1,41.102 //
GP12nardp1_u:6913: iti vāpyuñcarantīha na ca teṣāṃ kalerbhayam // NarP_1,41.103 //
GP12nardp1_u:6915: ghore kaliyuge vipra haribhaktastu durlabhā // NarP_1,41.104 //
GP12nardp1_u:6928: aho hariparā ye tu kalau ghore bhayaṅkare /
GP12nardp1_u:6929: te subhāgyā mahātmānaḥ satsaṃgara hitā api // NarP_1,41.111 //
GP12nardp1_u:6931: satyaṃ samastakarmāṇi yānti saṃpūrṇatāṃ dvija // NarP_1,41.112 //
GP12nardp1_u:6938: sūta uvāca evaṃ sa nārado viprāḥ sanakena prabodhitaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:6941: prakāśitaṃ jagajjyotiḥ paraṃ brahma sanātanam // NarP_1,41.117 //
GP12nardp1_u:6946: tasmādyena yathā brahma pratītaṃ bodhitena tu /
GP12nardp1_u:6950: sanaka uvāca brahmannahaṃ dhyānaparo bhaveyaṃ sanandanaṃ pṛccha yathābhilāṣam /
GP12nardp1_u:6956: pralaye ca kamabhyeti tanme brūhi sanandana // NarP_1,42.1 //
GP12nardp1_u:6958: sabhūmiḥ sāgnipavano loko 'yaṃ kena nirmitaḥ // NarP_1,42.2 //
GP12nardp1_u:6960: śaucāśaucaṃ kathaṃ teṣāṃ dharmādharmavidhiḥ katham // NarP_1,42.3 //
GP12nardp1_u:6961: kīdṛśo jīvatāṃ jīvaḥ kva vā gacchanti ye mṛtāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:6962: asmāllokādamuṃ lokaṃ sarvaṃ śaṃsatu me bhavān // NarP_1,42.4 //
GP12nardp1_u:6963: sanandana uvāca śṛṇu nārada vakṣyāmi cetihāsaṃ purātanam /
GP12nardp1_u:6967: bharadvāja uvāca kathaṃ jīvo vicarati nānāyoniṣu saṃtatam /
GP12nardp1_u:6968: kathaṃ muktiśca saṃsārājjāyate tasya mānada // NarP_1,42.7 //
GP12nardp1_u:6970: sevyasevakabhāvena vartete iti tau sadā // NarP_1,42.8 //
GP12nardp1_u:6972: lokānāṃ ramaṇaḥ so 'yaṃ nirguṇaśca nirañjanaḥ // NarP_1,42.9 //
GP12nardp1_u:6976: jīvo jīvatvamullaṅghya kathaṃ brahma samanvayāt // NarP_1,42.11 //
GP12nardp1_u:6978: evaṃ sa bhagavānpṛṣṭo bharadvājena saṃśayam // NarP_1,42.12 //
GP12nardp1_u:6980: bhṛguruvāca mānaso nāma yaḥ pūrvo viśruto ve maharṣibhiḥ // NarP_1,42.13 //
GP12nardp1_u:6983: yataḥ sṛṣṭāni bhūtāni jāyante ca mriyanti ca /
GP12nardp1_u:6984: so 'mṛjatprathamaṃ devo mahāntaṃ nāma nāmataḥ // NarP_1,42.15 //
GP12nardp1_u:6988: tatastejo mayaṃ divyaṃ padmaṃ sṛṣṭaṃ svayaṃbhuvā // NarP_1,42.17 //
GP12nardp1_u:6991: brahmā vai sa mahātejā ya ete pañca dhātavaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:6992: śailāstasyāsthisaṃdhāstu medo masiṃ ca medinī // NarP_1,42.19 //
GP12nardp1_u:6995: agnīṣomau ca candrākārai nayane tasya viśrute /
GP12nardp1_u:6996: nabhaścordhvaśirastasya kṣitiḥ padau bhujau diśaḥ // NarP_1,42.21 //
GP12nardp1_u:6998: sa eṣa bhagavānviṣṇurananta iti viśrutaḥ // NarP_1,42.22 //
GP12nardp1_u:7001: tataḥ samabhavadviśvaṃ pṛṣṭo 'haṃ yadiha tvayā // NarP_1,42.23 //
GP12nardp1_u:7002: bhagdvāja uvāca gaganasya diśāṃ caiva bhūtalasvānilasya ca /
GP12nardp1_u:7003: kānyatra parimāṇāni saṃśayaṃ chindhi tattvataḥ // NarP_1,42.24 //
GP12nardp1_u:7005: ramyaṃ nānāśrayākīrṇaṃ yasyāṃ to nādhigamyate // NarP_1,42.25 //
GP12nardp1_u:7007: tatra devāḥ svayaṃ dīptā bhāskarābhāgnivarcasaḥ // NarP_1,42.26 //
GP12nardp1_u:7008: te cāpyantaṃ na paśyanti nabhasaḥ prathitaujasaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:7020: paṭhanti caiva munayaḥ śāstreṣu vividheṣu ca /
GP12nardp1_u:7021: trailokye sāgare caiva pramāṇaṃ vihitaṃ yathā // NarP_1,42.33 //
GP12nardp1_u:7022: adṛśyo yastvagamyo yaḥ kaḥ pramāṇa mudīrayet /
GP12nardp1_u:7023: siddhānāṃ devatānāṃ ca parimītā yadā gatiḥ // NarP_1,42.34 //
GP12nardp1_u:7026: yadā tu divyaṃ yadrūpaṃ hrasate varddhate punaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:7030: bharadvāja uvāca puṣkaro yadi saṃbhūto jyeṣṭaṃ bhavati puṣkaram /
GP12nardp1_u:7031: brahmāṇaṃ pūrvajaṃ cāha bhavānsaṃdeha eva me // NarP_1,42.38 //
GP12nardp1_u:7035: tasya madhye sthito lokānsṛjatyeṣa jagadvidhiḥ // NarP_1,42.40 //
GP12nardp1_u:7036: bharadvāja uvāca prajāvisargaṃ vividhaṃ kathaṃ sa sṛjati prabhuḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:7039: saṃrakṣaṇārthaṃ bhūtānāṃ sṛṣṭaṃ prathamato jalam // NarP_1,42.42 //
GP12nardp1_u:7041: yatprāṇāḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ varddhante yena ca prajāḥ // NarP_1,42.43 //
GP12nardp1_u:7043: pṛthivī parvatā meghā mūrtimantaśca ye pare /
GP12nardp1_u:7045: bharadvāja uvāca kathaṃ salilamutpannaṃ kathaṃ caivāgnimārutau /
GP12nardp1_u:7046: kathaṃ vā medinī sṛṣṭetyatra me saṃśayo mahān // NarP_1,42.45 //
GP12nardp1_u:7047: bhṛguruvāca brahmakalpe purā brahman brahmarṣīṇāṃ samāgame /
GP12nardp1_u:7050: tyaktāhārāḥ sparddhamānā divyaṃ virṣaśataṃ dvijāḥ // NarP_1,42.47 //
GP12nardp1_u:7052: divyā sarasvatī tatra saṃbabhūva nabhastalāt // NarP_1,42.48 //
GP12nardp1_u:7070: bhūmiryo niriyaṃ jñeyā yasyāḥ sarvaṃ prasūyate // NarP_1,42.57 //
GP12nardp1_u:7071: bharadvāja uvāca ya ete dhātavaḥ pañca rakṣyā yānasṛjatprabhuḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:7075: bhṛguruvāca amitāni mahāṣṭāni yānti bhūtāni saṃbhavam /
GP12nardp1_u:7078: pṛthivī cātra saṃghātaḥ śarīraṃ pāñcabhautikam // NarP_1,42.61 //
GP12nardp1_u:7080: śrotre ghrāṇo rasaḥ sparśo dṛṣṭiścendriyasaṃjñitāḥ // NarP_1,42.62 //
GP12nardp1_u:7081: bharadvāja uvāca pañcabhiryadi bhūtaistu yuktāḥ sthāvarajaṅgamāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:7082: sthāvarāṇāṃ na dṛśyante śarīre pañca dhātavaḥ // NarP_1,42.63 //
GP12nardp1_u:7084: vṛkṣāṇāṃ nopalabhyante śarīre pañca dhātavaḥ // NarP_1,42.64 //
GP12nardp1_u:7085: va śṛṇvanti na paśyanti na gandharasavedinaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:7086: na ca sparśaṃ hi jānanti te kathaṃ pañca dhātavaḥ // NarP_1,42.65 //
GP12nardp1_u:7091: ūṣmato mlāyate parṇaṃ tvakphalaṃ puṣpameva ca /
GP12nardp1_u:7092: mlāyate śīryate cāpi sparśastenātra vidyate // NarP_1,42.68 //
GP12nardp1_u:7098: arogāḥ puṣpitāḥ saṃti tasmājjighranti pādapāḥ // NarP_1,42.71 //
GP12nardp1_u:7100: jīvaṃ paśyāmi vṛkṣāṇāmacaitanyaṃ na vidyate // NarP_1,42.72 //
GP12nardp1_u:7103: jaṅgamānāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ śarīre paṃñca dhātavaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:7104: pratyekaśaḥ prabhidyante yaiḥ śarīraṃ viceṣṭate // NarP_1,42.74 //
GP12nardp1_u:7105: tvak ca māṃsaṃ tathāsthīni majjā snāyuśca pañcamaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:7109: śrotraṃ ghrāṇaṃ tathāsyaṃ ca hṛdayaṃ koṣṭameva ca /
GP12nardp1_u:7111: śleṣmā pittamatha svedo vasā śoṇitameva ca /
GP12nardp1_u:7112: ityāpaḥ pañcadhā dehe bhavanti prāṇināṃ sadā // NarP_1,42.78 //
GP12nardp1_u:7120: nirhārī saṃhataḥ snigdho rukṣo viśada eva ca // NarP_1,42.82 //
GP12nardp1_u:7122: jyotiḥ paśyati cakṣurbhyaḥ sparśaṃ vetti ca vāyunā // NarP_1,42.83 //
GP12nardp1_u:7123: śabdaḥ sparśaśca rūpaṃ ca rasaścāpi guṇāḥ smṛtāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:7124: rasajñānaṃ tu vakṣyāmi tanme nigadataḥ śṛṇu // NarP_1,42.84 //
GP12nardp1_u:7128: śabdaḥ sparśaśca rūpaśca triguṇaṃ jyotirucyate // NarP_1,42.86 //
GP12nardp1_u:7129: jyotiḥ paśyati rūpāṇi rūpaṃ ca bahudhā smṛtam /
GP12nardp1_u:7132: kaṭhinaścikkaṇaḥ ślakṣṇaḥ picchilo mṛdu dāruṇaḥ // NarP_1,42.88 //
GP12nardp1_u:7138: eṣa saptavidhaḥ prokto guṇa ākāśasaṃbhavaḥ // NarP_1,42.91 //
GP12nardp1_u:7142: vāyavyastu guṇaḥ sparśaḥ sparśaśca bahudhā smṛtaḥ // NarP_1,42.93 //
GP12nardp1_u:7143: uṣṇaḥ śītaḥ sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ snigdho viśada eva ca /
GP12nardp1_u:7144: tathā kharo mṛduḥ ślakṣṇo lavurgurutaro 'pi ca // NarP_1,42.94 //
GP12nardp1_u:7149: āpyāyante ca te nityaṃ dhātavastaistu dhātubhiḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:7152: pārthivaṃ dhātumāsādya yathā ceṣṭayate balī // NarP_1,42.98 //
GP12nardp1_u:7154: prāṇo mūrddhani vāgnau ca vartamāno viceṣṭate // NarP_1,42.99 //
GP12nardp1_u:7155: sa jantuḥ sarvabhūtātmā puruṣaḥ sa sanātanaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:7156: mano buddhirahṝṅkāro bhūtāni viṣayaśca saḥ // NarP_1,42.100 //
GP12nardp1_u:7157: evaṃ tviha sa sarvatra prāṇaistu paripālyate /
GP12nardp1_u:7158: pṛṣṭatastu samānena svāṃ svāṃ gatimupāśritaḥ // NarP_1,42.101 //
GP12nardp1_u:7172: ūṣmā cāgirīti jñeyo yo 'nnaṃ pacati dehinām // NarP_1,42.108 //
GP12nardp1_u:7174: sa ūrdhvamāgamya punaḥ samutkṣipati pāvakam // NarP_1,42.109 //
GP12nardp1_u:7176: nābhimūle śarīrasya sarve prāṇāśca saṃsthitāḥ // NarP_1,42.110 //
GP12nardp1_u:7179: eṣa mārgo 'pi yogānāṃ yena gacchanti tatpadam /
GP12nardp1_u:7183: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge dvitīyapāde bhṛgubharadvājasaṃvāde jagadutpattivarṇanaṃ nāma dvicatvāriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:7185: śvasityābhāṣate caiva tato jīvo nirarthakaḥ // NarP_1,43.1 //
GP12nardp1_u:7190: yadi vāthumayo jīvaḥ saṃśleṣo yadi vāyunā /
GP12nardp1_u:7192: saṃśleṣo yadi vā tena yadi tasmātpraṇaśyati /
GP12nardp1_u:7194: kṛpe vā salilaṃ dadyātpradīpaṃ vā hutāśane /
GP12nardp1_u:7195: kṣipraṃ praviśya naśyeta yathā naśyatyasau tathā // NarP_1,43.6 //
GP12nardp1_u:7201: pīḍite 'nyatare hyeṣāṃ saṃghāto yāti pañcatām // NarP_1,43.9 //
GP12nardp1_u:7203: kiṃ khedayati vā jīvaḥ kiṃ śṛṇoti bravīti ca // NarP_1,43.10 //
GP12nardp1_u:7205: yo dattvā mriyate jantuḥ sā gauḥ kaṃ tārayiṣyati // NarP_1,43.11 //
GP12nardp1_u:7206: gauścapratigrahītā ca dātā caiva samaṃ yadā /
GP12nardp1_u:7207: ihaiva vilayaṃ yānti kutasteṣāṃ samāgamaḥ // NarP_1,43.12 //
GP12nardp1_u:7209: agninā copayuktasya kutaḥ saṃjīvanaṃ punaḥ // NarP_1,43.13 //
GP12nardp1_u:7210: chinnasya yadi vṛkṣasya na mūlaṃ pratirohati /
GP12nardp1_u:7211: jīvanyasya pravartante mṛtaḥ kva punareṣyati // NarP_1,43.14 //
GP12nardp1_u:7215: ta nivartaya sarvajña yatastvāmāśrito hyaham // NarP_1,43.16 //
GP12nardp1_u:7216: sanandana uvāca evaṃ pṛṣṭastadānena sa bhṛgarbrahmaṇaḥ sutaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:7218: bhṛguruvāca na prāṇāḥ santi jīvasya dattasya ca kṛtasya ca /
GP12nardp1_u:7219: yāti dehāntaraṃ prāṇī śarīraṃ tu viśīryate // NarP_1,43.18 //
GP12nardp1_u:7222: bharadvāja uvāca agneryathā tasya nāśāttadvināśo na vidyate /
GP12nardp1_u:7225: gatiryasya pramāṇaṃ vā saṃsthānaṃ vā na vidyate // NarP_1,43.21 //
GP12nardp1_u:7228: gatiryasya pramāṇaṃ vā saṃsthānaṃ vā na vidyate /
GP12nardp1_u:7233: prāṇāndhārayate hyagniḥ sa jīva upadhāryatām // NarP_1,43.25 //
GP12nardp1_u:7236: patitaṃ yāti bhūmitvamayanaṃ tasya hi kṣitiḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:7237: jagamānāṃ hi sarveṣāṃ sthāvarāṇāṃ tathaiva ca // NarP_1,43.27 //
GP12nardp1_u:7242: bharadvāja uvāca yadyagnimārutau bhūmiḥ khamāpaśca śarīriṣu /
GP12nardp1_u:7245: śarīre prāṇināṃ jīvaṃ vettubhicchāmi yādṛśam // NarP_1,43.31 //
GP12nardp1_u:7247: bhidyamāne śarīre tu jīvo naivopalabhyate // NarP_1,43.32 //
GP12nardp1_u:7249: śarīre mānase duḥkha kastāṃ vedayate rujam // NarP_1,43.33 //
GP12nardp1_u:7250: śṛṇoti kathitaṃ jīvaḥ karṇābhyāṃna śṛṇoti tat /
GP12nardp1_u:7251: maharṣe manasi vyagre tasmājjīvo nirarthakaḥ // NarP_1,43.34 //
GP12nardp1_u:7253: manasi vyākule cakṣuḥ paśyannapi na paśyati // NarP_1,43.35 //
GP12nardp1_u:7254: na paśyati na cāghrāti na śṛṇoti na bhāṣate /
GP12nardp1_u:7255: na ca smarśamasau vetti nidrāvaśagataḥ punaḥ // NarP_1,43.36 //
GP12nardp1_u:7256: hṛṣyati kruddhyate ko 'tra śocatyudvijate ca kaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:7257: icchati dhyāyati dveṣṭi vākyaṃ vācayate ca kaḥ // NarP_1,43.37 //
GP12nardp1_u:7259: sa vetti gandhāṃśca rasāñchutīśca sparśaṃ ca rūpaṃ ca guṇāṃśca ye 'lye //
GP12nardp1_u:7261: saveti duḥkhāni sukhāni cātra tadviprayogāttu na vetti deham //
GP12nardp1_u:7262: yadā na rūpaṃ na sparśo noṣyabhavaśca pāvake /
GP12nardp1_u:7263: tadā śānte śarīrāgnau dehatyāgena naśyati // NarP_1,43.40 //
GP12nardp1_u:7265: tatrātmā mānaso brahmā sarvabhūteṣu lokakṛt // NarP_1,43.41 //
GP12nardp1_u:7267: tasminyaḥ saṃśrito dehe hyabbinduriva puṣkare // NarP_1,43.42 //
GP12nardp1_u:7269: tamorajaśca sattvaṃ ca viddhi jīvaguṇānimām // NarP_1,43.43 //
GP12nardp1_u:7270: acetanaṃ jīvaguṇaṃ vadanti sa ceṣṭate ceṣṭayate ca sarvam /
GP12nardp1_u:7271: ataḥ paraṃ kṣetravido vadanti prāvartayadyo bhuvanāni sapta //
GP12nardp1_u:7272: na jīvanāśo 'sti hi dehabhede mithyaitadāhurmuna ityabuddhāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:7278: cittasya hi prasādena hitvā karma śubhāśubham /
GP12nardp1_u:7284: tataḥ satyaṃ ca dharmaṃ ca tathā brahma ca śāśvatam /
GP12nardp1_u:7285: ācāraṃ caiva śaucaṃ ca svargāya vidadhe prabhuḥ // NarP_1,43.51 //
GP12nardp1_u:7289: bharadvāja uvāca cāturvarṇyasya varṇena yadi varṇo vibhidyate // NarP_1,43.53 //
GP12nardp1_u:7291: tvantaḥ kṣarati sarveṣāṃ kasmādvarṇo vibhajyate // NarP_1,43.54 //
GP12nardp1_u:7294: bhṛguruvāca na viśeṣo 'sti varṇānāṃ sarvaṃ brahmamayaṃ jagat /
GP12nardp1_u:7295: brahmaṇā pūrvasṛṣṭaṃ hi karmaṇā varṇatāṃ gatam // NarP_1,43.56 //
GP12nardp1_u:7299: svadharṃmannānutiṣṭanti te dvijā vaiśyatāṃ gatāḥ // NarP_1,43.58 //
GP12nardp1_u:7301: kṛṣṇāḥ śaucapāribhrāṣṭāste dvijāḥ śūdratāṃ gatāḥ // NarP_1,43.59 //
GP12nardp1_u:7305: brahma caiva purā sṛṣṭaṃ yena jānanti tadvidaḥ // NarP_1,43.61 //
GP12nardp1_u:7309: bharadvāja uvāca brāhmaṇaḥ kena bhavati kṣatriyo vā dvijottama /
GP12nardp1_u:7310: vaiśyaḥ śūdraśca viprarṣe tadbrūhi vadatāṃ vara // NarP_1,43.63 //
GP12nardp1_u:7314: nityavratī satyaparaḥ sa vai brāhmaṇa ucyate // NarP_1,43.65 //
GP12nardp1_u:7316: tapasyāṃ dṛśyate yatra sa brāhmaṇa iti smṛtaḥ // NarP_1,43.66 //
GP12nardp1_u:7318: dānādānaratiryastu sa vai kṣatriya ucyate // NarP_1,43.67 //
GP12nardp1_u:7320: vedādhyayanasaṃpannaḥ sa vaiśya iti saṃjñitaḥ // NarP_1,43.68 //
GP12nardp1_u:7322: tyaktavedastvanācāraḥ sa vai śūdra iti smṛtaḥ // NarP_1,43.69 //
GP12nardp1_u:7323: śūdre caitadbhavellakṣma dvije tacca na vidyate /
GP12nardp1_u:7324: na vai śūdro bhavecchūdro brāhmaṇo brāhmaṇo na ca // NarP_1,43.70 //
GP12nardp1_u:7331: tyāge yasya hutaṃ sarvaṃ sa tyāgī sa ca buddhimān // NarP_1,43.74 //
GP12nardp1_u:7341: nivedādeva nirvāṇaṃ na ca kiñcidviccitayet // NarP_1,43.79 //
GP12nardp1_u:7343: śauce tu satataṃ yuktaḥ sadācārasamanvitaḥ // NarP_1,43.80 //
GP12nardp1_u:7345: satyaṃvrataṃ tapaḥ śaucaṃ satyaṃ visṛjate prajā // NarP_1,43.81 //
GP12nardp1_u:7346: satyena dhāryate lokaḥ svaḥ satyenaiva gacchati /
GP12nardp1_u:7347: anṛtaṃ tamaso rūpaṃ tamasā nīyate hyadhaḥ // NarP_1,43.82 //
GP12nardp1_u:7349: suduṣprakāśa ityāhurnarakaṃ tama eva ca // NarP_1,43.83 //
GP12nardp1_u:7351: tatrāpyevaṃvidhā loke vṛttiḥ satyānṛte bhavet // NarP_1,43.84 //
GP12nardp1_u:7356: sukhaṃ hyanityaṃ bhūtānāmiha loke paratra ca /
GP12nardp1_u:7357: rāhugrastasya somasya yathā jyotsnā na bhāsate // NarP_1,43.87 //
GP12nardp1_u:7358: tathā tamobhibhūtānāṃ bhūtānāṃ naśyate sukham // NarP_1,43.88 //
GP12nardp1_u:7359: tatkhalu dvividhaṃ sukhamucyacate śarīraṃ mānasaṃ ca /
GP12nardp1_u:7360: iha khalvamuṣmiṃśca loke vastupravṛttayaḥ sukhārthamabhidhīyante nahītaḥ paratrāparvagaphalādviśiṣṭataramasti
GP12nardp1_u:7362: bharadvāja uvāca vadaitadbhavatābhihitaṃ sukhānāṃ paramā sthitiriti // NarP_1,43.89 //
GP12nardp1_u:7363: na tadupagṛhṇīmo na hyeṣāmṛṣīṇāṃ mahati sthitānām // NarP_1,43.90 //
GP12nardp1_u:7364: aprāpya eṣa kāmya guṇaviśeṣo na cainamabhiśīlayanti /
GP12nardp1_u:7365: tapasi śrūyate trilokakṛdbrahmā prabhurekākī tiṣṭati brahmacārī na kāmasukhoṣvātmānamavadadhāti api ca bhagavānviśveśvara umāpatiḥ kāmamabhivartamānamanaṅgatvena samamanayat // NarP_1,43.92
GP12nardp1_u:7366: tasmādbhūmau na tu mahātmabhirañjayati gṛhīto na tveṣa tāvadviśiṣṭo guṇaviśeṣa iti // NarP_1,43.93
GP12nardp1_u:7367: naitadbhagavataḥ pratyemi bhavatā tūktaṃ sukhānāṃ paramāḥ striya iti lokapravādo hi dvividhaḥ phalodayaḥ sukṛtātsukhamavāpyate 'nyathā
GP12nardp1_u:7369: bhṛguruvāca atrocyate anṛtātkhalu tamaḥ prādurbhūtaṃ tatastamograstā adharmamevānuvartante na dharmaṃ krodhalobhamohahiṃsānṛtādibhikhacchannāḥ khalvasmiṃlloke nāmutra sukhamāpnuvanti vividhavyādhirujopatāpairavakīryante vadhabandhanaparikleśādibhiśca kṣutpipāsāśramakṛtairupatāpairupatapyante varṣavātātyuṣṇātiśītakṛtaiśca pratibhayaiḥ śārīrairduḥkhairupatapyante bandhudhanavināśaviprayogakṛtaiśca mānasaiḥ śaukairabhibhūyante
GP12nardp1_u:7371: śārīraṃ mānasaṃ nāsti na jarā na ca pātakam /
GP12nardp1_u:7372: nityameva sukhaṃ svarge sukhaṃ duḥkhamihobhayam // NarP_1,43.96 //
GP12nardp1_u:7374: pṛthivī sarvabhūtānāṃ janitrī tadvidhāḥ striyaḥ // NarP_1,43.97 //
GP12nardp1_u:7378: hutena śāmyate pāpaṃ svādhyāye śāntiruttamā // NarP_1,43.99 //
GP12nardp1_u:7380: dānaṃ tu dvividhaṃ prāhuḥ paratrārthamihaiva ca // NarP_1,43.100 //
GP12nardp1_u:7383: yādṛśaṃ dīyate dānaṃ tādṛśaṃ phalamaśnute // NarP_1,43.101 //
GP12nardp1_u:7384: bharadvāja uvāca kiṃ kasya dharmacaraṇaṃ kiṃ vā dharmasya lakṣaṇam /
GP12nardp1_u:7386: bhṛguruvāca svadharmācaraṇe yuktā ye bhavanti manīṣiṇaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:7389: teṣāṃ sve sve samācārāstanme vaktumihārhasi // NarP_1,43.104 //
GP12nardp1_u:7390: bhṛguruvāca pūrvameva bhagavatā brahmaṇā lokahitamanutiṣṭatā dharmasaṃrakṣaṇārthamāśramāścatvāro 'bhinirddiṣṭāḥ // NarP_1,43.105 //
GP12nardp1_u:7391: tatra gurukulavāsameva prathamamāśramamāharanti samyagatra śaucasaskāraniyamavrataviniyatātmā ubhe saṃdhye bhāskarāgnidaivatānyupasthāya vihāya taddhyālasyaṃ gurorabhivādanavedābyāsaśravaṇapavitraghīkṛtāntarātmā triṣavaṇamupaspṛśya brahmacaryāgniparicaraṇaguruśuśrūṣā nityabhikṣābhaikṣyādisarvaniveditāntarātmā guruvacananideśānuṣṭānāpratikūlo guruprasādalabdhasvādhyāyatatparaḥ syāt
GP12nardp1_u:7392: bhavati cātra ślokaḥ guruṃ yastu samārādhya dvijo vedamāvānpuyāt /
GP12nardp1_u:7394: iti gārhasthyaṃ khalu dvitīyamāśramaṃ vadanti // NarP_1,43.107 //
GP12nardp1_u:7397: dharmārthakāmāvāptirhya.tra trivargasādhanamapekṣyāgarhitakarmaṇā dhanānyādāya svādhyāyopalabdhaprakarṣeṇa vā brahmarṣinirmitena vā adbhiḥ sāgaragatena vā dravyaniyamābhyāsadaivataprasādopalabdhena vā dhanena
GP12nardp1_u:7399: taddhi sarvāśramaṇāṃ mūlamudāharanti gurukulanivāsinaḥ parivrājakā ye 'nye
GP12nardp1_u:7400: saṃkalpitavrataniyamadharmānuṣṭāninasteṣāmapyantarā ca bhikṣābalisaṃvibhāgāḥ pravartante // vānaprasthānāṃ ca dravyopaskāra iti prāyaśaḥ khalvete sādhavaḥ sādhupathyodanāḥ svādhyāyaprasaṃginastīrthābhigamanadeśadarśanārthaṃ pṛthivīṃ paryaṭanti // NarP_1,43.111 //
GP12nardp1_u:7402: bhavati cātra ślokaḥ atithiryasya bhagnāśo gṛhātpratinivartate /
GP12nardp1_u:7403: sa dattvā duṣkṛtaṃ tasmai puṇyamādāya gacchati // NarP_1,43.113 //
GP12nardp1_u:7404: api cātra yajñakriyābhirdevatāḥ prīyante nivāpena pitaro vidyābhyāsaśravaṇadhāraṇena ṛṣayaḥ apatyotpādanena prajāpatiriti //
GP12nardp1_u:7405: lokau cātra bhavataḥ vātsalyāḥ sarvabhūtebhyo vāyoḥ śrotrastathā girā /
GP12nardp1_u:7415: vānaprasthāḥ khalvapi dharmamanusarantaḥ puṇyāni tīrthāni nadīprastravaṇāni svabhakteṣvaraṇyeṣu mṛgavarāhamahiṣa śārdūlavanagajākīrṇeṣu tapasyante anusaṃcaranti // NarP_1,43.120 //
GP12nardp1_u:7416: tyaktagrāmyavastrābhyavahāropabhogā vanyauṣadhiphalamūlaparṇaparimitavicitraniyatāhārāḥ sthānāsaninobhūpāṣāṇasikatāśarkarāvālukābhasmaśāyinaḥ kāśukuśacarmavalkalasaṃvṛtāṅgāḥ keśaśyaśrunakharomadhāriṇo niyatakālopasparśanāḥśuṣkabalihomakālānuṣṭāyinaḥ samitkuśakusumāpahārasaṃmārjanalabdhaviśrāmāḥ śītoṣṇapavanaviṣṭaṃ bhavibhinnasarvatvaco vividhaniyamayogacaryānuṣṭānavihitapariśuṣkamāṃsaśoṇitatvagasthibhūtā dhṛtiparāḥ sattvayogāccharīrāṇyudvahṝnte // NarP_1,43.121 //
GP12nardp1_u:7423: parvatapulinavṛkṣamūladevāyatanānyanusaṃcaranto vā sārthamupeyurnagaraṃ grāmaṃ vā na krodhadarpalobhamohakārpaṇyadaṃbhaparivādābhimānanirvṛttahiṃsā iti //
GP12nardp1_u:7424: bhavanti cātra ślokāḥ abhayaṃ sarvabhūtebhyo dattvā yaścarate muniḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:7425: na tasya sarvabhūtebhyo bhayamutpadyate kvacit // NarP_1,43.125 //
GP12nardp1_u:7427: viprastu bhaikṣopagatairhavirbhiścitā gninā saṃvrajate hi sokān //
GP12nardp1_u:7429: anindhanaṃ jyotiriva praśāntaṃ sa brahmalokaṃ śrayate dvijātiḥ //
GP12nardp1_u:7430: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge dvitīyapāde bhṛgubharadvājasaṃvāde brāhmaṇācāranirūpaṇaṃ nāma tricatvāriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:7431: bharadvāja uvāca asmāllokātparo lokaḥ śrūyate nopalabhyate /
GP12nardp1_u:7434: puṇyaḥ kṣemyaśca kāmyaśca sa paro loka ucyate // NarP_1,44.2 //
GP12nardp1_u:7437: sa svargasadṛśo deśaḥ tatra hyuktāḥ śubhā guṇāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:7438: kāle mṛtyuḥ prabavati spṛśanti vyādhayo na ca // NarP_1,44.4 //
GP12nardp1_u:7440: nānyo hi vadhyate tatra dravyeṣu ca na vismayaḥ // NarP_1,44.5 //
GP12nardp1_u:7441: paro hyadharmo naivāsti saṃdeho nāpi jāyate /
GP12nardp1_u:7442: kṛtasya tu phalaṃ tatra pratyakṣamupalabhyate // NarP_1,44.6 //
GP12nardp1_u:7448: sukhitā duḥkhitāḥ kecinnirdhanā dhanino pare // NarP_1,44.9 //
GP12nardp1_u:7449: iha śramo bhayaṃ mohaḥ kṣudhā tīvrā ca jāyate /
GP12nardp1_u:7451: yastadvedo bhayaṃ prājñaḥ pāpmanā na sa lipyate /
GP12nardp1_u:7456: iha cintā bahuvidhā dharmādharmasya karmaṇaḥ // NarP_1,44.13 //
GP12nardp1_u:7462: ihasthāstatra jāyante ye vai puṇyakṛto janāḥ // NarP_1,44.16 //
GP12nardp1_u:7466: ihaiva parivarttante na ca yāntyuttarāṃ diśam // NarP_1,44.18 //
GP12nardp1_u:7470: dharmādharmauṃ hi lokasya yo vai vetti sa buddhimān // NarP_1,44.20 //
GP12nardp1_u:7473: yadadhyātmaṃ yathā caitattanme brūhi tapodhana // NarP_1,44.21 //
GP12nardp1_u:7475: tadvyākhyāṃsyāmi te tāta śreyaskaratamaṃ sukham // NarP_1,44.22 //
GP12nardp1_u:7477: yajjñātvā puruṣo loke prītiṃ saukhyaṃ ca vindati // NarP_1,44.23 //
GP12nardp1_u:7481: yataḥ sṛṣṭāni tatraiva tāni yānti layaṃ punaḥ // NarP_1,44.25 //
GP12nardp1_u:7483: prasārya ca yathāṅgāni kūrmaḥ saṃharate punaḥ // NarP_1,44.26 //
GP12nardp1_u:7484: tadvad bhūtāni bhūtātmā sṛṣṭāni harate punaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:7486: akarotteṣu vai samyak taṃ tu jīvo na paśyati /
GP12nardp1_u:7487: śabdaḥ śrotraṃ tathā khāni trayamākāśayonijam // NarP_1,44.28 //
GP12nardp1_u:7488: vāyoḥ sparsastathā ceṣṭā tvakcaiva tritayaṃ smṛtam /
GP12nardp1_u:7489: rūpaṃ cakṣustathā pākastrividhaṃ teja ucyate // NarP_1,44.29 //
GP12nardp1_u:7490: rasāḥ kledaśca jihvā ca trayo jalaguṇāḥ smṛtāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:7491: ghreyaṃ ghrāṇaṃ śarīraṃ ca ete bhūmiguṇāstrayaḥ // NarP_1,44.30 //
GP12nardp1_u:7492: mahābhūtāni pacaiva ṣaṣṭaṃ ca mana ucyate /
GP12nardp1_u:7495: śrotraṃ vai śravaṇārthāya sparśanāya ca tvak smṛtā // NarP_1,44.32 //
GP12nardp1_u:7502: tamo rajaśca sattvaṃ ca te 'pi bhāvāstadāśritāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:7503: etāṃ buddhiṃ naro buddhā bhūtānāgatiṃ gatim // NarP_1,44.36 //
GP12nardp1_u:7509: yena paśyati tañcakṣuḥ śṛṇoti śrotramucyate // NarP_1,44.39 //
GP12nardp1_u:7511: tvacā sparśayati sparśaṃ buddhirvikriyate sakṛt // NarP_1,44.40 //
GP12nardp1_u:7515: puruṣe tiṣṭatī buddhistriṣu bhāveṣu vartate // NarP_1,44.42 //
GP12nardp1_u:7517: na sukhena na duḥkhena kadācidapi vartate // NarP_1,44.43 //
GP12nardp1_u:7518: evaṃ narāṇāṃ manasi triṣu bhāveṣu vartate /
GP12nardp1_u:7523: indriyāṇi hi sarvāṇi pravartayati sā sadā // NarP_1,44.46 //
GP12nardp1_u:7524: prītiḥ sattvaṃ rajaḥ śokastamaḥ krodhastu te trayaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:7525: ye ye ca bhāvā loke 'sminsarve pyeteṣu vai triṣu // NarP_1,44.47 //
GP12nardp1_u:7527: indriyāṇi ca sarvāṇi vijetavyāni dhīmatā // NarP_1,44.48 //
GP12nardp1_u:7530: sāttvikī rājasī caiva tāmasī ceti mānada /
GP12nardp1_u:7533: tava yatprītisaṃyuktaṃ kāye manasi vā bhavet // NarP_1,44.51 //
GP12nardp1_u:7539: praharṣaḥ prītirānandaḥ sukhaṃ vā śāntacittatā // NarP_1,44.54 //
GP12nardp1_u:7541: atuṣṭiḥ paritāpaśca śoko lobhastathā kṣamā // NarP_1,44.55 //
GP12nardp1_u:7546: manaḥ svaniyataṃ yasya sa sukhī pretyaceha ca /
GP12nardp1_u:7548: sṛjatehi guṇāneka eko na sṛjate guṇān /
GP12nardp1_u:7549: maśakoduṃbarau vāpi saṃprayuktau yathā sadā // NarP_1,44.59 //
GP12nardp1_u:7551: pṛthagbhūtau prakṛtyā tau sapraṃyuktau ca sarvadā // NarP_1,44.60 //
GP12nardp1_u:7552: yathā matsyo jalaṃ caiva saṃprayukto tathaiva tau /
GP12nardp1_u:7553: na guṇā vidurātmānaṃ sa guṇānvetti sarvaśaḥ // NarP_1,44.61 //
GP12nardp1_u:7554: paridraṣṭā guṇānāṃ tu saṃstraṣṭā manyate tathā /
GP12nardp1_u:7557: sṛjate hi guṇānsattvaṃ kṣetrajñaḥ paripaśyati // NarP_1,44.63 //
GP12nardp1_u:7559: āśrayo nāsti sattvasya kṣetrajñasya ca kaścana // NarP_1,44.64 //
GP12nardp1_u:7560: sattvaṃ manaḥ saṃsṛjate na guṇānvai kadācana /
GP12nardp1_u:7561: raśmīṃsteṣāṃ sa manasā yadā samyaṅniyacchati // NarP_1,44.65 //
GP12nardp1_u:7563: tyaktvā yaḥ prākṛtaṃ karma nityamātmaratirmuniḥ // NarP_1,44.66 //
GP12nardp1_u:7565: yathā vāricaraḥ pakṣī salilena na lipyate // NarP_1,44.67 //
GP12nardp1_u:7569: bhāvayuktyā prayuktastu sa nityaṃ sṛjate guṇān // NarP_1,44.69 //
GP12nardp1_u:7577: malināḥ prāṇnuyuḥ śuddhiṃ yathā pūrṇāṃ nadīṃ narāḥ // NarP_1,44.73 //
