GP12nardp1_u:7579: mahānadyā hi pārajñastapyate na taranyathā // NarP_1,44.74 //
GP12nardp1_u:7580: na tu tapyati tattvajñaḥ kulajñastu taratyuta /
GP12nardp1_u:7581: evaṃ ye viduradhyātmaṃ kaivalyaṃ jñānamuttamam // NarP_1,44.75 //
GP12nardp1_u:7582: evaṃ buddhā naraḥ sarvo bhūtānāmagatiṃ gatim /
GP12nardp1_u:7583: avekṣya ca śanairbuddhyā labhate ca śamaṃ tataḥ // NarP_1,44.76 //
GP12nardp1_u:7584: trivargo yasya viditaḥ prekṣya yaśca vimuñcati /
GP12nardp1_u:7588: etad buddhā bhaved buddhaḥ kimanyad buddhalakṣaṇam /
GP12nardp1_u:7589: vijñāya taddhi manyante katakṛtyā manīṣiṇaḥ // NarP_1,44.79 //
GP12nardp1_u:7590: na bhavati viduṣāṃ tato bhayaṃ yadaviduṣāṃ sumahadbhayaṃ bhavet /
GP12nardp1_u:7591: nahi gatiradhikāsti kasyacitsati hi guṇepravadatyatulyatām // NarP_1,44.80
GP12nardp1_u:7593: nāpriyaṃ tadubhayaṃ kutaḥ priyaṃ tasya tajjanayatīha kurvataḥ //
GP12nardp1_u:7595: tatra paśya kuśalānna śocate jāyate yadi bhayaṃ padaṃ sadā // NarP_1,44.82
GP12nardp1_u:7598: bhṛguruvāca hṝnta te saṃpravakṣyāmi jñānayogaṃ caturvidham /
GP12nardp1_u:7599: yaṃ jñātvā śāśvatīṃ siddhiṃ gacchantīha maharṣayaḥ // NarP_1,44.84 //
GP12nardp1_u:7600: yathā svanuṣṭitaṃ dhyānaṃ tathā kurvanti yoginaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:7605: asaṃgānya vidhādīni manaḥ śāntikarāṇi ca // NarP_1,44.87 //
GP12nardp1_u:7608: śabdaṃ na vindecchrotreṇa tvacā sparśaṃ na vedayet /
GP12nardp1_u:7609: rūpaṃ na cakṣuṣā vindyājjihvayā na rasāṃstathā // NarP_1,44.89 //
GP12nardp1_u:7617: eṣa dhyānapathaḥ pūrvo bhayā samanuvarṇitaḥ // NarP_1,44.93 //
GP12nardp1_u:7621: evamevāsya cittaṃ ca bhavati dhyānavartmani // NarP_1,44.95 //
GP12nardp1_u:7623: punarvāyupathaṃ bhrāntaṃ mano bhavati vāyuvat // NarP_1,44.96 //
GP12nardp1_u:7631: sahasā vāriṇā siktā na yānti paribhāvanāḥ // NarP_1,44.100 //
GP12nardp1_u:7632: kiñcit snigdhaṃ yathā ca syācchuṣkaṃ cūrṇamabhāvitam /
GP12nardp1_u:7637: pūrvaṃ dhyānapathe sthāpya nityayogena śāmyati // NarP_1,44.103 //
GP12nardp1_u:7638: na tatpuruṣakāreṇa na ca daivena kenacit /
GP12nardp1_u:7641: gacchanti yogino hyovaṃ nirvāṇaṃ tu nirāmayam // NarP_1,44.105 //
GP12nardp1_u:7642: sanandana uvāca ityukto bhṛguṇā brahmanbharadvājaḥ pratāpavān /
GP12nardp1_u:7644: eṣa te prasavo vidvan jagataḥ saṃprakīrtitaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:7645: nikhilena mahāprājña kiṃ bhūyaḥ śrotumicchasi // NarP_1,44.107 //
GP12nardp1_u:7647: sūta uvāca sanandanavacaḥ śrutvā mokṣadharmāśritaṃ dvijāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:7649: nārada uvāca śrutaṃ mayā mahābhāga mokṣaśāstraṃ tvayoditam /
GP12nardp1_u:7650: na ca me jāyate tṛptirbhūyobhūyo 'pi śṛṇvataḥ // NarP_1,45.2 //
GP12nardp1_u:7652: tathā kathaya sarvajña mokṣadharmaṃ sadāśritam // NarP_1,45.3 //
GP12nardp1_u:7657: tasya śmaśāna mācāryā vasati satataṃ gṛhe /
GP12nardp1_u:7659: sa teṣāṃ pretyabhāve ca pretya jātau viniścaye /
GP12nardp1_u:7668: sa manye tena rūpeṇa vikhyāpayati hi svayam // NarP_1,45.11 //
GP12nardp1_u:7677: tasya pañcaśikhaḥ śiṣyo mānuṣyā payasā bhṛtaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:7679: tasyaḥ putratvamāgatya sriyāḥ sa pibagati stanau /
GP12nardp1_u:7680: tataśca kāpileyatvaṃ lebhe buddhiṃ ca naiṣṭikīm // NarP_1,45.17 //
GP12nardp1_u:7683: sāmātyo janako jñātvā dharmajño jñāninaṃ mune /
GP12nardp1_u:7691: yadarthaṃ dharmasaṃsargaḥ karmaṇāṃ ca phalo dayaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:7696: ātmānaṃ manyate mohāttadasamyak paraṃ matam // NarP_1,45.25 //
GP12nardp1_u:7702: pratyakṣo hyāgamo bhinnaḥ kṛtānto vā na kiñcana // NarP_1,45.28 //
GP12nardp1_u:7704: anyojīvaḥ śarīrasya nāstikānāṃ mate sthitaḥ // NarP_1,45.29 //
GP12nardp1_u:7710: amūtasya hi mūrtena sāmānyaṃ nopalabhyate // NarP_1,45.32 //
GP12nardp1_u:7711: avidyā karma tṛṣṇā ca kecidāhuḥ punarbhavam /
GP12nardp1_u:7712: tasminnaṣṭe ca dagdhe ca citte maraṇadharmiṇi // NarP_1,45.33 //
GP12nardp1_u:7716: evaṃ sati ca kā prīhirjñānavidyātapobalaiḥ // NarP_1,45.35 //
GP12nardp1_u:7720: yathā hi muśalairhanyuḥ śarīraṃ tatpunarbhavet // NarP_1,45.37 //
GP12nardp1_u:7726: indriyāṇi mano vāyuḥ śoṇitaṃ māṃsamasthi ca // NarP_1,45.40 //
GP12nardp1_u:7730: iti samyaṅ manasyete bahavaḥ saṃti hetavaḥ // NarP_1,45.42 //
GP12nardp1_u:7736: arthāstathā hṝnti sukhāvahāṃśca lihata ete bahavopaśuṣkāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:7739: vihāya yo gacchati sarvameva kṣaṇena gatvā na nivartate ca // NarP_1,45.47
GP12nardp1_u:7741: itīdamālakṣya ratiḥ kuto bhavedvināśināpyasya na śama vidyate //
GP12nardp1_u:7744: janaka uvāca bhagavanyadi na pretya saṃjñā bhavati kasyacit /
GP12nardp1_u:7745: evaṃ sati kimajñānaṃ jñānaṃ vā kiṃ kariṣyati // NarP_1,45.50 //
GP12nardp1_u:7747: apramattaḥ pramatto vā kiṃ viśeṣaṃ kariṣyati // NarP_1,45.51 //
GP12nardp1_u:7748: asaṃsargo hi bhūteṣu saṃsargo vā vināśiṣu /
GP12nardp1_u:7749: kasmai kriyata kalpeta niścayaḥ ko 'tra tattvataḥ // NarP_1,45.52 //
GP12nardp1_u:7750: sanandana uvāca tamasā hi maticchatraṃ vibhrāntamiva cāturam /
GP12nardp1_u:7752: pañcaśikha uvāca ucchedaniṣṭā nehāsti bhāvaniṣṭā na vidyate /
GP12nardp1_u:7755: dhātavaḥ pañcadhā toyaṃ khe vāyurjyotiṣo dharā // NarP_1,45.55 //
GP12nardp1_u:7757: ākāśaṃ vāyurūṣmā ca sneho yaścāpi pārthivaḥ // NarP_1,45.56 //
GP12nardp1_u:7759: jñānamūṣmā ca vāyuśca trividhaḥ kāyasaṃgrahaḥ // NarP_1,45.57 //
GP12nardp1_u:7762: śravaṇaṃ sparśanaṃ jihvā dṛṣṭirnāsā tathaiva ca /
GP12nardp1_u:7766: śabdaḥ sparśaśca rūpaṃ ca mūrtyarthameva te trayaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:7769: tamāhuḥ paramaṃ śuddhiṃ buddhirityavyayaṃ mahat // NarP_1,45.62 //
GP12nardp1_u:7772: anātmeti ca yadṛṣṭaṃ tenāhaṃ na mametyapi /
GP12nardp1_u:7777: nityaṃ mithyāvinītānāṃ kleśo duḥkhāvaho tamaḥ // NarP_1,45.66 //
GP12nardp1_u:7778: dravyatyāge tu karmāṇi bhogatyāge vratāni ca /
GP12nardp1_u:7779: sukhatyāgā tapo yogaṃ sarvatyāge samāpanā // NarP_1,45.67 //
GP12nardp1_u:7781: viprahāṇāya duḥkhasya durgatirhi tathā bhavet // NarP_1,45.68 //
GP12nardp1_u:7783: basaṣaṣṭāni vakṣyāmi pañca karmedriyāṇi tu // NarP_1,45.69 //
GP12nardp1_u:7788: karṇo śabdaśca cittaṃ ca trayaḥ śravaṇasaṃgrahe /
GP12nardp1_u:7789: tathā sparśe tathā rūpe tathaiva rasagandhayoḥ // NarP_1,45.72 //
GP12nardp1_u:7793: trividhā vedānā yeṣu prasṛtā sarvasādhinī // NarP_1,45.74 //
GP12nardp1_u:7800: imāṃ ca yo veda vimokṣabuddhimātmānamanvicchati cāpramattaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:7801: na lipyate karmapalairaniṣṭaiḥ patraṃ viṣasyeva jalena siktam //
GP12nardp1_u:7803: yadā hyasau duḥkhasaukhye jahāti muktastadāgryāṃ gatimetyaliṅgaḥ //
GP12nardp1_u:7805: kṣīṇe ca puṇye vigate ca pāpe tanornimitte ca phale vinaṣṭe //
GP12nardp1_u:7808: tathā vimuktaḥ prajahāti duḥkhaṃ vidhaavaṃsate loṣṭamivādimṛcchan /
GP12nardp1_u:7809: yathā ruruḥ śṛṅgamatho purāṇaṃ hitvā tvacaṃ vāpyurago yathā ca //
GP12nardp1_u:7811: matsyaṃ yathā vāpyudake patantamutsṛjya pakṣī nipatatsaśaktaḥ //
GP12nardp1_u:7812: tathā hyasau duḥkhasaukhye vihāya muktaḥ parārddhyā gatimetyaliṅgaḥ //
GP12nardp1_u:7815: api ca bhavati maithilena gītaṃ nagaramupāhitamagninābhivīkṣya /
GP12nardp1_u:7816: na khalu mama hi dahyate 'tra kiñcitsvayamidamāha kila sma bhūmipālaḥ //
GP12nardp1_u:7817: imaṃ hi yaḥ paṭhati vimokṣaniścayaṃ mahāmune satatamavekṣate tathā /
GP12nardp1_u:7818: upadravānanubhaghavate hyaduḥ khitaḥ pramucyate kapilamivaitya maithilaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:7819: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne dvitīyapāde pañcacatvāriṃśattamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:7820: sūta uvāca tacchṛtvā nārado viprā maithilādhyātmamuttamam /
GP12nardp1_u:7821: punaḥ papraccha taṃ prītyā sanandanamudāradhīḥ // NarP_1,46.1 //
GP12nardp1_u:7823: prabrūhi tanmune mahyaṃ prapannāya dayānidhe // NarP_1,46.2 //
GP12nardp1_u:7824: sanandana uvāca tadasya trividhaṃ duḥkhamiha jātasya paṇḍita /
GP12nardp1_u:7829: tatprāptihetujñānaṃ ca karma coktaṃ mahāmune // NarP_1,46.5 //
GP12nardp1_u:7834: dve brahmaṇī veditavye śabdabrahma paraṃ ca yat /
GP12nardp1_u:7836: dve vidye veditavye cetyāha cātharvaṇī śrutiḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:7841: vyāpyaṃ vyāptaṃ yataḥ sarvaṃ taṃ vai paśyanti sūrayaḥ // NarP_1,46.11 //
GP12nardp1_u:7843: śrutivākyoditaṃ sūkṣmaṃ tadviṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padam // NarP_1,46.12 //
GP12nardp1_u:7853: tenāgamapitā sraṣṭā gakāro 'yaṃ tathā mune // NarP_1,46.16 //
GP12nardp1_u:7863: vetti vidyāmavidyāṃ ca sa vācyo bhagavāniti // NarP_1,46.21 //
GP12nardp1_u:7868: khāṇḍikyaṃ janakaṃ prāha pṛṣṭaḥ keśidhvajaḥ purā /
GP12nardp1_u:7870: bhūteṣu vasate soṃ'tarvasaṃtyatra ca tāni yat /
GP12nardp1_u:7871: dhātā vidhātā jagatāṃ vāsudevastataḥ prabhuḥ // NarP_1,46.25 //
GP12nardp1_u:7872: sa sarvabhūtaprakṛtiṃ vikāraṃ guṇādidoṣāṃśca mune vyatītaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:7877: paraḥ parāṇāṃ sakalā na yatra kleśādayaḥ saṃti parāvareśe // NarP_1,46.28
GP12nardp1_u:7880: sa jñāyate yena tadastadoṣaṃ śuddhaṃ paraṃ nirmalameva rūpam /
GP12nardp1_u:7887: na māṃsacakṣuṣā draṣṭuṃ brahmabhūtaḥ sa śakyate // NarP_1,46.33 //
GP12nardp1_u:7888: // nārada uvāca bhagavaṃstamahaṃ yogaṃ jñātumicchāmi taṃ vada /
GP12nardp1_u:7890: sanandana uvāca keśidhvajo yathā prāha khāṇḍikyāya mahātmane /
GP12nardp1_u:7891: janakāya purā yogaṃ tathāhaṃ kathayāmi te // NarP_1,46.35 //
GP12nardp1_u:7892: nārada uvāca khāṇḍikyaḥ ko 'bhavadbrahman ko vā keśidhvajo 'bhavat /
GP12nardp1_u:7894: sanandana uvāca dharmadhvajo vai janaka tasya puśe 'mitadhvajaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:7903: ekadā vartamānasya yāge yogavidāṃ vara // NarP_1,46.40 //
GP12nardp1_u:7904: tasya dhenuṃ jaghānograḥ śārdūlo vijane vane /
GP12nardp1_u:7905: tato rājā hatāṃ jñātvā dhenuṃ vyāghreṇa cartvijaḥ // NarP_1,46.41 //
GP12nardp1_u:7909: śunakaṃ pṛccha rājendra veda sa vetsyati // NarP_1,46.43 //
GP12nardp1_u:7910: sa gatvā tamapṛcchañca so 'pyāha nṛpatiṃ mune /
GP12nardp1_u:7911: na kaśerurnacaivāhaṃ na cānyaḥ sāṃprataṃ bhuvi // NarP_1,46.44 //
GP12nardp1_u:7912: vettyeka eva tvacchatruḥ khāṇḍikyo yo jitastvayā /
GP12nardp1_u:7913: sa cāha taṃ vrajāmyeṣa praṣṭumātmaripuṃ mune // NarP_1,46.45 //
GP12nardp1_u:7914: prāpta eva mayā yajñe yadi māṃ sa haniṣyati /
GP12nardp1_u:7915: prāyaścittaṃ sa cetpṛṣṭo vadiṣyati ripurmama // NarP_1,46.46 //
GP12nardp1_u:7918: vanaṃ jagāma yatrāste khāṇḍikyaḥ sa mahīpatiḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:7923: mṛgānāṃ vada pṛṣṭeṣu mūḍha kṛṣṇājinaṃ na kim // NarP_1,46.50 //
GP12nardp1_u:7924: yeṣāṃ matvā vṛthā cogrāḥ prahitāḥ śitasāyakāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:7925: sa tvāmahaṃ haniṣyāmi na me jīvanvimokṣyase // NarP_1,46.51 //
GP12nardp1_u:7927: keśidhvaja uvāca khāṇḍikya saṃśayaṃ praṣṭuṃ bhavantamahamāgataḥ // NarP_1,46.52 //
GP12nardp1_u:7928: na tvāṃ hṝntuṃ vicāryataitkopaṃ bāṇaṃ ca muñca vā /
GP12nardp1_u:7929: tataḥ sa mantribhiḥ sārddhamekānte sapurohitaḥ // NarP_1,46.53 //
GP12nardp1_u:7932: hate 'tra pṛthivī sarvā tava vaśyā bhaviṣyati /
GP12nardp1_u:7933: khāṇḍikyaścāha tānsarvāneva meva na saṃśayaḥ // NarP_1,46.55 //
GP12nardp1_u:7934: hate tu pṛthivī sarvā mama vaśyā bhaviṣyati /
GP12nardp1_u:7940: praṣṭavyaṃ yattvayā sarvaṃ tatpṛccha tvaṃ vadāmyaham /
GP12nardp1_u:7941: tataḥ prāha yathāvṛttaṃ homadhenuvadhaṃ mune // NarP_1,46.59 //
GP12nardp1_u:7942: tataśca taṃ sa papraccha prāyaścittaṃ hi tadrūtam /
GP12nardp1_u:7943: sa cācaṣṭa yathānyāyaṃ mune keśidhvajāya tat // NarP_1,46.60 //
GP12nardp1_u:7949: pūjitā ṛtvijaḥ sarve sadasyā mānitā mayā // NarP_1,46.63 //
GP12nardp1_u:7951: yathāhaṃ martyalokasya mayā sarvaṃ vicaṣṭitam // NarP_1,46.64 //
GP12nardp1_u:7952: aniṣpannakriyaṃ cetastathā na mama kiṃ yathā /
GP12nardp1_u:7953: itthaṃ tu cintayanneva saṃmāra sa mahīpatiḥ // NarP_1,46.65 //
GP12nardp1_u:7955: sa jagāma tato bhūyo rathamāruhya pārthivaḥ // NarP_1,46.66 //
GP12nardp1_u:7959: ahaṃ tu nāpakārāya prāptaḥ khāṇḍikya mā krudhaḥ // NarP_1,46.68 //
GP12nardp1_u:7961: niṣpādito mayā yāgaḥ samyak tvadupadeśataḥ // NarP_1,46.69 //
GP12nardp1_u:7963: ityukto mantrayāmāsa sa bhūyo mantribhiḥ saha // NarP_1,46.70 //
GP12nardp1_u:7967: prāhasya tānāha nṛpaḥ sa khāṇḍikyo mahāpatiḥ // NarP_1,46.72 //
GP12nardp1_u:7970: paramārthaḥ kathaṃ ko 'tra yūyaṃ nātra vicakṣaṇāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:7971: ityuktvā samupetyaiṃnaṃ sa tu keśidhvajaṃ nṛpam // NarP_1,46.74 //
GP12nardp1_u:7975: yadi ceddīyate mahyaṃ bhavatā guruniṣkrayaḥ // NarP_1,46.76 //
GP12nardp1_u:7977: keśidhvaja uvāca na prārthitaṃ tvayā kasmānmama rājyamakaṇṭakam // NarP_1,46.77 //
GP12nardp1_u:7979: khāṇḍikya uvāca keśidhvaja nibodha tvaṃ mayā na prārthitaṃ yataḥ // NarP_1,46.78 //
GP12nardp1_u:7983: yatrāśaktasya me doṣo naivāstyapakṛte tvayā // NarP_1,46.80 //
GP12nardp1_u:7987: na yācñā kṣatrabandhūnāṃ dharmāyaitatsatāṃ matam // NarP_1,46.82 //
GP12nardp1_u:7991: keśidhvaja uvāca ahaṃ ca vidyayā mṛtyuṃ tartukāmaḥ karomi vai // NarP_1,46.84 //
GP12nardp1_u:7993: tadidaṃ te mano diṣṭyā vivekaiścaryatāṃ gatam // NarP_1,46.85 //
GP12nardp1_u:8001: kalevaropabhogyaṃ hi gṛhakṣetrādikaṃ ca yat // NarP_1,46.89 //
GP12nardp1_u:8003: itthaṃ ca putrapautreṣu taddehotpāditeṣu ca // NarP_1,46.90 //
GP12nardp1_u:8007: mṛṇmayaṃ hi yathā gehaṃ lipyate vai mṛdaṃ bhasā // NarP_1,46.92 //
GP12nardp1_u:8010: āpyāyate yadi tataḥ puṃso garvo 'tra kiṅkṛtaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:8015: mohaśrame śamaṃ yāte svacchāntaḥkaraṇaḥ pumān // NarP_1,46.96 //
GP12nardp1_u:8019: jalasya nāgninā saṃgaḥ sthālīsaṃgāttathāpi hi // NarP_1,46.98 //
GP12nardp1_u:8024: kleśānāṃ ca kṣayakaraṃ yogādanyanna vidyate // NarP_1,46.101 //
GP12nardp1_u:8025: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne dvitīyapāde ṣaṭcatvāriṃśattamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:8026: sanandana uvāca etadadhyātmamānāḍhyaṃ vacaḥ keśidhvajasya saḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:8028: khāṇḍikya uvāca tad brūhi tvaṃ mahābhāga yogaṃ yogaviduttama /
GP12nardp1_u:8030: keśidhvaja uvāca yogasvarūpaṃ khāṇḍikya śrūyatāṃ gadato mama /
GP12nardp1_u:8031: yatra sthito na cyavate prāpya brahmalayaṃ muniḥ // NarP_1,47.3 //
GP12nardp1_u:8039: tasyā brahmaṇi saṃyogo yoga ityabhidhīyate // NarP_1,47.7 //
GP12nardp1_u:8041: yasya yogaḥ sa vai yogī mumukṣuramidhīyate // NarP_1,47.8 //
GP12nardp1_u:8049: seveta yogī niṣkāmo yigitāṃ svamano nayan // NarP_1,47.12 //
GP12nardp1_u:8051: kurvvīta brahmaṇi tathā parisminpravaṇaṃ manaḥ // NarP_1,47.13 //
GP12nardp1_u:8057: prāṇāyāmaḥ sa vijñeyaḥ sabījo 'bīja eva ca // NarP_1,47.16 //
GP12nardp1_u:8064: vaśyatā paramā tena jāyate niścalā tmanām /
GP12nardp1_u:8068: khāṇḍikya uvāca kathyatāṃ me mahābhāga cetaso yaḥ śubhāśrayaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:8070: keśidhvaja uvāca āśrayaścetaso jñānin dvidhā tañca svarūpataḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:8071: rūpaṃ mūrtamamūrtaṃ ca paraṃ cāparameva ca // NarP_1,47.23 //
GP12nardp1_u:8073: brahmākhyā karmasaṃjñā ca tathā caivobhayātmikā // NarP_1,47.24 //
GP12nardp1_u:8086: na tadyogayujā śakyaṃ nṛpa cintayituṃ yataḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:8087: tataḥ sthūlaṃ hare rūpaṃ cintyaṃ yañcakṣugocaram // NarP_1,47.31 //
GP12nardp1_u:8089: maruto vasavo rudrā bhāskārāstārakā grahāḥ // NarP_1,47.32 //
GP12nardp1_u:8091: manuṣyāḥ paśavaḥ śailāsamudrāḥ sarito drumāḥ // NarP_1,47.33 //
GP12nardp1_u:8092: bhūpa bhūtānyaśeṣāṇi bhūtānāṃ ye ca hetavaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:8100: yeyaṃ kṣetrajñaśaktiḥ sā ceṣṭitā nṛpa karmajā /
GP12nardp1_u:8101: asārabhūte saṃsāre proktā tatra mahāmate // NarP_1,47.38 //
GP12nardp1_u:8103: tayā tirohitatvāttu śaktiḥ kṣetrajña saṃjñitā // NarP_1,47.39 //
GP12nardp1_u:8115: amṛrtaṃ brahmaṇo rūpaṃ yatsadityucyate budhaiḥ // NarP_1,47.45 //
GP12nardp1_u:8122: tadrūpaṃ viśvarūpāya cintyaṃ yoga yujā nṛpa /
GP12nardp1_u:8127: kurvīta saṃsthitaṃ sādhu vijñeyā śuddhalakṣaṇā // NarP_1,47.51 //
GP12nardp1_u:8130: anye tu puruṣavyāghra cetaso ye vyāpā8yāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:8133: eṣā vai dhāraṇā jñeyā yañcitaṃ tatra dhāryate // NarP_1,47.54 //
GP12nardp1_u:8134: tatra mūrttaṃ hare rūpaṃ yādṛk cintyaṃ narādhipa /
GP12nardp1_u:8147: tāvadyāvad dṛḍhībhūtā tatraiva nṛpa dhāraṇā // NarP_1,47.61 //
GP12nardp1_u:8149: nāpayāti yadā cittātsiddhāṃ manyeta tāṃ tadā // NarP_1,47.62 //
GP12nardp1_u:8160: vijñānaṃ prāpakaṃ prāpye paraṃ brahmaṇi pārthiva /
GP12nardp1_u:8163: niṣpādya muktikāryaṃ vai kṛtakṛtyo nivartate // NarP_1,47.69 //
GP12nardp1_u:8167: ātmano brahmaṇābhedaṃ saṃmataṃ kaḥ kariṣyati // NarP_1,47.71 //
GP12nardp1_u:8170: khāṇḍikya uvāca kathito yogasadbhāvaḥ sarvameva kṛtaṃ mama /
GP12nardp1_u:8175: paramārthastva saṃlāpyo vacasāṃ gocaro na yaḥ // NarP_1,47.75 //
GP12nardp1_u:8178: sanandana uvāca yathārhapūjayā tena khāṇḍikyena sa pūjitaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:8179: ājagāma puraṃ brahmaṃstataḥ keśidhvajo nṛpaḥ // NarP_1,47.77 //
GP12nardp1_u:8188: etatte kathitaṃ sarvaṃ yanmāṃ tvaṃ paripṛṣṭavān /
GP12nardp1_u:8191: nārada uvāca śrutaṃ mayā mahāmāga tāpatrayacikitsitam /
GP12nardp1_u:8192: tathāpi me mano bhrāntaṃ na sthitiṃ labhateṃ'jasā // NarP_1,48.1 //
GP12nardp1_u:8195: sūta uvāca tacchrṛtvā nāradenoktaṃ brahmaputraḥ sanandanaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:8197: sanandana uvāca atra te kathayiṣyāmi itihāsaṃ purātanam /
GP12nardp1_u:8198: yaṃ śrutvā tvanmano bhrāntamāsthānaṃ labhate bhūśam // NarP_1,48.4 //
GP12nardp1_u:8200: ārṣabho yasya nāmnedaṃ bhārataṃ khaṇḍamucyate // NarP_1,48.5 //
GP12nardp1_u:8208: tatrāsau tāpaso tāpaso bhūtvā viṣṇorārādhanaṃ mune // NarP_1,48.9 //
GP12nardp1_u:8210: nityaṃ prātaḥ samāplutya nirmale 'bhali nārada // NarP_1,48.10 //
GP12nardp1_u:8216: sacaikadā mahābhāgaḥ snātvā prātaḥ samāhitaḥ // NarP_1,48.13 //
GP12nardp1_u:8218: athājagāma tattīraṃ jalaṃ pātuṃ pipāsitā // NarP_1,48.14 //
GP12nardp1_u:8220: tataḥ samabhavattatra pītaprāye jale tayā // NarP_1,48.15 //
GP12nardp1_u:8227: munīndra sā tu hariṇī nipapāta mamāra ca /
GP12nardp1_u:8228: hariṇīṃ tāṃ vilokyātha vipannāṃ nṛpatāpasaḥ // NarP_1,48.19 //
GP12nardp1_u:8230: cakārānudinaṃ cāsau mṛgapotasya vai nṛpaḥ // NarP_1,48.20 //
GP12nardp1_u:8231: poṣaṇaṃ puṣyamāṇaśca sa tena vavṛdhe mune /
GP12nardp1_u:8237: āsīñcetaḥ samāsaktaṃ na tathā hyacyute mune /
GP12nardp1_u:8240: kiṃ vṛkaibhakṣito vyāghnaiḥ kiṃ siṃhena nipātitaḥ // NarP_1,48.25 //
GP12nardp1_u:8244: kālena gacchatā so 'tha kālaṃ cakre mahīpatiḥ // NarP_1,48.27 //
GP12nardp1_u:8247: mṛgo babhūva sa mune tādṛśīṃ bhāvanāṃ gataḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:8252: tatra cotsṛṣṭadeho 'sau jajñe jātismaro dvijaḥ // NarP_1,48.31 //
GP12nardp1_u:8258: na papāṭha guruproktaṃ kṛtopanayanaḥ śrutam // NarP_1,48.34 //
GP12nardp1_u:8259: na dadarśa ca karmāṇi śāstrāṇi jagṛhe na ca /
GP12nardp1_u:8264: saṃmānena parāṃ hāniṃ yogarddheḥ kurute yataḥ // NarP_1,48.37 //
GP12nardp1_u:8266: tasmāñcareta vai yogī satāṃ dharmamadūṣayan // NarP_1,48.38 //
GP12nardp1_u:8270: bhuṅkte kulmāṣavaṭakān śākaṃ tranyaphalaṃ kaṇān // NarP_1,48.40 //
GP12nardp1_u:8278: sa rājā śibikārūḍho gantuṃ kṛtamatirdvija // NarP_1,48.44 //
GP12nardp1_u:8280: śreyaḥ kimatra saṃsāre duḥkhaprāye nṛṇāmiti // NarP_1,48.45 //
GP12nardp1_u:8288: vilokya nṛpatiḥ so 'tha viṣamaṃ śibikāgatam // NarP_1,48.49 //
GP12nardp1_u:8290: punastathaiva śibikāṃ vilokya viṣamāṃ hasan // NarP_1,48.50 //
GP12nardp1_u:8294: rājovāca kiṃ śrānto 'syalpamadhvānaṃ tvayoḍhā śibikā mama /
GP12nardp1_u:8295: kimāyāsasaho na tvaṃ pīvā nāsi nirīkṣyase // NarP_1,48.52 //
GP12nardp1_u:8296: brāhmaṇa uvāca nāhaṃ pīvā na caivoḍhā śibikā bhavato mayā /
GP12nardp1_u:8297: na śrānto 'smi na cāyāso voḍhānyo 'sti mahīpate // NarP_1,48.53 //
GP12nardp1_u:8298: rājovāca pratyakṣaṃ dṛśyate pīvātvadyāpi śibikā tvayi /
GP12nardp1_u:8299: śramaśca bhāro dvahane bhavatyeva hi dehinām // NarP_1,48.54 //
GP12nardp1_u:8300: brāhmaṇa uvāca pratyakṣaṃ bhavatā bhūpa yaddṛṣṭaṃ mama tadvada /
GP12nardp1_u:8302: tvayoḍhā śibikā ceti tvayyadyāpi ca saṃsthitā /
GP12nardp1_u:8303: mithyā tadapyatra bhavān śṛṇotu vacanaṃ mama // NarP_1,48.56 //
GP12nardp1_u:8304: bhūmau pādayugaṃ cātha jaṅghe pādadvaye sthite /
GP12nardp1_u:8310: ahaṃ tvaṃ ca tathānye ca bhūtairuhyāśca pārthiva /
GP12nardp1_u:8314: ātmā śuddho 'kṣaraḥ śānto nirguṇaḥ prakṛte paraḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:8317: tadāpi bāliśo 'si tvaṃ kayā yuktyā tvayeritam // NarP_1,48.63/
GP12nardp1_u:8319: śibikeyaṃ yadā skandhe tadā bhāraḥ samastvayā // NarP_1,48.64 //
GP12nardp1_u:8323: soḍhavyaḥ sumahānbhāraḥ katamo nṛpa te mayā // NarP_1,48.66 //
GP12nardp1_u:8326: sanandana uvāca evamuktvābhavaṃnmaunī sa vahañśibikāṃ dvijaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:8327: so 'pi rājāvatīryorvyāṃ tatpādau jagṛhe tvaran // NarP_1,48.68 //
GP12nardp1_u:8328: rājovāca bho bho visṛjya śibikāṃ prasādaṃ kuru me dvija /
GP12nardp1_u:8329: kathyatāṃ ko bhavānatra jālmarupadharaḥ sthitaḥ // NarP_1,48.69 //
GP12nardp1_u:8331: tatsarvaṃ kathyatāṃ vidvanmahyaṃ śuśrūṣave tvayā // NarP_1,48.70 //
GP12nardp1_u:8332: brāhmaṇa uvāca śrūyatāṃ ko 'hamityetadvaktuṃ bhūpa na śakyate /
GP12nardp1_u:8336: sarvasyaiva hi bhūpāla jantoḥ sarvatra kāraṇam /
GP12nardp1_u:8338: rājovāca dharmādharmauṃ na saṃdehaḥ sarvakāryeṣu kāraṇam /
GP12nardp1_u:8341: vaktuṃ na śakyate śrotuṃ tanmameccā pravartate // NarP_1,48.75 //
GP12nardp1_u:8342: yo 'sti yo 'hamiti brahmankathaṃ vaktuṃ na śakyate /
GP12nardp1_u:8343: ātmanyeva na doṣāya śabdo 'hamiti yo dvijā // NarP_1,48.76 //
GP12nardp1_u:8344: brāhmaṇa uvāca śabdo 'hamiti doṣāya nātmanyevaṃ tathaiva tat /
GP12nardp1_u:8355: tadadā hi ko bhavānko 'hamityetadviphalaṃ vacaḥ // NarP_1,48.82 //
GP12nardp1_u:8356: tvaṃ rājā śibikā ceyaṃ vayaṃ vāhāḥ puraḥ sarāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:8357: ayaṃ ca bhavato loko na sadetannṛpocyate // NarP_1,48.83 //
GP12nardp1_u:8359: kva vṛkṣasaṃjñā vai tasyā dārusaṃjñāthavā nṛpa // NarP_1,48.84 //
GP12nardp1_u:8360: vṛkṣārūḍho mahārājo nāyaṃ vadati te janaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:8361: na ca dāruṇi sarvastvāṃ bravīti śibikāgatam // NarP_1,48.85 //
GP12nardp1_u:8365: kva jātaṃ chatramityeṣa nyāyastvayi tathā mayi // NarP_1,48.87 //
GP12nardp1_u:8368: pumānna devo na naro na paśurna ca pādapaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:8371: tathānyaśca nṛpetthaṃ tanna satyaṃ kalpanāmayam // NarP_1,48.90 //
GP12nardp1_u:8373: pariṇāmādisaṃbhūtaṃ tadvastu nṛpa tañca kim // NarP_1,48.91 //
GP12nardp1_u:8374: tvaṃ rājā sarvasokasya pituḥ putro ripo ripuḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:8375: patnyāḥ patiḥ pitā sūnoḥ kastvaṃ bhūpa vadāmyaham // NarP_1,48.92 //
GP12nardp1_u:8376: tvaṃ kimetacciraḥ kiṃ tu śirastava tatho daram /
GP12nardp1_u:8377: kimu pādādikaṃ tvetannaiva kiṃ te mahīpate // NarP_1,48.93 //
GP12nardp1_u:8379: ko 'hamityatra nipuṇaṃ bhūtvā cintaya pārthiva // NarP_1,48.94 //
GP12nardp1_u:8381: pṛthakūcaraṇaniṣpādyaṃ śakyaṃ tu nṛpate katham // NarP_1,48.95 //
GP12nardp1_u:8384: sanandana uvāca niśamya tasyeti vacaḥ paramārthasamanvitam /
GP12nardp1_u:8387: śrute tasminbhramantīva manaso mama vṛttayaḥ // NarP_1,49.2 //
GP12nardp1_u:8389: bhavatā darśitaṃ vipra tatparaṃ prakṛtermahat // NarP_1,49.3 //
GP12nardp1_u:8390: nāhaṃ vahāmi śibikāṃ śibikā mayi na sthitā /
GP12nardp1_u:8393: pravartante guṇāścaite kiṃ mameti tvayoditam // NarP_1,49.5 //
GP12nardp1_u:8397: praṣṭumabhyudyato gatvā śreyaḥ kintvatra saṃśaye // NarP_1,49.7 //
GP12nardp1_u:8399: tenaiva paramārthārthaṃ tvayi cetaḥ pradhāvati // NarP_1,49.8 //
GP12nardp1_u:8406: brāhmaṇa uvāca bhūyaḥ pṛcchasi kiṃ śreyaḥ paramārthena pṛcchasi /
GP12nardp1_u:8409: putrānicchati rājyaṃ ca śreyastasyaiva tannṛpa // NarP_1,49.13 //
GP12nardp1_u:8413: ātmā dhyeyaḥ sadā bhūpa yogayuktaistathā paraiḥ // NarP_1,49.15 //
GP12nardp1_u:8414: śreya stasyaiva saṃyogaḥ śreyo yaḥ paramātmanaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:8416: saṃtyatra paramārthāstu na tvete śrūyatāṃ ca me /
GP12nardp1_u:8417: dharmo 'yaṃ tyajate kiṃ tu paramārtho dhanaṃ yadi // NarP_1,49.17 //
GP12nardp1_u:8420: paramārthabhūtaḥ so 'nyasya paramārtho hi naḥ pitā /
GP12nardp1_u:8421: evaṃ na paramārtho 'sti jagatyatra carācare // NarP_1,49.19 //
GP12nardp1_u:8424: paramārthā bhavantyatra na bhavanti ca vai tataḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:8427: yattu niṣpādyate kāryaṃ mṛdā kāraṇabhūtayā // NarP_1,49.22 //
GP12nardp1_u:8430: niṣpādyate kriyā yā tu sā bhavitrī vināśinī /
GP12nardp1_u:8433: tadevāpaladaṃ karma paramārtho mato mama // NarP_1,49.25 //
GP12nardp1_u:8441: eko vyāpī samaḥ śuddho nirguṇa prakṛteḥ paraḥ // NarP_1,49.29 //
GP12nardp1_u:8451: śṛṇvatra bhūpa prāgvṛttaṃ yadgītamṛbhuṇā bhavet // NarP_1,49.34 //
GP12nardp1_u:8459: devikāyāstaṭe vīra nāgaraṃ nāma vai puram // NarP_1,49.38 //
GP12nardp1_u:8463: divye varṣasahasre tu samatīte 'sya tatpuram // NarP_1,49.40 //
GP12nardp1_u:8469: ṛbhuruvāca bho vipravarya bhoktavyaṃ yadatra bhavato gṛhe // NarP_1,49.43 //
GP12nardp1_u:8470: tatkathyatāṃ kadanneṣu na prītiḥ satataṃ mama /
GP12nardp1_u:8471: nidāgha uvāca saktuyāvakavrīhīnāmapūpānāṃ ca me gṛhe // NarP_1,49.44 //
GP12nardp1_u:8473: ṛbhuruvāca kadannāni dijaitāni miṣṭamannaṃ prayaccha me // NarP_1,49.45 //
GP12nardp1_u:8475: nidāgha uvāca gṛhe śālini madgehe yatkiñcidati śobhanam // NarP_1,49.46 //
GP12nardp1_u:8477: ityuktā tena sā patnī miṣṭamannaṃ dvijasya tat // NarP_1,49.47 //
GP12nardp1_u:8481: nidāgha uvāca api te paramā tṛptirutpannā puṣṭireva // NarP_1,49.49 //
GP12nardp1_u:8482: api te mānasaṃ svasthamāhāreṇa kṛtaṃ dvija /
GP12nardp1_u:8483: kva nivāsī bhavānvipra kva vā gantuṃ samudyataḥ // NarP_1,49.50 //
GP12nardp1_u:8485: ṛmuruvāca kṣudhitasya ca bhukte 'nne tṛptirbrahmanvijāyate // NarP_1,49.51 //
GP12nardp1_u:8486: na me kṣudhā bhavettṝptiḥ kasmānmāṃ dvija pṛcchati /
GP12nardp1_u:8487: vahninā pārthivenādau dagdhe vai kṣurāpīśvaḥ // NarP_1,49.52 //
GP12nardp1_u:8489: kṣuttṛṣṇe dehadharmākhye na mamaite yato dvija // NarP_1,49.53 //
GP12nardp1_u:8493: kva nivāsastavetyuktaṃ kva gantāsi ca yattvayā // NarP_1,49.55 //
GP12nardp1_u:8497: so 'haṃ gantā na cāgantā naikadeśaniketanaḥ // NarP_1,49.57 //
GP12nardp1_u:8498: tvaṃ cānye ca na ca tvaṃ tvaṃ nānye naivāhamapyaham /
GP12nardp1_u:8499: miṣṭanne miṣṭamityeṣā jihvā sā me kṛtā tava // NarP_1,49.58 //
GP12nardp1_u:8504: mṛṇmayaṃ hi mṛdā yadvadgṛhaṃ liptaṃ sthirībhavet /
GP12nardp1_u:8505: pārthivo 'yaṃ tathā dehaḥ pārthivaiḥ paramāṇubhiḥ // NarP_1,49.61 //
GP12nardp1_u:8507: guḍaḥ phalānīti tathā pārthivāḥ paramāṇavaḥ // NarP_1,49.62 //
GP12nardp1_u:8509: tanmanaḥ śamanālabi kāryaṃ prāpyaṃ hi muktaye // NarP_1,49.63 //
GP12nardp1_u:8513: naṣṭo mohastavākarṇya vacāṃsyetāni me dvija // NarP_1,49.65 //
GP12nardp1_u:8514: ṛbhuruvāca ṛbhurasmi tavācāryaḥ prajñādānāya te dvija /
GP12nardp1_u:8516: eka evamidaṃ viddhi na bhedi sakalaṃ jagat /
GP12nardp1_u:8518: brahmaṇa uvāca tathetyuktvā nidādhena praṇipātapuraḥ saram /
GP12nardp1_u:8519: pūjitaḥ parayā bhaktyānicchitaḥ prayayau vibhuḥ // NarP_1,49.68 //
GP12nardp1_u:8522: nagarasya bahiḥ so 'tha nidāghaṃ dṛṣṭavān munim /
GP12nardp1_u:8527: uvāca kasmādekāntaṃ sthīyata bhavatā dvija // NarP_1,49.72 //
GP12nardp1_u:8528: // nidāgha uvāca bho vipra janasaṃmarddo mahāneṣa janeśvare /
GP12nardp1_u:8529: pravivakṣau pure ramye tenātra sthīyate mayā // NarP_1,49.73 //
GP12nardp1_u:8531: kathyatāṃ me dvijaśreṣṭha tvamabhijño mato mama // NarP_1,49.74 //
GP12nardp1_u:8534: ṛbhuruvāca etau hi gajarājānau dṛṣṭau hi yugapanmayā /
GP12nardp1_u:8537: jñātumicchāmyahaṃ ko 'tra gajaḥ ko vā narādhipaḥ // NarP_1,49.77 //
GP12nardp1_u:8539: vāhyavāhakasaṃbandhaṃ ko na jānāti vai dvija // NarP_1,49.78 //
GP12nardp1_u:8541: adhaḥ sattvavibhāgaṃ kiṃ kiṃ corddhamabhidhīyate // NarP_1,49.79 //
GP12nardp1_u:8542: brāhmaṇa uvāca ityuktvā sahasāruhya nidāghaḥ prāha taṃ ṛbhum /
GP12nardp1_u:8543: śrayatāṃ kathayāmyeṣa yanmāṃ tvaṃ paripṛcchasi // NarP_1,49.80 //
GP12nardp1_u:8545: avabodhāya te brahmandṛṣṭānto darśito mayā // NarP_1,49.81 //
GP12nardp1_u:8546: ṛbhuruvāca tvaṃ rājeva dvijaśreṣṭha sthito 'haṃ gajavadyadi /
GP12nardp1_u:8547: tadevaṃ tvaṃ samācakṣva katamastvamahaṃ tathā // NarP_1,49.82 //
GP12nardp1_u:8548: brāhmaṇa uvāca ityuktaḥ satvarastasya caraṇāvabhivandya saḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:8551: yathācāryasya tena tvāṃ manye prāptamahaṃ gurum // NarP_1,49.84 //
GP12nardp1_u:8556: brāhmaṇa uvāca evamuktvā dadau vidyāṃ nidāghaṃ sa ṛbhurguruḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:8564: ekaḥ samastaṃ yadihāsti kiñcittadacyuto nāsti paraṃ tato 'nyat /
GP12nardp1_u:8565: so 'haṃ sa ca tvaṃ sa ca sarvametadātmāṃsvayaṃ bhātyapabhedamohaḥ //
GP12nardp1_u:8566: sanandana uvāca itīritastena sa rājavaryastatyāja bhedaṃ paramārthadṛṣṭiḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:8570: yathā pṛṣṭaṃ tvayā brahmaṃstathā te gaditaṃ mayā /
GP12nardp1_u:8574: sūta uvāca śrutvā sanandanasyetthaṃ vacanaṃ nārado muniḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:8575: asaṃtuṣṭa iva prāha bhrātaraṃ taṃ sanandanam // NarP_1,50.1 //
GP12nardp1_u:8576: nārada uvāca bhagavansarvamākhyātaṃ yatpṛṣṭaṃ bhavato mayā /
GP12nardp1_u:8577: tathāpi nātmā prīyeta śṛṇvanharikathāṃ muhuḥ // NarP_1,50.2 //
GP12nardp1_u:8579: siddhiṃ sumahatīṃ prāpto nirviṇṇo 'vāntaraṃ bahiḥ // NarP_1,50.3 //
GP12nardp1_u:8581: na jāyate kathaṃ prāpto jñānaṃ vyāsātmajaḥ śiśuḥ // NarP_1,50.4 //
GP12nardp1_u:8584: sanandana uvāca śṛṇu viprapravakṣyāmi śukotpattiṃ samāsataḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:8585: yāṃ śrutvā brahmatattvajño jāyate mānavo mune // NarP_1,50.6 //
GP12nardp1_u:8586: na hāyanairna palitairna vittena na bandhubhiḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:8587: ṛṣayaścakrire dharmaṃ yo 'nūcānaḥ sa no mahān // NarP_1,50.7 //
GP12nardp1_u:8589: tanme karma samācakṣva śrotuṃ kautūhalaṃ mama // NarP_1,50.8 //
GP12nardp1_u:8590: sanandana uvāca śṛṇu nārada vakṣyāmi hyanūcānasya lakṣaṇam /
GP12nardp1_u:8592: śikṣā kalpo vyākaraṇaṃ niruktaṃ jyotiṣaṃ tathā /
GP12nardp1_u:8598: nārada uvāca aṅgānāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ brūhi vedānāṃ cāpi vistarāt /
GP12nardp1_u:8600: sanandana uvāca praśnabhāro 'yamatulastvayā mama kṛto dvija /
GP12nardp1_u:8603: vedānāṃ vedavidbhistu tacchṛṇuṣva vadāmi te // NarP_1,50.15 //
GP12nardp1_u:8604: ārcikaṃ gāthikaṃ caiva sāmikaṃ ca svarāntaram /
GP12nardp1_u:8610: mantro hīnaḥ svarato varṇato vā mithyāprayukto na tamarthamāha /
GP12nardp1_u:8611: sa vāgvajro yajamānaṃ hirnāsti yathendraśatruḥ svarato 'parādhāt //
GP12nardp1_u:8612: uraḥ kaṇṭhaḥ śiraścaiva sthānāni trīṇi vāṅkye /
GP12nardp1_u:8615: na ca śakto 'si vyaktastu tathā prāvacanā vidhiḥ // NarP_1,50.21 //
GP12nardp1_u:8617: ṛgvede sāmavede ca vaktavyaḥ prathamaḥ svaraḥ // NarP_1,50.22 //
GP12nardp1_u:8623: mandraḥ kruṣṭo munīśvara etānkurvanti sāmagāḥ // NarP_1,50.25 //
GP12nardp1_u:8626: ete viśeṣataḥ proktāḥ svarā vai sārvavaidikāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:8628: sāmavede tu vakṣyāmi svarāṇāṃ caritaṃ yathā /
GP12nardp1_u:8631: pavitraṃ pāvanaṃ puṇyaṃ yathā tubhyaṃ prakīrtitam // NarP_1,50.29 //
GP12nardp1_u:8639: svargābhrāñcaiva gāndhāro grāmasthānāni trīṇi hi // NarP_1,50.33 //
GP12nardp1_u:8640: svarāṇāṃ ca viśeṣeṇa grāmarāgā iti smṛtāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:8643: nadī viśālā sumukhī citrā citravatī mukhā // NarP_1,50.35 //
GP12nardp1_u:8644: balā cāpyatha vijñeyā devānāṃ sapta mūrchanāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:8645: āpyāyinī viśvabhṛtā candrā hemā kapardinī // NarP_1,50.36 //
GP12nardp1_u:8646: maitrī ca bārhatī caiva pitṝṇāṃ sapta mūrchanāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:8648: aśvakrāntā tu gāndhāre tṛtīyā mūrcchanā smṛtā /
GP12nardp1_u:8649: madhyame khalu sauvīrā hṛṣikā pañcame svare // NarP_1,50.38 //
GP12nardp1_u:8650: dhaivate cāpi vijñeyā mūrchanā tūttarā matā /
GP12nardp1_u:8651: niṣāde rajanīṃ vidyādṛṣīṇāṃ sapta mūrchanāḥ // NarP_1,50.39 //
GP12nardp1_u:8653: pitṝṇāṃ mūrcchānāḥ sapta tathā yakṣā na saṃśayaḥ // NarP_1,50.40 //
GP12nardp1_u:8654: ṛṣīṇāṃ mūrchanāḥ sapta yāstvimā laukikāḥ smṛtāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:8655: ṣaṅjaḥ prīṇāti vai devānṛṣīnprīṇāti carṣabhaḥ // NarP_1,50.41 //
GP12nardp1_u:8659: gānasya tu daśavidhā guṇavṛttistu tadyathā // NarP_1,50.43 //
GP12nardp1_u:8660: raktaṃ pūrṇamalaṅkṛtaṃ prasannaṃ vyaktaṃ vikruṣṭaṃ ślakṣṇaṃ samaṃ sukumāraṃ madhuramiti guṇāstatra raktaṃ nāma veṇuvīṇāsvarāṇāmekībhāvaṃ raktamityucyate pūrṇaṃ nāma svaraśrutipūraṇācchandaḥ pādākṣaraṃ saṃyogātpūrṇamityucyate alaṅkṛtaṃ nāmorasi śirasi kaṇṭhayuktamityalaṅkṛtaṃ prasannaṃ nāmāpagatāgadgadanirviśaṅkaṃ prasannamityucyate vyaktaṃ nāma padapadārthaprakṛtivikārāgamanopakṛttaddhitasamāsadhātunipātopasargasvaraliṅgaṃ vṛttivārttikavibhaktyarthavacanānāṃ samyagupapādanaṃ vyaktamityucyate vikruṣṭaṃ nāmoñcairuñcāritaṃ vyaktapadākṣaraṃ vikruṣṭamityucyate ślekṣṇaṃ
GP12nardp1_u:8661: nāma drutamavilaṃbitamuccanīcaplutasamāhārahelatālopanayādibhirupapādanābhiḥ ślakṣṇamityucyate samaṃ nāmāvāpanirvāpapradeśe pratyantarasthānānāṃ samāsaḥ samamityucyate sukumāraṃ nāma mṛdupadavarṇasvarakuhagaraṇayuktaṃ sukumāramityucyate madhuraṃ nāma svabhāvopanītalalitapadākṣaraguṇasamṛddhaṃ madhuramityucyate evametairdaśabhirguṇairyuktaṃ gānaṃ bhavati // 1//
GP12nardp1_u:8662: bavanti cātra ślokāḥ śaṅkitaṃ bhīṣaṇaṃ bhītamuddhuṣṭamanunāsikam /
GP12nardp1_u:8672: pacamo madhyamaḥ ṣaṅja ityete brāhmaṇāḥ smṛtāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:8677: nipatati madhyamarāge sa niṣādaṃ ṣāṅjavaṃ vidyāt // NarP_1,50.51 //
GP12nardp1_u:8683: dhaivataḥ kaṃpito yatra sa ṣaṅgayāma īritaḥ // NarP_1,50.54 //
GP12nardp1_u:8685: taṃ tu sādhāritaṃ vidyātpañcamasthaṃ tu kaiśikam // NarP_1,50.55 //
GP12nardp1_u:8686: kaiśikaṃ bhāvayitvā tu svaraiḥ sarvaiḥ samantataḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:8690: geti geyaṃ viduḥ prājñā dheti kārupravādanam /
GP12nardp1_u:8691: veti vādyasya saṃjñeyaṃ gandharvasya prarocanam // NarP_1,50.58 //
GP12nardp1_u:8692: yaḥ sāmagānāṃ prathamaḥ sa veṇormadhyamaḥ svaraḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:8693: yo dvitīyaḥ sa gāndhārastṛtīyastvṛṣabhaḥ smṛtaḥ // NarP_1,50.59 //
GP12nardp1_u:8694: caturthaḥ ṣaṅja ityāhuḥ pañcamo dhaivato bhavet /
GP12nardp1_u:8695: ṣaṣṭho niṣādo vijñeyaḥ saptamaḥ pañcamaḥ smṛtaḥ // NarP_1,50.60 //
GP12nardp1_u:8696: ṣaṅjaṃ mayūro vadati gāvo raṃbhanti carṣabham /
GP12nardp1_u:8697: ajāvike tu gāndhāraṃ kraiñco vadati madhyamam // NarP_1,50.61 //
GP12nardp1_u:8699: aśvastu dhaivataṃ vakti niṣaādaṃ vakti kuñjaraḥ // NarP_1,50.62 //
GP12nardp1_u:8705: ṣaṅbhiḥ saṃ jāyate yasmāttasmātṣaṅja iti smṛtaḥ // NarP_1,50.65 //
GP12nardp1_u:8709: vāti gandhavahaḥ puṇyo gāndhārastena hetunā // NarP_1,50.67 //
GP12nardp1_u:8714: dhaivataṃ ca niṣādaṃ ca varjayitvā tu tāvubhau /
GP12nardp1_u:8718: somena gīto gāndhāro viṣṇunā madhyamaḥ svaraḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:8721: ādyaṃsya daivataṃ brahmā ṣaṅjasyāpyucyate budhaiḥ // NarP_1,50.73 //
GP12nardp1_u:8723: gāvaḥ praṇīte tuṣyanti gāndhārastena hetunā // NarP_1,50.74 //
GP12nardp1_u:8731: dāravī gātravīṇā ca dve vīṇe gānajātiṣu // NarP_1,50.79 //
GP12nardp1_u:8732: sāmanī gātravīṇā tu tasyāstvaṃ śṛṇu lakṣaṇam /
GP12nardp1_u:8733: gātravīṇā tu sā proktā yasyāṃ gāyanti sāmaṅgāḥ // NarP_1,50.80 //
GP12nardp1_u:8735: hastau tu saṃyatau dhāryauṃ jānubhyāmuparisthitau // NarP_1,50.81 //
GP12nardp1_u:8741: viralā nāṅgulīḥ kuryānmūle caitāṃ na saṃspṛśet // NarP_1,50.84 //
GP12nardp1_u:8742: aṅguṣṭhāgreṇa tā nityaṃ madhyame parvaṇi spṛśet /
GP12nardp1_u:8745: trirekhā yasya dṛśyate siddhiṃ tatra vinirdiśet // NarP_1,50.86 //
GP12nardp1_u:8747: parvāntaraṃ sāmasu ca ṛkṣu kuryāttilāntaram // NarP_1,50.87 //
GP12nardp1_u:8753: kūrmo 'gāni ca saṃhṛtya cetodṛṣṭiṃ diśanmanaḥ // NarP_1,50.90 //
GP12nardp1_u:8757: samyakpracārayedvākyaṃ hastena ca mukhena ca // NarP_1,50.92 //
GP12nardp1_u:8760: samaṃ sāmāni gāyeta vyomni svena gātiryathā /
GP12nardp1_u:8761: yathā sucaratāṃ mārgo mīnānāṃ nopalabhyate // NarP_1,50.94 //
GP12nardp1_u:8763: yathā dadhini sarpiḥ syātkāṣṭastho vā yathānalaḥ // NarP_1,50.95 //
GP12nardp1_u:8769: svaraḥ sthānāccyuto yastu svaṃ sthānamativartate // NarP_1,50.98 //
GP12nardp1_u:8771: abhyāsārthe drutāṃ vṛttiṃ prayogārthe tu madhyamām // NarP_1,50.99 //
GP12nardp1_u:8775: kruṣṭasya mūrddhani sthānaṃ lalāṭe prathamasya tu // NarP_1,50.101 //
GP12nardp1_u:8779: aṅguṣṭasyottame vruṣṭo hyaṅguṣṭaṃ prathamaḥ svaraḥ // NarP_1,50.103 //
GP12nardp1_u:8781: anāmikāyāṃ ṣaṅgastu kaniṣṭāyāṃ tu dhaivataḥ // NarP_1,50.104 //
GP12nardp1_u:8784: mandro hi mandībhūtastu parisvāra iti smṛtaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:8785: kruṣṭena devā jīvanti prathamena tu mānuṣāḥ // NarP_1,50.106 //
GP12nardp1_u:8790: sarvāṇi khalu bhūtāni dhāryante sāmikaiḥ svaraiḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:8792: śrutīnāṃ yo viśeṣajño na sa ācārya ucyate /
GP12nardp1_u:8793: dīptā mandre dvitīya ca pracaturthe tathaiva ca // NarP_1,50.110 //
GP12nardp1_u:8794: atisvare tṛtīye ca kruṣṭe tu karuṇā śrutiḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:8795: śrutayo yā dvitīyasya mṛdumadhyāyatāḥ smṛtāḥ // NarP_1,50.111 //
GP12nardp1_u:8796: tāsāmapi tu vakṣyāmi lakṣaṇāni pṛthak pṛthak /
GP12nardp1_u:8797: āyatātvaṃ bhavennīce mṛdutā tu viparyaye // NarP_1,50.112 //
GP12nardp1_u:8798: sve svare madhyamātvaṃ tu tatsamīkṣya prayojayet /
GP12nardp1_u:8799: dvitīye viratā yā tu kruṣṭaśca parato bhavet // NarP_1,50.113 //
GP12nardp1_u:8800: dīptāṃ tāṃ tu vijānīyātprāthamyena mṛduḥ smṛtaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:8801: atraiva viratā yā tu caturthena pravartate // NarP_1,50.114 //
GP12nardp1_u:8804: taṃ ca hrasve ca dīrghe ca na cāpi ghuṭisajñake /
GP12nardp1_u:8809: dīptāmudātte jānīyāddīptāṃ ca svarite viduḥ // NarP_1,50.118 //
GP12nardp1_u:8813: ata ūrdhvaṃ pravakṣyāmi ācikasya svaratrayam // NarP_1,50.120 //
GP12nardp1_u:8815: ya evodātta ityuktaḥ sa eva svaritātparaḥ // NarP_1,50.121 //
GP12nardp1_u:8819: sa tu saptavidho jñeyaḥ svaraḥ pratyayadarśanāt // NarP_1,50.123 //
GP12nardp1_u:8820: padena tu sa vijñeyo bhavedyo yatra yādṛśaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:8831: jātyaḥ kṣaipro 'bhinihita stairavyañjana eva ca // NarP_1,50.129 //
GP12nardp1_u:8835: sapakāraṃ savaṃ vāpi hyakṣaraṃ svaritaṃ bhavet // NarP_1,50.131 //
GP12nardp1_u:8836: na codāttaṃ puro yasya jātyaḥ svāraḥ sa ucyate /
GP12nardp1_u:8847: svare cetsvaritaṃ yatra vivṛtā yatra saṃhitā // NarP_1,50.137 //
GP12nardp1_u:8849: tānyaḥ svāraḥ sa jātyena śrutyagre kṣaipra ucyate // NarP_1,50.138 //
GP12nardp1_u:8857: ikārānte pade pūrva ukāre parataḥ sthite // NarP_1,50.142 //
GP12nardp1_u:8859: ikārānte pade caivokāradvayaṃ pare pade // NarP_1,50.143 //
GP12nardp1_u:8861: trayo dīrghāstu vijñeyā ye ca saṃdhyakṣareṣu vai // NarP_1,50.144 //
GP12nardp1_u:8862: manyā yathā na indrābhyāṃ śeṣā hrasvāḥ prakīrtitāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:8867: na rephe vā hakāre vā dvirbhāvo jāyate kvacit // NarP_1,50.147 //
GP12nardp1_u:8868: na ca vargadvitīyeṣu na caturthe kadācana /
GP12nardp1_u:8869: caturthaṃ tu tṛtīyena dvitīyaḥ prathamena tu // NarP_1,50.148 //
GP12nardp1_u:8870: ādyamantyaṃ ca madhyaṃ ca svārākṣareṇa pīḍayet /
GP12nardp1_u:8871: anantyaśca bhavetpūrvo hyantaśca parato yadi // NarP_1,50.149 //
GP12nardp1_u:8879: saṃyogo yatra dṛśyeta rvyañjanaṃ virate pade // NarP_1,50.153 //
GP12nardp1_u:8881: saṃyoge svaritaṃ yatra udvātaḥ pratanaṃ tathā // NarP_1,50.154 //
GP12nardp1_u:8885: anusvāraḥ padāntaśca kramajaṃ pratyaye svake // NarP_1,50.156 //
GP12nardp1_u:8888: yaśabda iti vijñeyo yo 'nyaḥsaya iti smṛtaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:8894: yannīcaṃ nīcameva tadyatpracayasthaṃ tadapi nīcam // NarP_1,50.160 //
GP12nardp1_u:8896: priyaṃ dūtaṃ ghṛtaṃ cittamatiśabdastu nīcataḥ // NarP_1,50.161 //
GP12nardp1_u:8901: dvau varuṇau vasvarata uduttamantvaṃ varuṇadhāra caurudhārāmurudhāresvadohate /
GP12nardp1_u:8902: mātrikaṃ vā dvimātraṃ vā svaryate yadihākṣaram /
GP12nardp1_u:8903: tasyāditor'ddhamātraṃ vai śeṣaṃ tu parato bhavet /
GP12nardp1_u:8914: vivṛtayaścatasro vai vijñeyā iti me matam // NarP_1,50.168 //
GP12nardp1_u:8915: akṣarāṇāṃ niyogena tāsāṃ nāmāni me śṛṇu /
GP12nardp1_u:8918: catasṛṇāṃ vivṛtīnā mantaraṃ mātrikaṃ bhavet // NarP_1,50.170 //
GP12nardp1_u:8922: nakārānte padā pūrve svare ca parataḥ sthite /
GP12nardp1_u:8925: arddhamātrā tu pūrvasya rajyate tvaṇumātrayā // NarP_1,50.174 //
GP12nardp1_u:8927: repho raṅgaśca lopaśca sānusvaro 'pi vā kvacit // NarP_1,50.175 //
GP12nardp1_u:8929: mṛduścaiva dvimātraśca dadhanvāṃ iti nidarśanam // NarP_1,50.176 //
GP12nardp1_u:8931: evaṃ raṅgaḥ prayoktavyo nāradaitanmataṃ mama // NarP_1,50.177 //
GP12nardp1_u:8933: caturṇāṃ padajātīnāṃ padāntā daśa kīrtitāḥ // NarP_1,50.178 //
GP12nardp1_u:8934: svara uccaḥ svaro nīcaḥ svaraḥ svarita eva ca /
GP12nardp1_u:8935: vyañjanā na tu vartante yatra tiṣṭati sa svaraḥ // NarP_1,50.179 //
GP12nardp1_u:8937: maṇivadvyañjanaṃ vidyātsūtra vañca svaraṃ viduḥ // NarP_1,50.180 //
GP12nardp1_u:8944: saṃdhyakṣare pare saṃdhau prāptasuptau yavau yadi /
GP12nardp1_u:8946: ūṣmāntaṃ virate yatra saṃbhāvo bhavati kvacit /
GP12nardp1_u:8947: vivṛttiryā bhavettatra svarākhyāṃ tāṃ vinirddiśet // NarP_1,50.185 //
GP12nardp1_u:8954: chandomānaṃ ca vṛttaṃ ca pādasthānaṃ trikāraṇam /
GP12nardp1_u:8958: ṛvarṇe tu pṛthagrephaḥ pratyayastu vṛthā bhaveta /
GP12nardp1_u:8960: ūṣmaṇaiva hi saṃyukta ṛkāro yatra pīḍyate /
GP12nardp1_u:8961: guruvarṇaḥ sa vijñeyastṛcaṃ cātra nidarśanam // NarP_1,50.192 //
GP12nardp1_u:8962: ṛṣabhaṃ ca gṛhītaṃ ca bṛhaspatiṃ pṛthivyāṃ ca /
GP12nardp1_u:8963: nirṛtipañcamā hyatra ṛkārā nātra saṃśayaḥ // NarP_1,50.193 //
GP12nardp1_u:8969: śaṣaseṣu vivṛtāṃ tu hakāre saṃvṛtāṃ viduḥ // NarP_1,50.196 //
GP12nardp1_u:8971: ikāraṃ cāpyukāraṃ grastadoṣaṃ tathaiva ca // NarP_1,50.197 //
GP12nardp1_u:8973: atha sāntika ca naṅmasānusvāraṃ ghuṭataṃ ca // NarP_1,50.198 //
GP12nardp1_u:8976: yasyā lakṣaṇamuktaṃ yā tvanyā sā smṛtā vipulā // NarP_1,50.199 //
GP12nardp1_u:8979: vivṛttir yatra dṛśyate svārasyaivāgrataḥ sthitaḥ // NarP_1,50.201 //
GP12nardp1_u:8983: madhyodāttaṃ svaritaṃ dvirudāttamityetā aṣṭau padasaṃjñāḥ // NarP_1,50.203
GP12nardp1_u:8984: agniḥ somaḥ pravo vīryaṃ haviṣā svarvanaspatiḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:8985: antarmadhyamayotāmyudamanunipātya ādyātsvaritamupasarge dvirnnīcamākhyāta iti svaritātparāṇi yāni syurddhārāpakṣarāṇi tu /
GP12nardp1_u:8987: pracayo yatra dṛśyeta tatra hanyātsvaraṃ budhaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:8988: svaritaḥ kevalo yatra mṛdustatra nipātayet // NarP_1,50.205 //
GP12nardp1_u:8989: pañcavidhamācāryakaṃ nāma sukhaṃ nyāsaḥ karaṇaṃ pratijñoccāraṇā /
GP12nardp1_u:8990: atrocyate śreyaḥ khalu vaiśyāḥ pratijñātoccāraṇā yasya kasyacidvarṇasya karaṇaṃ nopalabhyate pratijñā tatra voḍhavyākaraṇaṃ hi tadātmakam //
GP12nardp1_u:8992: sāmasu nibhṛtaṃ karaṇaṃ svarasaukṣmyānnaiva jānīyuḥ // NarP_1,50.207 //
GP12nardp1_u:8994: jīrṇo hāraḥ prabuddhaḥ khalūṣasinbrahma cintayet // NarP_1,50.208 //
GP12nardp1_u:9000: sarve kaṇṭakinaḥ puṇyāḥ kṣīriṇaśca yaśasvinaḥ // NarP_1,50.211 //
GP12nardp1_u:9001: tenāsya karaṇe saukṣmyaṃ mādhuryaṃ copa jāyate /
GP12nardp1_u:9006: pītvā madhuṃ ghṛtaṃ caiva śucirbhūtvā tato vadet // NarP_1,50.214 //
GP12nardp1_u:9013: na tasya parimokṣo 'sti pāpāheriva kilbiṣāt // NarP_1,50.217 //
GP12nardp1_u:9015: susvareṇa svavakreṇa prayuktaṃ brahma rājati // NarP_1,50.218 //
GP12nardp1_u:9016: na takālo na laṃboṣṭo na ca sarvānunāsikaḥ // NarP_1,50.218 //
GP12nardp1_u:9019: sa tu varṇānprayuñjīta detoṣṭhaṃ yasya śobhanam // NarP_1,50.220 //
GP12nardp1_u:9020: pañcavidyāṃ na gṛhṇanti caṇḍā stabdhāśca ye narāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:9021: alasāśca sarogāśca yeṣāṃ ca visṛtaṃ manaḥ // NarP_1,50.221 //
GP12nardp1_u:9023: śanairadhvasu varteta yojanānna paraṃ vrajet // NarP_1,50.222 //
GP12nardp1_u:9032: añjanasya kṣayaṃ dṛṣṭvā valmīkasya tu saṃcayam /
GP12nardp1_u:9039: nahi vādyārthināṃ nidrā ciraṃ netreṣu tiṣṭati // NarP_1,50.230 //
GP12nardp1_u:9043: rākṣasībhya iva sribhyaḥ sa vidyāmadhigacchati // NarP_1,50.232 //
GP12nardp1_u:9044: na śaṭhāḥ prānpuvantyarthānna klibā na ca māninaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:9045: na ca lokaravā dīnā na ca svasvapratīkṣakāḥ // NarP_1,50.233 //
GP12nardp1_u:9049: athavā vidyayā vidyā hyanyathā nopapadyate // NarP_1,50.235 //
GP12nardp1_u:9051: vandhyeva yauvanavatī na tasya sāphalyavati bhavati // NarP_1,50.236 //
GP12nardp1_u:9053: jñātvā vedāṅgamādyaṃ tu brahmabhūyāya kalpate // NarP_1,50.237 //
GP12nardp1_u:9054: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne dvitīyapāde pañcāśattamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:9060: nakṣatrakalpe nirdiṣṭaṃ jñātavyaṃ tadihāpi ca // NarP_1,51.3 //
GP12nardp1_u:9061: vedakalpe vidhānaṃ tu ṛgādī nāṃ munīśvara /
GP12nardp1_u:9070: viśeṣaḥ pṛthageteṣāṃ sthitaḥ śaṅkhāntareṣu ca // NarP_1,51.8 //
GP12nardp1_u:9072: vakṣyāmi te dvijaśreṣṭha sāvadhānatayā śṛṇu // NarP_1,51.9 //
GP12nardp1_u:9075: kṛtvā proktāni karmāṇi tadvarddhvāni karoti yaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:9081: rekhāḥ proktāśca yāstisraḥ kartavyāstāḥ samā dvija /
GP12nardp1_u:9082: nyūnādhikā na karttavyā ityeva paribhāṣitam // NarP_1,51.14 //
GP12nardp1_u:9085: vandhyā duṣṭā ca dīnāṅgī mṛtavatsā ca yā bhavet /
GP12nardp1_u:9086: yajñārthaṃ gomayaṃ tasyā nāharediti bhāṣitam // NarP_1,51.16 //
GP12nardp1_u:9088: taṣāṃ praharaṇārthāya mataṃ proddharaṇaṃ dvija // NarP_1,51.17 //
GP12nardp1_u:9091: āpo devagaṇāḥ sarve tathā pitṛgaṇā dvija /
GP12nardp1_u:9094: śubhade mṛṇmaye pātre prokṣyādbhistaṃ nidhāyapayet // NarP_1,51.20 //
GP12nardp1_u:9098: tebhyaḥ saṃrakṣaṇārthāya brahmāṇaṃ taddiśi nyaset // NarP_1,51.22 //
GP12nardp1_u:9100: yajamānaḥ pūrvataḥ syurdvijāḥ sarve 'pi nārada // NarP_1,51.23 //
GP12nardp1_u:9101: dyūte ca vyavahāre ca yajñakarmaṇi cedbhavet /
GP12nardp1_u:9104: ṛtvijāṃ niyamo nāsti yathālābhaṃ samarcayet // NarP_1,51.25 //

GP12nardp1_u:9148: tathā sviṣṭakṛtaṃ vipra śrotre pūrṇāhutistathā // NarP_1,51.47 //
GP12nardp1_u:9150: dviśīrṣakaṃ ca ṣaṇnetraṃ piṅgalaṃ saptajihvakam // NarP_1,51.48 //
GP12nardp1_u:9152: srukstruvau cākṣamālā ca yā śaktirdakṣiṇe kare // NarP_1,51.49 //

GP12nardp1_u:9161: home mudrātrayaṃ proktaṃ mṛgī haṃsī ca sūkarī /

GP12nardp1_u:9171: svameva gāhatetyarthaṃ jalaṃ muṇḍāṃśca paśyati // NarP_1,51.59 //

GP12nardp1_u:9185: carmaṇyānuḍuhe rakte sthāpyaṃ bhadrāsanaṃ tataḥ // NarP_1,51.65 //

GP12nardp1_u:9188: bhagaṃ te varuṇo rājā bhagaṃ sūryo bṛhaspatiḥ /

GP12nardp1_u:9190: yatte keśeṣu daurbhāgyaṃ sīmante yacca mūrddhani /

GP12nardp1_u:9206: rūpaṃ dehi yaśo dehi bhagaṃ bhagavati dehi me /
GP12nardp1_u:9207: putrāndehi dhanaṃ dehi sarvānkāmāṃśca dehi me // NarP_1,51.76 //
GP12nardp1_u:9214: sīryyaḥ somo mahīputro budho jīvo bhṛguḥ śaniḥ /

GP12nardp1_u:9219: yathāvarṇaṃ pradeyāni vāsāṃsi kusumāni ca // NarP_1,51.82 //
GP12nardp1_u:9226: uduṃbaraḥ śamī dūrvā kuśāśca samidhaḥ kramāt // NarP_1,51.86 //

GP12nardp1_u:9234: kṛṣṇāgaurāyasaṃ chāga etā vai dakṣiṇāḥ smṛtāḥ // NarP_1,51.90 //
GP12nardp1_u:9235: yasya yasya tu yaddravyaṃ palenārcyaḥ sa tena ca /

GP12nardp1_u:9277: dvau dvaive prāk trayaḥ pitraghye udagekaikameva ca // NarP_1,51.112 //

GP12nardp1_u:9285: apasavyaṃ tataḥ tṛtvā pitṝṇāṃ sapradakṣiṇam // NarP_1,51.116 //
GP12nardp1_u:9289: dattvārdhyaṃ sayavāṃsteṣāṃ pātre kṛtvā vidhānataḥ // NarP_1,51.118 //

GP12nardp1_u:9307: dattvā ca dakṣiṇāṃ śaktyā svadhākāramudāharet // NarP_1,51.127 //
GP12nardp1_u:9309: brūyurastu svadhetyukte bhūmau siṃcettato jalam // NarP_1,51.128 //

GP12nardp1_u:9359: āyuḥ prajāṃ dhanaṃ vidyāṃ svargaṃ mokṣaṃ sukhāni ca // NarP_1,51.153 //

GP12nardp1_u:9408: ta āteṃ'te prathamo madhvaḥ se āthe dhve tathottamaḥ /

GP12nardp1_u:9420: daṇḍāgraṃ ca dadhīdaṃ ca madhūdakaṃ pitrarṣabhaḥ /

GP12nardp1_u:9425: ta ādyā viṣṇave hyatra tasmā argho gurā adhaḥ // NarP_1,52.27 //

GP12nardp1_u:9435: tejāṃsi maṃsyate gaṅgā hariśchettā maraḥśivaḥ // NarP_1,52.32 //
GP12nardp1_u:9436: rāma kāmyaḥ kṛpa pūjyo hariḥ pūjyor'cya eva hi /
GP12nardp1_u:9437: romo dṛṣṭo 'balā atra suptā iṣṭā imā yataḥ // NarP_1,52.33 //
GP12nardp1_u:9440: eṣa śārṅgī saiṣa rāmaḥ saṃhitaivaṃ prakīrtitā // NarP_1,52.34 //

GP12nardp1_u:9449: aṣṭau ayaṃ mune samrāṭ savibhradvapuṅmanaḥ // NarP_1,52.38 //
GP12nardp1_u:9450: pratyaṅ pumānmahān dhīmān vidvānṣaṭ pipaṭhīśca doḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:9452: rādhā sarvā gatirgopī srī śrīrdhenurvadhūḥ svasā /
GP12nardp1_u:9453: gaurnauṃrupān dūdyaurgoḥ kṣut kakupsaṃvittu vā kvacit // NarP_1,52.40 //
GP12nardp1_u:9463: paṭuḥ svayaṃbhūḥ kartā ca mātā caiva va pitā ca nā // NarP_1,52.45 //
GP12nardp1_u:9466: rimapavviṣādvajātānaho tathā sarvaṃ viśvobhaye cobhau anyāntaretarāṇi ca

GP12nardp1_u:9477: bhavādyarthe tu kānīnaḥ kṣatriyo vaidikaḥ svakaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:9480: gomāndhanī ca dhanavānastyarthe pramitau kiyān // NarP_1,52.54 //
GP12nardp1_u:9482: sragvī tapasvī medhāvī māyāvyastyartha eva ca // NarP_1,52.55 //
GP12nardp1_u:9493: jānumātraṃ ca nirddhāre bahūnāṃ ca dvayoḥ kramāt /
GP12nardp1_u:9496: etādaśaḥ katipayaḥ katithaḥ kati nārada // NarP_1,52.62 //
GP12nardp1_u:9498: dvedhā dvaidhā dvidhā saṃkhyā prakāre 'tha munīśvara // NarP_1,52.63 //
GP12nardp1_u:9500: dvitayaṃ tritapaṃ cāpi saṃkhyāyāṃ hi dvayaṃ trayam // NarP_1,52.64 //
GP12nardp1_u:9508: cillaśca cipiṭaṃ cikvaṃ vātūlaḥ kutapastathā // NarP_1,52.68 //
GP12nardp1_u:9513: kaṃbhaśca kaṃyuḥ kaṃvaśca nāradaketiḥ kantuḥ kantakaṃpau śaṃvastathaiva ca /
GP12nardp1_u:9514: śantaḥ śantiḥ śaṃyaśantau śaṃyohaṃyuḥ śubhaṃyuvat // NarP_1,52.71 //
GP12nardp1_u:9518: juhito juhāva juhavāñcakāra hotā hoṣyati juhotu /
GP12nardp1_u:9520: dideva devitā deviṣyati ca adīvyaddīvyeddīvyādvai // NarP_1,52.74 //
GP12nardp1_u:9524: atautsīdatotsyaditi ca ruṇaddhi rūrodha roddhā rotsyati vai //
GP12nardp1_u:9526: tanoti tatāna tanitā taniṣyati tanotvatanottanuyāddhi // NarP_1,52.77 //
GP12nardp1_u:9527: atanīñcātānīdataniṣyatkrīṇāti cikrāya kretā kreṣyati krīṇātviti ca /
GP12nardp1_u:9528: akrīṇātkrīṇātkrīṇīyātkrīyādakraiṣīdakreṣyañcorayati corayāmāsa corayitā corayiṣyati corayatu acorayañcorayeccoryāt acūcuradacoriṣyadityevaṃ daśa vai gaṇāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:9530: kriyāsamabhihāre tu paṇḍito bobhūyate mune // NarP_1,52.79 //
GP12nardp1_u:9539: labhante kartṛte paśya pacyate hyodanaḥ svayam // NarP_1,52.83 //
GP12nardp1_u:9540: sādhu vāsiśchinattyevaṃ sthālī pacati vai mune /
GP12nardp1_u:9545: gauṇe karmaṇi druhyādeḥ pradhāne nīhṛkṛṣvahām // NarP_1,52.86 //
GP12nardp1_u:9547: prayojya karmaṇyanyeṣāṃ ṇyantānāṃ lādayo matāḥ // NarP_1,52.87 //
GP12nardp1_u:9551: bhāve karmaṇi kṛtyāḥ syuḥ kṛtaḥ kartari kīrtitāḥ // NarP_1,52.89 //
GP12nardp1_u:9552: kartā kāraka ityādyā bhūte bhūtādi kīrtitam /
GP12nardp1_u:9557: pañcagavaṃ daśagrāmī triphaleti tu rūḍhitaḥ // NarP_1,52.92 //
GP12nardp1_u:9559: abrāhmaṇo na ñi proktaḥ kuṃbhakārādikaḥ kṛtā // NarP_1,52.93 //
GP12nardp1_u:9560: anyārthe tu bahuvrīhau grāmaḥ prāptodako dvija /
GP12nardp1_u:9562: samuccaye guruṃ ceśaṃ bhajasvānvācaye tvaṭa // ca dvayoḥ kramāt /
GP12nardp1_u:9565: rāmakṛṣṇaṃ dvija dvai dvai brahma caikamupāsyate // NarP_1,52.96 //
GP12nardp1_u:9566: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne dvitīyapāde vyākaraṇanirūpaṇaṃ nāma dvipañcāśattamo
GP12nardp1_u:9567: sanandana uvāca niruktaṃ te pravakṣyāmi vedaṃ śrotrāṅgamuttamam /
GP12nardp1_u:9570: vikāraḥ kvāpi varṇānāṃ varṇanāśaḥ kvacinmataḥ // NarP_1,53.2 //
GP12nardp1_u:9575: bhramarāduṣu śabdeṣu jñeyo yogo hi pañcamaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:9578: paraṃ vyavahitāścāpi gatisaṃjñāstathā hi ā // NarP_1,53.6 //
GP12nardp1_u:9579: vibhaktīnāṃ viparyāso yathā dadhanā juhoti hi /
GP12nardp1_u:9583: vyatyayamicchati śāsrakṛdeṣāṃ so 'pi ca siddhyati bāhulakena //
GP12nardp1_u:9584: rātrī vimbī ca kadrūścāviṣṭvau vājasaneyinaḥ // NarP_1,53.9 //
GP12nardp1_u:9590: hiraṇyayena naraṃ ca parame vyomanityapi // NarP_1,53.12 //
GP12nardp1_u:9592: yajadhvainamemasi ca snātvī gatvā pacāsthabhauḥ // NarP_1,53.13 //
GP12nardp1_u:9596: dadhartyādyā svavadbhiśca sasūveti ca dhiṣva ca // NarP_1,53.15 //
GP12nardp1_u:9622: anudātteta akhyātā bhādyutāttā itaḥ syamāt // NarP_1,53.28 //
GP12nardp1_u:9624: sadasraya udāttetaḥ kucādvedā udātta it // NarP_1,53.29 //
GP12nardp1_u:9636: bhvādyā ete ṣaḍadhikaṃ sahasraṃ dhātavo matāḥ // NarP_1,53.35 //
GP12nardp1_u:9638: svariteto dviṣādyāstu catvāro dhātavo matāḥ // NarP_1,53.36 //
GP12nardp1_u:9642: parasmaipadinaḥ proktā ṣumukhāḥ sapta dhātavaḥ // NarP_1,53.38 //
GP12nardp1_u:9645: ṣṭuñekastu samā khyātaḥ smṛte nārada śābdikaiḥ // NarP_1,53.40 //
GP12nardp1_u:9655: dādayo dhātavo vedāḥ parasmaipadino matāḥ // NarP_1,53.45 //
GP12nardp1_u:9659: ghṛmukhā dvādaśa tathā parasmaipatino matāḥ // NarP_1,53.47 //
GP12nardp1_u:9663: oditaḥ pūṅmukhāḥ sapta ātmanedapino matāḥ // NarP_1,53.49 //
GP12nardp1_u:9667: mṛṣādyāḥ svaritetastu dhātavaḥ pañca kīrtitāḥ // NarP_1,53.51 //
GP12nardp1_u:9669: rādhoḥ karmaka evātra vṛddhau svādicurādike // NarP_1,53.52 //
GP12nardp1_u:9673: catvāriśacchataṃ cāpi divādau dhātavo matāḥ // NarP_1,53.54 //
GP12nardp1_u:9681: vraścādaya udāttetaḥ proktāḥ pañcādhikaṃ śatam // NarP_1,53.58 //
GP12nardp1_u:9685: pṛṅ mṛṅ cātmanebhāṣau ṣaṭ parasmaipade ripeḥ // NarP_1,53.60 //
GP12nardp1_u:9688: svaritetaḥ ṣaṭ tataśca proktā milamukhā mune /
GP12nardp1_u:9696: tato dvau kīrtitau vipra dhātavo daśa śābdikaiḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:9703: curādyā dhātavo ñyantā ṣaṭrtriṃśadadhikaḥ śatam // NarP_1,53.69 //
GP12nardp1_u:9705: carcādyā ādhṛṣīyāstu pyantā vā parikīrtitāḥ // NarP_1,53.70 //
GP12nardp1_u:9707: padādyāstu daśa proktā dhātavo hyātmanepade // NarP_1,53.71 //
GP12nardp1_u:9708: sūtrādyā aṣṭa cāpyatra ñyantā proktā manīṣibhiḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:9713: stomādyāḥ ṣoḍaśa tathā andatasyaṃ nidarśanam // NarP_1,53.74 //
GP12nardp1_u:9718: saṃkṣepo 'yaṃ samuddiṣṭo vistarastatra tatra ca // NarP_1,53.76 //
GP12nardp1_u:9720: vṛṅvṛñbhyāṃ ca vinaikāco 'janteṣu nihatāḥ smṛtāḥ // NarP_1,53.77 //
GP12nardp1_u:9732: cādyā nipātā gavayaḥ prādyā digdeśakālajāḥ // NarP_1,53.83 //
GP12nardp1_u:9733: śabdāḥ proktā hyanekārthāḥ sarvaliṅgā api dvija /
GP12nardp1_u:9736: śabdāḥ siddhā vaidikāstu laukikāścāpi nārada // NarP_1,53.85 //
GP12nardp1_u:9742: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇa pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne dvitīyapāde niruktalakṣaṇanirūpaṇaṃ nāma tripañcāśattamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:9743: sanandana uvāca jyotiṣāṅgaṃ pravakṣyāmi yaduktaṃ brahmaṇā purā /
GP12nardp1_u:9766: ekaṃ daśa śataṃ caiva sahasrāyutalakṣakam // NarP_1,54.12 //
GP12nardp1_u:9768: niravarva ca mahāpadmaṃ śaṅkurjaladhireva ca // NarP_1,54.13 //
GP12nardp1_u:9769: atyaṃ madhyaṃ parārddhaṃ ca saṃjñā daśaguṇottarāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:9770: kramādutkramato vāpi yogaḥ kāryottaraṃ tathā // NarP_1,54.14 //
GP12nardp1_u:9776: tatkṛtiṃ ca tyajedvipra mūlena vibhajetpunaḥ // NarP_1,54.17 //
GP12nardp1_u:9779: procyate viṣamaṃ tvādyaṃ same dve ca tataḥ param /
GP12nardp1_u:9785: lavā lavaghnāśca harā haraghnā hi savarṇanam /
GP12nardp1_u:9793: chedaṃ cāpi lavaṃ vidvanparivartya harasya ca /
GP12nardp1_u:9794: śeṣaḥ kāryo bhāgahāre kartavyo guṇanāvidhiḥ // NarP_1,54.26 //
GP12nardp1_u:9795: hārāṃśayoḥ kṛtī varge ghanau ghanavidhau mune /
GP12nardp1_u:9796: padasiddhyai pade kuryādathoravaṃ sarvataśca ravam // NarP_1,54.27 //
GP12nardp1_u:9797: chedaṃ guṇaṃ guṇaṃ chedaṃ vargaṃ mūlaṃ padaṃ kṛtim /
GP12nardp1_u:9798: ṛṇaṃ svaṃ svamṛṇaṃ kuryādṛśye rāśiprasiddhaye // NarP_1,54.28 //
GP12nardp1_u:9799: atha svāṃśādhikone tu lavāḍhyo no haro haraḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:9806: eko 'sya vargo dalitaḥ saiko rāśiḥ paro mataḥ // NarP_1,54.32 //
GP12nardp1_u:9810: eṣīsyānāmubhe vyakte gaṇite vyaktameva ca // NarP_1,54.34 //
GP12nardp1_u:9812: dṛṣṭasya ca guṇārddho na yutaṃ vargīkṛtaṃ guṇaḥ // NarP_1,54.35 //
GP12nardp1_u:9814: bhaktaṃ tathā mūlaguṇaṃ tābhyāṃ sādhyotha vyaktavat // NarP_1,54.36 //
GP12nardp1_u:9818: bahurāśivadhaṃ bhakte phalaṃ svalpavadhena ca // NarP_1,54.38 //
GP12nardp1_u:9824: kṣepā miśrahatāḥ kṣepoyogabhaktāḥ phalāni ca // NarP_1,54.41 //
GP12nardp1_u:9827: vyastaṃ gacchataṃ phalaṃ yadguṇavargaṃ bhacahi tat /
GP12nardp1_u:9828: vyekaṃ vyekaguṇāptaṃ ca prādhnaṃ mānaṃ guṇottare // NarP_1,54.43 //
GP12nardp1_u:9832: rāśyorantaravargeṇa dvighne ghāte yute tayoḥ // NarP_1,54.45 //
GP12nardp1_u:9841: vyāsadhnaṃ prabhajedvipra jyā kāśaṃ jāyate sphuṭā /
GP12nardp1_u:9868: tāvatyeva niśā tasya viprendra parikīrtitā // NarP_1,54.63 //
GP12nardp1_u:9908: yojanāni śatānyaṣṭau bhūkarṇauṃ dviguṇāḥ smṛtaḥ // NarP_1,54.83 //
GP12nardp1_u:9918: iṣṭanāḍīguṇā bhuktiḥ ṣaṣṭyā bhaktā kalādikam // NarP_1,54.88 //
GP12nardp1_u:9919: gate śoddhyaṃ tathā yojyaṃ gamye tātkāliko grahaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:9930: grahaṃ saṃśodhya mandoñcattathā śīghnādviśodhya ca // NarP_1,54.94 //
GP12nardp1_u:9942: jyāṃ prohya śeṣaṃ tattvatāśvi hṝntaṃ tadvivaroddhṛm // NarP_1,54.100 //
GP12nardp1_u:9956: śai'yakoṭiphalaṃ kendre makarādau dhanaṃ smṛtam // NarP_1,54.107 //
GP12nardp1_u:9957: saṃśodhyaṃ tu trijīvāyāṃ karkādau koṭijaṃ phalam /
GP12nardp1_u:9960: saṃśodhyaṃ tu trijīvāyāṃ karkādau koṭijaṃ phalam // NarP_1,54.109 //
GP12nardp1_u:9963: labdhasya cāpaṃ liptādi phalaṃ śaidhryamidaṃ smṛtam /
GP12nardp1_u:9964: etadādau kujādīnāṃ caturthe caiva karmaṇi // NarP_1,54.111 //
GP12nardp1_u:9966: śairdhyaṃ mādyaṃ punarmāndyaṃ śairghyaṃ catvāryanukramāt // NarP_1,54.112
GP12nardp1_u:9967: ajā dikendre sarveṣāṃ māndye śairghye ca karmaṇi /
GP12nardp1_u:9968: dhanaṃ grahāṇāṃ liptādi tulādāvṛṇameva tat // NarP_1,54.113 //
GP12nardp1_u:9972: karkādau taddhanaṃ tatra makarādāvṛṇaṃ smṛtam // NarP_1,54.115 //
GP12nardp1_u:9993: tithayaḥ śuklapratipado dvighnāḥ saikā na gāhatāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:9994: śeṣaṃ bavo bālavaśca kaulavastaitilo garaḥ // NarP_1,54.126 //
GP12nardp1_u:10002: tanmadhye timinā rekhā kartavyā dakṣiṇottata // NarP_1,54.130 //
GP12nardp1_u:10012: prohya śaṅkukṛte mūlaṃ chāyā śekuviparyayāt // NarP_1,54.135 //
GP12nardp1_u:10018: laṃbākṣajye tayośchāye laṃbākṣau dakṣimau sadā // NarP_1,54.138 //
GP12nardp1_u:10024: digbhedopakramaḥ śeṣastasya jyā trijyayā hatā // NarP_1,54.141 //
GP12nardp1_u:10043: bhāgayuktaṃ ca hīnaṃ ca vyayanāṃśaṃ tanuḥ kuje /
GP12nardp1_u:10045: bhānau kṣayadhane kṛtvā madhyalagnaṃ tadā bhavet /
GP12nardp1_u:10050: arkaṃ vidhurvidhuṃ bhūbhā chādayatyathā channakam // NarP_1,54.154 //
GP12nardp1_u:10074: dṛṣṭvā hyādau kheṭabiṃbaṃ dṛgauñcye laṃbamīkṣya ca // NarP_1,54.166 //
GP12nardp1_u:10076: aste sāvayavā jñeyā gataiṣyāstithayo budhaiḥ // NarP_1,54.167 //
GP12nardp1_u:10090: tayute maṇḍale krāntyau tulyatve vai dhṛtābhidhaḥ // NarP_1,54.174 //
GP12nardp1_u:10096: yadi syādadhikā bhānoḥ krānteḥ pāto gatastadā // NarP_1,54.177 //
GP12nardp1_u:10097: nyūnā cetsyāttadā bhāvī vāmaṃ yugmapadasya ca /
GP12nardp1_u:10098: yadānyatvaṃ vidhoḥ krāntiḥ kṣepāccedyadi śuddhyati // NarP_1,54.178 //
GP12nardp1_u:10117: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne dvitīyapāde jyotiṣavarṇanaṃ nāma catuḥpañcāśattamo
GP12nardp1_u:10129: śeṣā dinākhyāstūbhayaṃ timiḥ krūraḥ saumyaḥ pumān // NarP_1,55.6 //
GP12nardp1_u:10139: nṛpādaḥ kīṭapaśavo balāḍhyāḥ kendragāḥ kramāt // NarP_1,55.11 //
GP12nardp1_u:10141: raktaḥ śvetaḥ śukanibhaḥ pāṭalo dhūmrapāṇḍurau // NarP_1,55.12 //
GP12nardp1_u:10142: citraḥ kṛṣṇaḥ pītapiṅgau babhruḥ svacchaḥ prabhākriyāt /
GP12nardp1_u:10145: jīvo jñānaṃ sukhaṃ śukraḥ kāmo duḥkhaṃ dineśajaḥ // NarP_1,55.14 //
GP12nardp1_u:10146: nṛpau ravīndū netāsṛk kumāro jñaḥ kavījyakau /
GP12nardp1_u:10147: sacivo sūryajaḥ preṣyo mato jyotirvidāṃ varaiḥ // NarP_1,55.15 //
GP12nardp1_u:10152: klibau budhārkī śukrendū sriyau śeṣā narāḥ smṛtāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:10154: kavījyau kujasūryauṃ ca vedo jño varṇapāḥ kramāt /
GP12nardp1_u:10158: vasraṃ sthalaṃ navaṃ vahnikahataṃ madyadaṃ tathā /
GP12nardp1_u:10167: jīvo jīvajñau sitajñau vyarkā vyārāḥ kramādamī // NarP_1,55.25 //
GP12nardp1_u:10173: dikṣu saumyejyayoḥ sūryārayoḥ saure sitābjayoḥ // NarP_1,55.28 //
GP12nardp1_u:10177: krūrāḥ kṛṣṇe site saumyāḥ mataṃ kālabalaṃ budhaiḥ // NarP_1,55.30 //
GP12nardp1_u:10179: pāpāstu balinaḥ saumyā vivakṣāḥ kaṇṭakopage // NarP_1,55.31 //
GP12nardp1_u:10181: svāṃśe pāpāḥ parāṃśasthāḥ saumyālagnaṃ viyonijam // NarP_1,55.32 //
GP12nardp1_u:10184: pārśve kukṣī tvapānāṅghrī meḍhramuṣkau tathā sphijau /
GP12nardp1_u:10185: pucchaṃ catuṣpadāṅgeṣu meṣādyā rāśayaḥ smṛtāḥ // NarP_1,55.34 //
GP12nardp1_u:10192: sthalāṃbu ca patiḥ kheṭo lagnādyāvanmite gṛhe /
GP12nardp1_u:10193: tāvanta eva takhaḥ sthalajā jalajāstathā // NarP_1,55.38 //
GP12nardp1_u:10194: antaḥsārā ravau saure durbhagāḥ kṣīriṇo vidhau /
GP12nardp1_u:10195: bhaume kaṇṭakino vṛkṣā ījye jñe saphalāphalau // NarP_1,55.39 //
GP12nardp1_u:10197: aśubharkṣe śubhaḥ kheṭaḥ śubhaṃ vṛkṣaṃ kubhūmijam // NarP_1,55.40 //
GP12nardp1_u:10201: pāpayuktekṣite dyūne ruṣā prītyā śubhagrahaiḥ // NarP_1,55.42 //
GP12nardp1_u:10205: vyayakhago yuktau caikadṛṣṭyā nṛtyupradau tayoḥ // NarP_1,55.44 //
GP12nardp1_u:10207: mātṛṣvasṛpitṛvyākhyau vā padmeji same śubhau // NarP_1,55.45 //
GP12nardp1_u:10208: pāpadṛṣṭe śubhe kṣīṇe tuṅge vā lagnageyame /
GP12nardp1_u:10211: yadā tadā garbhayutā nārī mṛtyumavāpnuyāt // NarP_1,55.47 //
GP12nardp1_u:10219: gurvakārai viṣamasthau vā yuñjanma pravadettadā // NarP_1,55.51 //
GP12nardp1_u:10224: mitho ravīndūrjñārkī vā paśyataḥ samagaṃ raviḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:10225: vakro vāṅgavidhū oje jajñau yugmaujasaṃsthitau // NarP_1,55.54 //
GP12nardp1_u:10227: same sitendū ojasthā jñārāṅgojyā nṛvīkṣitau // NarP_1,55.55 //
GP12nardp1_u:10246: vyayejo vāmanayanaṃ dakṣaṃ sūryo vināśayet // NarP_1,55.63 //
GP12nardp1_u:10247: neṣṭā yogāḥ śubhairdṛṣṭāḥ pāpāḥ syurnātra saṃśayaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:10254: mandeṅgasthe kujeste ca jñosphuji madhyage vidhau // NarP_1,55.69 //
GP12nardp1_u:10256: sūryastaddṛṣṭigo vāpi jñeyo jyotirvidāṃ varaiḥ // NarP_1,55.70 //
GP12nardp1_u:10258: kośādatau tu yamalau jāyete munisattama // NarP_1,55.71 //
GP12nardp1_u:10260: lagnaminduṃ ca sārkenduṃ na paśyati yadā guruḥ // NarP_1,55.72 //
GP12nardp1_u:10264: pūrṇa iṇḍhau svabheśejñe śubhe muvyaṃvuje tanau // NarP_1,55.74 //
GP12nardp1_u:10265: dyūnasthe vā vidhau yāteṅganā nārī prasūyate /
GP12nardp1_u:10266: abdhāṅgamanbhagaḥ pūrṇe jyo vā paśyati nārada // NarP_1,55.75 //
GP12nardp1_u:10275: bhāsamāne sare mārge sthire svarkṣāṃśage gṛhe /
GP12nardp1_u:10277: gurudṛṣṭe tu dīrghāyuḥ paraṃ ca prāpyate punaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:10282: tarugehe śubhe nīce naikasthadṛṣṭau lagnenduḥ // NarP_1,55.83 //
GP12nardp1_u:10284: mandarkṣāṃśe vidhau turye mandadṛṣṭe 'bjage 'pi vā // NarP_1,55.84 //
GP12nardp1_u:10286: śīrṣe pṛṣṭodaye janma tadvadeva vinirdiśet // NarP_1,55.85 //
GP12nardp1_u:10288: jīrṇoddhṛtaṃ gṛhaṃ mande sṛji dagdhaṃ na vā vidhau // NarP_1,55.86 //
GP12nardp1_u:10290: citrayuktaṃ navaṃ śukre dṛḍhe ramye gurau gṛham // NarP_1,55.87 //
GP12nardp1_u:10292: vṛṣe paścānmṛge siṃhe dakṣiṇe vasatirbhavet // NarP_1,55.88 //
GP12nardp1_u:10301: śiṃśnāpāte ca vṛṣaṇau jaghane jānunī tathā /
GP12nardp1_u:10304: svarkṣāṃśe sthirayukte tu naija āgantuko 'nyathā // NarP_1,55.94 //
GP12nardp1_u:10310: caturasraḥ piṅgadṛk ca paittiko 'lpakaco raviḥ // NarP_1,55.97 //
GP12nardp1_u:10311: vṛto vātakaphī prājño mandavāk śubhadṛk śaśī /
GP12nardp1_u:10322: na ceddṛṣṭastadā mṛtyurjātasya bhavati dhruvam // NarP_1,55.103 //
GP12nardp1_u:10323: kṣīṇe 'bje vyayage pāpairlagnāṣṭasthaiḥ śubhā na cet /
GP12nardp1_u:10334: lagne ravau tu śasreṇa savīryāsadbhiraṣṭagaiḥ // NarP_1,55.109 //
GP12nardp1_u:10335: karkendvījyayute lagne kendre saumye ca bhārgave /
GP12nardp1_u:10340: svaccobje svarkṣagaiḥ saumyaiḥ savīryeṅgādhipe tanau // NarP_1,55.112 //
GP12nardp1_u:10352: kavījyayoge saumyābjau lagne mṛtyau ca sveṣavaḥ // NarP_1,55.118 //
GP12nardp1_u:10354: sūryādhika bale paiṇḍaṃ nisargāñca vidhorbale // NarP_1,55.119 //
GP12nardp1_u:10356: gobjāstattvatithī sūryāstithiḥ svargā nakhāḥ kramāt // NarP_1,55.120 //
GP12nardp1_u:10358: piṇḍe nisarge ravocce no grahaḥ ṣaṭbhālpako yadā /
GP12nardp1_u:10360: aṃśonāḥ śantrubhe kāryā grahaṃ vakragatiṃ vinā /
GP12nardp1_u:10369: śeṣe ṣaṣṭyā hate bhakte hāreṇa ghaṭikādikam // NarP_1,55.127 //
GP12nardp1_u:10371: bhajedvarṣāṇi śeṣe tu guṇite dvādaśādibhiḥ // NarP_1,55.128 //
GP12nardp1_u:10377: yadaikālyaṃ tadāstāṃśāḥ svāgryāptonā ca bhūrguṇaḥ // NarP_1,55.131 //
GP12nardp1_u:10381: śeṣaṃ dviśatabhaktaṃ syurmāsāḥ śeṣā dinādikam // NarP_1,55.133 //
GP12nardp1_u:10387: lagnārkacandramadhye tu yo balī taddaśā purā // NarP_1,55.136 //
GP12nardp1_u:10388: tataḥ kendrādigānāṃ tu dvitryādau sabalasya ca /
GP12nardp1_u:10395: turyāṣṭagasya tu svargā guṇakāḥ parikīrtitāḥ // NarP_1,55.140 //
GP12nardp1_u:10403: jīvikādiphalaṃ sarvaṃ daśāyāṃ tasya yojayet // NarP_1,55.144 //
GP12nardp1_u:10407: yasyāṣṭavargajaṃ cāpi phalaṃ pūrṇaśubhaṃ bhavet // NarP_1,55.146 //
GP12nardp1_u:10411: neṣṭamutkaṭamiṣṭaṃ tu svalpaṃ jñātvā balaṃ vadet // NarP_1,55.148 //
GP12nardp1_u:10413: sthire neṣṭaṣṭamadhyā ca horāyāstryaṃ śakaiḥ phalam // NarP_1,55.149 //
GP12nardp1_u:10416: prāgdhvāṅkṣā bandhu mṛtyāya tayordyūne raviḥ svabhāt /
GP12nardp1_u:10423: kendrāṣṭāyāntya ijyādvā jñajyāyāstatra sve kaveḥ // NarP_1,55.154 //
GP12nardp1_u:10433: sātryaṅke san raveḥ śukrāddhīkhago digbhavārigaḥ // NarP_1,55.159 //
GP12nardp1_u:10459: sitāsṛjo gurau karke sārāje lagnage nṛpāḥ // NarP_1,55.172 //
GP12nardp1_u:10467: dhīsthau gurvidukavayo bhūmau ratryage budhairnṛpaḥ // NarP_1,55.176 //
GP12nardp1_u:10469: kavikṣau tulayuramasthau vai bhūpaḥ kīrtimānbhavent // NarP_1,55.177 //
GP12nardp1_u:10473: siṃher'ke meṣalagne 'je mṛge bhaume ghaṭe 'ṣṭame // NarP_1,55.179 //
GP12nardp1_u:10475: pātālage dharmage 'bje śubhadṛṣṭe yute mune // NarP_1,55.180 //
GP12nardp1_u:10482: sukhe guruḥ kheravīndūyamo lagne bhave karai /
GP12nardp1_u:10501: bhālā kendrasthitaiḥ saumyaiḥ pāpaiḥsarpa udāhṛtaḥ // NarP_1,55.193 //
GP12nardp1_u:10505: dātā samṛddho dāmāsthaḥ pāśajo dhanaśīlayuk // NarP_1,55.195 //
GP12nardp1_u:10511: taujaḥ sakīrtiḥ sukhabhāk mānavo bhavati dhruvam // NarP_1,55.198 //
GP12nardp1_u:10512: tyāgī yajvātmavān yūthe hiṃsro guhyādhipaḥ śaraiḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:10513: śaktau nīco 'laso niḥsvo daṇḍe priyaviyogabhāk // NarP_1,55.199 //
GP12nardp1_u:10515: durudharā caiva vidhau jñeyaḥ kemudrumo 'nyathā // NarP_1,55.200 //
GP12nardp1_u:10523: samando dhātukuśalaṃ tathā bhāḍaṃvidaṃ mune // NarP_1,55.204 //
GP12nardp1_u:10529: saśukre dyūtakrarheyo nṛtī dyūti samandake // NarP_1,55.207 //
GP12nardp1_u:10531: sabhārgavesamande lubdhakaḥ krūro naro bhavati nārada // NarP_1,55.208 //
GP12nardp1_u:10533: kavau sa mandamandākṣā va vaniśrayavittavān // NarP_1,55.209 //
GP12nardp1_u:10540: mando vā janmapaṃ naṣṭaṃ tathā ca mandakāgaṇe /
GP12nardp1_u:10541: bhaumārkāṃśe sauradṛṣṭe candre vā dīkṣito bhavet // NarP_1,55.213 //
GP12nardp1_u:10544: brāhmo dhanīmṛge bhogī raudre hiṃstraḥ śaṭho 'ghakṛt /
GP12nardp1_u:10545: dānto rogī śubho 'dityāṃ puṣyaryajanmā kaviḥ sukhī // NarP_1,55.215 //
GP12nardp1_u:10546: dhūrtaḥ śaṭhaḥ kṛtaghno 'hau pāpaḥ sarvāśano bhavet /
GP12nardp1_u:10547: patre bhogī dhanī bhakto dātā priyavacā bhage // NarP_1,55.216 //
GP12nardp1_u:10548: dhanī bhogīnaroryamarkṣe steno dhṛṣṭo ghṛṇī kare /
GP12nardp1_u:10549: citrāṃbaraḥ sudṛktvāṣṭre na ca dharmadayāparaḥ // NarP_1,55.217 //
GP12nardp1_u:10550: dvīśe lubdhaḥ paṭuḥ krodhī maḍhaiyo āṭhanovideśagaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:10551: śākre dharmaparastuṣṭo mūle mānī dhanī sukhī // NarP_1,55.218 //
GP12nardp1_u:10552: āpye mānī dṛṣṭo vaiśve namraśca dhārmikaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:10553: karṇe dhanī sukhī khyāto dātā śūro dhanī vasau // NarP_1,55.219 //
GP12nardp1_u:10555: budhne vaktā sukhī kāntaḥ pauṣṇe śūro dhanī śuciḥ // NarP_1,55.220 //
GP12nardp1_u:10556: kāmī śūraḥ kṛtajño 'je kāntastyāgī kṣamī vṛṣe /
GP12nardp1_u:10557: yugme srīdyūtaśāsrajñaḥ sraiṇo hrasvaḥ svabhe vidhau // NarP_1,55.221 //
GP12nardp1_u:10558: srīdviṭ krodhī harau mānī vikrāntaḥ sthiradhīḥ sukhī /
GP12nardp1_u:10559: dharmī ślakṣṇaḥ sudhīḥ ṣaṣṭe prājñaḥ prāṃśurdhanī ghaṭe // NarP_1,55.222
GP12nardp1_u:10560: rogī pūjyaḥ kṣatī kārairpye kaviḥ śilpījyabhe dhanī /
GP12nardp1_u:10564: khyātaḥ srīdviṭ dhanī tīkṣṇojñaḥ kaviḥ śaiṇḍiko dhanī /
GP12nardp1_u:10565: pūjyo lubdho 'dhanasakho meṣādau bhāskare janau // NarP_1,55.224 //
GP12nardp1_u:10566: niḥsvor'kabhe bhūmiputre bhūmiputre dhanī cāndre svabhedanaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:10567: baudhe kṛtajño jaive tu khyātaḥ śaukre 'nyadārikaḥ // NarP_1,55.225 //
GP12nardp1_u:10574: sārthaḥ prājñaḥ samaḥ khyātiḥ srīji'torkādibhe mṛgau /
GP12nardp1_u:10593: kaviḥ sukhī budhāṃśe tu naṭacaurajñaśilpinaḥ // NarP_1,55.238 //
GP12nardp1_u:10595: krodhī nidhīśo mātyo vā nṛpo hiṃsro suto hareḥ // NarP_1,55.239 //
GP12nardp1_u:10596: jīvāṃśe hāsyavidyodhā balī mantrī ca dhārmikaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:10599: vargottame khe parabhe pala muktaṃ śubhaṃ kramāt // NarP_1,55.241 //
GP12nardp1_u:10600: puṣṭaṃ madhyaṃ laghu jñeyaṃ yadi cāṃśapatirbalī /
GP12nardp1_u:10603: meṣe dhanī taimirakaḥ siṃhe rātryandha eva ca // NarP_1,55.243 //
GP12nardp1_u:10606: trige budho vikramī ca vimukhaḥ pīḍito bhuvi /
GP12nardp1_u:10610: lābhe bahudhano mānī patito kho 'vyaye ravau /.
GP12nardp1_u:10611: mūkodho badhiraḥ preṣyo jege khāñcājage dhanī // NarP_1,55.247 //
GP12nardp1_u:10617: kṣudrāeṃ'gahīno vyayage candre proktaṃ phalaṃ budhaiḥ // NarP_1,55.250 //
GP12nardp1_u:10620: vidvān dhanī ca pravaraḥ paṇḍitaḥ sacivoriyuk /
GP12nardp1_u:10627: alaso lagnage mande dharmātsvoñcagate nṛpaḥ // NarP_1,55.255 //
GP12nardp1_u:10635: nṛpaśca mitrabhāstheṣu kheṭe vrekādiṣu kramāt // NarP_1,55.259 //
GP12nardp1_u:10637: khyāto mahodyamī cātitejā dhīmāndhanī balī // NarP_1,55.260 //
GP12nardp1_u:10650: tejasvī ca naraḥ khāye triṃśāṃse sṛjisaṃsthite /
GP12nardp1_u:10651: āmayī vā svabhāryāyāṃ viṣamaḥ pāradārikaḥ // NarP_1,55.267 //
GP12nardp1_u:10660: sukhejño cāru ceṣṭāṅgau candrārkkaucetkujādigau mūlatrikoṇasvarkṣocce kaṇṭhasthāstu ca ye grahāḥ // NarP_1,55.272 //
GP12nardp1_u:10662: śubhaṃ vargottame janma vesisthāne vasadgṛhaiḥ // NarP_1,55.273 //
GP12nardp1_u:10666: praveśe bhāskarakujau bhṛgvījyo madhyagau tathā // NarP_1,55.275 //
GP12nardp1_u:10667: candrārkī phala dāvantye sadā jñaḥ phaladāyakaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:10670: ravau bhīner'kajaḥ srīghnaḥ putrasthastu tathā kujaḥ // NarP_1,55.277 //
GP12nardp1_u:10678: pāpe dhīsthe vidhau kṣīṇajanmā sutakalatriṇaḥ // NarP_1,55.281 //
GP12nardp1_u:10680: tau cetseṃdusriyā sārddhaṃ puṃścalo jāyate naraḥ // NarP_1,55.282 //
GP12nardp1_u:10682: nṛsriyo stu śubhairdṛṣṭau tau dvau pariṇatāṅgakau // NarP_1,55.283 //
GP12nardp1_u:10688: karkālyaṃ śagate kendre pāpayukte tu guhyaruk // NarP_1,55.286 //
GP12nardp1_u:10690: candre khe 'stāṅgate bhaume vikalo veśiger'kaje // NarP_1,55.287 //
GP12nardp1_u:10694: saumyā dṛṣṭā na vāyatridhīgatāḥ pāpakhecarāḥ // NarP_1,55.289 //
GP12nardp1_u:10696: lagne gurau dyune mande vātarogādito bhavet // NarP_1,55.290 //
GP12nardp1_u:10697: sukhe 'ste vā kuje jīve lagne vārkiyutodaye /
GP12nardp1_u:10698: kujena vātmaje dyūne saṃjñeṃ'tye 'bje ca sonmadaḥ // NarP_1,55.291 //
GP12nardp1_u:10704: puñjanau tu phalaṃ puṇyasrīṇāṃ yogyaṃ vadecca tat // NarP_1,55.294 //
GP12nardp1_u:10712: bālyaduṣṭā tathā dāsī sādhvī māyāvatī tvarā // NarP_1,55.298 //
GP12nardp1_u:10715: duṣṇavāk punarbhūḥ saguṇā vijñā khyātā sphujidgrṛhe /
GP12nardp1_u:10716: baudhe samā yā klīvā ca satī guṇavatī calā // NarP_1,55.300 //
GP12nardp1_u:10718: vācāṭā kulaṭā siṃhe rāgī pundhīragamyatā // NarP_1,55.301 //
GP12nardp1_u:10720: dāsī nīcaratā sādhvī mānde duṣṭā napatyakā // NarP_1,55.302 //
GP12nardp1_u:10722: dṛggaiḥ mithoṃśe śukrārkī śaukre cedvā ghaṭāṃśake // NarP_1,55.303 //
GP12nardp1_u:10724: śūnye kāpuruṣo dyūne bale klīvo na sadṛśi // NarP_1,55.304 //
GP12nardp1_u:10726: tatsṛṣṭā madage sūrye strībālavidhavā kuje // NarP_1,55.305 //
GP12nardp1_u:10730: mithoṃśagaiḥ sitārau tu kuruto 'nyaratāṃ striyam // NarP_1,55.307 //
GP12nardp1_u:10732: saurārarkṣe lagnagate seṃduśukre tu vandhakī // NarP_1,55.308 //
GP12nardp1_u:10735: mandarkṣe vāṃśake dyūne vṛddhau mūrkhaḥ patiḥ striyāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:10736: strīlolaḥ krodhanaḥ kauje baudhe vidvāṃśca naipuṇaḥ // NarP_1,55.310 //
GP12nardp1_u:10740: jñedvoḥ kalāsu nipuṇā sukhitā ca guṇānvitā // NarP_1,55.312 //
GP12nardp1_u:10744: vaidhavyaṃ ca mṛtistasyā svayaṃsatsvarthageṣu tu // NarP_1,55.314 //
GP12nardp1_u:10762: mṛtyuścātha mṛge candre karke mande jalodarāt // NarP_1,55.323 //
GP12nardp1_u:10766: striyāṃ sapāpe 'bje dyūne site meṣe ravau tanau // NarP_1,55.325 //
GP12nardp1_u:10767: maraṇaṃ strīkṛte gehe hyatha turye kuje ravau /
GP12nardp1_u:10796: svoccasthoṃ'ge vyaye saumyabhāge mokṣo balānyataḥ // NarP_1,55.340 //
GP12nardp1_u:10797: ādhāne janmā jñāne tu vṛkṣatāṃ lagnato vadet /
GP12nardp1_u:10824: cipiṭāsyo hi saṃvīto nausthaḥ ratryarthaṃvrajañjale // NarP_1,55.354 //
GP12nardp1_u:10825: śvā naro jaṃbukaṃ gṛdhraṃ gṛhītvā rauti śālmalau /
GP12nardp1_u:10842: bhāṇḍī romaścavāḥ śyāmaḥ kirīṭī phalayantradhṛk // NarP_1,55.363 //
GP12nardp1_u:10849: iti śrīnāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge dvitīyapāde bṛhadupākhyāne jātakanirūpaṇannāma pañcapañcāśattamo
GP12nardp1_u:10850: sanandana uvāca kramāñcaitrādimāseṣu meṣādyāḥ saṃkramā matāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:10851: caitraśuklapratipadi yo vāraḥ sa nṛpaḥ smṛtaḥ // NarP_1,56.1 //
GP12nardp1_u:10855: adhamo ravijo vācyo jñātvā caiṣāṃ balābalam // NarP_1,56.3 //
GP12nardp1_u:10865: śubhor'kaḥ śiśire tāmraḥ kuṅkumābhā vasaṃtike // NarP_1,56.8 //
GP12nardp1_u:10871: śaśaraktanibhe bhānau saṃgrāmo na cirādbhuvi // NarP_1,56.11 //
GP12nardp1_u:10874: arke śyāme kīṭabhayaṃ bhasmābhe rāṣṭrajaṃ tathā /
GP12nardp1_u:10897: yāmyaśṛṅgonnato neṣṭaḥ śubhaḥ śukle pipīlikā // NarP_1,56.24 //
GP12nardp1_u:10901: kujādyairnihate śṛṅge maṇḍale vā yathākramam // NarP_1,56.26 //
GP12nardp1_u:10907: kuje trayodaśe ṛkṣe vakrite vā caturdaśe // NarP_1,56.29 //
GP12nardp1_u:10921: triṣūttarāsu rohiṇyāṃ nairṛte śravaṇe mṛge // NarP_1,56.36 //
GP12nardp1_u:10954: dvibhāṭajodimāstasya pañcamaikādaśāstrimādhavaḥ śubhado jyeṣṭo nṛṇāṃ madhyaphalapradaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:10955: śucirmadhyo nabhaḥ śreṣṭho bhādraḥ śreṣṭhaḥ kvacinnaraḥ // NarP_1,56.53 //
GP12nardp1_u:10957: śubhapradau pauṣamādhau madhyamau phaālguno madhuḥ // NarP_1,56.54 //
GP12nardp1_u:10959: śucirmadhyo nabhaḥ śreṣṭho bhādraḥ śreṣṭhaḥ kvacinnara // NarP_1,56.55 //
GP12nardp1_u:10971: hṛdayeśasya nidhanaṃ śubhaṃ syātsaṃyutaiḥ śubhaiḥ // NarP_1,56.61 //
GP12nardp1_u:10973: iti dvijātimadhyāṃ tu gonṛpastrīsukhaṃ mahat // NarP_1,56.62 //
GP12nardp1_u:10982: saumya mārge ca tisṛṣu caranvīthiṣu bhārgavaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:10985: pūrvasyāṃ diśi meghastu śubhadaḥ pitṛpañcake // NarP_1,56.68 //
GP12nardp1_u:10989: undayāstamanaṃ yāti tadā jalamayī mahī // NarP_1,56.70 //
GP12nardp1_u:10998: mukhe caikaṃ gude dve ca trīṇi ke nayane dvayam /
GP12nardp1_u:10999: hṛdaye pañca ṛkṣāṇi vāmahaste catuṣṭayam // NarP_1,56.75 //
GP12nardp1_u:11000: vāmapāde tathā trīṇi dakṣiṇe trīṇe bhāni ca /
GP12nardp1_u:11002: rogo lābhastathā hānirlābhaḥ saukhyaṃ ca bandhanam /
GP12nardp1_u:11003: āyāsaḥ śreṣṭhayātrā ca dhanalābhaḥ kramātphalam // NarP_1,56.77 //
GP12nardp1_u:11007: amṛtyutāṃ gatastatra kheṭastatra kheṭatve parikalpitaḥ // NarP_1,56.79 //
GP12nardp1_u:11011: parveśāstu tathā satyadevā khyāditaḥ kramāt // NarP_1,56.81 //
GP12nardp1_u:11014: tadvadeva phalaṃ saumye śleṣmapīḍā ca parvaṇi /
GP12nardp1_u:11029: no śaktā lakṣituṃ devāḥ kiṃ punaḥ prākṛtā janāḥ // NarP_1,56.90 //
GP12nardp1_u:11031: śubhāśubhānyaiḥ kālasya grāhayāmo hi lakṣaṇam // NarP_1,56.91 //
GP12nardp1_u:11037: nakṣatrasaṃsthitā divyā bhaumā ye bhūmisaṃsthitāḥ // NarP_1,56.94 //
GP12nardp1_u:11056: vikacākhyā gurusutā veṣṭā yāmye sthitā api /
GP12nardp1_u:11061: śukrajā ṛkṣasadṛśāḥ ke tavaḥ śubhadāyakāḥ // NarP_1,56.106 //
GP12nardp1_u:11067: cāndramārkṣaṃ gurormānamiti mānāni vai navaḥ // NarP_1,56.109 //
GP12nardp1_u:11079: aṅgirāḥ śrīmukho bhāvo yuvā dhātā tathaiva ca // NarP_1,56.115 //
GP12nardp1_u:11087: paribhāvī pramādī ca ānando rākṣaso 'nalaḥ // NarP_1,56.119 //
GP12nardp1_u:11097: tatkālaṃ grahacāraṃ ca samyak jñātvā phalaṃ padet // NarP_1,56.124 //
GP12nardp1_u:11099: ahaḥ surāṇāṃ tadrātriḥ karkādyaṃ dakṣiṇāyanam // NarP_1,56.125 //
GP12nardp1_u:11101: madhādau maṅgalaṃ karma vidheyaṃ cottarāyaṇe // NarP_1,56.126 //
GP12nardp1_u:11103: mādhādi māsau dvau dvau ca ṛtavaḥ śiśirādayaḥ // NarP_1,56.127 //
GP12nardp1_u:11105: varṣā śaraśca hemantaḥ karkādvai dakṣiṇāyane // NarP_1,56.128 //
GP12nardp1_u:11106: cāndro darśīvadhiḥ sauraḥ saṃkrātyā sāvano dineḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:11109: nabhasya iṣa ūrjaśca sahāścaiva sahasyakaḥ // NarP_1,56.130 //
GP12nardp1_u:11111: yasminmāse paurṇamāsī yena dhiṣṇena saṃyutā // NarP_1,56.131 //
GP12nardp1_u:11113: tatpakṣau daiva pitrākhyau śuklakṛṣṇau tathāpare // NarP_1,56.132 //
GP12nardp1_u:11114: śubhāśubhe karmaṇi ca praśastau bhavataḥ sadā /
GP12nardp1_u:11123: aṣṭamī dvādaśī ṣaṣṭī caturthī ca caturdaśī // NarP_1,56.137 //
GP12nardp1_u:11126: tyājyāḥ syustāsu tithiṣu kramātpañca ca sarvadā /
GP12nardp1_u:11127: amāvāsyā ca navamī hitvā viṣamasaṃjñikā // NarP_1,56.139 //
GP12nardp1_u:11129: ṣaṣaaṭyāṃ tailaṃ tathāṣṭamyāṃ māsaṃ kṣauraṃ kalestithau // NarP_1,56.140
GP12nardp1_u:11131: derśe ṣaṣṭyāṃ pratipadi dvādaśyāṃ pratiparvasu // NarP_1,56.141 //
GP12nardp1_u:11133: vyatīpāte ca saṃkrāntāvekādaśyāṃ ca parvasu // NarP_1,56.142 //
GP12nardp1_u:11135: yaḥ karoti daśamyāṃ ca snānamāmalakairnaraḥ // NarP_1,56.143 //
GP12nardp1_u:11138: amāyāṃ ca navamyāṃ ca saptamyāṃ ca kulakṣayaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:11139: yā paurṇimā divā candramatī sānumatī smṛtā // NarP_1,56.145 //
GP12nardp1_u:11147: caitre bhādrapade caiva tṛtīyā śuklasaṃjñitā // NarP_1,56.149 //
GP12nardp1_u:11149: māghe ca saptamī śuklā nabhasye tvasitāṣṭamī // NarP_1,56.150 //
GP12nardp1_u:11151: āṣāḍhe kārtike māsi jyaṣṭe caitre ca paurṇimā // NarP_1,56.151 //
GP12nardp1_u:11153: bhādre kṛṣṇatrayodaśyāṃ maghāminduḥ kare raviḥ // NarP_1,56.152 //
GP12nardp1_u:11156: tithirvāratraye tvekā hyadhikā dve ca nindite /
GP12nardp1_u:11157: sūryāstamanaparyantaṃ yasminvāre tu yā tithiḥ // NarP_1,56.154 //
GP12nardp1_u:11161: raviḥ sthiraścaraścandraḥ krūro vakrokhilo budhaḥ // NarP_1,56.156 //
GP12nardp1_u:11163: abhyakto bhānuvāre yaḥ sa naraḥ kleśavānbhavet // NarP_1,56.157 //
GP12nardp1_u:11165: jīve naivaṃ site hānirmande sarvasamṛddhayaḥ // NarP_1,56.158 //
GP12nardp1_u:11169: tatkarma balahīnasya duḥkhenāpi na siddhyāti // NarP_1,56.160 //
GP12nardp1_u:11173: dūrvāvarṇo vudho jīvaḥ pītaśvetastu bhārgavaḥ // NarP_1,56.162 //
GP12nardp1_u:11191: adhomukhaṃ tu navakaṃ bhānau tatra vidhīyate // NarP_1,56.171 //
GP12nardp1_u:11195: tiryaṅmukhākhyaṃ navakaṃ bhānau tatra vidhīyate // NarP_1,56.173 //
GP12nardp1_u:11199: ūrddhāsyaṃ navakaṃ bhānāṃ proktamatra vidhīyate // NarP_1,56.175 //
GP12nardp1_u:11203: sādhāraṇaṃ dvidaivatyaṃ vahnibhaṃ ca prakīrtitam // NarP_1,56.177//
GP12nardp1_u:11213: darśāṣṭabhyāṃ caturdaśyāṃ paśūnāṃ na kadācana // NarP_1,56.182 //
GP12nardp1_u:11217: agre vṛddhyai trayaṃ lakṣmye saumyapārśve ca pañcakam // NarP_1,56.184 //
GP12nardp1_u:11219: śriyai puṣṭyai trayaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ syāccakre lāṅgalāhvaye // NarP_1,56.185 //
GP12nardp1_u:11223: gale trayaṃ kajjalāya vṛddhyai ca dvādaśodare // NarP_1,56.187 //
GP12nardp1_u:11225: nābhau vahniḥ pañcakaṃ yadvījoptāviti cintayet // NarP_1,56.188 //
GP12nardp1_u:11249: krūraviddho yuto vāpipuṣyo yadi balānvitaḥ // NarP_1,56.200 //
GP12nardp1_u:11255: yā dṛśyante dīptatārāḥ svagaṇe yogatārakāḥ // NarP_1,56.203 //
GP12nardp1_u:11278: vyāgaghāte nava śūle tu pañca nāḍyo hi garhitāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:11282: tatra ravārjūrike cakre kathitaṃ mūrdhni bhaṃ nyaset /
GP12nardp1_u:11290: parītā viparītā vā viṣyirneṣṭā tu maṅgale /
GP12nardp1_u:11291: mukhe pañcagale caikā vakṣasyekādaśa smṛtaḥ // NarP_1,56.221 //
GP12nardp1_u:11292: nābhau catasraḥ ṣaṭ kaṭyāṃ tisraḥ pucchākhyanājikāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:11294: kaṭyāmunmattatā nābhau cyutiḥ pucche dhruvaṃ jayaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:11298: aryamā bhagasaṃjñaśca vijñeyā daśa pañca ca /
GP12nardp1_u:11306: yeṣu ṛkṣeṣu yatkarma kathitaṃ nikhilaṃ ca tat /
GP12nardp1_u:11307: taddaivatye muhūrte 'pi kāryaṃ yātrādikaṃ sadā // NarP_1,56.229 //
GP12nardp1_u:11309: śūlo 'ṣṭame ca daśame śāniraṣṭādaśe tataḥ // NarP_1,56.230 //
GP12nardp1_u:11317: dhiṣṇye tāvati satyatra duṣṭayogaḥ patatyasau // NarP_1,56.234 //
GP12nardp1_u:11332: hastarkṣaṃ ca khārvidau candrabhaṃ dasrabhaṃ kuje /
GP12nardp1_u:11333: saumye mitrabhamācāryaṃ tiṣyaḥ pauṣṇaṃ bhṛgoḥ sute // NarP_1,56.242/
GP12nardp1_u:11336: jayāsaumye gurau riktā śanaupūrṇeti no śubhāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:11337: nandā tithiḥ śukravāre saumye bhadrā kuje jayā // NarP_1,56.244 //
GP12nardp1_u:11338: riktā mande gurorvāre pūrṇā siddhāhvayā amī /
GP12nardp1_u:11340: ṣaṣṭī gurau tṛtīyā jñe 'ṣṭamī śukre śanaiścare /
GP12nardp1_u:11341: navamī pañcamī bhaume dagdhayogāḥ prakīrtitāḥ // NarP_1,56.246 //
GP12nardp1_u:11343: budhe śraviṣṭāryamabhe gurau jyeṣṭā bhṛgordine // NarP_1,56.247 //
GP12nardp1_u:11352: anuktānāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ ghorādyāḥ sukhadāḥ smṛtāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:11361: bhuśuḍī ca gadākhaḍgau daṇḍa iṣaavāsatomarau // NarP_1,56.256 //
GP12nardp1_u:11363: annaṃ ca pāyasaṃ bhaikṣyaṃ sayūṣaṃ ca payo dadhi // NarP_1,56.257 //
GP12nardp1_u:11367: catuḥ pāde tilenāge suptaḥ krāntiṃ karoti hi // NarP_1,56.259 //
GP12nardp1_u:11368: dharmāyurvṛṣṭiṣu samaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ naṣṭaṃ phalaṃ kramāt /
GP12nardp1_u:11369: āyudhaṃ vāhanāhārau yajjātīyaṃ janasya ca // NarP_1,56.260 //
GP12nardp1_u:11371: andhakaṃ mandasaṃjñaṃ ca madhyasaṃjñaṃ sulocanam // NarP_1,56.261 //
GP12nardp1_u:11377: medhyā viṣuvati proktāḥ puṇyanāḍyastu ṣoḍaśa // NarP_1,56.264 //
GP12nardp1_u:11381: naraḥ prāpnoti tadrāśau śītāṃśoḥ sādhvasādhu ca // NarP_1,56.266 //
GP12nardp1_u:11385: vratodvāhādikeṣveva dvayaṃ neṣṭaṃ tu tatkramāt // NarP_1,56.268 //
GP12nardp1_u:11394: tryāyāriṣu kujaḥ śreṣṭho janmanā cenna vidhyate /
GP12nardp1_u:11406: niṣphalau tau grahau svena śatruṇā ca vilokitau /
GP12nardp1_u:11407: nīcarāśigataḥ svasya śatroḥ kṣetragato 'pi vā // NarP_1,56.279 //
GP12nardp1_u:11411: maṇirmuktāphalaṃ vidrumākhyaṃ maraka taṃ tathā // NarP_1,56.281 //
GP12nardp1_u:11413: dūryyaṃ bhāskarādīnāṃ tuṣṭya dhāryaṃ yathākramam // NarP_1,56.282 //
GP12nardp1_u:11418: janma saṃpadvipat kṣema pratyariḥ sādhako vadhaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:11419: mitraṃ paramamitraṃ ca janmabhāttu punaḥ puna // NarP_1,56.285 //
GP12nardp1_u:11421: śākaṃ guḍaṃ ca lavaṇaṃ satilaṃ kāñcanaṃ kramāt // NarP_1,56.286 //
GP12nardp1_u:11423: kṛṣṇe balavatī tārā śuklapakṣe balū śaśī /
GP12nardp1_u:11441: kanyā lagne vidheyaṃ ca pauṣṭikākhilamaṅgalam // NarP_1,56.295 //
GP12nardp1_u:11443: tulāyāmakhilaṃ karma tulābhārāśrite ca yat // NarP_1,56.296 //
