GP12nardp1_u:11461: ante tucchaphale lagne sarvasminnevameva hi // NarP_1,56.305 //
GP12nardp1_u:11463: kalpyāmadindau balini saptame balino grahāḥ // NarP_1,56.306 //
GP12nardp1_u:11469: lagnodbhavaṃ phalaṃ dhatte dhanātīto dvitīyakam // NarP_1,56.309 //
GP12nardp1_u:11473: doṣādduṣṭo hi kālastamapi mārṣṭuṃ pitāmahaḥ // NarP_1,56.311 //
GP12nardp1_u:11478: rugṇā patipriyā duḥkhī putriṇī bhogamī tathā /
GP12nardp1_u:11481: tārakā na hitā māsā madhūrjaśucipauṣakāḥ // NarP_1,56.315 //
GP12nardp1_u:11486: ādyā niśaścatasrastu tyājyā hyapi samāḥ paraiḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:11490: prasiddhe prathame garbhe tṛtīye vā dvitīyake /
GP12nardp1_u:11491: māse puṃsavanaṃ kāryaṃ sīmantaṃ ca yathā tathā // NarP_1,56.320 //
GP12nardp1_u:11492: caturthe māsi ṣaṣṭe vāpyaṣṭame vā tadīśvare /
GP12nardp1_u:11501: sīmantinīṃ vā tadgarbhaṃ balī hṝnti na saṃśayaḥ // NarP_1,56.325 //
GP12nardp1_u:11509: candrātārābalopete divase ca śiśoḥ pituḥ // NarP_1,56.329 //
GP12nardp1_u:11511: ṣaṣṭe māsyaṣṭame vāpi puṃsāṃ strīṇāṃ tu pañcame // NarP_1,56.330 //
GP12nardp1_u:11512: saptame māsi vā kāryaṃ navānnapraśanaṃ śubham /
GP12nardp1_u:11517: pūrvārddhe saumyakheṭena saṃyukte vīkṣitepi vā // NarP_1,56.333 //
GP12nardp1_u:11531: abhyakte sandhyayornāre niśi bhuktvā na vāhave // NarP_1,56.340 //
GP12nardp1_u:11532: notkaṭe bhūṣite naiva yāne na navame 'hni ca /
GP12nardp1_u:11538: navame saptame vāpi pañcame divase 'pi vā /
GP12nardp1_u:11541: āśiṣo vācanaṃ kāryaṃ puṇyaṃ puṇyāṅganādibhiḥ // NarP_1,56.345 //
GP12nardp1_u:11547: rājñā mekādaśe maiñjībandhanaṃ dvādaśe viśām // NarP_1,56.348 //
GP12nardp1_u:11559: upanīto balāḍhyaśca jyeṣṭhe vidhividāṃ varaḥ // NarP_1,56.354 //
GP12nardp1_u:11560: śuklapakṣe dvitīyā ca tṛtīyā pañcamī tathā /
GP12nardp1_u:11561: trayodaśī ca daśamī saptamī vratabandhane // NarP_1,56.355 //
GP12nardp1_u:11570: vārau tu madhyamau caiva vrate 'nyau ninditau matau /
GP12nardp1_u:11571: tridhā vibhajya divasaṃ tatrādau karma daivikam // NarP_1,56.360 //
GP12nardp1_u:11572: dvitīye mānuṣaṃ kāryaṃ tṛtīye ḥṃśe ca paitṛkam /
GP12nardp1_u:11573: svanīcage tadaṃśe vā svāribhe vā tadaṃśake // NarP_1,56.361 //
GP12nardp1_u:11575: svādhiśatrugṛhasthe vā tadaṃśasthe 'tha vā vratī // NarP_1,56.362 //
GP12nardp1_u:11577: svoccasaṃsthe tadaṃśe vā svarāśau rāśige gaṇe // NarP_1,56.363 //
GP12nardp1_u:11578: śākheśe vā gurau śukre kendrage vā trikoṇage /
GP12nardp1_u:11580: paramoccagate jīve śākheśe vātha vā sate /
GP12nardp1_u:11583: gurau bhṛgau vā śākheśe vidyādhanasamanvitaḥ // NarP_1,56.366 //
GP12nardp1_u:11585: śaākhādhipatilagnaṃ ca durlabhaṃ tritayaṃ vrate // NarP_1,56.367 //
GP12nardp1_u:11591: lagne tu nidhane saumyaiḥ saṃyute vā nirīkṣite // NarP_1,56.370 //
GP12nardp1_u:11603: na karoti śiśuṃ niḥsvaṃ sarvataḥ kṣayarogiṇam // NarP_1,56.376 //
GP12nardp1_u:11609: caturthī vā śubhāḥ proktā aṣṭāvete galagrahāḥ // NarP_1,56.379 //
GP12nardp1_u:11622: ghūmrāye maraṇaṃ siṃhe jayaḥ śuni ca rogitā /
GP12nardp1_u:11623: dhanalābho vṛṣe 'tyantaṃ duḥkhī bhavati gardabhe // NarP_1,56.386 //
GP12nardp1_u:11630: sthito dhvaje vṛṣāye vā naṣṭācetpūrvato vraṇam /
GP12nardp1_u:11637: pratipatparvariktā mā cāṣṭamī ca dinatrayam // NarP_1,56.393 //
GP12nardp1_u:11640: sukhaṃ tatrāpi bhāminyāṃ śīlavatyāṃ sthitaṃ tataḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:11641: tasyāḥ sacchīlarlā dhastu sulagnavaśataḥ khalu // NarP_1,56.395 //
GP12nardp1_u:11651: mṛtaputrātha vā kanyā kulaṭā vā na saṃśayaḥ // NarP_1,56.400 //
GP12nardp1_u:11655: vīkṣitāḥ pṛcchatāṃ nṝṇāṃ kanyālābho bhavettadā // NarP_1,56.402 //
GP12nardp1_u:11661: pāpadṛṣṭo 'tha vā randhre na saṃbandho bhavettadā // NarP_1,56.405 //
GP12nardp1_u:11669: tadā kuryātpitā tasyāḥ pradānaṃ prītipūrvakam // NarP_1,56.409 //
GP12nardp1_u:11671: varāya ca rūpavatīṃ kanyāṃ dadyādyavīyasīm // NarP_1,56.410 //
GP12nardp1_u:11672: saṃpūjya prārthayitvā ca śacīṃ devīṃ guṇāśrayām /
GP12nardp1_u:11677: evaṃvidhāṃ kumārīṃ tāṃ pūjānte prārthayediti // NarP_1,56.413 //
GP12nardp1_u:11679: vivāhe bhāgyamārogyaṃ putralābhaṃ ca dehi me // NarP_1,56.414 //
GP12nardp1_u:11683: madhyamā kārtiko mārgaśīrṣo vai ninditāḥ pare // NarP_1,56.416 //
GP12nardp1_u:11685: vivāho devatānāṃ ca pratiṣṭāṃ copanāyanam // NarP_1,56.417 //
GP12nardp1_u:11687: na gurau siṃharāśisthe siṃhāṃśakagatepi vā // NarP_1,56.418 //
GP12nardp1_u:11689: buddhaḥ pañcadinaṃ pakṣaṃ guruḥ pakṣaṃ ca sarvataḥ // NarP_1,56.419 //
GP12nardp1_u:11692: na janmamāse janmarkṣe na janmadivase 'pi ca /
GP12nardp1_u:11697: nākhile tridinaṃ neṣṭaṃ tridyuspṛk ca kṣayaṃ tathā // NarP_1,56.423 //
GP12nardp1_u:11699: saṃdhyāyāṃ tridinaṃ tadvanniśīthe sapta eva ca // NarP_1,56.424 //
GP12nardp1_u:11701: vyatīpātaṃ vaidhṛtiṃ ca saṃpūrṇaṃ parighārddhakam // NarP_1,56.425 //
GP12nardp1_u:11705: cetpūjā yatnataḥ kāryā durbala grahayostayoḥ // NarP_1,56.427 //
GP12nardp1_u:11709: tithirekaguṇā vāro dviguṇastriguṇaṃ ca bham // NarP_1,56.429 //
GP12nardp1_u:11711: tato manahūrto balavāṃstato lagnaṃ balādhikam // NarP_1,56.430 //
GP12nardp1_u:11713: tato navāṃśo balavāndvādaśāṃśo balī tataḥ // NarP_1,56.431 //
GP12nardp1_u:11723: tṛtīyaḥ pāpaṣaḍvargo bhṛguḥ ṣaṣṭaḥ kujo 'ṣṭamaḥ // NarP_1,56.436 //
GP12nardp1_u:11736: evaṃ tau na yutau dṛṣṭau mutyurvadhvāḥ karagrahe /
GP12nardp1_u:11737: tyājyāḥ sūryasya saṃkrānteḥ pūrvataḥ paratastathā // NarP_1,56.443 //
GP12nardp1_u:11741: uccage śubhasaṃyukte tallagnaṃ sarvadā tyajet // NarP_1,56.445 //
GP12nardp1_u:11743: śubhatrayayutaṃ lagnaṃ na tyajettuṅgago yadi // NarP_1,56.446 //
GP12nardp1_u:11750: ugraṃ ca saṃdhitritayaṃ gaṇḍātaṃ trividhaṃ mahat /
GP12nardp1_u:11757: uccage nīcage vāpi mitrabhe śatrurāśige // NarP_1,56.453 //
GP12nardp1_u:11761: sūryeṇa saṃyute candre dāridyaṃ bhavati sphuṭam // NarP_1,56.455 //
GP12nardp1_u:11763: daurbhāgyaṃ guruṇā yukte sāpatyaṃ bhārgaveṇa tu // NarP_1,56.456 //
GP12nardp1_u:11765: ketunā saṃyute candre nityaṃ kaṣṭaṃ daridratā // NarP_1,56.457 //
GP12nardp1_u:11769: svoccago vā svarkṣago vā mitra kṣetragatopi vā // NarP_1,56.459 //
GP12nardp1_u:11773: sa rāśiḥ śubhasaṃyukto lagnaṃ vā śubhasaṃyutam // NarP_1,56.461 //
GP12nardp1_u:11775: daṃpatyordvādaśaṃ lagnaṃ rāśirvā yadi lagnagaḥ // NarP_1,56.462 //
GP12nardp1_u:11795: yāvacca śaśinā bhuktvā muktabhaṃ dagdhakāṣṭavat // NarP_1,56.472 //
GP12nardp1_u:11799: krūraviddhaṃ yutaṃ dhiṣṇyaṃ nikhilaṃ naiva maṅgalam // NarP_1,56.474 //
GP12nardp1_u:11801: ete navāṃśāḥ śubhadā vṛṣabhasyāṃśakāḥ khalu // NarP_1,56.475 //
GP12nardp1_u:11803: anye navāṃśā na grāhyā yataste kunavāṃśakāḥ // NarP_1,56.476 //
GP12nardp1_u:11814: bṛhaspatiḥ kendragataḥ śukro vā yadi vā budhaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:11815: eko 'pi doṣanicayaṃ haratyeva na saṃśayaḥ // NarP_1,56.482 //
GP12nardp1_u:11816: tiryakpañcorddhūgāḥ pañca rekhā dve dve ca koṇayoḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:11819: purataḥ pṛṣṭator'kādyā dinarkṣaṃ lattayanti yat // NarP_1,56.484 //
GP12nardp1_u:11823: saurāṣṭre sālvadeśe tu lattitaṃ bhaṃ vivarjayet // NarP_1,56.486 //
GP12nardp1_u:11825: bāhlike kurudeśe cānyasmindeśe na dūṣaṇam // NarP_1,56.487 //
GP12nardp1_u:11827: madhyadeśe vivarjyāni na dṛṣṭānītareṣu ca // NarP_1,56.488 //
GP12nardp1_u:11830: doṣaduṣṭaṃ sadā kālaṃ sannimārṣṭuṃ na śakyate /
GP12nardp1_u:11831: api dhāturato grāhyaṃ doṣālpatvaṃ guṇādhikam // NarP_1,56.490 //
GP12nardp1_u:11845: uttamaṃ madhyamaṃ bhinnaṃ rāśyaikatvaṃ yayostayoḥ // NarP_1,56.497 //
GP12nardp1_u:11848: dvitīye madhyamaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ tṛtīye navake nṛbham /
GP12nardp1_u:11859: dvirdādaśe trikoṇe ca na kadācitṣaḍaṣṭake // NarP_1,56.504 //
GP12nardp1_u:11876: prācyā na ca kaliṅgānāṃ mukhyaṃ godhūlikaṃ smṛtam /
GP12nardp1_u:11885: na caikajanyayoḥ puṃsorekajanye tu kanyake // NarP_1,56.517 //
GP12nardp1_u:11887: divājātastu pitaraṃ rātrau tu jananīṃ tathā // NarP_1,56.518 //
GP12nardp1_u:11889: sutaḥ sutā vā niyataṃ śvasuraṃ hṝnti mūlajaḥ // NarP_1,56.519 //
GP12nardp1_u:11891: jyeṣṭāntyapādajau jyeṣṭaṃ bālo hṝnti na bālikā // NarP_1,56.520 //
GP12nardp1_u:11893: saindrī dhavāgrajaṃ hṝnti devaraṃ tu dvidaivajā // NarP_1,56.521 //
GP12nardp1_u:11897: saṃtyajya hyatiśukre 'pi yātrā vaivāhikī śubhā // NarP_1,56.523 //
GP12nardp1_u:11902: dineṣu yasya devasya yā titistatra tasya ca /
GP12nardp1_u:11909: śubhalagne śubhāṃśe ca kartturna nidhanodaye // NarP_1,56.529 //
GP12nardp1_u:11911: pañcāṣṭake śubhe lagne naidhane śuddhisaṃyute // NarP_1,56.530 //
GP12nardp1_u:11916: caturthe sukhadāḥ saumyāḥ krūrāḥ kheṭāśca duḥkhadāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:11917: glānidāḥ pañcame krūrāḥ saumyāḥ putrasukhapradāḥ // NarP_1,56.533 //
GP12nardp1_u:11918: ṣaṣṭe śubhāḥ śatrudāḥ syuḥ pāpāḥ śabrukṣayaṅkarāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:11919: vyādhidāḥ saptame pāpāḥ saumyāḥ śubhaphalapradāḥ // NarP_1,56.534 //
GP12nardp1_u:11921: dharme pāpā ghnanti saumyāḥ śubhadā maṅgalapradāḥ // NarP_1,56.535 //
GP12nardp1_u:11927: guṇādhikatare lagne doṣaḥ svalpataro yadi // NarP_1,56.538 //
GP12nardp1_u:11932: sitaṃ raktaṃ ca haritaṃ kṛṣṇavarṇaṃ yathākramam /
GP12nardp1_u:11933: madhuraṃ kaṭukaṃ tiktaṃ kaṣāyakarasaṃ kramāt // NarP_1,56.541 //
GP12nardp1_u:11937: atyantavṛddhiradhike hīne hāniḥ same samam // NarP_1,56.543 //
GP12nardp1_u:11939: prātardṛṣṭe jale vṛddhiḥ samaṃ paṅke kṣayaḥ kṣaye // NarP_1,56.544 //
GP12nardp1_u:11945: āyāmeṣu caturdikṣu prāgādiṣu ca satsvapi // NarP_1,56.547 //
GP12nardp1_u:11957: paścime dakṣiṇe vāpi kapāṭaṃ sthāpayedgṛhe // NarP_1,56.553 //
GP12nardp1_u:11969: akārādiṣu bhāgṣu dikṣu prāgādiṣu kramāt // NarP_1,56.559 //
GP12nardp1_u:11972: sādhyavargaḥ puraḥ sthāpya pṛṣṭataḥ sādhakaṃ nyaset /
GP12nardp1_u:11973: vyatyaye nāśanaṃ tasya ṛṇamadhyaṃ dhanācchubham // NarP_1,56.561 //
GP12nardp1_u:11975: vibhejetsaptabhiḥ śeṣaṃ sādhakasya dhanaṃ tadā // NarP_1,56.562 //
GP12nardp1_u:11979: viṣamāyaḥ śubhaghāyaiva samāyo nirdhanāya ca // NarP_1,56.564 //
GP12nardp1_u:11981: ātmakṣayaḥ saptamarkṣe bhavatyeva hi bhartṛbhāt // NarP_1,56.565 //
GP12nardp1_u:11991: sabalo mukhagehānāmeṣa doṣo na vidyate // NarP_1,56.570 //
GP12nardp1_u:11993: gṛhamadhye hastamātre garte nyāsāya vinyaset // NarP_1,56.571 //
GP12nardp1_u:12000: śakuṃ tridhā vibhajyāndyaṃ caturasraṃ tataḥ param /
GP12nardp1_u:12001: aṣṭāsraṃ ca tṛtīyāsau manvasraṃ mṛdumavraṇam // NarP_1,56.575 //
GP12nardp1_u:12007: śubhekṣite 'tha vā yukte lagne śaṅkuṃ vinikṣipet // NarP_1,56.578 //
GP12nardp1_u:12012: tāḥ punaḥ ṣaḍvidhāḥ śālāḥ pratyekaṃ daśaṣaḍvidhāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:12013: dhruvaṃ dhānyaṃ jayaṃ nandaṃ kharaḥ kāntaṃ manoramam // NarP_1,56.581 //
GP12nardp1_u:12014: sumukhaṃ durmukhaṃ krūraṃ śatruṃ svarṇapradaṃ kṣayam /
GP12nardp1_u:12015: ākrandaṃ vipulākhya ca vijayaṃ ṣoḍaśaṃ gṛham // NarP_1,56.582 //
GP12nardp1_u:12023: pratīcyāṃ bhojanagṛhaṃ vā yavyāṃ dhānyamadiram // NarP_1,56.586 //
GP12nardp1_u:12029: dhvajo dhūmrotha siṃhaḥ śvā saurameyaḥ kharo gajāḥ // NarP_1,56.589 //
GP12nardp1_u:12039: pāñcālamānaṃ vaidehaṃ kauravaṃ ca kujanyakam // NarP_1,56.594 //
GP12nardp1_u:12045: avantimānaṃ viprāṇāṃ gāndhāraṃ kṣatriyasya ca // NarP_1,56.597 //
GP12nardp1_u:12049: paśuśālāśca śālānāṃ dhvajāyepyatha vā gaje // NarP_1,56.599 //
GP12nardp1_u:12059: sūryaḥ śaśī mṛgākāśau vāyuḥ pūṣā ca nairṛtiḥ // NarP_1,56.604 //
GP12nardp1_u:12065: ekāntarā syuḥ prāgādyāḥ parito brahmaṇaḥ smṛtāḥ // NarP_1,56.607 //
GP12nardp1_u:12067: mitrotha rājayakṣmā ca tathā pṛthvīdharāhvayaḥ // NarP_1,56.608 //
GP12nardp1_u:12071: tanmadhye viṃśatirbāhyā dvipadāste tu sarvadā // NarP_1,56.610 //
GP12nardp1_u:12072: aryamā ca vivasvāṃśca mitraḥ pṛthvī dharāhvayaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:12073: brahmaṇaḥ pārito dikṣu catvārastripadāḥ smṛtāḥ // NarP_1,56.611 //
GP12nardp1_u:12079: tāmbūlaṃ ca tataḥ kartā prārthayedvāstupūruṣam // NarP_1,56.614 //
GP12nardp1_u:12083: dadyāttadagre viprebhyo bhojanaṃ ca svaśaktitaḥ // NarP_1,56.616 //
GP12nardp1_u:12085: ārogyaṃ putralābhaṃ ca dhanaṃ dhānyaṃ labhennaraḥ // NarP_1,56.617 //
GP12nardp1_u:12089: gṛhaṃ na praviśedevaṃ vipadāmākaraṃ hi tat // NarP_1,56.619 //
GP12nardp1_u:12095: yātrā śuklapratipadi nirddhanāya kṣayāya ca // NarP_1,56.622 //
GP12nardp1_u:12098: na mandendudine prācīṃ na vrajeddakṣiṇaṃ gurau /
GP12nardp1_u:12105: digrāśayastu kramaśo meṣādyāśca punaḥ punaḥ // NarP_1,56.627 //
GP12nardp1_u:12107: lagnastho bhāskaraḥ prācyāṃ diśi yāturlalāṭagaḥ // NarP_1,56.628 //
GP12nardp1_u:12111: lagnātsaptamagaḥ sauriḥ pratīcyāṃ tu lalāṭagaḥ // NarP_1,56.630 //
GP12nardp1_u:12117: tasya bhaṅgaprado rājñasta dvargo 'pi vilagnagaḥ // NarP_1,56.633 //
GP12nardp1_u:12121: pratiśukrakṛtaṃ doṣaṃ hṝntuṃ śaktā grahā na hi // NarP_1,56.635 //
GP12nardp1_u:12123: eteṣāṃ pañcagotrāṇāṃ pratiśukro na vidyate // NarP_1,56.636 //
GP12nardp1_u:12125: dvijakṣobhe nṛpakṣobhe pratiśukro na vidyate // NarP_1,56.637 //
GP12nardp1_u:12133: yāne sthirodaye neṣṭo bhavyayuktekṣitaḥ svayam // NarP_1,56.641 //
GP12nardp1_u:12137: tābhyāṃ tayorikendreṣu yātuḥ śatrukṣayo bhavet // NarP_1,56.643 //
GP12nardp1_u:12139: śubhavārgotha vā lagne yātuḥ śatrukṣayastadā // NarP_1,56.644 //
GP12nardp1_u:12141: tayorīśasthite rāśau yātuḥ śatrukṣayo bhavet // NarP_1,56.645 //
GP12nardp1_u:12145: mūrtiḥ kośo dhanvinaśca vāhanaṃ mantrasaṃjñakam // NarP_1,56.647 //
GP12nardp1_u:12149: na nighnato hi vyāpāraṃ saumyāḥḍha puṣṇantyariṃ vinā // NarP_1,56.649 //
GP12nardp1_u:12150: śukro 'staṃ ca na puṣṇāti mūrtiṃ mṛtyuṃ ca candramāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:12159: yoge 'pi yāyināṃ kṣemamadhiyoge jayo bhavet // NarP_1,56.654 //
GP12nardp1_u:12167: lagne śukre ravau lābhe candre bandhusthite yadā // NarP_1,56.658 //
GP12nardp1_u:12169: svoccasaṃsthe site lagne svocce candre ca lābhage // NarP_1,56.659 //
GP12nardp1_u:12171: trikoṇe kendragāḥ saumyāḥ krūrāstryāyārigā yadi // NarP_1,56.660 //
GP12nardp1_u:12175: trikhaḍāyeṣu mandārau balavantaḥ śubhā yadi // NarP_1,56.662 //
GP12nardp1_u:12177: svoñcasthe lagnage jīve candre lābhagate yadi // NarP_1,56.663 //
GP12nardp1_u:12178: gato rājā ripūnhati pinākī tripuraṃ yathā /
GP12nardp1_u:12181: jīvaṃ lagnagate śukre kendre vāpi trikoṇage // NarP_1,56.665 //
GP12nardp1_u:12183: lagnage jñe śubhe kendre dhiṣṇye copakule gataḥ // NarP_1,56.666 //
GP12nardp1_u:12185: śubhi trikoṇe kendrasthe lābhe candre 'thavā ravī // NarP_1,56.667 //
GP12nardp1_u:12186: śatrūnhanti gato rājā hyandhakāraṃ yathā raviḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:12187: svakṣetrage śubhe kadre trikoṇoyagate gataḥ // NarP_1,56.668 //
GP12nardp1_u:12189: indau svasthe gurau kendre mantraḥ sapraṇavo gataḥ // NarP_1,56.669 //
GP12nardp1_u:12193: śubhe kendre trikoṇasthe candre vargottame gataḥ // NarP_1,56.671 //
GP12nardp1_u:12195: mitrabhe 'tha gurau kendre trikoṇasthe 'tha vā site // NarP_1,56.672 //
GP12nardp1_u:12196: śatrūnhṝnti gato rājā bhujaṅgān garuḍo yathā /
GP12nardp1_u:12199: ye nṛpā yāntyarīñjetuṃ teṣāṃ yogairnṛpāhvayaiḥ // NarP_1,56.674 //
GP12nardp1_u:12206: asamāpte na kurvīta yātrāṃ martyo jijīviṣuḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:12208: vastrādeḥ skhalite krodhe durukte na vrajennṛpaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:12211: sajjikā paramānnaṃ ca kāñjika ca payo dadhi // NarP_1,56.680 //
GP12nardp1_u:12213: kulmāṣāṃśca tilānnaṃ ca dadhi kṣaudraṃ ghṛtaṃ payaḥ // NarP_1,56.681 //
GP12nardp1_u:12214: mṛgamāṃsaṃ ca tatsāraṃ pāyasaṃ ca khagaṃ mṛgam /
GP12nardp1_u:12217: haviṣyaṃ kṛśarānnaṃ ca mudgānnaṃ yavapiṣṭikam // NarP_1,56.683 //
GP12nardp1_u:12233: prāṇināṃ prāṇarūpaṃ taṃ dvibāhuṃ daṇḍapāṇikam // NarP_1,56.691 //
GP12nardp1_u:12239: aprayāṇe svayaṃ kāryā prekṣayā bhūbhujastathā // NarP_1,56.694 //
GP12nardp1_u:12243: dinānyekatra na vasetsaptaṣṭ vā paro janaḥ // NarP_1,56.696 //
GP12nardp1_u:12246: utpāteṣu trividheṣu saptarātraṃ tu na vrajet /
GP12nardp1_u:12251: kṛṣṇaṃ tyaktvā prayāṇe tu kṛkalāsena vīkṣitaḥ // NarP_1,56.700 //
GP12nardp1_u:12255: dṛṣṭamātreṇa yātrāyāṃ vyastaṃ sarvaṃ praveśane // NarP_1,56.702 //
GP12nardp1_u:12269: vedamaṅgalaghoṣāḥ syuḥ yā yināṃ kāryasiddhidāḥ // NarP_1,56.709 //
GP12nardp1_u:12271: smṛtvā dvitīye viprāṇāṃ kṛtvā pūjāṃ nivartayet // NarP_1,56.710 //
GP12nardp1_u:12283: divā vā yadi vā rātrau praveśo maṅgalapradaḥ // NarP_1,56.716 //
GP12nardp1_u:12285: sthiralagne sthirāṃśe ca naidhane śuddhisaṃyute // NarP_1,56.717 //
GP12nardp1_u:12291: kṛtvārkaṃ vāmato vidvānbhṛṅgāraṃ cāgrato viśet // NarP_1,56.720 //
GP12nardp1_u:12293: kendrage vā śuklapakṣe cātivṛṣṭiḥ śubhekṣite // NarP_1,56.721 //
GP12nardp1_u:12301: pravarṣaṇaṃ bhṛguḥ kuryādviparīte na varṣaṇam // NarP_1,56.725 //
GP12nardp1_u:12303: tadā vṛṣṭiṃ prakurvanti na te cetpratilomagāḥ // NarP_1,56.726 //
GP12nardp1_u:12309: candrejye jñetha vā śukre kendrenbītirvinaśyati // NarP_1,56.729 //
GP12nardp1_u:12313: siṃhe bhinne kujo vṛṣṭirabhinne karkaṭe tathā // NarP_1,56.731 //
GP12nardp1_u:12315: ahirbudhnyaṃ pūrvaśasyaṃ paraśasyā ca revatī // NarP_1,56.732 //
GP12nardp1_u:12317: guroḥ saptamarā tisthaḥ pratyaggo bhṛgujo yadā // NarP_1,56.733 //
GP12nardp1_u:12327: udayāstamaye kāle vivarṇor'ketha vā śaśī // NarP_1,56.738 //
GP12nardp1_u:12329: prāṅmukhasya tu kūrmasya navāṅgeṣu dharāmimām // NarP_1,56.739 //
GP12nardp1_u:12341: nābhyādiṣu navāṅgeṣu pāpairduṣṭaṃ śubhaiḥ śubham // NarP_1,56.745 //
GP12nardp1_u:12342: devatā yatra nṛtyanti patanti prajvalanti ca /
GP12nardp1_u:12343: muhū rudanti gāyanti prasvidyanti hasaṃti ca // NarP_1,56.746 //
GP12nardp1_u:12344: vamantyagniṃ tathā dhūmaṃ snehaṃ raktaṃ payo jalam /
GP12nardp1_u:12346: evamādyā hi dṛśyante vikārāḥ pratimāsu ca /
GP12nardp1_u:12349: gāndharvaṃ dehadigdhūmaṃ bhūmikaṃpaṃ divā niśi // NarP_1,56.749 //
GP12nardp1_u:12350: anagnau ca sphuliṅgāśca jvalanaṃ ca vinendhanam /
GP12nardp1_u:12353: jantavo dvitriśiraso jāyante vāpi yoniṣu // NarP_1,56.751 //
GP12nardp1_u:12357: akāle puṣpitā vṛkṣā dṛśyante phalitā yadi // NarP_1,56.753 //
GP12nardp1_u:12361: madhyādbhayaṃ yaśo mṛtyuḥ kṣayaḥ kīrtiḥ sukhāsukham // NarP_1,56.755 //
GP12nardp1_u:12362: aisvaryaṃ dhanahāniṃ ca madhucchannaṃ ca vālmikam /
GP12nardp1_u:12365: ityetatkathitaṃ vipra jyautiṣaṃ te samāsataḥ // NarP_1,56.757 //
GP12nardp1_u:12366: ataḥ paraṃ pravakṣyāmi cchandaḥ śāstramanuttamam // NarP_1,56.758 //
GP12nardp1_u:12368: sanandana uvāca vaidikaṃ laukikaṃ cāpi chando dvividhamucyate /
GP12nardp1_u:12372: sarvago magaṇaḥ prokto mukhalo yagaṇaḥ smṛtaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:12373: madhyalo ragaṇaśvaiva prāntyagaḥ sagaṇo mataḥ // NarP_1,57.3 //
GP12nardp1_u:12383: lakṣma bhinnaṃ yasya pādacatuṣke viṣamaṃ hi tat // NarP_1,57.8 //
GP12nardp1_u:12387: tribhiḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ padairgāthāḥ śṛṇu saṃjñā yathottaram // NarP_1,57.10 //
GP12nardp1_u:12391: śakkarī sātipūrvā ca aṣṭyatyaṣṭī tataḥ smṛte // NarP_1,57.12 //
GP12nardp1_u:12395: pāde sarvagurau pūrvīllaghuṃ sthāpya guroradhaḥ // NarP_1,57.14 //
GP12nardp1_u:12398: naṣṭāṅkārddhe same laḥ syādvipam saiva sorddhagaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:12410: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne dvitīyapāde saṅkṣiptacchandovarṇanaṃ nāma saptapañcāśattamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:12414: sanandana uvāca meruśṛṅge kila purā karṇikāravanāyate // NarP_1,58.2 //
GP12nardp1_u:12421: vīryeṇa saṃmataḥ putro mama bhūyāditi sma ha /
GP12nardp1_u:12424: atiṣṭanmārutāhāraḥ śataṃ kila samāḥ prabhuḥ // NarP_1,58.7 //
GP12nardp1_u:12430: tatra rudro mahādevaḥ karṇikāramayīṃ śubhām // NarP_1,58.10 //
GP12nardp1_u:12432: tasnin divye vane ramye devadevarṣisaṃkule // NarP_1,58.11 //
GP12nardp1_u:12434: na cāsya hīyate varṇo na glānirupajāyate // NarP_1,58.12 //
GP12nardp1_u:12438: evaṃ vidhena tapasā tasya bhaktyā ca nārada // NarP_1,58.14 //
GP12nardp1_u:12442: yathā khe ca tathā śuddho bhaviṣyati sutastaṃva // NarP_1,58.16 //
GP12nardp1_u:12444: tejasā tasya lokāṃstrīnyaśaḥ prāpsyati kevalam // NarP_1,58.17 //
GP12nardp1_u:12445: evaṃ labdhvā varaṃ devo vyāsaḥ satyavatīsutaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:12447: atha rūpaṃ paraṃ vipra bibhratīṃ svena tejasā /
GP12nardp1_u:12451: sā tu kṛtvā tadā vyāsaṃ kāmasaṃvignamānasam /
GP12nardp1_u:12455: sa tu mahatā nigṛhṇan hṛcchayaṃ muniḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:12456: na śaśāka niyantuṃ taṃ vyāsaḥ pravisṛtaṃ manaḥ // NarP_1,58.23 //
GP12nardp1_u:12460: śukre nirmathyamāne 'syāṃ śuko jajñe mahātapāḥ // NarP_1,58.25 //
GP12nardp1_u:12463: tathā rūpaḥ śuko jajñe prajvalanniva tejasā /
GP12nardp1_u:12465: taṃ gaṅgāṃ saritāṃ śreṣṭhāṃ merupṛṣṭhe svarūpiṇīm /
GP12nardp1_u:12466: abhyetya snāpayāmāsa vāriṇā svena nārada // NarP_1,58.28 //
GP12nardp1_u:12474: divyāni sarvapuṣpāṇi pravavarṣa ca mārutaḥ // NarP_1,58.32 //
GP12nardp1_u:12476: taṃ mahātmā svayaṃ prītyā devyā saha mahādyutiḥ // NarP_1,58.33 //
GP12nardp1_u:12479: dadau kamaṇḍaluṃ prītyā devā vāsāṃsi cābhitaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:12482: āraṇe yastadā divyaṃ prāpya janma mahāmuniḥ // NarP_1,58.36 //
GP12nardp1_u:12484: utpannamātraṃ taṃ vedāḥ sarahasyāḥ sasaṃgrahāḥ // NarP_1,58.37 //
GP12nardp1_u:12486: bṛhaspatiṃ sa vavre ca vedavedāṅgabhāṣyavit // NarP_1,58.38 //
GP12nardp1_u:12490: gurave dakṣiṇāṃ dattvā samāvṛtto mahāmuniḥ // NarP_1,58.40 //
GP12nardp1_u:12494: na tvasya ramate buddhi rāśrameṣu munīśvara // NarP_1,58.42 //
GP12nardp1_u:12498: mokṣadharmeṣu kuśalo bhagavān prabravītu me // NarP_1,58.44 //
GP12nardp1_u:12500: śṛtvā putrasya vacanaṃ paramarṣiruvāca tam // NarP_1,58.45 //
GP12nardp1_u:12503: yogaśāstraṃ ca nikhilaṃ kāpilaṃ caiva nārada /
GP12nardp1_u:12504: śataṃ brāhmyā śriyā yuktaṃ brahmatulyaparākramam // NarP_1,58.47 //
GP12nardp1_u:12506: uvāca gaccheti tadā janakaṃ mithileśvaram // NarP_1,58.48 //
GP12nardp1_u:12507: sa te vakṣyati mokṣārthaṃ nikhilena narādhipaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:12509: praṣṭuṃ dharmasya niṣṭāṃ vai mokṣasya ca parāyaṇam /
GP12nardp1_u:12510: uktaśca mānuṣeṇa tvaṃ tathā gacchetyavismitaḥ // NarP_1,58.50 //
GP12nardp1_u:12512: ārjavenaiva gantavyaṃ na sukhāya kṣaṇāttvayā // NarP_1,58.51 //
GP12nardp1_u:12513: na draṣṭavyā viśeṣā hi viśeṣā hi prasaṃginaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:12514: ahṝṅkāro na kartavyo yājye tasminnarādhipe // NarP_1,58.52 //
GP12nardp1_u:12515: sthātavyaṃ vasathe tasya sa te chetsyati saṃśayam /
GP12nardp1_u:12518: evamuktaḥ sa dharmātmā jagāma mithilāṃ muniḥ // NarP_1,58.54 //
GP12nardp1_u:12532: darśayitvāsane sthāpya rājānaṃ ca vyajijñapat // NarP_1,58.61 //
GP12nardp1_u:12533: śrutvā rājā śukaṃ prāptaṃ vārastrīḥ sa nyayuṅkta ca /
GP12nardp1_u:12534: sevāyai tasya bhāvasya jñānāya munisatama // NarP_1,58.62 //
GP12nardp1_u:12542: krīḍantyaśca hasaṃtyaśca gāyantyaścaiva tāḥ śukam // NarP_1,58.66 //
GP12nardp1_u:12545: dhyānastha eva satataṃ na hṛṣyati na kupyati /
GP12nardp1_u:12546: pādaśaucaṃ tu kṛtvā vai śukaḥ saṃdhyāmupāsya ca // NarP_1,58.68 //
GP12nardp1_u:12548: pūrvarātre tu tatrāsau bhūtvā dhyānaparāyaṇaḥ // NarP_1,58.69 //
GP12nardp1_u:12550: tataḥ prātaḥ samutthāya kṛtvā śaucamanantaram // NarP_1,58.70 //
GP12nardp1_u:12553: tāṃ ca rātriṃ nṛpakule vartayāmāsa nārada // NarP_1,58.72 //
GP12nardp1_u:12554: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne dvitīyabhāge śukapralobhanaṃ nāmāṣṭañcāśattamo
GP12nardp1_u:12555: sanandana uvāca tataḥ sa rājā sahito mantribhirdvijasattama /
GP12nardp1_u:12556: puraḥ purohitaṃ kṛtvā sarvāṇyantaḥ purāṇi ca // NarP_1,59.1 //
GP12nardp1_u:12561: pādyaṃ nivedya prathamaṃ sārghyaṃ gāṃ ca nyavedayat /
GP12nardp1_u:12562: sa ca tāṃmantrataḥ pūjāṃ pratigṛhya dvijottamaḥ // NarP_1,59.4 //
GP12nardp1_u:12568: śuka uvāca pitrāhamukto bhadraṃ te mokṣadharmārthakovidaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:12570: tatra tvaṃ gaccha tūrṇaṃ vai sa te hṛdayasaṃśayam /
GP12nardp1_u:12571: pravṛttau ca nivṛttau ca sarvaṃ chetsyatyasaṃśayam // NarP_1,59.8 //
GP12nardp1_u:12575: kathaṃ ca mokṣaḥ kartavyo jñānena tapasāpi vā // NarP_1,59.10 //
GP12nardp1_u:12576: janaka uvāca yatkāryaṃ brāhmaṇeneha janmaprabhṛti tacchuṇu /
GP12nardp1_u:12588: śuka uvāca utpanne jñānavijñāne pratyakṣe hṛdi śaśvate /
GP12nardp1_u:12590: kimavaśyaṃ tu vastavyamāśrameṣu na vā nṛpa /
GP12nardp1_u:12592: janaka uvāca na vinā jñānavijñāne mokṣasyādhigamo bhavet /.
GP12nardp1_u:12594: ācāryaḥ plāvitā tasya jñānaṃ plava ihocyate /
GP12nardp1_u:12597: kṛtvā śubhāśubhaṃ karma mokṣo nāmeha labhyate // NarP_1,59.21 //
GP12nardp1_u:12599: āsādayati śuddhātmā mokṣaṃ hi prathamāśrame // NarP_1,59.22 //
GP12nardp1_u:12605: saṃpaśyannaiva lipyeta jale vāricarago yathā // NarP_1,59.25 //
GP12nardp1_u:12607: vihāya dehaṃ nirmukto nirdvandvaḥ śubhasaṃgataḥ // NarP_1,59.26 //
GP12nardp1_u:12608: atra gāthāḥ purā gītāḥ śṛṇu rājñā yayātinā /
GP12nardp1_u:12610: jyotiścātmani nānyatra ratnaṃ tatraiva caiva tat /
GP12nardp1_u:12611: svayaṃ ca śakyaṃ taddraṣṭuṃ susamāhitarcatasā // NarP_1,59.28 //
GP12nardp1_u:12612: na bibheti paro yasmānna bibheti parācca yaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:12613: yaśca necchati na dveṣṭi brahma saṃpadyate sa tu // NarP_1,59.29 //
GP12nardp1_u:12614: yadā bhāvaṃ na kurute sarvabhūteṣu pāpakam /
GP12nardp1_u:12617: karmaṇā manasā vācā brahma saṃpadyate tadā // NarP_1,59.31 //
GP12nardp1_u:12619: tyaktva kāmaṃ ca lobhaṃ ca tato brahmatvamaśnute // NarP_1,59.32 //
GP12nardp1_u:12620: yadā śrāvye ca dṛśye ca sarvabhūteṣu cāvyayam /
GP12nardp1_u:12621: samo bhavati nirdvudvo brahma saṃpadyate tadā // NarP_1,59.33 //
GP12nardp1_u:12622: yadā stuti ca rnidāṃ ca samatvena ca paśyati /
GP12nardp1_u:12623: kāñcanaṃ cāyasaṃ caiva sukhaduḥkhe tathaiva ca // NarP_1,59.34 //
GP12nardp1_u:12625: jīvitaṃ maraṇaṃ caiva brahma saṃpadyate tadā // NarP_1,59.35 //
GP12nardp1_u:12628: tamaḥ parigataṃ veśya yathā dīpena dṛśyate /
GP12nardp1_u:12629: tathā buddhipradīpena śakya ātmā nirīkṣitum // NarP_1,59.37 //
GP12nardp1_u:12631: yañcānyadapi vettavyaṃ tattvato vetti tadbhavān // NarP_1,59.38 //
GP12nardp1_u:12635: jñānaṃ divyaṃ samādīptaṃ tenāsi vidito vidito mama // NarP_1,59.40 //
GP12nardp1_u:12637: adhikaṃ ca tavaiśvaryaṃ tañca tvaṃ nāvabudhyase // NarP_1,59.41 //
GP12nardp1_u:12639: utpanne cāpi vijñā ne nādhigacchanti tāṅgatim // NarP_1,59.42 //
GP12nardp1_u:12644: nāsti te sukhaduḥkheṣu viśeṣo nāsti vastuṣu /
GP12nardp1_u:12645: nautsukyaṃ nṛtyagīteṣu na rāga upajāyate // NarP_1,59.45 //
GP12nardp1_u:12646: na bandhuṣu nibandhaste na bhayeṣvasti te bhayam /
GP12nardp1_u:12648: ahaṃ ca tvānupaśyāmi ye cānye 'pi manīṣiṇaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:12649: āsthitaṃ paramaṃ mārge akṣayaṃ cāpyanāmayam // NarP_1,59.47 //
GP12nardp1_u:12652: sanandana uvāca etacchutvā tu vacanaṃ katātmā kṛtaniścayaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:12655: śaiśiraṃ girimāsādya pārāśaryaṃ dadarśa ca // NarP_1,59.50 //
GP12nardp1_u:12662: samāliṅgya sutaṃ vyāsaḥ svapārśvasthaṃ cakāra ca // NarP_1,59.54 //
GP12nardp1_u:12663: tataḥ pailādayo viprā vedān vyāsādadhītya ca /
GP12nardp1_u:12666: sanadana uvāca avatīrṇeṣu vipreṣu yāsaḥ putrasahāyavān /
GP12nardp1_u:12669: bho bho maharṣe bāsiṣṭha brahmaghoṣo na vartate // NarP_1,60.2 //
GP12nardp1_u:12684: divyaṃ te cakṣurutpannaṃ svasthaṃ te niścalaṃ manaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:12685: tamasā rajasā cāpi tyaktaḥ satye vyavasthitaḥ // NarP_1,60.10 //
GP12nardp1_u:12688: dvāvetau pratyayaṃ yātau divaṃ cādhaśca gacchataḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:12689: pithivyāmantarikṣe ca yataḥ saṃyānti vāyavaḥ // NarP_1,60.12 //
GP12nardp1_u:12694: apānaśca tato jajñe prāṇaścāpi tataḥ param /
GP12nardp1_u:12696: pṛtharkkṃmāṇi teṣāṃ tu pravakṣyāmi yathā tathā /
GP12nardp1_u:12697: prāṇināṃ sarvato vāyuśceṣṭā vartayate pṛthak // NarP_1,60.16 //
GP12nardp1_u:12700: prathamaḥ prathame mārge pravaho nāma so 'nilaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:12702: āvaho nāma so 'bhyeti dvitīyaḥ śvasano nadan /
GP12nardp1_u:12703: udayaṃ jyotiṣāṃ śaśvatsomādīnāṃ karoti yaḥ // NarP_1,60.19 //
GP12nardp1_u:12709: saṃnīyamānā bahudhā yena nīlā mahāghanāḥ // NarP_1,60.22 //
GP12nardp1_u:12711: yo 'sau vahati devānāṃ vimānāni vihāyasā // NarP_1,60.23 //
GP12nardp1_u:12712: caturthaḥ saṃvaho nāma vāyuḥ sa girimardanaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:12713: yena vegavatā rugṇāḥ kriyante tarujā rasāḥ // NarP_1,60.24 //
GP12nardp1_u:12714: pañcamaḥ sa mahāvego vivaho nāma mārutaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:12720: ṣaṣṭhaḥ parivaho nāma sa vāyurjīvatāṃ varaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:12725: yaṃ samāsādya vegena diśāmantaṃ prapedire // NarP_1,60.30 //
GP12nardp1_u:12728: parīvaho nāma varo vāyuḥ sa duratikramaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:12729: evamete diteḥ putrā marutaḥ paramādbhutāḥ // NarP_1,60.32 //
GP12nardp1_u:12739: tato vyāse gate snātuṃ śuko brahmavidāṃ varaḥ // NarP_1,60.37 //
GP12nardp1_u:12741: tatra svādhyāyasaṃsaktaṃ śukaṃ vyāsasutaṃ mune // NarP_1,60.38 //
GP12nardp1_u:12743: utthāya satkṛtastena brahmaputro hi kārṣṇinā // NarP_1,60.39 //
GP12nardp1_u:12744: tataḥ provāca viprendra śukaṃ vidāṃ varaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:12745: kiṃ karoṣi mahābhāga vyāsaputra mahādyute // NarP_1,60.40 //
GP12nardp1_u:12746: śuka uvāca svādhyāye saṃpravṛtto 'haṃ brahmaputrādhunā sthitaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:12749: tadvadasva mahābhāga yathā ta jjñānamāpnuyām // NarP_1,60.42 //
GP12nardp1_u:12750: sanatkumāra uvāca nāsti vidyāsamaṃ cakṣurnāsti vidyāsamaṃ tapaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:12751: nāsti rāgasamaṃ duḥkhaṃ nāsti tyāgasamaṃ sukham // NarP_1,60.43 //
GP12nardp1_u:12754: mānuṣyamasukhaṃ prāpya yaḥ sajjati sa muhyati /
GP12nardp1_u:12755: nālaṃ sa duḥkhamokṣāya saṃgo vai duḥkhalakṣaṇaḥ // NarP_1,60.45 //
GP12nardp1_u:12759: kāryaḥ śreyorthinā tau hi śreyoghātārthamudyatau // NarP_1,60.47 //
GP12nardp1_u:12762: ānṛśaṃsyaṃ paro dharmaḥ kṣamā ca paramaṃ balam /
GP12nardp1_u:12763: ātmajñānaṃ paraṃ jñānaṃ satyaṃ hi paramaṃ hitam // NarP_1,60.49 //
GP12nardp1_u:12764: yena sarvaṃ parityaktaṃ sa vidvānsa ca paṇḍitaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:12767: ātmabhūtairatadbhūtaḥ saha caiva vinaiva ca // NarP_1,60.51 //
GP12nardp1_u:12768: sa vimuktaḥ paraṃ śreyo na cireṇādhigacchati /
GP12nardp1_u:12770: yasya bhūtaiḥ saha mune sa śreyo vindate mahat /
GP12nardp1_u:12772: nedaṃ janma samāsādya vairaṃ kurvīta kena cit /
GP12nardp1_u:12783: dvandvārāmeṣu bhūteṣu varāko ramate muniḥ // NarP_1,60.59 //
GP12nardp1_u:12793: alaṃ parigraheṇeha doṣavān hi parigrahaḥ // NarP_1,60.64 //
GP12nardp1_u:12799: pārakyamadhruvaṃ sarvaṃ kiṃ svaṃ sukṛtaduṣkṛte // NarP_1,60.67 //
GP12nardp1_u:12801: anarthe kiṃ prasaktastvaṃ svamarthaṃ nānutiṣṭasi // NarP_1,60.68 //
GP12nardp1_u:12805: sukṛtaṃ duṣkṛtaṃ ca tvāṃ gacchantamanuyāsyataḥ // NarP_1,60.70 //
GP12nardp1_u:12806: vidyā karma ca śauryaṃ ca jñānaṃ ca bahuvistaram /
GP12nardp1_u:12808: nibandhinī rajjureṣā yā grāme vasato ratiḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:12809: chitvaināṃ sukṛto yānti naināṃ chindanti duṣkṛtaḥ // NarP_1,60.72 //
GP12nardp1_u:12811: na ca nāmāsti nirvedo lohaṃ hi hṛdayaṃ tava // NarP_1,60.73 //
GP12nardp1_u:12815: tyāgavātādhvagāṃ śīghrāṃ buddhināvaṃ nadīṃ taret // NarP_1,60.75 //
GP12nardp1_u:12816: tyaktvā dharmamadharmaṃ ca hyubhe satyānṛte tyaja /
GP12nardp1_u:12825: indriyāṇi ca pañcaiva tamaḥ sattvaṃ rajastathā // NarP_1,60.80 //
GP12nardp1_u:12830: trivargo 'tra sukhaṃ duḥkha jīvitaṃ maraṇaṃ tathā /
GP12nardp1_u:12831: ya idaṃ veda tattvena sasa veda prabhavāpyayau // NarP_1,60.83 //
GP12nardp1_u:12835: loke vihitamātmānaṃ lokaṃ cātmani paśyati // NarP_1,60.85 //
GP12nardp1_u:12845: tataḥ karma samādatte punaranyannavaṃ bahu // NarP_1,60.90 //
GP12nardp1_u:12851: saṃyamena ca saṃbandhānnivṛttyā tapaso balāt // NarP_1,60.93 //
GP12nardp1_u:12852: samprāptā bahavaḥ siddhiṃ avyābādhāṃ sukhodayām // NarP_1,60.94 //
GP12nardp1_u:12853: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge dvitīyapāde bṛhadupākhyāne ṣaṣṭitamo
GP12nardp1_u:12855: sanatkumāra uvāca aśokaṃ śokanāśārthaṃ śāstraṃ śāntikaraṃ śivam /
GP12nardp1_u:12858: divase divase mūḍhamāviśanti na paṇḍitam // NarP_1,61.2 //
GP12nardp1_u:12865: nārtho na dharmo na yaśo yo 'tītamanuśocati /
GP12nardp1_u:12866: asyābhāvena yujyetaṃ tañcāsya tu nivartate // NarP_1,61.6 //
GP12nardp1_u:12867: guṇairbhūtāni yujyante tathaiva ca na yujyate /
GP12nardp1_u:12868: sarvāṇi naitadekasya śokasthānaṃ hi vidyate // NarP_1,61.7 //
GP12nardp1_u:12869: mṛtaṃ vā yadi vā naṣṭaṃ yo 'tītamanuśocati /
GP12nardp1_u:12870: duḥkhena labhate duḥkhaṃ mahānarthe prapadyate // NarP_1,61.8 //
GP12nardp1_u:12874: cintyamānaṃ hi na vyeti bhūyaścābhipravarddhate // NarP_1,61.10 //
GP12nardp1_u:12876: etadvijñāya sāmarthyaṃ na vānyaiḥ samatāmiyāt // NarP_1,61.11 //
GP12nardp1_u:12878: ārogyaṃ priyasaṃvāsaṃ na mṛdhyetpaṇḍitaḥ kvacit // NarP_1,61.12 //
GP12nardp1_u:12884: sāyakā iva tīkṣṇāgrāḥ prayuktā dṛḍhadhanvibhiḥ // NarP_1,61.15 //
GP12nardp1_u:12890: jātaṃ martyaṃ jarayati nimiṣaṃ nāvatiṣṭate // NarP_1,61.18 //
GP12nardp1_u:12892: ādityo hyastamabhyeti punaḥ punarudeti ca // NarP_1,61.19 //
GP12nardp1_u:12894: iṣṭāniṣṭā manuṣyāṇāṃ mataṃ gacchanti rātrayaḥ // NarP_1,61.20 //
GP12nardp1_u:12896: yadi syānna parādhīnaṃ puruṣasya kriyāphalam // NarP_1,61.21 //
GP12nardp1_u:12898: dṛśyante niṣphalāḥ saṃtaḥ prahīnāśca svakarmabhiḥ // NarP_1,61.22 //
GP12nardp1_u:12902: vañcanāyāṃ ca lokeṣu sasukheṣveva jīyate // NarP_1,61.24 //
GP12nardp1_u:12907: tasya yonau prasaktasya garbho bhavati mānavaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:12912: āyuṣmān jāyate putraḥ kathaṃ pretaḥ piteva saḥ // NarP_1,61.29 //
GP12nardp1_u:12920: parityajati yo duḥkhaṃ sukhamapyubhayaṃ naraḥ // NarP_1,61.33 //
GP12nardp1_u:12922: duḥkhamarthā hi tyajyante pālane ca na te sukhāḥ // NarP_1,61.34 //
GP12nardp1_u:12924: anyāmanyāṃ dhanāvasthāṃ prāpya vaiśeṣikā narāḥ // NarP_1,61.35 //
GP12nardp1_u:12925: atṛptā yānti vidhvaṃsaṃ santoṣaṃ yānti paṇḍitāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:12926: sarve kṣayāntā nicayāḥ patanāntāḥ samucchrayāḥ // NarP_1,61.36 //
GP12nardp1_u:12928: anto nāsti pipāsāyāstuṣṭistu paramaṃ sukham // NarP_1,61.37 //
GP12nardp1_u:12932: bhūteṣu bhāvaṃ saṃcintya ye buddhyā tamasaḥ param // NarP_1,61.39 //
GP12nardp1_u:12933: na śocanti gatādhvānaḥ paśyanti paramāṃ gatim /
GP12nardp1_u:12938: śabde sparśe rase rūpe gandhe ca paramaṃ tathā // NarP_1,61.42 //
GP12nardp1_u:12941: viprayogaśca sarvasya na vācā na ca vidyayā /
GP12nardp1_u:12943: vicaredasamunnaddhaḥ sa sukhī sa ca paṇḍitaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:12947: nainaṃ prajñā suniyataṃ trāyate nāpi pauruṣam /
GP12nardp1_u:12955: kena yatnena jīvantaṃ garbhaṃ tvamiha paśyasi /
GP12nardp1_u:12956: annapānāni jīryante yatra bhakṣyāśca bhakṣitāḥ // NarP_1,61.51 //
GP12nardp1_u:12959: dhāraṇe vā visarge ca na kartuṃ vidyate 'vaśaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:12964: garbhasya saha jātasya saptamīmīdṛśīṃ daśām // NarP_1,61.55 //
GP12nardp1_u:12965: prāpnuvanti tataḥ pañca na bhavanti śatāyuṣaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:12966: nābhyutthāne manuṣyāṇāṃ yogāḥ syurnātra saṃśayaḥ // NarP_1,61.56 //
GP12nardp1_u:12970: te cāpi vividhā vaidyāḥ kuśalā saṃmatauṣadhāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:12972: te pibanti kaṣāyāṃśca sarpīṣi vividhāni ca /
GP12nardp1_u:12973: dṛśyante jarayā bhagnā nāgairnāgā ivottamāḥ // NarP_1,61.60 //
GP12nardp1_u:12975: śvāpadāśca daridrāśca prāyo nārtā bhavanti te // NarP_1,61.61 //
GP12nardp1_u:12977: ākramya roga ādatte paśūnpaśupaco yathā // NarP_1,61.62 //
GP12nardp1_u:12979: srotasā mahasā kṣipraṃ hriyamāṇaṃ balīyasā // NarP_1,61.63 //
GP12nardp1_u:12980: na dhanena na rājyena nogreṇa tapasā tathā /
GP12nardp1_u:12981: svabhāvā hyativartante ye nirmuktāḥ śarīriṣu // NarP_1,61.64 //
GP12nardp1_u:12983: yatate ca yathāśakti na ca tadvartate tathā // NarP_1,61.65 //
GP12nardp1_u:12987: apramattāḥ śaṭhāḥ krūrā vikrāntāḥ paryupāsate // NarP_1,61.67 //
GP12nardp1_u:12989: svaṃ svaṃ ca punaranyeṣāṃ na kañcidatigacchati // NarP_1,61.68 //
GP12nardp1_u:12993: manujāśca gataśrīkāḥ śataśo vividhāḥ striyāḥ // NarP_1,61.70 //
GP12nardp1_u:12995: idamanyatparaṃ paśya nātra mohaṃ kariṣyasi // NarP_1,61.71 //
GP12nardp1_u:12996: dharmaṃ cāpi tyajā dharmaṃ tyaja satyānṛtāṃ dhiyam /
GP12nardp1_u:12997: sarvaṃ tyaktvā svarūpasthaḥ sukhī bhava nirāmayaḥ // NarP_1,61.72 //
GP12nardp1_u:12999: yena devāḥ parityajya bhartyalokaṃ divaṃ gatāḥ // NarP_1,61.73 //
GP12nardp1_u:13000: sanandana uvāca ityuktvā vyāsatanayaṃ samāpṛcchya mahāmuniḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:13004: tataḥ pitrā samāgamya praṇamya ca mahāmuniḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:13007: kṣaṇaikaṃ sthīyatāṃ putra iti ca krośa durmanāḥ // NarP_1,61.77 //
GP12nardp1_u:13009: mokṣamevānusaṃcitya gata eva paraṃ padam // NarP_1,61.78 //
GP12nardp1_u:13010: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne dvitīyapāde ekaṣaṣṭitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:13011: sūta uvāca etacchrṛtvā tu vacanaṃ nārado bhagavānṛṣiḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:13012: punaḥ papraccha taṃ vipra śukābhipatanaṃ munim // NarP_1,62.1 //
GP12nardp1_u:13018: kutra te nivasaṃtīha saṃśayo me mahānayam // NarP_1,62.4 //
GP12nardp1_u:13023: tataḥ sa prāṅmukho vidvānādityena virocite // NarP_1,62.6 //
GP12nardp1_u:13025: na tatra pakṣisaṃghāto na śabdo na ca darśanam // NarP_1,62.7 //
GP12nardp1_u:13028: prajahāsa tato hāsaṃ śukaḥ samprekṣya bhāskaram /
GP12nardp1_u:13036: taṃ dṛṣṭvā vismitāḥ sarve gandharvāpsarasāṃ gaṇāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:13043: tamo hyaṣṭavidhaṃ tyaktvā jahau pañcavidhaṃ rajaḥ // NarP_1,62.16 //
GP12nardp1_u:13047: saṃśliṣṭe śvetapīte ca rukmarūpyamaye śubhe // NarP_1,62.18 //
GP12nardp1_u:13053: na ca pratijaghānāsya sa gatiṃ parvatottamaḥ // NarP_1,62.21 //
GP12nardp1_u:13064: sa dadarśa dvidhā kṛtvā parvatāgraṃ gataṃ śukam /
GP12nardp1_u:13065: śaśaṃsurmunayaḥ siddhā gatiṃ tasmai sutasya tām // NarP_1,62.27 //
GP12nardp1_u:13077: so 'nunīto bhagavatā vyāso rudreṇa nārada // NarP_1,62.33 //
GP12nardp1_u:13078: kimu tvaṃ tāmyasi mune putraṃ prati samākulaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:13079: paśyasi vipra nāyāntaṃ brahmabhūtaṃ nijāntire // NarP_1,62.34 //
GP12nardp1_u:13081: śvāśramaṃ sa śuko brahmabhūto lokāṃścacāra ha // NarP_1,62.35 //
GP12nardp1_u:13084: tatra dṛṣṭvā tu tau devau tapyamāno mahattapaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:13085: svayaṃ ca tatra tapasi sthitaḥ śukamanusmaran // NarP_1,62.37 //
GP12nardp1_u:13087: śvetadvīpaṃ gatastāta yatra tvamagamaḥ purā // NarP_1,62.38 //
GP12nardp1_u:13089: dṛṣṭaḥ śrutivimṛgyo hi devadevo janārdanaḥ // NarP_1,62.39 //
GP12nardp1_u:13091: śrībhagavānuvāca tvayā dṛṣṭo 'smi yogīndra sarvadevarahaḥsthitaḥ // NarP_1,62.40 //
GP12nardp1_u:13097: yaṃ bhāntamanubhāntyete lokāḥ sarve 'pi nārada // NarP_1,62.43 //
GP12nardp1_u:13111: śuka uvāca namaste vāsudevāya sarvalokaikasākṣiṇe // NarP_1,62.50 //
GP12nardp1_u:13123: ṛbhave suvratākhyāya sudhāmne cājitāya ca // NarP_1,62.56 //
GP12nardp1_u:13135: ghṛtārciṣe viṣṇave te 'nantāya kapilāyaya ca // NarP_1,62.62 //
GP12nardp1_u:13144: śrībhagavānuvāca vyāsaputra mahābhāga prīto 'smi tava suvrata /
GP12nardp1_u:13145: vidyāmāpnuhi bhaktiṃ ca jñānī tvaṃ mama rūpadhṛk // NarP_1,62.67 //
GP12nardp1_u:13146: yadrūpaṃ mama dṛṣṭaṃ prāk śvetadvīpe tvayā dvija /
GP12nardp1_u:13149: varalokānyathā vāyuryathā ravaṃ savitā tathā // NarP_1,62.69 //
GP12nardp1_u:13151: bhaktirhi durlabhā loke mayi sarvaparāyaṇe // NarP_1,62.70 //
GP12nardp1_u:13155: kartā bhāgavataṃ śāstraṃ tadadhīṣva bhuvaṃ vraja // NarP_1,62.72 //
GP12nardp1_u:13157: tvadviyogena khinnātmā taṃ prasādaya matpriyam // NarP_1,62.73 //
GP12nardp1_u:13160: atha taṃ svantike dṛṣṭvā pārāśaryyaḥ pratāpavān /
GP12nardp1_u:13161: putraṃ prāpya prahṛṣṭātmā tapaso nivavarta ha // NarP_1,62.75 //
GP12nardp1_u:13172: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge dvitīyapāde bṛhadupākhyāne mokṣadharṃmanirūpaṇaṃ nāma dviṣaṣṭitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:13174: śaunaka uvāca sūta sādho ciraṃ jīva sarvaśāstraviśāradaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:13181: teṣāṃ samāgame bhadrā kā kathā lokapāvanī // NarP_1,63.4 //
GP12nardp1_u:13182: sūta uvāca sādhu pṛṣṭaṃ mahābhāga tvayā lokopakāriṇā /
GP12nardp1_u:13185: nārado bhārgavaśreṣṭha punaḥ papraccha tānmunīn // NarP_1,63.6 //
GP12nardp1_u:13186: nārada uvāca sarvadeveśvaro viṣṇurvede tantre ca kīrtitaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:13187: samārādhyaḥ sa evātra sarvaiḥ sarvārthakāṅkṣibhiḥ // NarP_1,63.7 //
GP12nardp1_u:13191: dīkṣaṇaṃ prātarādyaṃ ca kṛtyaṃ syādyattaducyatām // NarP_1,63.9 //
GP12nardp1_u:13193: prīyeta paramātmā vai tadbrūta mama mānadāḥ // NarP_1,63.10 //
GP12nardp1_u:13194: sūta uvāca etacchrutvā vacastasya nāradasya mahātmanaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:13196: sanatkumāra uvāca śṛṇu nārada vakṣyāmi tantraṃ bhāgavataṃ tava /
GP12nardp1_u:13201: patistatra śivohyeko jīvāstu paśavaḥ smṛtāḥ // NarP_1,63.14 //
GP12nardp1_u:13215: pāśāḥ pañca tathā tatra prathamau malakarmajau // NarP_1,63.21 //
GP12nardp1_u:13221: ityetau prathamau cātha māyeyādyān śṛṇudvija // NarP_1,63.24 //
GP12nardp1_u:13223: patirjayati sarveṣāmeko bījaṃ vibhuḥ param // NarP_1,63.25 //
GP12nardp1_u:13224: manasyati na codeti nivṛttiṃ ca prayacchati /
GP12nardp1_u:13225: varvarti dṛkkriyārūpaṃ tattejaḥ śāṃbhavaṃ param // NarP_1,63.26 //
GP12nardp1_u:13226: śakto mayā harau bhukto paśugaṇasya hi /
GP12nardp1_u:13231: kṛtyaṃ kurvanti tenedaṃ sarvānugrāhakaṃ mune // NarP_1,63.29 //
GP12nardp1_u:13239: yatra kriyā hi nyagbhūtā jñānākhyodrekamaśnute // NarP_1,63.33 //
GP12nardp1_u:13241: nādo binduśca sakalaḥ sadākhyaṃ tattvamāśritau // NarP_1,63.34 //
GP12nardp1_u:13242: vidyeśāḥ punaraiśaṃ tu mantrā vidyābhidhaṃ punaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:13243: imāni caiva tattvāni śuddhādhveti prakīrtitam // NarP_1,63.35 //
GP12nardp1_u:13247: tattvaṃ vastuta ekaṃ tu śivākhyaṃ citraśaktikam // NarP_1,63.37 //
GP12nardp1_u:13249: cijjaḍānugrahārthāya kṛtvā rūpāṇi vai prabhuḥ // NarP_1,63.38 //
GP12nardp1_u:13251: muktiṃ ca viśveṣāṃ svavyāpāre samarthetām // NarP_1,63.39 //
GP12nardp1_u:13259: nityaikā ca śivā śaktyā hyanādinidhanā satī // NarP_1,63.43 //
GP12nardp1_u:13260: sādhāraṇī narāṇāṃ vai bhuvanānāṃ ca kāraṇam /
GP12nardp1_u:13262: viśvī sūkṣmā parā māyā vikṛtaiḥ parattu sā /
GP12nardp1_u:13263: karmāṇyāvekṣya vidyeśo māyāṃ vikṣobhya śaktibhiḥ // NarP_1,63.45 //
GP12nardp1_u:13265: sṛjatyādo kālatattvaṃ nānāśaktimayī ca sā // NarP_1,63.46 //
GP12nardp1_u:13267: sūte hyanantaraṃ māyā śaktiṃ niyamanātmikām // NarP_1,63.47 //
GP12nardp1_u:13269: anantaraṃ ca sā māyā nityā viśvavimohinī // NarP_1,63.48 //
GP12nardp1_u:13271: ekatastu nṛṇāṃ yena kalayitvā malaṃ tataḥ // NarP_1,63.49 //
GP12nardp1_u:13275: pradarśanātha vai puṃso viṣayāṇāṃ ca sā punaḥ // NarP_1,63.51 //
GP12nardp1_u:13276: prakāśarūpaṃ vidyākhyaṃ tattvaṃ sūte kalaiva hi /
GP12nardp1_u:13277: vidyā tvāvaraṇaṃ bhitvā jñānaśakteḥ svakarmaṇā // NarP_1,63.52 //
GP12nardp1_u:13279: karoti bhogyaṃ yānāsau karaṇena pareṇa vai // NarP_1,63.53 //
GP12nardp1_u:13281: bhogye bhogaṃ ca bhoktāraṃ tatparaṃ karaṇaṃ tu sā // NarP_1,63.54 //
GP12nardp1_u:13284: bhogyaṃ bhoktuśca svenaiva vidyākhyaṃ karaṇaṃ tu tat /
GP12nardp1_u:13285: yadyarkavatprakāśā dhīḥ karmatvāñca tathāpi hi // NarP_1,63.56 //
GP12nardp1_u:13290: kiṃ ca pradhānacaritaṃ vyarthaṃ sarvaṃ bhavettataḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:13295: yena bhogyāya janitā bhidyaṅge puruṣe punaḥ // NarP_1,63.61 //
GP12nardp1_u:13299: kalaiva praścādavyaktaṃ sūte bhogyāya cāsya tu // NarP_1,63.63 //
GP12nardp1_u:13302: ādhāro 'pi ca yasteṣāṃ tadavyaktaṃ ca gīyate /
GP12nardp1_u:13303: traya eva guṇā hyaṣāmavyaktādeva saṃbhavaḥ // NarP_1,63.65 //
GP12nardp1_u:13309: sattvā dviguṇabhedena sa punastrividho bhavet // NarP_1,63.68 //
GP12nardp1_u:13311: tatra taijasato jñānendriyāṇi manasā saha // NarP_1,63.69 //
GP12nardp1_u:13315: icchārūpaṃ ca saṃkalpavyāpāraṃ tatra vai manaḥ // NarP_1,63.71 //
GP12nardp1_u:13317: bahiḥ karaṇabhāvena svocitena yataḥ sadā // NarP_1,63.72 //
GP12nardp1_u:13322: jñānendriyāṇi śrotraṃ tvak cakṣurjihvā ca nāsikā /
GP12nardp1_u:13323: grāhyāśca viṣayā hyeṣāṃ jñeyāḥ śabdādayo mune // NarP_1,63.75 //
GP12nardp1_u:13327: karaṇāni ca siddhinā na kṛtiḥ karaṇairvinā // NarP_1,63.77 //
GP12nardp1_u:13330: tanmātrāṇi tu khavāyustejo 'mbhaḥ kṣmeti pañca vai /
GP12nardp1_u:13333: rūpaṃ triṣu rasaścaiva dvayorgandhaḥ kṣitau tathā // NarP_1,63.80 //
GP12nardp1_u:13335: pākaśca saṃgrahaścaiva dhāraṇaṃ ceti kathyate // NarP_1,63.81 //
GP12nardp1_u:13337: bhāsvadagnau jale śuklaṃ kṣitau śuklādyanekadhā // NarP_1,63.82 //
GP12nardp1_u:13338: rūpaṃ triṣu rasoṃ'bhaḥ su madhuraḥ ṣaḍidhaḥ kṣitau /
GP12nardp1_u:13341: bhūtasya tu viśeṣo 'yaṃ viśeṣarahitaṃ tu tat // NarP_1,63.84 //
GP12nardp1_u:13347: hṛdi paṅktau dṛśoḥ pitte tejastaddharmadarśanāt // NarP_1,63.87 //
GP12nardp1_u:13353: deheṣu karmavaśataḥ sarveṣu vicaranti hi // NarP_1,63.90 //
GP12nardp1_u:13365: bindurekaḥ praviśati yadā garbhe dvayātmakaḥ // NarP_1,63.96 //
GP12nardp1_u:13372: evaṃ tatra sthito garbhe prāgjanmotthaṃ śubhāśubham /
GP12nardp1_u:13377: tataḥ krameṇa sa śiśurvardhamāno dinedine // NarP_1,63.102 //
GP12nardp1_u:13382: āhāraścaiva nidrā ca bhayaṃ maithunameva ca /
GP12nardp1_u:13383: paśvādīnāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ sādhāraṇamitīritam // NarP_1,63.105 //
GP12nardp1_u:13391: yajate śivaṃ mantraiśca ravapareṣāṃ hitāya saḥ // NarP_1,63.109 //
GP12nardp1_u:13401: yo yasminnāśrame tiṣṭandīkṣāṃ prāpnoti mānavaḥ // NarP_1,63.114 //
GP12nardp1_u:13403: kṛtānyapi na karmāṇi bandhanāya bhavanti hi // NarP_1,63.115 //
GP12nardp1_u:13407: nityaṃ naimittikaṃ dīkṣāṃ prāpya yo nācarennaraḥ // NarP_1,63.117 //
GP12nardp1_u:13416: kṛte 'pi viphalaṃ tasya prāyaścittaṃ pade pade /
GP12nardp1_u:13417: kāyena manasā vācā gurubhaktiparasya ca // NarP_1,63.122 //
GP12nardp1_u:13421: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne tṛtīyapāde triṣaṣṭitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:13424: divyaṃ bhāvaṃ yato dadyātkṣiṇuyā dduritāni ca /
GP12nardp1_u:13425: ato dīkṣeti sā proktā sarvāgamaviśāradaiḥ // NarP_1,64.2 //
GP12nardp1_u:13429: strīmantrāstu dviṭhāntāḥ syuḥ puṃmantrā huṃphaḍantakāḥ // NarP_1,64.4 //
GP12nardp1_u:13431: pundaivatāstu mantrā syurvidyāḥ strīdaivatā matāḥ // NarP_1,64.5 //
GP12nardp1_u:13435: agnīṣomātmakā hyevaṃ mantrā jñeyā manīṣibhiḥ // NarP_1,64.7 //
GP12nardp1_u:13437: saumayāścaiva prabudhyante vāme vahati māruteḥ // NarP_1,64.8 //
GP12nardp1_u:13442: japto yadi sa vai devaṃ prabuddhaḥ kṣiprasiddhidaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:13443: anayā mālayā japto duṣṭamantro 'pi siddhyati // NarP_1,64.11 //
GP12nardp1_u:13444: krūre karmāṇi cāgneyāḥ saumyāḥ saumya phalapradāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:13453: kumāro 'tha yuvā prauḍho vṛddho nistriṃśakastathā // NarP_1,64.16 //
GP12nardp1_u:13460: doṣā hyete samākhyātā vakṣyāmyeṣāṃ ca lakṣaṇam /
GP12nardp1_u:13461: saṃyuktaṃ vā viyuktaṃ vā tridhā vā svarasaṃyutam // NarP_1,64.20 //
GP12nardp1_u:13463: caturddhā pañcadhā vāpi sa mantraśchinnasaṃjñakaḥ // NarP_1,64.21 //
GP12nardp1_u:13465: sa tu ruddho manujñeyo hyatiklaśena siddhidaḥ // NarP_1,64.22 //
GP12nardp1_u:13469: asau parāṅmukho jñeyo bhajatāṃ cirasiddhidaḥ // NarP_1,64.24 //
GP12nardp1_u:13471: sa mantro badhiraḥ proktaḥ kaṣṭenālpaphalapradaḥ // NarP_1,64.25 //
GP12nardp1_u:13473: netrahīnastu vijñeyaḥ kleśenāpi na siddhidaḥ // NarP_1,64.26 //
GP12nardp1_u:13475: haṃseṃdurvā sakāro vā phakāro varma vā puna // NarP_1,64.27 //
GP12nardp1_u:13476: māprā namāmi ca padaṃ nāsti yasminsa kīlitaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:13477: evaṃ madhye dvayaṃ mūrghni yasminnasralakārakau // NarP_1,64.28 //
GP12nardp1_u:13478: na vidyete sa mantrastu staṃbhitaḥ siddhirodhakṛt /
GP12nardp1_u:13479: agniḥ pavanasaṃyukto manoryasya tu mūrddhani // NarP_1,64.29 //
GP12nardp1_u:13480: sa sārṇo dṛśyate yastu sa mantro dagdhasaṃjñakaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:13482: trastaḥ sa mantro vijñeyo mukhe tāravivarjitaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:13483: hakāraḥ śaktirathavā bhīto mantraḥ sa eva hi // NarP_1,64.31 //
GP12nardp1_u:13485: malinastu sa vijñeyo hyatikleśena siddhidaḥ // NarP_1,64.32 //
GP12nardp1_u:13486: dārṇo yasya manormadhye mūrdhni krodhayugaṃ tathā /
GP12nardp1_u:13487: asraṃ cāsti sa mantrastu tiraskṛta udīritaḥ // NarP_1,64.33 //
GP12nardp1_u:13490: tryakṣaro haṃsahīno yaḥ suṣuptaḥ kīrtitastu saḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:13493: yasya madhye sthitaṃ cāsraṃ sa mantro mūrcchitaḥ smṛtaḥ // NarP_1,64.36 //
GP12nardp1_u:13495: mantrasyādau ca madhye ca mūrdhni cāsracatuṣṭayam // NarP_1,64.37 //
GP12nardp1_u:13496: jñātavyo bhrānta ityeṣa yaḥ syādaṣṭā daśākṣaraḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:13497: punarviśativarṇo vā yo mantraḥ smarasaṃyutaḥ // NarP_1,64.38 //
GP12nardp1_u:13505: śikhā varma ca yasyānte netramasraṃ ca dṛśyate // NarP_1,64.42 //
GP12nardp1_u:13506: śiva śaktyārṇahīno vā nirbījaḥ sa manuḥ smṛtaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:13508: sa manuḥ siddhihīnaḥ syānmandaḥ paṅktyakṣaro manuḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:13509: kūṭa ekākṣaro mantraḥ sa evokto niraṃśakaḥ // NarP_1,64.44 //
GP12nardp1_u:13511: ṣaḍvarṇo bījahīno vā sārddhasaptākṣaro 'pi vā // NarP_1,64.45 //
GP12nardp1_u:13515: yo mantro dantavarṇastu mohitaḥ sa tu kīrtitaḥ // NarP_1,64.47 //
GP12nardp1_u:13517: kṣudhārtaḥ sa tu vijñeyo mantrasiddhivivarjitaḥ // NarP_1,64.48 //
GP12nardp1_u:13521: ekona triṃśadarṇo vā mantro hīnāṅgakaḥ smṛtaḥ // NarP_1,64.50 //
GP12nardp1_u:13525: vrīḍitaḥ sa tu vijñeyaḥ sarvakarmasu na kṣamaḥ // NarP_1,64.52 //
GP12nardp1_u:13528: ye mantrāste tu vijñeyāḥ sthānabhraṣṭā munīśvara /
GP12nardp1_u:13529: trayodaśārṇā ye mantrāstithyarṇāśca tathā punaḥ // NarP_1,64.54 //
GP12nardp1_u:13531: śataṃ sārddhaśataṃ vāpi śatadvayamathāpi vā // NarP_1,64.55 //
GP12nardp1_u:13533: ye mantrā varṇasaṃkhyākā niḥsnehāste prakīrtitāḥ // NarP_1,64.56 //
GP12nardp1_u:13537: tadvarddhvaṃ caiva ye mantrāḥ stotrarūpāstu te smṛtāḥ // NarP_1,64.58 //
GP12nardp1_u:13538: evaṃ vidhāḥ samākhyātā manavo doṣa saṃyutāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:13543: yaṃ kañcidapi vā mantraṃ tasya syuḥ sarvasiddhayaḥ // NarP_1,64.61 //
GP12nardp1_u:13544: savyapāṣṇi gude sthāpya dakṣiṇaṃ ca dhvajopari /
GP12nardp1_u:13547: tadagre sarahasyaṃ te kathayiṣyāmi nārada // NarP_1,64.63 //
GP12nardp1_u:13550: suṃdaraḥ sumukhaḥ śāntaḥ kulīnaḥ sulabho vaśī /
GP12nardp1_u:13553: tattvaniṣkāsane dakṣo vinayī ca suveṣavān // NarP_1,64.66 //
GP12nardp1_u:13562: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne tṛtīyapāde catuḥṣaṣṭitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:13563: sanatkumāra uvāca parīkṣya śiṣyaṃ tu gururmantraśodhanamācaret /
GP12nardp1_u:13578: catuṣke cettadā pūrvaṃ yatra nāmākṣaraṃ sthitam // NarP_1,65.8 //
GP12nardp1_u:13582: tadā pūrvoktarītyā tu kramāddveyaṃ manīṣibhiḥ // NarP_1,65.10 //
GP12nardp1_u:13584: turīye ceñcatuṣke tu tadaivaṃ gaṇayetsudhīḥ // NarP_1,65.11 //
GP12nardp1_u:13594: anye 'pyatra prakārā hi saṃti vai bahavoṃ mune // NarP_1,65.16 //
GP12nardp1_u:13596: evaṃ saṃśodhya mantraṃ tu śuddhe kāle sthale tathā // NarP_1,65.17 //
GP12nardp1_u:13601: kṛtvā svasti vidhānaṃ tu maṇḍalādi ca tuṣṭimān /
GP12nardp1_u:13602: guruḥ śiṣyeṇa sahitaḥ śuciryāgagṛhaṃ viśet // NarP_1,65.20 //
GP12nardp1_u:13609: tatra saṃsthāpya vidhivattatra bhānoḥ kalāṃ yajet /
GP12nardp1_u:13614: vahnerdaśa kalāḥ proktāḥ procyante 'tha raveḥ kalāḥ // NarP_1,65.26 //
GP12nardp1_u:13616: suṣumṇā bhogadā viśvā bodhinī dhāriṇī kṣamā // NarP_1,65.27 //
GP12nardp1_u:13617: athendrośca kalā jñeyā hyamṛtā mānadā punaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:13618: pūṣā tuṣṭiśca puṣṭiśca ratiśca dhṛtisaṃjñikāḥ // NarP_1,65.28 //
GP12nardp1_u:13628: vedyāṃ saṃveśya saṃprokṣya prokṣaṇīsthena vāriṇā // NarP_1,65.33 //
GP12nardp1_u:13630: nyāsajālena saṃśodhya mūrdhni vinyasya pallavān // NarP_1,65.34 //
GP12nardp1_u:13635: atha śiṣyasya śirasi hastaṃ datvā gurustataḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:13638: tataḥ sacandanaṃ hastaṃ datvā śiṣyasya mastake // NarP_1,65.38 //
GP12nardp1_u:13650: raviṃ śivāṃ śivaṃ caiva yadā madhye tu śaṅkaram // NarP_1,65.44 //
GP12nardp1_u:13651: raviṃ gaṇeśamaṃbāṃ ca hariṃ cātha yadā śivām /
GP12nardp1_u:13653: śivaṃ śivāṃ raviṃ viṣṇuṃ ravau madhyagate punaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:13654: gaṇeṣaṃ viṣṇumaṃbāṃ ca śivaṃ ceti yathākramam // NarP_1,65.46 //
GP12nardp1_u:13656: brāhme muhūrtte hyutthāya kṛtvācā vaśyakaṃ budhaḥ // NarP_1,65.47 //
GP12nardp1_u:13672: tatpadaṃ darśitaṃ yena tasmai śrīgurave namaḥ // NarP_1,65.55 //
GP12nardp1_u:13674: cakṣurunmīlitaṃ yena tasmai śrīgurave namaḥ // NarP_1,65.56 //
GP12nardp1_u:13676: yasya vāgamṛtaṃ hṝnti viṣaṃ saṃsārasaṃjñakam // NarP_1,65.57 //
GP12nardp1_u:13678: oṃ namaste nātha bhagavān śivāya gururūpiṇe // NarP_1,65.58 //
GP12nardp1_u:13690: iti stutvā tataḥ sarva gurave vinivedayet // NarP_1,65.64 //
GP12nardp1_u:13692: yatkaromi jagannātha tadastu tava pūjanam // NarP_1,65.65 //
GP12nardp1_u:13710: prātaḥ samutthāya tava priyārthaṃ saṃsārayātrāṃ tvanuvartayiṣye //
GP12nardp1_u:13714: ajapākhyāṃ tu gāyatrīṃ jīvojapati sarvadā // NarP_1,65.76 //
GP12nardp1_u:13718: nirābhāsaśca dharmaśca jñānaṃ ceti tathā punaḥ // NarP_1,65.78 //
GP12nardp1_u:13734: saśriye ṣaṭsahasraṃ ca viṣṇave vinivedayet // NarP_1,65.86 //
GP12nardp1_u:13746: praramādye ca gurave sahasraṃ vinivedayet // NarP_1,65.92 //
GP12nardp1_u:13752: brahmaivāhaṃ na saṃsārī nityamukto na śokabhāk // NarP_1,65.95 //
GP12nardp1_u:13756: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne tṛtīyapāde pañcaṣaṣṭimo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:13757: sanatkumāra uvāca tataḥ śvāsānusāreṇa datvā pādaṃ mahītale /
GP12nardp1_u:13760: iti bhūmiṃ tu saṃprārthya vihareñca yathāvidhi // NarP_1,66.2 //
GP12nardp1_u:13762: gacchantu ṛṣayo devāḥ piśācā ye ca guhyakāḥ // NarP_1,66.3 //
GP12nardp1_u:13764: iti tālatrayaṃ datvā śiraḥ prāvṛtya vāsasā // NarP_1,66.4 //
GP12nardp1_u:13766: malaṃ visṛjya saucaṃ tu mṛdādbhiḥ samupācaret // NarP_1,66.5 //
GP12nardp1_u:13767: ekā liṅge gude tisro daśa vāmakare mṛdaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:13768: karayoḥ sapta vai dadyātritrivaraṃ ca pādayoḥ // NarP_1,66.6 //
GP12nardp1_u:13771: āyurbalaṃ yaśo varcaḥ prajāḥ paśuvasūni ca /
GP12nardp1_u:13772: śriyaṃ prajñāṃ ca medhāṃ ca tvaṃ no dehi vanaspate // NarP_1,66.8 //
GP12nardp1_u:13778: devāgāraṃ tato gatvā nirmālyamapasārya ca // NarP_1,66.11 //
GP12nardp1_u:13780: asreṇa pātraṃ saṃprokṣya mūlena jvālayeñca tam // NarP_1,66.12 //
GP12nardp1_u:13784: iti nīrājanaṃ kṛtvā prārthayitvā nijeśvaram // NarP_1,66.14 //
GP12nardp1_u:13786: gatvā tīrthaṃ namaskṛtya snānīyaṃ ca nidhāya vai // NarP_1,66.15 //
GP12nardp1_u:13790: praviśya nābhimātre tu mṛdaṃ vāmakarasya ca // NarP_1,66.17 //
GP12nardp1_u:13791: maṇibandhe hastatale tadagre ca tathā punaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:13794: talasthāṃ ca ṣaḍaṅgeṣu tanmantraiḥ pravilepayet // NarP_1,66.19 //
GP12nardp1_u:13799: dhārāṃ ca brahmarandhreṇa praviśantīṃ nijāṃ tanum /
GP12nardp1_u:13802: tataḥ śrautoktavidhinā snātvā mantrī samāhitaḥ // NarP_1,66.23 //
GP12nardp1_u:13806: brahmāṇḍodaratīrthāni karaiḥ spṛṣṭāni te raveḥ // NarP_1,66.25 //
GP12nardp1_u:13807: tena satyena me deva dehi tīrthaṃ divākara // NarP_1,66.26 //
GP12nardp1_u:13808: gaṅge ca yamune caiva godāvari sarasvati /
GP12nardp1_u:13815: mūlena caikādaśadhā tatra saṃmantrya bhāvayet // NarP_1,66.30 //
GP12nardp1_u:13821: iti natvā samārundhya saptacchidrāṇi sādhakaḥ // NarP_1,66.33 //
GP12nardp1_u:13825: catvāro manavaste 'tra kathyante tāntrikā mune // NarP_1,66.35 //
GP12nardp1_u:13827: mātaraḥ sarvabhūtānāmāpo devyaḥ punantu mām // NarP_1,66.36 //
GP12nardp1_u:13829: kṣālayanti ca tāṃ sparśādāpo devyaḥ punantu mām // NarP_1,66.37 //
GP12nardp1_u:13830: yanme keśeṣu daurbhāgyaṃ sīmante yañca mūrddhani /
GP12nardp1_u:13833: santoṣaḥ kṣāntirāstikyaṃ vidyā bhavatu vo namaḥ // NarP_1,66.39 //
GP12nardp1_u:13835: pibeddhiruddhaṃ no kuryādeṣāṃ tu niyato vidhiḥ // NarP_1,66.40 //
GP12nardp1_u:13836: pṛthivyāṃ yāni tīrthāni dakṣāṅghrau tāni bhūsure /
GP12nardp1_u:13841: athavā bhasmanā snāto rajobhiścaiva vākṣamaḥ // NarP_1,66.43 //
GP12nardp1_u:13842: atha sandhyādikaṃ kuryān sthitvā caivāsane śubhe /
GP12nardp1_u:13843: keśavena tathā nārāyaṇena mādhavena ca // NarP_1,66.44 //
GP12nardp1_u:13853: hariṇā viṣṇunāṃsau ca vaiṣṇavācamanaṃ tvidam // NarP_1,66.49 //
GP12nardp1_u:13862: tilakaṃ ca tataḥ kuryādbhāle suṣṭhu gadākṛti /
GP12nardp1_u:13863: nandakaṃ hṛdaye śaṅkhacakre caiva bhujadvaye // NarP_1,66.54 //
GP12nardp1_u:13865: karṇamūle pārśvayośca pṛṣṭe nābhau kakudyapi // NarP_1,66.55 //
GP12nardp1_u:13867: agnihotrodbhavaṃ bhasma gṛhītvā tryaṃbakeṇa tu // NarP_1,66.56 //
GP12nardp1_u:13871: śaivaṃ śāktastrikoṇā bhaṃ nārīvadvā samācaret // NarP_1,66.58 //
GP12nardp1_u:13872: kṛtvā tu vaidikīṃ saṃdhyāṃ tāntrikīṃ ca samācaret /
GP12nardp1_u:13883: prakṣālyāntargataṃ tena kalmaṣaṃ tajjalaṃ punaḥ // NarP_1,66.64 //
GP12nardp1_u:13887: tataśca hastau prakṣālya prāgvadācamya mantravit // NarP_1,66.66 //
GP12nardp1_u:13891: dattvārghaṃ triranenātha devaṃ ravigataṃ smaret // NarP_1,66.68 //
GP12nardp1_u:13898: varaṃ pāśaṃ ca śūlaṃ ca dadhānāṃ nṛkaroṭikām /
GP12nardp1_u:13904: gurupaṅktiṃ ca saṃtarpyaṃ sāṃgaṃ sāvaraṇaṃ tathā /
GP12nardp1_u:13907: viṣvaksena ca śaileyaṃ vaiṣṇavaḥ paritarpayet // NarP_1,66.76 //
GP12nardp1_u:13908: evaṃ saṃtarpya viprendra dattvārdhyaṃ ca vivasvate /
GP12nardp1_u:13913: sarasvatīṃ vāmabhāge dakṣe vighneśvaraṃ punaḥ // NarP_1,66.79 //
GP12nardp1_u:13914: kṣetrapālaṃ tathā vāme dakṣe gaṅgāṃ prapūjayet /
GP12nardp1_u:13915: vāme ca yamunāṃ dakṣe dhātāraṃ vāmatastathā // NarP_1,66.80 //
GP12nardp1_u:13921: vṛṣabhaśca mahākālaḥ śaivā vai dvārapālakāḥ // NarP_1,66.83 //
GP12nardp1_u:13922: brāhmayādyā mātaro 'ṣṭau tu śaktyo dvāḥsthitāḥ svayam /
GP12nardp1_u:13923: seṃduḥ svanāmāgharṇādyā ṅenamoṃtā ime smṛtāḥ // NarP_1,66.84 //
GP12nardp1_u:13931: śrīdharo medhayā yukto hṛṣīkiśaśca harṣayā // NarP_1,66.88 //
GP12nardp1_u:13936: śārṅgī tu prabhayā yuktaḥ khaḍgī yuktastu satyayā /
GP12nardp1_u:13939: pāśī virajayā yukto kuśī viśvāsamanvitaḥ // NarP_1,66.92 //
GP12nardp1_u:13941: nindī smṛtyā samāyukto naro vṛddhyā samanvitaḥ // NarP_1,66.93 //
GP12nardp1_u:13943: kṛṣṇo buddhyā yutaḥ satyo bhuktyā muktyātha sātvataḥ // NarP_1,66.94 //
GP12nardp1_u:13947: balī tu parayā yukto balānujaparāyaṇe // NarP_1,66.96 //
GP12nardp1_u:13949: haṃsaḥ prabhāsamāyukto varāho niśayā yutaḥ // NarP_1,66.97 //
GP12nardp1_u:13950: vimalo dhārayā yukto nṛsiṃho vidyutā yutaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:13952: amṛtādyā ca gāyatrī chando viṣṇuśca devatā /
GP12nardp1_u:13959: eka maulau mukhe caika dvika netre dvikaṃ śrutau // NarP_1,66.102 //
GP12nardp1_u:13960: nasordvayaṃ kapole ca dvayaṃ dve dviradacchade /
GP12nardp1_u:13961: ekaṃ tu rasanāmūle grīvāyāmekameva ca // NarP_1,66.103 //
GP12nardp1_u:13963: ṭatavargauṃ pādayostu paphau kuṅkṣidvaye nyaset // NarP_1,66.104 //
GP12nardp1_u:13964: pṛṣṭhavaṃśe vamityuktaṃ nābhau bhaṃ hṛdaye tu mam /
GP12nardp1_u:13965: yādisaptāpi dhātusthā haṃ prāṇe laṃ tathātmani // NarP_1,66.105 //
GP12nardp1_u:13966: kṣaṃ krodhe kramato nyasya viṣṇu pūjākṣamo bhavet /
GP12nardp1_u:13967: pūrṇodaryā tu śrīkaṇṭho hyananto vijarānvitaḥ // NarP_1,66.106 //
GP12nardp1_u:13974: akrūra āsyayā yukto mahāseno vidyayā yutaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:13991: śvetorasko vidāriṇyā bhṛguḥ sahajayā yutaḥ // NarP_1,66.118 //
GP12nardp1_u:13994: yatra svīśapadaṃ noktaṃ tatra sarvatra yojayet /
GP12nardp1_u:13997: halo bījāni coktāni svarāḥ śaktaya īritāḥ // NarP_1,66.121 //
GP12nardp1_u:14003: vighneśaśca hriyā yukto vighnarājaḥ śriyā yutaḥ // NarP_1,66.124 //
GP12nardp1_u:14007: kāntyā yukto dvidantastu kāminyā gajavakrakaḥ // NarP_1,66.126 //
GP12nardp1_u:14024: muṃhī subhagayā yuktaḥ khaḍgī durbhagayā yutaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:14031: ṣaḍdīrghāḍhyena bījena kṛtvāṅgāni tataḥ smaret // NarP_1,66.138 //
GP12nardp1_u:14033: patnyāśliṣṭaṃ raktatanuṃ trinetraṃ gaṇape bhavet // NarP_1,66.139 //
GP12nardp1_u:14035: nivṛttiśca pratiṣṭhā ca vidyā śāntistatedhikāḥ // NarP_1,66.140 //
GP12nardp1_u:14036: dīpikā recikā cāpi mocikā ca parābhidhā /
GP12nardp1_u:14039: smṛtirmedhā tataḥ kāntirlakṣmīrddhṛtiḥ sthirā sthitiḥ // NarP_1,66.142 //
GP12nardp1_u:14041: kāmiko varadā vātha hlādinī prītisaṃyutā // NarP_1,66.143 //
GP12nardp1_u:14042: dīrghā tīkṣṇā tathā raudrā proktā nidrā ca tandrikā /
GP12nardp1_u:14043: kṣudhā ca krodhinī paścākriyākārī samṛtyukā // NarP_1,66.144 //
GP12nardp1_u:14054: namaḥ svāhā vaṣaṭ huṃ vauṣaṭ phaṭ jātaya īritāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:14057: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge buhadupākhyāne tṛtīyapāde saṃdhyādinirūpaṇaṃ nāma ṣaṭṣaṣṭitamo
GP12nardp1_u:14058: sanatkumāra uvāca atha vakṣye devapūjāṃ sādhakābhīṣṭasiddhidām /
GP12nardp1_u:14059: trikoṇaṃ caturasraṃ vā vāmabhāge prakalpya ca // NarP_1,67.1 //
GP12nardp1_u:14060: sampūjyā sreṇa saṃkṣālya hṛdādhāraṃ nidhāya ca /
GP12nardp1_u:14061: tatrāgnimaṇḍalaṃ cedvā pātraṃ saṃkṣālya cāsrataḥ // NarP_1,67.2 //
GP12nardp1_u:14074: netraṃ madhye dikṣu cāsraṃ trikoṇe pūjayettataḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:14082: tāraḥ kārṃmamahāṃste tu tato jalacarāya ca /
GP12nardp1_u:14083: varma phaṭ hṛdayaṃ pāñcajanyāya hṛdayaṃ maneḥ // NarP_1,67.13 //
GP12nardp1_u:14095: cintayitveṣṭadevaṃ ca tato mudrāḥ pradarśayet // NarP_1,67.19 //
GP12nardp1_u:14098: gāruḍī gālinī caiva mukhye mudre prakīrtite /
GP12nardp1_u:14112: jātīphalaṃ ca kaṅkolaṃ lavaṅgaṃ ca jalānvitam /
GP12nardp1_u:14119: vidhinā sthāpitāyāṃ vā pratimāyāṃ prapūjayet // NarP_1,67.31 //
GP12nardp1_u:14121: nirmitā śubhadā gehe pūjanāya dine dine // NarP_1,67.32 //
GP12nardp1_u:14122: vakrāṃ dagdhāṃ khaṇḍitāṃ ca bhinnamūrddhadṛśaṃ punanaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:14123: spaṣṭāṃ vāpya ntyajādyaiśca pratimāṃ naiva pūjayet // NarP_1,67.33 //
GP12nardp1_u:14125: mūlena mūrtiṃ saṃkalpya dhyātvā devaṃ yathoditam // NarP_1,67.34 //
GP12nardp1_u:14131: taveyaṃ hi mahāmūrtistasyāṃ tvāṃ sarvagaṃ prabho /
GP12nardp1_u:14136: sāṃnidhyaṃ kuru tasyāṃ tvaṃ bhaktānugrāhakāraka // NarP_1,67.40 //
GP12nardp1_u:14140: mūrtauṃ vā yajñasaṃpūrtyai sthito bhava maheśvara // NarP_1,67.42 //
GP12nardp1_u:14142: svatejaḥ pañjareṇāśu veṣṭito bhava sarvataḥ // NarP_1,67.43 //
GP12nardp1_u:14144: tasmai te parameśāya svāgataṃ svāgataṃ ca me // NarP_1,67.44 //
GP12nardp1_u:14148: tasmai me paraṇābjāya pādyaṃ śuddhāya kalpyate // NarP_1,67.46 //
GP12nardp1_u:14154: madhuparkamidaṃ deva kalpayāmi prasīda me // NarP_1,67.49 //
GP12nardp1_u:14161: sahasraṃ vā śataṃ vāpi yathāśaktyādareṇa ca // NarP_1,67.52 //
GP12nardp1_u:14168: tailādidūṣitaṃ jīrṇaṃ sacchidraṃ malinaṃ tyajet // NarP_1,67.56 //
GP12nardp1_u:14170: yajñasūtrāya tasmai te yajñasūtraṃ prakalpaye // NarP_1,67.57 //
GP12nardp1_u:14174: gṛhāṇa parama gandha kṛpayā parameśvara // NarP_1,67.59 //
GP12nardp1_u:14178: ketakīṃ kuṭajaṃ kundaṃ bandhūkaṃ kesaraṃ japām /
GP12nardp1_u:14181: śaktau dūrvārkamandārān gaṇeśe tulasīṃ tyajet // NarP_1,67.62 //
GP12nardp1_u:14185: kadalī badarī dhātrī tintiṇī bījapūrakam // NarP_1,67.64 //
GP12nardp1_u:14187: eteṣāṃ tu phalaiḥ kuryāddevatāpūjanaṃ budhaḥ // NarP_1,67.65 //
GP12nardp1_u:14188: śuṣkaistu nārcayeddevaṃ patraiḥ puṣpaiḥ phalairapi // NarP_1,67.66 //
GP12nardp1_u:14190: chinnabhinnānyapi mune na dūṣyāṇi jagurbudhāḥ // NarP_1,67.67 //
GP12nardp1_u:14192: sarvadā tulasī śuddhā bilvapatrāṇi vai tathā // NarP_1,67.68 //
GP12nardp1_u:14198: āghreyaṃ devadeveśa dhūpaṃ bhaktyā gṛhāma me // NarP_1,67.71 //
GP12nardp1_u:14201: annaṃ caturvidhaṃ svādu rasaiḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ samanvitam /
GP12nardp1_u:14202: bhaktyā gṛhāṇa me deva naivedyantuṣṭidaṃsadā // NarP_1,67.73 //
GP12nardp1_u:14207: saiva prācī tu vijñeyā tato 'nyā vidiśo daśa // NarP_1,67.76 //
GP12nardp1_u:14222: idro vahniryamo rakṣo varuṇaḥ pavano vidhuḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:14225: vājī vṛṣo haṃsakūrmauṃ vāhanāni vidurbudhāḥ // NarP_1,67.85 //
GP12nardp1_u:14226: vajraṃ śaktiṃ daṇḍakhaḍgau pāśāṃ kuśagadā api /
GP12nardp1_u:14231: dakṣiṇe sthaṇḍilaṃ kṛtvā tatra saṃskāramācaret // NarP_1,67.88 //
GP12nardp1_u:14239: devaṃ saṃyojayenmūrtauṃ tato vahniṃ visarjayet // NarP_1,67.92 //
GP12nardp1_u:14241: karmāntare 'pi saṃprāpte sānnidhyaṃ kuru sādaram // NarP_1,67.93 //
GP12nardp1_u:14249: ityaṣṭadikṣu datvā ca punarbhūtabaliṃ caret // NarP_1,67.97 //
GP12nardp1_u:14258: japtvā mantraṃ yathāśakti devatāyai nivedayet // NarP_1,67.101 //
GP12nardp1_u:14260: siddhirbhavatu me deva tvatprasādāttvayi sthitā // NarP_1,67.102 //
GP12nardp1_u:14261: tataḥ parāṅmukhaṃ cārghaṃ kṛtvā puṣpaiḥ prapūjayet /
GP12nardp1_u:14263: manasā vacasā ceti praṇāmo 'ṣṭāṅga īritaḥ // NarP_1,67.103 //
GP12nardp1_u:14264: bāhubhyāṃ ca sajānubhyāṃ śirasā vacasāpi vā /
GP12nardp1_u:14271: vācā hastābhyāṃ ca padbhyā mudareṇa tataḥ param // NarP_1,67.107 //
GP12nardp1_u:14273: tatsarvaṃ ca tato brahmarpaṇaṃ bhavatu ṭhadvayam // NarP_1,67.108 //
GP12nardp1_u:14274: māṃ madīyaṃ ca sakalaṃ viṣṇave ca samarpaye /
GP12nardp1_u:14282: tatsarvaṃ tāvakī pūjā bhūyādbhūtyai ca me prabho /
GP12nardp1_u:14285: anyathā śaraṇaṃ nāsti tvameva śaraṇaṃ mama // NarP_1,67.114 //
GP12nardp1_u:14288: dāso 'yamiti māṃ matvā kṣamasva jagatāṃ pate /
GP12nardp1_u:14289: āvāhanaṃ na jānāmi na jānāmi visarjanam // NarP_1,67.116 //
GP12nardp1_u:14290: pūjāṃ caiva na jānāmi tvaṃ gatiḥ parameśvara /
GP12nardp1_u:14291: saṃprārthyaivaṃ tato mantrī mūlānte ślokamuñcaret // NarP_1,67.117 //
GP12nardp1_u:14292: gaccha gaccha paraṃ sthānaṃ jagadīśa jaganmaya /
GP12nardp1_u:14293: yanna brahmādayo devā jānanti ca sadāśivaḥ // NarP_1,67.118 //
GP12nardp1_u:14295: nidhāya devaṃ sāṃgaṃ ca svīyadṛtsarasīruhe // NarP_1,67.119 //
GP12nardp1_u:14302: agrāhyaṃ śivanirmālyaṃ patraṃ puṣpaṃ phalaṃ jalam // NarP_1,67.123 //
GP12nardp1_u:14304: pūjā pañcavidhā tatra kathitā nāradākhilaiḥ // NarP_1,67.124 //
GP12nardp1_u:14305: āturī sautikī trāsī sādhanā bhāvinī tathā /
GP12nardp1_u:14306: daurbodhī ca kramādāsāṃ lakṣaṇāni śṛṇuṣaava me // NarP_1,67.125 //
GP12nardp1_u:14307: rogādiyukto na srāyānna japenna ca pūjayet /
GP12nardp1_u:14308: vilokya pūjāṃ devasya mūrtiṃ vā sūryyamaṇḍalam // NarP_1,67.126 //
GP12nardp1_u:14310: roge nivṛtte snātvātha natvā saṃpūñcedgurum // NarP_1,67.127 //
GP12nardp1_u:14312: pūjāvicchedadoṣo me māstviti prārthayecca tam // NarP_1,67.128 //
GP12nardp1_u:14313: dvijānapi ca saṃpūjya yathāśaktyā pratoṣya ca /
GP12nardp1_u:14316: sūtakaṃ dvividhaṃ proktaṃ jātākhyaṃ mṛtasaṃjñakam // NarP_1,67.130 //
GP12nardp1_u:14317: tatra snātvā mānasīṃ tu kṛtvā saṃdhyāṃ samāhitaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:14319: nivṛtte sūtake prāgvatsaṃpūjya ca guruṃ dvijān /
GP12nardp1_u:14321: eṣā tu sautikī proktā trāsī cātha nigadyate /
GP12nardp1_u:14325: puṣpaiḥ patraiḥ phalairvāpi manasā vā yajedvibhum /
GP12nardp1_u:14326: sādhanābhāvinī hyeṣā daurbodhīṃ śṛṇu nārada // NarP_1,67.135 //
GP12nardp1_u:14327: striyo vṛddhā stathā bālā mūrkhāstaistu yathākramam /
GP12nardp1_u:14328: yathājñānakṛtā sā tu daurbodhīti prakīrtitā // NarP_1,67.136 //
GP12nardp1_u:14330: devapūjāvihīno yaḥ sa gacchennarakaṃ dhruvam // NarP_1,67.137 //
GP12nardp1_u:14332: deve niveditaṃ paścādbhuñjīta svagaṇaiḥ svayam // NarP_1,67.138 //
GP12nardp1_u:14336: na sāṃgaśayikaṃ tasya durmaterjāyate phalam // NarP_1,67.140 //
GP12nardp1_u:14337: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne tṛtīyapāde devapūjānirūpaṇaṃ nāma saptaṣaṣṭittamo
GP12nardp1_u:14344: sarvānte janamuñcārya tato me vaśamānaya // NarP_1,68.3 //
GP12nardp1_u:14349: ṛṣiṃ śirasi vakre tu chandaśca hṛdi devatām /
GP12nardp1_u:14350: guhye bījaṃ padoḥ śaktiṃ nyasetsādhakasattamaḥ // NarP_1,68.6 //
GP12nardp1_u:14351: ṣaḍdīrghāḍhyena bījena yaṃ ca bījādinā punaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:14354: gāmādyaṃ caiva bhūrlokaṃ nābhyantaṃ pādayornyaset // NarP_1,68.8 //
GP12nardp1_u:14355: gīmādyaṃ ca bhuvarlokaṃ kaṇṭhāntaṃ nābhito nyaset /
GP12nardp1_u:14360: kṣāntaṃ vinyasya mūlena vyāpakaṃ racayetsudhīḥ // NarP_1,68.11 //
GP12nardp1_u:14364: bhāladeśe mukhe kaṇṭhe hṛdi nābhyūrujānuṣu // NarP_1,68.13 //
GP12nardp1_u:14368: tanno dantiḥ pracovarṇā dayāditi vadetpunaḥ // NarP_1,68.15 //
GP12nardp1_u:14370: evaṃ nyāsavidhiṃ kṛtvā dhyāyedevaṃ hṛdaṃbuje // NarP_1,68.16 //
GP12nardp1_u:14380: bhūpuraṃ tadbahiḥ kṛtvā gameśaṃ tatra pūjayet // NarP_1,68.21 //
GP12nardp1_u:14382: agrā tejovatī satyā navamī vidhnanāśinī // NarP_1,68.22 //
GP12nardp1_u:14387: śriyaṃ śriyaḥ patiṃ caiva gaurīṃ gaurī patiṃ tathā /
GP12nardp1_u:14388: ratiṃ ratipatiṃ pāścānmahīpūrva ca potriṇam // NarP_1,68.25 //
GP12nardp1_u:14406: keśareṣu ṣaḍaṅgāni patreṣvaṣṭau tu mātaraḥ // NarP_1,68.34 //
GP12nardp1_u:14416: godugdhena gavāṃ lābho dadhnā sarvasamṛddhimān // NarP_1,68.39 //
GP12nardp1_u:14418: vāsāṃsi labhate hutvā kusuṃbhakusumaiḥ śubhaiḥ // NarP_1,68.40 //
GP12nardp1_u:14420: mūlenādau caturvāraṃ pratyekaṃ ca pratarpayet // NarP_1,68.41 //
GP12nardp1_u:14424: devena sahitāṃ śaktiṃ śaktyā ca sahitaṃ tu tam // NarP_1,68.43 //
GP12nardp1_u:14438: ardhyaṃ dadyāttu mūlānte ṅeṃte gaṇapatiṃ tataḥ // NarP_1,68.50 //
GP12nardp1_u:14440: stutvā natvā visṛjyātha yajeccandramasaṃ punaḥ // NarP_1,68.51 //
GP12nardp1_u:14444: evaṃ vrataṃ yaḥ kurute samyaksaṃvatsarāvadhi // NarP_1,68.53 //
GP12nardp1_u:14448: evaṃ kṛte 'pi pūrvoktaṃ phalamāpnoti niścitam // NarP_1,68.55 //
GP12nardp1_u:14454: dyūte vivāde samare vyavahāre jayaṃ labhet // NarP_1,68.58 //
GP12nardp1_u:14455: bījaṃ varāho binddhāḍhyau manvindvānnau kalau tataḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:14462: padaiḥ sarvaṇa mantreṇa pañcāṅgāni prakalpayet // NarP_1,68.62 //
GP12nardp1_u:14468: vakratuṇḍābhidho bījaṃ vaṃ śaktiḥ kavacaṃ punaḥ // NarP_1,68.65 //
GP12nardp1_u:14470: kṛtvā ṣaḍaṅgamantrārṇānbhrūmadhye ca gale hṛdi // NarP_1,68.66 //
GP12nardp1_u:14471: nāmau liṅge pade nyasyākhilena vyāpakaṃ caret /
GP12nardp1_u:14476: mūrtiṃ mūrtena saṃkalpya tasyāmāvāhya pūjayet // NarP_1,68.69 //
GP12nardp1_u:14478: yajedvidyāṃ vidhātrīṃ ca bhogadāṃ vipraghātinīm // NarP_1,68.70 //
GP12nardp1_u:14486: brahmacārī haviṣyāśī satyavāk ca jitendriyaḥ // NarP_1,68.74 //
GP12nardp1_u:14488: dāridṣaṃ tu parābhūya jāyate dhanadopamaḥ // NarP_1,68.75 //
GP12nardp1_u:14490: aṣṭottaraśataṃ nityaṃ hutvā prāgvatphalaṃ labhet // NarP_1,68.76/
GP12nardp1_u:14492: apūpairvatsare sa syātsamṛddheḥ paramaṃ padam // NarP_1,68.77 //
GP12nardp1_u:14494: haviṣā pā yasānnena naivedyaṃ parikalpayet // NarP_1,68.78 //
GP12nardp1_u:14501: vacāṃ niṣkārddhabhāgaṃ ca tadarddhaṃ vā manuṃ japet /
GP12nardp1_u:14502: viśodhya cūrṇaṃ prasṛtau gavāṃ mūtre vinikṣipet // NarP_1,68.82 //
GP12nardp1_u:14518: sakalaṃ pravadedevaṃ kumārī vā kumārakaḥ // NarP_1,68.90 //
GP12nardp1_u:14520: anye 'pi mantrā devarṣe santi tantre gaṇeśituḥ // NarP_1,68.91 //
GP12nardp1_u:14521: kintvatra yanna sādhyaṃ syātrriṣu lokeṣu sādhakaiḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:14524: śaṭhebhyaḥ paraśiṣyebhyo vañcakebhyo 'pi mā vada // NarP_1,68.93 //
GP12nardp1_u:14527: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne tṛtīyapāde gaṇeśamantravidhānanirūpaṇaṃ nāmāṣṭaṣaṣṭitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:14528: sanatkumāra uvāca atha vakṣye trayīmūrtervidhānaṃ tvabjinīpateḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:14533: devabhāgo muniśchando gāyatrī devatā raviḥ // NarP_1,69.3 //
GP12nardp1_u:14535: satyāya hṛdayaṃ paścādbrahmaṇe śira īritam // NarP_1,69.4 //
GP12nardp1_u:14538: netro jvālā mano huṃ phaṭsvāhāntā manavo gaṇāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:14539: punaḥ ṣaḍarṇairhrī lakṣmyāḥ kṛtvāntaḥ sthaiḥ ṣaḍaṅgakam // NarP_1,69.6 //
GP12nardp1_u:14541: ādityaṃ ca raviṃ paścādbhānuṃ bhāskarameva ca // NarP_1,69.7 //
GP12nardp1_u:14542: sūryaṃ ca mūrdhni vadane hṛdi guhye ca pādayoḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:14563: bhrūmadhye ca tathā bhāle brahmaraṅghre nyasetkramāt // NarP_1,69.18 //
GP12nardp1_u:14571: prathamaṃ pīṭhayajane dharmādīnāṃ sthale yajet // NarP_1,69.22 //
GP12nardp1_u:14575: dīptā sūkṣmā jayā bhadrā vibhūtirvimalā tathā // NarP_1,69.24 //
GP12nardp1_u:14578: svarā bījāni śaktīnāṃ tadādyāḥ pūjayettuḥ tāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:14583: navārṇāya ca manave mūrtiṃ saṃkalpayetsudhīḥ // NarP_1,69.28 //
GP12nardp1_u:14586: saṃpūjya madhye vādityaṃ raviṃ bhānuṃ ca bhāskaram /
GP12nardp1_u:14589: uṣāṃ prajñāṃ prabhāṃ saṃdhyāṃ tato brahmādikānyajet // NarP_1,69.31 //
GP12nardp1_u:14590: purato 'ruṇamabhyarcya somaṃ jñaṃ ca guruṃ bhṛgum /
GP12nardp1_u:14595: samāhito dineśāya dadyādardhyaṃ dine dine // NarP_1,69.34 //
GP12nardp1_u:14597: vidhāya maṇḍalaṃ bhānoḥ pīṭhaṃ pūrvavadarcayet // NarP_1,69.35 //
GP12nardp1_u:14603: kuṅkumaṃ rojanāṃ rājīṃ candanaṃ raktacandanam // NarP_1,69.38 //
GP12nardp1_u:14609: sudhābījaṃ candanena dakṣe karatale likhet // NarP_1,69.41 //
GP12nardp1_u:14614: dṛṣṭiṃ cādhāya manasā pūjayitvā raviṃ punaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:14615: sādhakena svakaikyena mūlamantraṃ dhiyā japan // NarP_1,69.44 //
GP12nardp1_u:14617: dattvā puṣpāñjaliṃ bhūyo japedaṣṭottaraṃ śatam // NarP_1,69.45 //
GP12nardp1_u:14619: tena tuṣṭo dineśo 'smai dadyādvittaṃ yaśaḥ sukham // NarP_1,69.46 //
GP12nardp1_u:14625: evaṃ manuṃ japanvipro duḥkhaṃ naivāpnuyātkvacit // NarP_1,69.49 //
GP12nardp1_u:14633: chandaḥ paṅktistu somo 'sya devatā parikīrtitā // NarP_1,69.53 //
GP12nardp1_u:14642: rohiṇī kṛttikā caiva revatī bharaṇī puraḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:14643: rātrirārdrā tato jyetsnā kalā hārasamaprabhā // NarP_1,69.58 //
GP12nardp1_u:14657: paścime maṇḍale sthitvā pūjādravyaṃ ca madhyame // NarP_1,69.65 //
GP12nardp1_u:14687: ityeka rviśatiḥ proktā mūrtayo bhūsutasya vai // NarP_1,69.80 //
GP12nardp1_u:14698: ācamya deśakālau ca smṛtvā kāmya samuccaran /
GP12nardp1_u:14701: dharātmajaṃ nasorakṣṇoḥ kujaṃ bhaumaṃ lalāṭake // NarP_1,69.87 //
GP12nardp1_u:14703: aṅgārakaṃ śikhāyāṃ ca sarvāṅge ca mahīsutam // NarP_1,69.88 //
GP12nardp1_u:14708: nābhau hṛdi śirasyāraṃ vakre bhūmijameva ca /
GP12nardp1_u:14715: trikoṇeṣu ca sampūjya bahiraṣṭau ca mātṛkāḥ // NarP_1,69.94 //
GP12nardp1_u:14720: maṅgalāya tato mantrī idaṃ mantradvayaṃ paṭhet // NarP_1,69.96 //
GP12nardp1_u:14722: sutārthinī prapannā tvāṃ gṛhāṇārdhyaṃ namo 'stu te // NarP_1,69.97 //
GP12nardp1_u:14724: mahīsuta mahābhāga gṛhāṇārdhyaṃ namo 'stu te // NarP_1,69.98 //
GP12nardp1_u:14728: kumāraṃ śaktihastaṃ ca maṅgalaṃ praṇamāmyaham // NarP_1,69.100 //
GP12nardp1_u:14738: saubhāgyasukhado nityaṃ bhava me dharaṇīsuta // NarP_1,69.105 //
GP12nardp1_u:14744: āpnuvanti śivaṃ sarve sadā pūrṇamanorathāḥ // NarP_1,69.108 //
GP12nardp1_u:14746: prāpnuvanti sukhaṃ tasmai namo dharaṇisūnave // NarP_1,69.109 //
GP12nardp1_u:14748: pūjitaḥ sukhasaubhāgyaṃ tasmai kṣmāsūnave namaḥ // NarP_1,69.110 //
GP12nardp1_u:14767: bhaumasyaiṣā tu gāyatrī japtuḥ sarveṣṭasiddhidā // NarP_1,69.120 //
GP12nardp1_u:14769: phaāntaḥ karṇendusaṃyukto budho ṅeṃte hadantimaḥ // NarP_1,69.121 //
GP12nardp1_u:14771: paṅktiśchaido devatā tu budhaḥ sarveṣṭado nṛṇām // NarP_1,69.122 //
GP12nardp1_u:14773: vande budhaṃ sadā bhaktyā pītāmbaravibhūṣaṇam // NarP_1,69.123 //
GP12nardp1_u:14780: tasyāśu grahajā pīḍā naśyatyeva na saṃśayaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:14789: lakṣaṃ japo daśāṃśena ghṛtenānnena vā hunet // NarP_1,69.131 //
GP12nardp1_u:14791: evaṃ siddhe manau mantrī sādhayediṣṭamātmanaḥ // NarP_1,69.132 //
GP12nardp1_u:14795: sa viṃśatiśataṃ śīghraṃ vāsāṃsi labhate mahīm // NarP_1,69.134 //
GP12nardp1_u:14797: vasraṃ me dehi śukrāya ṭhadvayānto dhruvādikaḥ // NarP_1,69.135 //
GP12nardp1_u:14799: daityejyo devatā bījaṃ dhruvaḥ śaktirvasupriyā // NarP_1,69.136 //
GP12nardp1_u:14803: ayutaṃ prajapenmantraṃ daśāṃśaṃ juhuyād ghṛtaiḥ // NarP_1,69.138 //
GP12nardp1_u:14807: manavo 'mo sadā gopyā na deyā yasya kasyacit // NarP_1,69.140 //
GP12nardp1_u:14808: bhaktiyuktāya śiṣyāya deyā vā nijasūnave // NarP_1,69.141 //
GP12nardp1_u:14809: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne tṛtīyapāde mantravidhānanirūpaṇaṃ nāmaikonasaptatitamo
GP12nardp1_u:14810: sanatkumāra uvāca atha vakṣye mahāviṣṇormantrānlokeṣu durlabhān /
GP12nardp1_u:14815: aṣṭākṣaro manuścāsya sādhyo nārāyaṇo muniḥ // NarP_1,70.3 //
GP12nardp1_u:14816: chandaḥ proktaṃ ca gāyatrī devatā viṣṇukhyayaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:14817: oṃ bījaṃ yaṃ ca tathā śaktirviniyogo 'khilāptaye // NarP_1,70.4 //
GP12nardp1_u:14819: vīrolkāya śikhā proktā dyulkāya kavacaṃ matam // NarP_1,70.5 //
GP12nardp1_u:14829: gale nābhau hṛdi kucapārśvapṛṣṭeṣu tatparāḥ // NarP_1,70.10 //
GP12nardp1_u:14839: athavā vai namontena nyasedityapare jaguḥ // NarP_1,70.15 //
GP12nardp1_u:14844: pāde liṅge hṛdi mukhe mūrdhni vakṣasi hṛtsthale /
GP12nardp1_u:14855: kakudyapi nyasenmantrī mūrtīrdvādaśa vai kramāt // NarP_1,70.23 //
GP12nardp1_u:14856: dhātrā tu keśavaṃ nyasyāryamṇa nārāyaṇaṃ punaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:14857: mitreṇa mādhavaṃ nyasya govindaṃ varuṇena ca // NarP_1,70.24 //
GP12nardp1_u:14860: vāmanaṃ ca tathādraṇa pūṣṇā śrīdharameva ca /
GP12nardp1_u:14862: tvaṣṭrā yutaṃ padmanābhaṃ dāmodaraṃ ca viṣṇunā /
GP12nardp1_u:14863: dvādasārṇaṃ tato mantraṃ samaste śirasi nyaset // NarP_1,70.27 //
GP12nardp1_u:14867: pītāṃbarānte śrīvatsāṃ kitavakṣaḥ sthaleti ca // NarP_1,70.29 //
GP12nardp1_u:14871: evaṃ nyāsavidhiṃ kṛtvā dhyāyennārāyaṇaṃ vibhum // NarP_1,70.31 //
GP12nardp1_u:14877: prathamena tu lakṣeṇa svātmaśuddhirbhaved dhruvam // NarP_1,70.34 //
GP12nardp1_u:14881: tathā ca nirmalaṃ jñānaṃ pañcalakṣajapādbhavet // NarP_1,70.36 //
GP12nardp1_u:14885: evaṃ japtvā tataḥ prājño daśāṃśaṃ sarasīruhaiḥ // NarP_1,70.38 //
GP12nardp1_u:14888: vimalotkarṣiṇī jñānā kriyā yogā tataḥ parā /
GP12nardp1_u:14889: prahvī satyā tatheśānanugrahā navamī matā // NarP_1,70.40 //
GP12nardp1_u:14890: tāro namano bhagavate viṣṇave sarvabhū tataḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:14891: tātmane vāsudevāya sarvātmeti padaṃ vadet // NarP_1,70.41 //
GP12nardp1_u:14895: ādau cāṅgāni saṃpūjya mantrāṇāṃ keśareṣu ca // NarP_1,70.43 //
GP12nardp1_u:14908: raktaṃ vighnaṃ tathāgneye śyāmamāryaṃ ca rākṣase /
GP12nardp1_u:14909: durgāṃ śyāmāṃ vāyukoṇe senānyaṃ pītamaiśvare // NarP_1,70.50 //
GP12nardp1_u:14918: bhāratyā sahitaṃ yo vai dhyāyeddvevaṃ parātparam /
GP12nardp1_u:14921: śaśtraṃ saṃmantrya mantreṇa śabrūnhatvā nivartate // NarP_1,70.56 //
GP12nardp1_u:14925: gāruḍena ca saṃyojya pañcārṇena japettadā // NarP_1,70.58 //
GP12nardp1_u:14937: śanaiśvara dine samyak spṛṣṭvā śvatthaṃ ca pāṇinā // NarP_1,70.64 //
GP12nardp1_u:14939: pañcaviṃśatidhā japtvā nityaṃ prātaḥ pibejjalam // NarP_1,70.65 //
GP12nardp1_u:14945: medhāṃ kavitvaṃ vāksiddhiṃ labhate nātra saṃśayaḥ // NarP_1,70.68 //
GP12nardp1_u:14953: tāro hṛdbhagavān ṅeṃto vāsudevāya kīrtitaḥ // NarP_1,70.72 //
GP12nardp1_u:14957: devatā vāsudevastu bījaṃ śaktirdhruvaśca hṛt // NarP_1,70.74 //
GP12nardp1_u:14959: mūrdhni bhāle dṛśorāsye gale dorhṛdaye punaḥ // NarP_1,70.75 //
GP12nardp1_u:14960: kukṣau nābhau dhvaje jānudvaye pādadvaye tathā /
GP12nardp1_u:14963: pādādārabhya mūrddhānaṃ nyāsaṃ saṃhārakaṃ viduḥ // NarP_1,70.77 //
GP12nardp1_u:14965: bīvaṃ prāṇaṃ tathā cittaṃ hṛtpadmaṃ sūryamaṇḍalam // NarP_1,70.78 //
GP12nardp1_u:14967: saṃkarṣaṇaṃ ca pradyumnamaniruddhaṃ tataḥ param // NarP_1,70.79 //
GP12nardp1_u:14973: pīṭhe pūrvodite mantrī mūrti saṃkalpya mūlataḥ // NarP_1,70.82 //
GP12nardp1_u:14977: tṛtīyāvaraṇe pūjyāḥ proktā dvādaśa mūrtayaḥ // NarP_1,70.84 //
GP12nardp1_u:14984: tāraḥ kāmo ramā paścān ṅeṃtaḥ syātpuruṣottamaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:14986: brahmā muniḥ syādgāyatrī chandaḥ prokto 'tha devatā /
GP12nardp1_u:14999: evamārādhya deveśaṃ prāpnoti mahatīṃ śriyam // NarP_1,70.95 //
GP12nardp1_u:15000: putrānpautrānyaśaḥ kāntiṃ bhuktiṃ muktiṃ ca vindati /
GP12nardp1_u:15003: śrīkārākhyo hariḥ prokto devatā sakaleṣṭadaḥ // NarP_1,70.97 //
GP12nardp1_u:15011: bāhuyugme tathā bāhūṃrājanya iti vinyaset // NarP_1,70.101 //
GP12nardp1_u:15013: nyasetpādadvaye mantrī padbhyāṃ śūdro ajāyata // NarP_1,70.102 //
GP12nardp1_u:15014: cakraṃ śaṅkhaṃ gadāṃ padmaṃ karāgreṣvatha vinyaset /
GP12nardp1_u:15025: tāro hṛdbhagavān ṅeṃto varāheti tataḥ param // NarP_1,70.108 //
GP12nardp1_u:15026: rūpāya bhūrbhuvaḥ svaḥ syāllohitakāmikā ca ye /
GP12nardp1_u:15027: bhūpatitvaṃ ca me dehi dadāpaya śucipriyā // NarP_1,70.109 //
GP12nardp1_u:15031: śikhā tejo 'dhipataye viśvarūpāya varma ca // NarP_1,70.111 //
GP12nardp1_u:15036: āṃ hrīṃ svarṇanibhaṃ jānvoradho nābheḥ sitaprabham /
GP12nardp1_u:15039: evaṃ dhyātvā japellakṣaṃ daśāṃśaṃ sarasīruhaiḥ // NarP_1,70.115 //
GP12nardp1_u:15041: mūlena mūrtiṃ saṅkalpya tasyāṃ sampūjayedvibhum // NarP_1,70.116 //
GP12nardp1_u:15043: japādevāvarni dadyāddhanaṃ dhānyaṃ mahīṃ śriyam // NarP_1,70.117 //
GP12nardp1_u:15045: śilāṃ śuddhāṃ vinikṣipya spṛṣṭvā tāmayutaṃ japet // NarP_1,70.118 //
GP12nardp1_u:15049: mantritāṃ mūlamantreṇa vibhajettāṃ tridhā punaḥ // NarP_1,70.120 //
GP12nardp1_u:15052: samyak śuddhe śuciḥ keśe japanmantraṃ paceñcarum /
GP12nardp1_u:15053: avatārya caruṃ paścādvahnau deyaṃ yathāvidhi // NarP_1,70.122 //
GP12nardp1_u:15065: svarṇābhaṃ pārthive pīte maṇḍale susamāhitaḥ // NarP_1,70.128 //
GP12nardp1_u:15069: vaśyārthaṃ ca sadā dhyāyedvarhyābhaṃ vahnimaṇḍe // NarP_1,70.130 //
GP12nardp1_u:15081: praṇavādau ca ṅentaṃ ca bhagavatīti padaṃ tataḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:15088: nīlāṃbujadvayaṃ śālimañjarīṃ ca śukraṃ karaiḥ // NarP_1,70.139 //
GP12nardp1_u:15090: evaṃ dhyātvā japellakṣaṃ daśāṃśaṃ pāyasena tu // NarP_1,70.140 //
GP12nardp1_u:15092: mūrtiṃ saṃkalpya mūlena tasyāṃ vasumatīṃ yajet // NarP_1,70.141 //
GP12nardp1_u:15094: dikpātreṣu ca sampūjya koṇapatreṣu tatkalāḥ // NarP_1,70.142 //
GP12nardp1_u:15095: nivṛttiśca pratiṣṭā ca vidyānāṃ taiśca tatkalāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:15099: dharamyā vallabhaḥ sa syātsukhī jīvecchataṃ samā /
GP12nardp1_u:15101: tāraḥ kāmo ramā bījaṃ hṛdante puruṣottamaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:15102: śrīkaṇṭhaḥ pratirūpānte lakṣmīti ca nivāsi ca // NarP_1,70.146 //
GP12nardp1_u:15112: praṇavādau ca ṅentaṃ ca bhagavatīti padaṃ tataḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:15121: evaṃ dhyātvā japellakṣaṃ daśāṃśaṃ pāyasena tu // NarP_1,70.140 //
GP12nardp1_u:15123: mūrtiṃ saṃkalpya gūlena tasyāṃ vasumatīṃ yajet // NarP_1,70.141 //
GP12nardp1_u:15125: dikpātreṣu ca sampūjya koṇapatreṣu tatkalāḥ // NarP_1,70.142 //
GP12nardp1_u:15126: nivṛttiśca pratiṣṭā ca vidyānāṃ taiśca tatkalāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:15130: dharaṇyā vallabhaḥ sa syātsukhī jīvecchataṃ samā /
GP12nardp1_u:15132: tāraḥ kāmo ramā bījaṃ hṛdante puruṣottamaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:15133: śrīkaṇṭhaḥ pratirūpānte lakṣmīti ca nivāsiṃ ca // NarP_1,70.146 //
GP12nardp1_u:15150: tato me siddhirābhāsya bhavamante ca varma phaṭ // NarP_1,70.154 //
GP12nardp1_u:15159: kāmadāyeti huṃ procya nyasedvama tataḥ param /
GP12nardp1_u:15160: paramānte bhṛgukarṇābhyāṃ ca sarvapadaṃ tataḥ // NarP_1,70.159 //
GP12nardp1_u:15165: hanayugmaṃ ca hṛdayaṃ bandhanāni tato vadet /
