GP12nardp1_u:22951: dvitīyo 'yaṃ samuditaḥ skandho vyāsena dhīmatā // NarP_1,96.6 //
GP12nardp1_u:22955: satyāścaritamādau tu dhruvasya caritaṃ tataḥ // NarP_1,96.8 //
GP12nardp1_u:22957: ityeṣa turyo gadito visarge skandha uttamaḥ // NarP_1,96.9 //
GP12nardp1_u:22959: brahmāṇḍāntargatānāṃ ca lokānāṃ varṇanaṃ tataḥ // NarP_1,96.10 //
GP12nardp1_u:22971: kṛṣṇasya bālacaritaṃ kaumāraṃ ca vrajasthitiḥ // NarP_1,96.16 //
GP12nardp1_u:22973: bhūbhāraharaṇaṃ cātra nirodhe daśamaḥ smṛtaḥ // NarP_1,96.17 //
GP12nardp1_u:22979: saurī vibhūtiruditā sātvatī ca tataḥ param // NarP_1,96.20 //
GP12nardp1_u:22981: ityevaṃ kathitaṃ vatsa śrīmadbhāgavataṃ tava // NarP_1,96.21 //
GP12nardp1_u:22989: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne caturthapāde śrīmadbhāgavatānukramaṇīnirūpaṇaṃ nāma ṣaṇṇavatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:22990: śrībrahmovāca śṛṇu vipra pravakṣyāmi purāṇaṃ nāradīyakam /
GP12nardp1_u:23003: purāṇalakṣaṇaṃ caiva pramāṇaṃ dānameva ca // NarP_1,97.7 //
GP12nardp1_u:23009: asyottare vibhāge tu praśna ekādaśīvrate // NarP_1,97.10 //
GP12nardp1_u:23019: prabhāsasya ca māhātmyaṃ puṣkarākhyānakaṃ tataḥ // NarP_1,97.15 //
GP12nardp1_u:23025: mohinīcaritaṃ paścādevaṃ paścādevaṃ vai nāradīyakam // NarP_1,97.18 //
GP12nardp1_u:23027: sa yāti brahmaṇo dhāma nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // NarP_1,97.19 //
GP12nardp1_u:23032: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne caturthapāde nāradīyapurāṇānukramaṇīkathanaṃ nāma saptanavatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:23033: śrībrahmovāca atha te saṃpravakṣyāmi mārkaṇḍeyābhidhaṃ mune /
GP12nardp1_u:23034: purāṇaṃ sumahatpuṇyaṃ paṭhatāṃ śṛṇvatāṃ sadā // NarP_1,98.1 //
GP12nardp1_u:23048: manūnāṃ ca kathā nānākīrtitāḥ pāpahārikāḥ // NarP_1,98.8 //
GP12nardp1_u:23053: khanitrasya tataḥ proktā kathā puṇyā mahātmanaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:23058: pururavaḥ kathā puṇyā nahuṣasya kathādbhutā // NarP_1,98.13 //
GP12nardp1_u:23064: yaḥ śṛṇoti naro bhaktyā purāṇamidamādarāt // NarP_1,98.16 //
GP12nardp1_u:23066: yastu vyākurute caitacchaivaṃ sa labhate padam // NarP_1,98.17 //
GP12nardp1_u:23068: kārtikyāṃ dvijavaryāya sa labhendbrahmaṇaḥ padam // NarP_1,98.18 //
GP12nardp1_u:23071: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne caturthapāde mārkaṇḍeyapurāṇānukramaṇīnirūpaṇaṃ nāmāṣṭanavatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:23075: paṭhatāṃ śṛṇvatāṃ caiva sarvapāpaharaṃ nṛṇām // NarP_1,99.2 //
GP12nardp1_u:23083: nyāsādīnāṃ vidhānaṃ ca pratiṣṭhāpūrtakaṃ tataḥ // NarP_1,99.6 //
GP12nardp1_u:23088: jyotiṣaṃ ca tataḥ proktaṃ śāstraṃ yuddhajayārṇavam /
GP12nardp1_u:23089: ṣaṭkarma ca tataḥ proktaṃ mantramantrauṣadhīgaṇaḥ // NarP_1,99.9 //
GP12nardp1_u:23107: gajādīnāṃ cikitsā ca teṣāṃ śāntistataḥ param // NarP_1,99.18 //
GP12nardp1_u:23113: varṇanaṃ narakāṇāṃ ca yogāśtramataḥ param // NarP_1,99.21 //
GP12nardp1_u:23117: tiladhenu yutaṃ cāpi mārgaśīrṣyāṃ vidhānataḥ // NarP_1,99.23 //
GP12nardp1_u:23120: śṛṇvatāṃ paṭhatāṃ caiva nṛṇāṃ ceha paratra ca // NarP_1,99.25 //
GP12nardp1_u:23121: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne caturthapāde 'gnipurāṇānukramaṇīnirūpaṇaṃ nāmaikonaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:23122: śrībrahmovāca atha te saṃpravakṣyāmi purāṇaṃ sarvasiddhidam /
GP12nardp1_u:23125: sṛṣṭyarthaṃ tatra saṃjāto manuḥ svāryabhuvaḥ purā // NarP_1,100.2 //
GP12nardp1_u:23126: sa māṃ praṇamya papraccha dharmaṃ sarvāthasādhakam /
GP12nardp1_u:23127: ahaṃ tasmai tadā prītaḥ prāvocaṃ dharmasaṃhitām // NarP_1,100.3 //
GP12nardp1_u:23128: purāṇānāṃ yadā vyāso vyāsaṃ caktre mahāmatiḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:23129: tadā tāṃ saṃhitāṃ sarvāṃ pañcadhā vyabhajanmuniḥ // NarP_1,100.4 //
GP12nardp1_u:23131: tatrādimaṃ smṛtaṃ parvaṃ brāhmaṃ yatrāstyupakramaḥ // NarP_1,100.5 //
GP12nardp1_u:23135: pustalekhakalekhānāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ ca tataḥ param // NarP_1,100.7 //
GP12nardp1_u:23136: saṃskārāṇāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ cātra kīrtitam /
GP12nardp1_u:23137: pakṣasyāditithīnāṃ ca kalpāḥ sapta ca kīrtitāḥ // NarP_1,100.8 //
GP12nardp1_u:23139: śaive ca kāyato bhinnāḥ saure cāntyakathānvayaḥ // NarP_1,100.9 //
GP12nardp1_u:23143: dharme kāme ca mokṣe tu viṣṇoścāpi śivasya ca // NarP_1,100.11 //
GP12nardp1_u:23144: dvitīyaṃ ca tṛtīye ca saure vargacatuṣṭaye /
GP12nardp1_u:23149: guṇānāṃ tāratamyena samaṃ brahmeti hi śrutiḥ // NarP_1,100.14 //
GP12nardp1_u:23150: taṃ likhitvā tu yo dadyātpauṣyāṃ vidvānvimatsaraḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:23154: yo vai jitendriyo bhūtvā sopavāsaḥ samāhitaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:23156: sa muktaḥ pātakairghoraiḥ prayāti brahmaṇaḥ padam /
GP12nardp1_u:23158: paṭhedvā śṛṇuyāccaitāṃ bhuktiṃ muktiṃ ca vindati // NarP_1,100.19 //
GP12nardp1_u:23159: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne caturthapāde bhaviṣyapurāṇānukramaṇī nirūpaṇaṃ nāma śatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:23160: śrībrahmovāca śṛṇu vatsa pravakṣyāmi purāṇaṃ daśamaṃ tava /
GP12nardp1_u:23193: rahasye rādhayā krīḍā varṇitā bahuvistarā // NarP_1,101.17 //
GP12nardp1_u:23195: kaṃsādīnāṃ vadhe vṛtte kṛṣṇasya dvijasaṃskṛtiḥ // NarP_1,101.18 //
GP12nardp1_u:23200: paṭhitaṃ ca śrutaṃ dhyātaṃ pūjitaṃ cābhivanditam /
GP12nardp1_u:23207: so 'pi kṛṣṇaprasādena labhate vāñchitaṃ phalam // NarP_1,101.24 //
GP12nardp1_u:23208: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne brahmavaivartapurāṇānukramaṇīnirūpaṇaṃ nāmaikottaraśatatamo 'dhyāyāḥ //
GP12nardp1_u:23209: brahmovāca śṛṇu putra pravakṣyāmi purāṇaṃ liṅgasaṃjñitam /
GP12nardp1_u:23218: yogākhyānaṃ tataḥ proktaṃ kalpākhyānaṃ tataḥ param // NarP_1,102.5 //
GP12nardp1_u:23219: liṅgodbhavastadaṃbā ca kīrtitā hi tataḥ param /
GP12nardp1_u:23240: tryaṃbakasya ca māhātmyaṃ purāṇaśravaṇasya ca // NarP_1,102.16 //
GP12nardp1_u:23244: phaālgunyāṃ pūrṇimāyāṃ yo dadyādbhaktyā dvijātaye // NarP_1,102.18 //
GP12nardp1_u:23246: yaḥ paṭecchṛṇuyādvāpi laiṅgaṃ pāpāpahaṃ naraḥ // NarP_1,102.19 //
GP12nardp1_u:23251: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne caturthapāde liṅgapurāṇānukramaṇīnirūpaṇaṃ nāma dvyuttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:23252: brahmovāca śṛṇu vatsa pravakṣyāmi vārāhaṃ vai purāṇakam /
GP12nardp1_u:23254: mānavasya tu kalpasya prasaṃgaṃ matkṛtaṃ purā /
GP12nardp1_u:23256: vyāso hi viduṣāṃ śreṣṭhaḥ sākṣānnārāyaṇo bhuvi /
GP12nardp1_u:23262: gaṇānāṃ ca tathā devyā dhanadasya vṛṣasya ca /
GP12nardp1_u:23267: ityādi kṛtavṛttāntaṃ prathame darśitaṃ mayā // NarP_1,103.8 //
GP12nardp1_u:23279: ityevaṃ tava vārāhaṃ proktaṃ pāpavināśanam // NarP_1,103.14 //
GP12nardp1_u:23286: iti śrībṛhannāradīya purāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne caturthapāde vārāhapurāṇānukramaṇīvarṇanaṃ nāma tryuttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:23287: brahmovāca śṛṇu vatsa pravakṣyāmi purāṇaṃ skandasaṃjñakam /
GP12nardp1_u:23289: purāṇe śatakoṭo tu yacchaivaṃ varṇitaṃ mayā /
GP12nardp1_u:23290: lakṣaṃ tasyārthaṃ jātasya sāro vyāsena kīrtitaḥ // NarP_1,104.2 //
GP12nardp1_u:23293: yaḥ śṛṇoti paṭhedvāpi sa tu sākṣācchivaḥ sthitaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:23294: yatra māheśvarā dharmāḥ ṣaṇmukhena prakāśitāḥ // NarP_1,104.4 //
GP12nardp1_u:23316: vāsudevasya māhātmyaṃ koṭitīrthaṃ tataḥ param // NarP_1,104.15 //
GP12nardp1_u:23324: ityeṣa kathitaḥ skānde khaṇḍo māheśvaro 'dbhutaḥ // NarP_1,104.19 //
GP12nardp1_u:23353: tato mārgasya māhātmye vidhānaṃ snānajaṃ tathā /
GP12nardp1_u:23362: vanānāṃ dvādaśānāṃ ca māhātmyaṃ kīrtitaṃ tataḥ // NarP_1,104.38 //
GP12nardp1_u:23377: somārkā dīni tīrthāni trayodaśa tataḥ param /
GP12nardp1_u:23382: ataḥ paraṃ brahmakhaṇḍaṃ marīce śṛṇu puṇyadam // NarP_1,104.48 //
GP12nardp1_u:23383: yatra vai setumāhātmye phalaṃ snāne kṣaṇodbhavam /
GP12nardp1_u:23402: chatrānandā tathā śāntā śrīmātā ca mataṅginī // NarP_1,104.58 //
GP12nardp1_u:23403: puṇyadā ca samākhyātā yatra devyaḥ samāsthitāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:23422: śravaṇādikapuṇyaṃ ca kīrtitaṃ śarmadaṃ nṛṇām // NarP_1,104.68 //
GP12nardp1_u:23469: ataḥ paraṃ tvavantyākhyaṃ śṛṇu khaṇḍa ca pañcamam ///
GP12nardp1_u:23482: śukre ca pañcame cākhye kuśasthalyāḥ pradakṣiṇāḥ // NarP_1,104.98 //
GP12nardp1_u:23506: kalpe kalpe pṛthaṅ nāma narmadāyāḥ prakīrtitam // NarP_1,104.110 //
GP12nardp1_u:23524: lokeśaṃ dhanadeśaṃ ca maṅgaleśaṃ ca kāmajam // NarP_1,104.119 //
GP12nardp1_u:23530: caṇḍārkaṃ yamatīrthaṃ ca kālhoḍīśaṃ vanādike // NarP_1,104.122 //
GP12nardp1_u:23534: karañjaṃ kāmahaṃ tīrthaṃ bhāṇḍīro rohiṇībhavam // NarP_1,104.124 //
GP12nardp1_u:23537: indreśaṃ kaṃbukeśaṃ ca someśaṃ kohanaṃ śakam /
GP12nardp1_u:23541: śākraṃ saumyaṃ ca nādeśaṃ toyeśaṃ rukmiṇībhavam /
GP12nardp1_u:23555: ṛṇamokṣaṃ bhārabhūti puṅkhāṃ muḍiṃ ca ḍiṇḍimam // NarP_1,104.134 //
GP12nardp1_u:23565: rudrāvartaṃ ca markaṇḍaṃ tīrthaṃ pāpapraṇāśanam // NarP_1,104.139 //
GP12nardp1_u:23569: ataḥ paraṃ nāgarākhyaḥ khaṇḍaḥ ṣaṣṭho 'bhidhīyate // NarP_1,104.141 //
GP12nardp1_u:23581: rāmahradaṃ nāgapuraṃ ṣaāḍliṅgaṃ caiva yajñabhūḥ // NarP_1,104.147 //
GP12nardp1_u:23583: rudraśīrṣaṃ ca yāgeśaṃ vālakhilyaṃ ca gāruḍam // NarP_1,104.148 //
GP12nardp1_u:23593: aṭeśvaraṃ yājñavalkya gauryaṃ gāṇeśameva ca // NarP_1,104.153 //
GP12nardp1_u:23600: bhārgavaṃ caritaṃ caiva vaiśvāmaitraṃ tataḥ param /
GP12nardp1_u:23601: sārasvataṃ paippalādaṃ kaṃsārīśaṃ ca paiṇḍakam // NarP_1,104.157 //
GP12nardp1_u:23605: pauṣkaraṃ naimiṣaṃ dhārmamaraṇya tritayaṃ smṛtam // NarP_1,104.159 //
GP12nardp1_u:23611: nadīnāṃ tritayaṃ gaṅgā narmadā ca sarasvatī // NarP_1,104.162 //
GP12nardp1_u:23623: someśo yatra viśveśor'kasthalaṃ puṇyadaṃ mahat // NarP_1,104.168 //
GP12nardp1_u:23629: varārohā hyajā pālā maṅgalā laliteśvarī // NarP_1,104.171 //
GP12nardp1_u:23661: kapileśasya ca kathā jaradgavaśivasya ca // NarP_1,104.187 //
GP12nardp1_u:23669: mṛgīkuṇḍaṃ ca sarvasvaṃ kṣetre vastrāpathe smṛtam // NarP_1,104.191 //
GP12nardp1_u:23673: bhadrakarṇasya māhātmyaṃ trinetrasya tataḥ param // NarP_1,104.193 //
GP12nardp1_u:23679: kātyāyanyāśca māhātmyaṃ tataḥ piṇḍārakasya ca // NarP_1,104.196 //
GP12nardp1_u:23709: ityeṣa saptamaḥ proktaḥ khaṇḍaḥ prābhāsiko dvijāḥ // NarP_1,104.211 //
GP12nardp1_u:23712: mādhyāṃ satkṛtya viprāya sa śaive modate pade // NarP_1,104.213 //
GP12nardp1_u:23713: iti śrībṛhannāradīya purāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne caturthapāde skandapurāṇānukramaṇīvarṇanaṃ nāma caturadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:23714: brahmovāca śṛṇu vatsa pravakṣyāmi purāṇaṃ vāmanābhidham /
GP12nardp1_u:23731: marutāṃ janmakathanaṃ baleśca caritaṃ tataḥ // NarP_1,105.9 //
GP12nardp1_u:23742: māheśvaryāṃ tu kṛṣṇasya tadbhaktānāṃ ca kīrtanam /
GP12nardp1_u:23745: gāṇeśvaryāṃ gaṇeśasya caritaṃ ca maheśituḥ // NarP_1,105.16 //
GP12nardp1_u:23750: sa cākhyāsyati viprebhyo naimiṣīyebhya eva ca /
GP12nardp1_u:23751: evaṃ paraṃparāprāptaṃ purāṇaṃ vāmanaṃ śubham // NarP_1,105.19 //
GP12nardp1_u:23752: ye paṭhanti ca śṛṇvanti te 'pi yānti parāṃ gatim /
GP12nardp1_u:23756: dehānte bhuktabhogo 'sau yāti viṣṇoḥ paraṃ padam // NarP_1,105.21 //
GP12nardp1_u:23757: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne caturthapāde vāmanapurāṇānukramaṇīvarṇanaṃ nāma pañcādhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:23758: brahmovāca śṛṇu vatsa marīce tvaṃ purāṇaṃ kūrmasaṃjñakam /
GP12nardp1_u:23763: yatra brāhmāḥ purā proktā dharmā nānāvidhā mune // NarP_1,106.3 //
GP12nardp1_u:23765: tatra pūrvavibhāge tu purāṇopakramaḥ purā // NarP_1,106.4 //
GP12nardp1_u:23769: tataḥ saṃkṣepataḥ sargaḥ śāṅkaraṃ caritaṃ tathā // NarP_1,106.6 //
GP12nardp1_u:23777: vārāṇasyāśca māhātmyaṃ prayāgasya tataḥ param // NarP_1,106.10 //
GP12nardp1_u:23779: uttare 'syā vibhāge tu purā gītaiśvarī tataḥ // NarP_1,106.11 //
GP12nardp1_u:23781: nānāvidhānāṃ tīrthānāṃ māhātmyaṃ ca pṛthak tataḥ // NarP_1,106.12 //
GP12nardp1_u:23785: pāda'syāḥ prathame proktā brāhmaṇānāṃ vyavasthitiḥ // NarP_1,106.14 //
GP12nardp1_u:23787: dvitīye kṣattriyāṇāṃ tu vṛttiḥ samyakprakīrtitā // NarP_1,106.15 //
GP12nardp1_u:23795: ityeṣā pañcapadyuktā dvitīyā saṃhitā mune // NarP_1,106.19 //
GP12nardp1_u:23797: ṣoḍhā ṣaṭkarmasirddhi bodhayantī ca kāminām // NarP_1,106.20 //
GP12nardp1_u:23804: brāhmaṇāyā yane dadyātsa yāti paramāṃ gatim // NarP_1,106.24 //
GP12nardp1_u:23805: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne caturthapāde kūrmaparāṇānukramaṇīkathanaṃ nāma ṣaḍuttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:23806: brahmovāca atha mātsyaṃ purāṇaṃ te pravakṣye dvijasattama /
GP12nardp1_u:23807: yatroktaṃ saptakalpānāṃ vṛttaṃ saṃkṣipya bhūtale // NarP_1,107.1 //
GP12nardp1_u:23827: tathaivānaṃ dakaryāśca vrataṃ sārasvataṃ punaḥ // NarP_1,107.11 //
GP12nardp1_u:23857: vāmanasya tu māhātmyaṃ vārāhasya tataḥ param // NarP_1,107.26 //
GP12nardp1_u:23865: yaḥ paṭhecchṛṇuyādvāpi sa yāti bhavanaṃ hareḥ // NarP_1,107.30 //
GP12nardp1_u:23867: viprāyābhyarcya viṣuve sa yāti paramaṃ padam // NarP_1,107.31 //
GP12nardp1_u:23868: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne caturthapāde matsyapurāṇānukramaṇīkathanaṃ nāma saptottaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:23869: brahmovāca marīce śṛṇu vakṣyābhi purāṇaṃ gāruḍaṃ śubham /
GP12nardp1_u:23875: pūjāvidhānaṃ ca tathā vaiṣṇavaṃ pañjaraṃ tataḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:23878: mālāmantraḥ śivārcātha gaṇapūjā tataḥ param // NarP_1,108.5 //
GP12nardp1_u:23896: rogaghnaṃ kavacaṃ viṣṇorgāruḍaṃ traipuro manuḥ // NarP_1,108.14 //
GP12nardp1_u:23900: tarpaṇaṃ vaiśvadevaṃ ca saṃdhyā pārvaṇakarma ca // NarP_1,108.16 //
GP12nardp1_u:23902: pratisaṃkrama uktāḥ sma yugadharmāḥ kṛteḥ phalam // NarP_1,108.17 //
GP12nardp1_u:23912: yamalokasthamārgasya varṇana ca taḥ param // NarP_1,108.22 //
GP12nardp1_u:23916: pretānāṃ caritākhyānaṃ kāraṇaṃ pretatāṃ prati // NarP_1,108.24 //
GP12nardp1_u:23934: kīrtitaṃ pāpaśamanaṃ paṭhatāṃ śṛṇvatāṃ nṛṇām // NarP_1,108.33 //
GP12nardp1_u:23936: sauvarṇahaṃsayugmāḍhyaṃ viprāya sa divaṃ vrajet // NarP_1,108.34 //
GP12nardp1_u:23937: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne caturthapāde gāruḍānukramaṇīvarṇanaṃ nāmāṣṭottaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:23938: brahmovāca śṛṇu vatsa pravakṣyāmi brahmāṇḍākhyaṃ purātanam /
GP12nardp1_u:23941: caturtha upasaṃhāraḥ pādāścatvāra eva hi // NarP_1,109.2 //
GP12nardp1_u:23946: eṣa vai prathamaḥ pādo dvitīyaṃ śṛṇu mānada /
GP12nardp1_u:23973: kārtavīryasya caritaṃ jāmadagnyaṃ tataḥ param // NarP_1,109.18 //
GP12nardp1_u:23978: indrasya tu stavaḥ puṇyaḥ śukreṇa parikīrtitaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:23985: bhaviṣyāṇāṃ manūnāṃ ca caritaṃ hi tataḥ param // NarP_1,109.24 //
GP12nardp1_u:23990: śaivasyātha purasyāpi varṇanaṃ ca tataḥ param /
GP12nardp1_u:23993: anvayavyatirekābhyāṃ varṇanaṃ hi tataḥ param // NarP_1,109.28 //
GP12nardp1_u:23995: catuṣpādaṃ purāṇaṃ te brahmāṇḍaṃ samudāhṛtakam // NarP_1,109.29 //
GP12nardp1_u:23997: brahmāṇḍaṃ yaccaturlakṣaṃ purāṇaṃ yena vaṭhyate // NarP_1,109.30 //
GP12nardp1_u:24001: mattaḥ śrutvā purāṇāni lokebhyaḥ pracakāśire // NarP_1,109.32 //
GP12nardp1_u:24003: mayācedaṃ purāṇaṃ tu vasiṣṭāya puroditam // NarP_1,109.33 //
GP12nardp1_u:24007: ya idaṃ kīrtayedvatsa śṛṇoti ca samāhitaḥ // NarP_1,109.35 //
GP12nardp1_u:24011: sa yādi brahmaṇo lokaṃ nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // NarP_1,109.37 //
GP12nardp1_u:24013: purāṇāni tu saṃkṣepācchrotavyāni ca vistarāt // NarP_1,109.38 //
GP12nardp1_u:24015: kathayedvā vidhānena neha bhūyaḥ sa jāyate // NarP_1,109.39 //
GP12nardp1_u:24019: deyaṃ kadāpi sādhūnāṃ dveṣiṇe na śaṭhāya ca // NarP_1,109.41 //
GP12nardp1_u:24021: nirmatsarāya śucaye deyaṃ sadvaiṣṇavāya ca // NarP_1,109.42 //
GP12nardp1_u:24022: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne caturthapāde brahmāṇḍapurāṇānukramaṇīnirūpaṇaṃ nāma navottaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:24023: nārada uvāca purāṇasūtramakhilaṃ śrutaṃ tava mukhādvibho /
GP12nardp1_u:24024: marūcaye yathā proktaṃ brahmaṇā parameṣṭhinā // NarP_1,110.1 //
GP12nardp1_u:24025: adhunā tu mahābhāga tithīnāṃ vai kathānakam /
GP12nardp1_u:24027: yasminmāse tu yā puṇyā tithiryena uvāsitā /
GP12nardp1_u:24028: yadvidhānaṃ ca pūjādestatsarvaṃ vada sāṃpratam // NarP_1,110.3 //
GP12nardp1_u:24029: sanātana uvāca śṛṇu nārada vakṣyāmi tithīnāṃ te vrataṃ pṛthak /
GP12nardp1_u:24032: śuklapakṣe samagraṃ vai tadā sūryodaye sati // NarP_1,110.5 //
GP12nardp1_u:24038: maṅgalyā ca pavitrā ca lokadvayamukhāvahā // NarP_1,110.8 //
GP12nardp1_u:24042: tataḥ krameṇa devebhyaḥ pūjā kāryā pṛthakpṛthak // NarP_1,110.10 //
GP12nardp1_u:24044: savastraṃ sahiraṇyaṃ ca tato dadyāddijātaye // NarP_1,110.11 //
GP12nardp1_u:24047: ārogyadaṃ nṛṇāṃ vipra tasminneva dine mune /
GP12nardp1_u:24050: atha jyeṣṭhe site pakṣe pakṣatyāṃ divasodaye // NarP_1,110.14 //
GP12nardp1_u:24058: evaṃ bhaktyā samabhyacya dattvā viprāya dakṣiṇām // NarP_1,110.18 //
GP12nardp1_u:24074: idaṃ kṛtvā vrataṃ vipra deva devasya śūlinaḥ // NarP_1,110.26 //
GP12nardp1_u:24080: samarpya gurave bhaktyā śivaloke mahīyate // NarP_1,110.29 //
GP12nardp1_u:24089: itthaṃ kṛtvā vrataṃ vipra sarvasiddhyālayo naraḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:24090: jāyate bhuvi durgāyāḥ prasādānnātra saṃśayaḥ // NarP_1,110.34 //
GP12nardp1_u:24098: naktaṃ viṣṇvarcanaṃ homaiḥ sauvarṇīṃ hutabhuktanum // NarP_1,110.38 //
GP12nardp1_u:24100: evaṃ kṛtvā dhanairdhānyaiḥ samṛddho jāyate bhuvi // NarP_1,110.39 //
GP12nardp1_u:24108: karmaṇā laukikenāpi saṃtuṣṭo hi maheśvaraḥ // NarP_1,110.43 //
GP12nardp1_u:24110: vaiśākhe tu sitādyāyāṃ viṣṇuṃ viśvavihāriṇam // NarP_1,110.44 //
GP12nardp1_u:24112: evaṃ śucisitādyāyāṃ brahmāṇaṃ jagatāṃ gurum // NarP_1,110.45 //
GP12nardp1_u:24116: vratāni tubhyaṃ proktāni bhuktimuktipradāni ca // NarP_1,110.47 //
GP12nardp1_u:24118: bhojane tu haviṣyānnaṃ sāmānyata udāhṛtam // NarP_1,110.48 //
GP12nardp1_u:24119: iti śrībṛhannanāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne caturthapāde dvādaśamāsapratipadvratanirūpaṇaṃ nāma daśottaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:24120: sanātana uvāca śṛṇu vipra pravakṣyāmi dvitīyāyā vratāni te /
GP12nardp1_u:24121: yāni kṛtvā naro bhaktyā brahmaloke mahīyate // NarP_1,111.1 //
GP12nardp1_u:24125: asminneva dine vipra bālendumuditaṃ pare // NarP_1,111.3 //
GP12nardp1_u:24127: atha vāsmindine bhaktyā dasrāvabhyarcya yatnataḥ // NarP_1,111.4 //
GP12nardp1_u:24129: pūrṇayātrāvrate hyasmindadhnā vāpi ghṛtena ca // NarP_1,111.5 //
GP12nardp1_u:24137: bhojayitvā dvijān bhaktyā bhāskaraṃ lokamāpnuyāt // NarP_1,111.9 //
GP12nardp1_u:24139: tasyāṃ rathaṃ samāropya rāmaṃ saha subhadrayā // NarP_1,111.10 //
GP12nardp1_u:24149: gārhasthyaṃ mā praṇāśaṃ me yātu dharmārthakāmada // NarP_1,111.15 //
GP12nardp1_u:24153: āśvine māsi vai puṇyā dvitīyā śuklapakṣagā // NarP_1,111.17 //
GP12nardp1_u:24157: puṣṭipravarddhanaṃ cātra bhaginyā bhojanaṃ gṛhe // NarP_1,111.19 //
GP12nardp1_u:24158: vastrālaṅkārapūrvaṃ tu tasmai deyamataḥ param // NarP_1,111.20 //
GP12nardp1_u:24159: yasyāṃ tithau yamunayā yamarājadevaḥ saṃbhojito nijakarātsvasṛsauhṛdena /
GP12nardp1_u:24160: tasyāṃ svasuḥ karatalādiha yo bhunakti prāpnoti ratnadhanadhānyamanuttamaṃ saḥ // NarP_1,111.21
GP12nardp1_u:24171: samarpya deve bhaktyaiva sa mūrtiṃ pradadeddvije /
GP12nardp1_u:24172: evaṃ kṛte vrate vipra sākṣātsūrya ivoditaḥ // NarP_1,111.27 //
GP12nardp1_u:24174: iha kāmānvarāmbhuktvā yātyante brahmaṇaḥ padam // NarP_1,111.28 //
GP12nardp1_u:24180: prasādya praṇameccaiva sāṣṭāṅgaṃ patito bhuvi // NarP_1,111.31 //
GP12nardp1_u:24184: proktaṃ tadeva kṛṣṇāsu karttavyaṃ vidhikovidaiḥ // NarP_1,111.33 //
GP12nardp1_u:24186: pūjyate hi dvitīyāsu brahmacaryyādi pūrvavat // NarP_1,111.34 //
GP12nardp1_u:24187: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne caturthapāde dvādaśamāsadvitīyāvratanirūpaṇaṃ nāmaikādaśādhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:24188: sanātana uvāca śṛṇu nārada vakṣyāmi tṛtīyāyā vratāni te /
GP12nardp1_u:24191: sauvarṇā rājatīṃ vāpi tāmnīṃ vā mṛṇyayīṃ dvija // NarP_1,112.2 //
GP12nardp1_u:24195: dvijabhāryā bhartṛmatīḥ kanyakāṃ vā sulakṣaṇāḥ // NarP_1,112.4 //
GP12nardp1_u:24199: dhātujāṃ mṛnmayīṃ vā tu nikṣipecca jalāśaye // NarP_1,112.6 //
GP12nardp1_u:24203: strīṇāṃ yathā tathā nānyā vidyate bhuvanatraye // NarP_1,112.8 //
GP12nardp1_u:24208: dve śukle dve tathā kṛṣṇe yugādī kavayo viduḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:24209: śukle pūrvāhnike grāhye kṛṣṇe caiva tapastatha // NarP_1,112.11 //
GP12nardp1_u:24210: dvāparaṃ hi kalirbhādre pravṛttāni yugāni vai /
GP12nardp1_u:24213: yadvā gaṅgāṃbhasi snāto mucyate sarvakilbiṣaiḥ // NarP_1,112.13 //
GP12nardp1_u:24218: atha jyeṣṭhatṛtīyā tu śuklā raṃbheti nāmataḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:24222: dadāti vittaṃ putrāṃśca matiṃ dharme śubhāvahām /
GP12nardp1_u:24224: keśavaṃ tu salakṣmīkaṃ sastrīke tu dvijer'cayet /
GP12nardp1_u:24231: putrāndehi dhanaṃ dehi saubhāgyaṃ dehi suvrate // NarP_1,112.22 //
GP12nardp1_u:24232: anyāṃśca sarvakāmānme dehi dehi namo 'stu te /
GP12nardp1_u:24233: evaṃ saṃprārthya deveśīṃ bhavānīṃ bhavasaṃyutām // NarP_1,112.23 //
GP12nardp1_u:24235: evaṃ ṣoḍaśavarṣāṇi kṛtvā nārī vrataṃ śubham // NarP_1,112.24 //
GP12nardp1_u:24239: sauvarṇīṃ pratimāṃ tatra bhavānyāḥ pratipūjayet // NarP_1,112.26 //
GP12nardp1_u:24244: pratimāṃ gurave dattvā dvijebhyo dakṣiṇāṃ tathā /
GP12nardp1_u:24248: tatastu kāñcane pātre rājate cāpi tāmrake /
GP12nardp1_u:24249: vaiṇave mṛnmaye vāpi vinyasyānnaṃ sadakṣiṇam // NarP_1,112.31 //
GP12nardp1_u:24250: saphalaṃ ca savastraṃ ca dvijāya pratipādayet /
GP12nardp1_u:24257: bhūyasīṃ ca tato dadyādviprebhyo devituṣṭaye // NarP_1,112.35 //
GP12nardp1_u:24258: evaṃ yā kurute nārī vrataṃ saubhāgyavarddhanam /
GP12nardp1_u:24259: sā tu devīprasādena saubhāgyaṃ labhate dhruvam // NarP_1,112.36 //
GP12nardp1_u:24260: yadā tṛtīyā bhādre tu hastarkṣasahitā bhavet /
GP12nardp1_u:24261: hastagaurīvrataṃ nāma taduddiṣṭaṃ hi śauriṇā // NarP_1,112.37 //
GP12nardp1_u:24262: tathā koṭīśvarī nāma vrataṃ proktaṃ pinākinā /
GP12nardp1_u:24265: upavāsena kartavyaṃ varṣe varṣe tu nārada // NarP_1,112.39 //
GP12nardp1_u:24268: tatpakkena tu nirmāya devyā mūrtiṃ suśomanām /
GP12nardp1_u:24275: iti te kathitaṃ vipra koṭilakṣeśvarīvratam // NarP_1,112.44 //
GP12nardp1_u:24285: vāyanāni ca pañcaiva tābhyo dadyācca bhojayet // NarP_1,112.49 //
GP12nardp1_u:24289: gītavādyayutā nadyāṃ gaurīṃ tāṃ tu visarjayet // NarP_1,112.51 //
GP12nardp1_u:24290: āhūtāsi mayābhadre pūjitā ca yathā vidhi /
GP12nardp1_u:24291: mama saubhāgyadānāya yatheṣṭaṃ gamyatāṃ tvayā // NarP_1,112.52 //
GP12nardp1_u:24292: evaṃ kṛtvā vrataṃ bhaktyā dvija devīprasādataḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:24301: devīlokaṃ samāsādya modate ca tayā saha // NarP_1,112.57 //
GP12nardp1_u:24307: prasannā diśati svīyaṃ lokaṃ tu vratatoṣitā // NarP_1,112.60 //
GP12nardp1_u:24310: sarvāsu ca tṛtīyāsu vidhiḥ sādhāraṇo mune /
GP12nardp1_u:24311: devīpūjā viprapūjā dānaṃ homo visarjanam // NarP_1,112.62 //
GP12nardp1_u:24314: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne caturthapāde dvādaśamāsatṛtīyāvratakathanaṃ nāma dvādaśādhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:24315: sanātana uvāca śṛṇu vipraṃ pravakṣyāmi caturthyāste vratānyaham /
GP12nardp1_u:24320: vaiśākhasya caturthyāṃ tu prārthyaṃ saṃkarṣaṇāhvayam // NarP_1,113.3 //
GP12nardp1_u:24322: prāpya saṃkarṣaṇaṃ lokaṃ modate bahukalpakam // NarP_1,113.4 //
GP12nardp1_u:24324: phalaṃ mūlaṃ ca yuthebhyo dattvā svargaṃ labhennaraḥ // NarP_1,113.5 //
GP12nardp1_u:24335: śrāvaṇasya caturthyāṃ tu jāti candrodaye mune // NarP_1,113.11 //
GP12nardp1_u:24341: evaṃ vrataṃ vidhāyātha bhuktvā modakameva ca // NarP_1,113.14 //
GP12nardp1_u:24349: haimaṃ nirmāya gaṇapaṃ tāmrapātropari sthitam // NarP_1,113.18 //
GP12nardp1_u:24356: tataḥ saṃprārathya vighneśamūrtiṃ sopaskarāṃ mune // NarP_1,113.21 //
GP12nardp1_u:24358: kṛtvaivaṃ pañca varṣāṇi samupāsya yathāvidhi // NarP_1,113.22 //
GP12nardp1_u:24364: pañcābdaṃ vādaśābdaṃ vā ṣoḍaśābdamathāpi vā // NarP_1,113.25 //
GP12nardp1_u:24368: atha śukla caturthyāṃ tu siddhavaināyakavratam // NarP_1,113.27 //
GP12nardp1_u:24376: umāputrāya bailvaṃ tu dūrvāṃ gajamukhāya ca // NarP_1,113.31 //
GP12nardp1_u:24380: herambāya tu siṃdūraṃ catirhetre ca patrajam // NarP_1,113.33 //
GP12nardp1_u:24384: ācamayya namaskṛtya saṃprārthya ca visarjjayet // NarP_1,113.35 //
GP12nardp1_u:24386: nivedayecca gurave dvijebhyo dakṣiṇāṃ dadet // NarP_1,113.36 //
GP12nardp1_u:24387: evaṃ kṛtārcano bhaktyā pañca varṣāṇi nārada /
GP12nardp1_u:24389: asyāṃ caturthyāṃ śaśinaṃ na paśyecca kadācana /
GP12nardp1_u:24390: paśyan mithyābhiśāpa tu labhate nātra saṃśayaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:24391: atha taddoṣanāśāya mantraṃ paurāṇikaṃ paṭhet // NarP_1,113.38 //
GP12nardp1_u:24393: sakumāraka mā rodīstava hyeṣa syamantakaḥ // NarP_1,113.39 //
GP12nardp1_u:24400: caturthyāṃ kārtike kṛṣṇe karakākhyaṃ vrataṃ smṛtam // NarP_1,113.43 //
GP12nardp1_u:24406: suvāsinībhyo viprebhyo yathākāmaṃ ca sādaram // NarP_1,113.46 //
GP12nardp1_u:24408: bhuñjīta miṣṭamannaṃ ca vratasya paripūrtaye // NarP_1,113.47 //
GP12nardp1_u:24409: yadvā kṣīreṇa karakaṃ pūrṇaṃ toyena vā mune /
GP12nardp1_u:24413: yāvajjīvaṃ tu vā nāryā kāryyaṃ saubhāgyavāñchayā /
GP12nardp1_u:24422: viṣāṇi naśyantyacirānna daśanti ca pannagāḥ // NarP_1,113.54 //
GP12nardp1_u:24430: tasyopari ghaṭaṃ sthāpya tāmrapātreṇa saṃyutam // NarP_1,113.58 //
GP12nardp1_u:24435: prabhāte vimale snātvā homaṃ kṛtvā vidhānataḥ /'
GP12nardp1_u:24443: tato vyāhṛtibhiḥ śaktyā hutvā pūrṇāhutiṃ caret /
GP12nardp1_u:24446: savatsāṃ gāṃ tato dadyādācāryāya sadakṣiṇām // NarP_1,113.66 //
GP12nardp1_u:24447: anyobhyo 'pi yathāśakti bhūyasīṃ ca tato dadet /
GP12nardp1_u:24449: bandhubhiḥ saha bhuñjīta svayaṃ ca prītamānasaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:24450: etadvrataṃ naraḥ kṛtvā bhuktvā bhogānihottamān // NarP_1,113.68 //
GP12nardp1_u:24454: pauṣamāsacaturthyāṃ tu vighneśaṃ prārthya bhaktitaḥ // NarP_1,113.70 //
GP12nardp1_u:24456: evaṃ kṛte mune bhūyādvratī saṃpattibhājanam // NarP_1,113.71 //
GP12nardp1_u:24466: saśamīpatradadhi ca kṛtvā candrāya dāpayet // NarP_1,113.76 //
GP12nardp1_u:24470: śaktyā saṃbhojya viprāgryānsvayaṃ bhuñjīta cājñayā // NarP_1,113.78 //
GP12nardp1_u:24471: evaṃ kṛtvā vrataṃ vipra saṃkaṣṭākhyaṃ śūbhāvaham /
GP12nardp1_u:24472: samṛddho dhanadhānyaiḥ syānna ca saṃkaṣṭamāpnuyāt // NarP_1,113.79 //
GP12nardp1_u:24474: tasyāṃ tu gaurī saṃpūjyā saṃyuktā yoginīgaṇaiḥ // NarP_1,113.80 //
GP12nardp1_u:24478: payasā pāyasenāpi lavaṇena ca pālakaiḥ // NarP_1,113.82 //
GP12nardp1_u:24480: saubhāgyavṛddhaye deyo bhoktavyaṃ bandhubhiḥ saha // NarP_1,113.83 //
GP12nardp1_u:24485: snānaṃ dānaṃ japo homaḥ sarvamasyāṃ kṛtaṃ mune /
GP12nardp1_u:24488: tilaṣiṣṭairdvijān bhojya svayaṃ cāśnīta mānavaḥ // NarP_1,113.87 //
GP12nardp1_u:24491: sauvarṇaṃ gajavaktraṃ ca kṛtvā saṃpūjya yatnataḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:24494: sāṃgārakā vā viprendra sā viśeṣaphalapradā // NarP_1,113.90 //
GP12nardp1_u:24496: vighneśa eva deveśaḥ saṃpūjyo bhaktitatparaiḥ // NarP_1,113.91 //
GP12nardp1_u:24497: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne caturthapāde dvādśanāsa caturthīvratānirūpaṇaṃ nāma trayodaśādhikasatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:24498: sanātana uvāca śṛṇu vipra pravakṣyāmi pañcamyāste vratānyaham /
GP12nardp1_u:24501: asyāṃ matsyāvatārārcā bhaktaiḥ kāryā mahotsavā // NarP_1,114.2 //
GP12nardp1_u:24504: yo lakṣmīṃ pūjayeccātra taṃ vai lakṣmīrna muñcati /
GP12nardp1_u:24505: pṛthvīvrataṃ tathā cāndraṃ hayagarīvavrataṃ tathā // NarP_1,114.4 //
GP12nardp1_u:24507: atha vaiśākhapañcamyāṃ śeṣaṃ cābhyarcya mānavaḥ // NarP_1,114.5 //
GP12nardp1_u:24511: athāṣāḍhasya pañcamyāṃ vāyuṃ sarvagataṃ mune // NarP_1,114.7 //
GP12nardp1_u:24513: dhvajaṃ ca pañcavarṇaṃ tu vaṃśadaṇḍāgrasaṃsthitam // NarP_1,114.8 //
GP12nardp1_u:24515: tatastanmūladeśe tu dikṣu sarvāsu nārada // NarP_1,114.9 //
GP12nardp1_u:24517: prathamādiṣu yāmeṣu yo yo vāyuḥ pravartate // NarP_1,114.10 //
GP12nardp1_u:24518: tasmai tasmai digīśāya pūjāṃ samyak prakalpayet /
GP12nardp1_u:24520: sāyamāgatya gehaṃ svaṃ bhuktvā svalpaṃ samāhitaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:24522: yaḥ svapno jāyate tasyāṃ rātrau yāme caturthake /
GP12nardp1_u:24523: sa eva bhavitā nūnaṃ svapna ityāha vai śivaḥ // NarP_1,114.13 //
GP12nardp1_u:24533: prātarbhānau samudite pitṝṃścaiva tathā ṛṣīn // NarP_1,114.18 //
GP12nardp1_u:24536: sarvaṃ dinaṃ kṣipedevaṃ pradoṣe tu śivālaye /
GP12nardp1_u:24539: japetpañcākṣarī vidyāṃ śataṃ cāpi sahasrakam // NarP_1,114.21 //
GP12nardp1_u:24544: yāni syustaiḥ samṛddho 'haṃ bhūyāṃ janmani janmani /
GP12nardp1_u:24545: evaṃ saṃprārthya deveśaṃ gṛhamāgatya vai svakam // NarP_1,114.24 //
GP12nardp1_u:24562: bhādre tu kṛṣṇapañcamyāṃ nāgān kṣīreṇa tarpayet // NarP_1,114.33 //
GP12nardp1_u:24572: etaibhyo 'ghya ca vidhivatkalpayitvā pradāya ca // NarP_1,114.38 //
GP12nardp1_u:24576: kṛtvā vratānte varayedācāryān sapta vaidikān // NarP_1,114.40 //
GP12nardp1_u:24582: arghyaṃ datvā tato homaṃ tilavrīhiyavādibhiḥ // NarP_1,114.43 //
GP12nardp1_u:24588: bhojayitvā tu tānbhaktyā praṇipatya visarjayet // NarP_1,114.46 //
GP12nardp1_u:24590: bhuṅktvā vai ṣaḍrasopetaṃ pramudyātsaha bandhubhiḥ // NarP_1,114.47 //
GP12nardp1_u:24594: tasyāḥ svarṇamayīṃ mūrtiṃ śaktyā nirmāya nārada /
GP12nardp1_u:24604: vipraikaṃ bhojayeccāpi tasmai dattvā ca dakṣiṇām /
GP12nardp1_u:24606: yastu vai bhaktisaṃyuktaḥ snānaṃ kuryāj jayādine /
GP12nardp1_u:24607: naśyanti tasya pāpāni siṃhākrāntā mṛgā yathā // NarP_1,114.56 //
GP12nardp1_u:24610: aputro labhate putraṃ vandhyā gabha ca vindati /
GP12nardp1_u:24611: rogī rogātpramucyeta baddho mucyeta bandhanāt // NarP_1,114.58 //
GP12nardp1_u:24613: nāgebhyo hyabhayaṃ labdhvā modate saha bāndhavaiḥ // NarP_1,114.59 //
GP12nardp1_u:24616: pañcamyāṃ pratimāse tu śukle kṛṣṇe ca nārada /
GP12nardp1_u:24617: pitṝṇāṃ pūjanaṃ śastaṃ nāgānāṃ cāpi sarvathā // NarP_1,114.61 //
GP12nardp1_u:24618: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne caturthapāde dvādaśamāsasthapañcamīvratanirūpaṇaṃ nāma caturdaśādhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:24619: sanātana uvāca śṛṇu vipra pravakṣyāmi ṣaṣṭhyāścaiva vratāni te /
GP12nardp1_u:24622: tatreṣṭvā ṣaṇmukhaṃ devaṃ nānāpūjā vidhānataḥ // NarP_1,115.2 //
GP12nardp1_u:24624: vaiśākhaśuklaṣaṣṭhyāṃ ca pūjayitvā ca kārtikam // NarP_1,115.3 //
GP12nardp1_u:24625: labhate mātṛjaṃ saukhyaṃ nātra kāryā vicāraṇā /
GP12nardp1_u:24637: gṛhītvā vaṃśapātre tu dhṛtvā piṇḍākṛtiṃ ca tām /
GP12nardp1_u:24639: paṅkajaṃ karavīraṃ ca nepālīṃ mālatīṃ tathā /
GP12nardp1_u:24640: nīlotpalaṃ ketakīṃ ca saṃgṛhya tagaraṃ tathā // NarP_1,115.11 //
GP12nardp1_u:24642: akṣatāḥ kalikā gṛhya tābhirdevīṃ prapūjayet // NarP_1,115.12 //
GP12nardp1_u:24645: snātvā kanakhale devi harariṃ labdhavatī patim /
GP12nardp1_u:24659: sakhībhiḥ sahitā sādhvī tāṃ rātriṃ prasabhaṃ nayet /
GP12nardp1_u:24662: evaṃ jāgaraṇaṃ kṛtvā saptamyāṃ saritaṃ nayet // NarP_1,115.22 //
GP12nardp1_u:24665: snātvā gṛhaṃ samāgatya hutvā vaiśvānaraṃ tataḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:24671: naro vā yadi vā nārī tasya puṇyaphalaṃ śṛṇu /
GP12nardp1_u:24676: nabhasye māsi yā śuklā ṣaṣṭhī sā candanāhvayā // NarP_1,115.29 //
GP12nardp1_u:24678: rohiṇī pātabhaumaistu saṃyutā kapilā bhavet // NarP_1,115.30 //
GP12nardp1_u:24688: pūjyātra saikatī mūrtiryadvā dvijasatī mudā // NarP_1,115.35 //
GP12nardp1_u:24690: kanyā varaṃ prāpnuyācca vāñcitaṃ putramaṅganā // NarP_1,115.36 //
GP12nardp1_u:24692: kārtike śuklaṣaṣṭhyāṃ tu ṣaṇmukhena mahātmanā // NarP_1,115.37 //
GP12nardp1_u:24694: atastasyāṃ suraśreṣṭhāṃ devasenāṃ ca ṣaṇmukham // NarP_1,115.38 //
GP12nardp1_u:24700: skandena satkṛtiḥ prāptā brahamādyaiḥ parikalpitā // NarP_1,115.41 //
GP12nardp1_u:24704: yadi cetsā samuddiṣṭā caṃpāhvā munisattama // NarP_1,115.43 //
GP12nardp1_u:24712: māghamāse sitā ṣaṣṭhī varuṇāhvā smṛtā tu sā /
GP12nardp1_u:24717: phaālgune śuklaṣaṣṭhyāṃ tu devaṃ paśupatiṃ dvija // NarP_1,115.50 //
GP12nardp1_u:24724: evaṃ kṛta śivārcastu naro nāryathavā mune /
GP12nardp1_u:24725: iha bhuktvā varānbhogānante śivagatiṃ labhet // NarP_1,115.54 //
GP12nardp1_u:24726: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne caturthapāde dvādaśamāsasthitaṣaṣṭhīvratanirūpaṇaṃ nāma pañcadaśādhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:24727: sanātana uvāca śṛṇu nārada vakṣyāmi saptamyāste vratānyaham /
GP12nardp1_u:24728: yāni kṛtvā naro bhaktyā sūryasāyujyamāpnuyāt // NarP_1,116.1 //
GP12nardp1_u:24729: caitre tu śuklasaptamyāṃ bahiḥ snānaṃ samācaret /
GP12nardp1_u:24732: vinyasetpūrvapatre tu devau dvau kṛtadhātukau // NarP_1,116.3 //
GP12nardp1_u:24734: dakṣiṇe ca nyasetpatre tathaiva rākṣasadvayam // NarP_1,116.4 //
GP12nardp1_u:24737: vāyavya yātudhānau dvau uttare ca ṛṣidvayam /
GP12nardp1_u:24741: evaṃ saṃpūjya homaṃ tu ghṛtenāṣṭaśataṃ caret /
GP12nardp1_u:24743: nāmamantreṇa vedyāṃ vā tataḥ pūrṇāhutiṃ dadet /
GP12nardp1_u:24744: dakṣiṇā ca tato deyā dvijebhyaḥ śaktito dvija // NarP_1,116.9 //
GP12nardp1_u:24746: dehānte maṇḍalaṃ bhānorbhattvā gacchetparaṃ padam // NarP_1,116.10 //
GP12nardp1_u:24749: tāṃ tatra pūjayetsnātvā pratyūṣe vimale jale /
GP12nardp1_u:24751: tato ghaṭasahasraṃ tu deyaṃ gaṅgāvrate tvidam /
GP12nardp1_u:24754: tilamātraṃ tu sauvarṇaṃ vidhāya kamalaṃ śubham // NarP_1,116.14 //
GP12nardp1_u:24758: iti saṃprārthya deveśaṃ sūrye cāstamupāgate // NarP_1,116.16 //
GP12nardp1_u:24759: sodakuṃbhaṃ tu tatpadmaṃ kapilāṃ ca dvijer'payet /
GP12nardp1_u:24760: taddine tūpavastavyaṃ bhoktavyaṃ ca pare 'hani // NarP_1,116.17 //
GP12nardp1_u:24762: nibavrataṃ ca tatreva tadvidhānaṃ śṛṇuṣva me // NarP_1,116.18 //
GP12nardp1_u:24766: dvijānpare 'hni saṃbhojya svayaṃ bhuñjīta bandhubhiḥ // NarP_1,116.20 //
GP12nardp1_u:24768: saptamī śarkarākhyaiṣā proktā taccāpi me śṛṇu // NarP_1,116.21 //
GP12nardp1_u:24772: iṣṭā raverataḥ puṇyā śarkarā havyakavyayoḥ // NarP_1,116.23 //
GP12nardp1_u:24776: kartavyaṃ hi prayatnena vratame tadravipriyam // NarP_1,116.25 //
GP12nardp1_u:24777: yaḥ kuryātparāyā bhaktyā sa vai sadgatimāpnuyāt /
GP12nardp1_u:24778: jyeṣṭhe tu śuklasaptamyāṃ jāta indro raviḥ svayam // NarP_1,116.26 //
GP12nardp1_u:24780: svargatiṃ labhate vipra devendrasya prasādataḥ // NarP_1,116.27 //
GP12nardp1_u:24782: jātastaṃ tatra saṃprārcya gandhapuṣpādibhiḥ pṛthak // NarP_1,116.28 //
GP12nardp1_u:24785: kārpāsaṃ tu caturhastaṃ sārddha vastraṃ hi gopateḥ ///
GP12nardp1_u:24788: asyāṃ dānaṃ japo homaḥ sarvaṃ cākṣayyatāṃ vrajet // NarP_1,116.31 //
GP12nardp1_u:24790: somasya tu maheśasya pūjanaṃ cātra kīrtitam // NarP_1,116.32 //
GP12nardp1_u:24794: nālikeraṃ ca vṛntākaṃ nāraṅgaṃ bījapūrakam // NarP_1,116.34 //
GP12nardp1_u:24798: saṃpūjya parayā bhaktyā dhārayedvāmake kare // NarP_1,116.36 //
GP12nardp1_u:24799: strī naro dakṣiṇe caiva yāvadvarṣaṃ samāpyate /
GP12nardp1_u:24800: saṃbhojya viprānsaptaiva pāyasena visṛjyasa tān // NarP_1,116.37 //
GP12nardp1_u:24802: phalāni tāni deyāni saptasvapi dvijeṣu ca // NarP_1,116.38 //
GP12nardp1_u:24803: evaṃ tu sapta varṣāṇi kṛtvopāsya yathāvidhi /
GP12nardp1_u:24804: sāyujyaṃ labhate vipra mahādevasya tadvratī // NarP_1,116.39 //
GP12nardp1_u:24808: tvāmahaṃ dadmi kalyāṇi prīyatāmaryamā svayam // NarP_1,116.41 //
GP12nardp1_u:24810: ityuktvā vedaviduṣe dattvā kṛtvā ca dakṣiṇām // NarP_1,116.42 //
GP12nardp1_u:24812: pacagavyaṃ vrataṃ cetthaṃ vidhāya śvo dvijottamān // NarP_1,116.43 //
GP12nardp1_u:24814: kṛtaṃ hyetadgataṃ vipra subhāṣyaṃ śraddhayānvitaḥ // NarP_1,116.44 //
GP12nardp1_u:24820: visṛjya bandhubhiḥ sārddhaṃ svayaṃ bhuñjīta vāgyataḥ // NarP_1,116.47 //
GP12nardp1_u:24824: ato 'syāṃ pūjanaṃ tasya yathoktavidhinā dvija // NarP_1,116.49 //
GP12nardp1_u:24826: suvarṇadakṣiṇāṃ datvā visṛjyāśnīta ca svayam // NarP_1,116.50 //
GP12nardp1_u:24828: dvijobrāhmaṃ tathā śūdraḥ satkulejanma cāpnuyāt // NarP_1,116.51 //
GP12nardp1_u:24830: upoṣya bhānuṃ triḥsandhyaṃ samabhyarcya dharāsthitaḥ // NarP_1,116.52 //
GP12nardp1_u:24833: pṛthavī vā suvarṇaṃ vā visṛjyāśnīta ca svayam /
GP12nardp1_u:24835: mārtaṇḍākhyaṃ vrataṃ nāma kathayanti dvijāḥ pare /
GP12nardp1_u:24839: sauvarṇaṃ gandhapuṣpādyaiḥ kṛtvā rātrau ca jāgaram /
GP12nardp1_u:24840: pare 'hni viprānsambhojya pāyasena tu sapta vai // NarP_1,116.57 //
GP12nardp1_u:24841: dakṣiṇāṃ nālikerāṇi tebhyo datvā guruṃ tataḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:24842: sauvarṇaṃ tu raverbimbaṃ yuktaṃ dakṣiṇayā nyayā // NarP_1,116.58 //
GP12nardp1_u:24843: samarpya ca bhṛśaṃ prārthya visṛjyādyātsvayaṃ tataḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:24849: asyāṃ samarcya savituḥ pratimāṃ tu haimīṃ haimāśvayuktarathagāṃ tu dadetsahebhām /
GP12nardp1_u:24850: yo bhāvabhaktisahitaḥ sa gato hi lokaṃ śambhoḥ sa modata ihāpi ca bhuktabhogaḥ // NarP_1,116.62
GP12nardp1_u:24853: arkasya ca badaryāśca sapta sapta dalāni vai /
GP12nardp1_u:24855: putrapradaṃ vrataṃ cātra prāhādityaḥ svayaṃ prabhuḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:24859: pūjayedapare cāhni homaṃ kṛtvā dvijāṃ stataḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:24860: dadhyodanena payasā pāyasena ca bhojayet // NarP_1,116.67 //
GP12nardp1_u:24862: labhate sa tu satputraṃ cirāyuṣamanāmayam // NarP_1,116.68 //
GP12nardp1_u:24871: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne caturthapāde dvādaśamāsasthitasappamīvratanirūpaṇaṃ nāma ṣoḍaśādhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:24872: sanātana uvāca śuklāṣṭamyāṃ caitramāse bhavānyāḥ procyate janiḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:24877: caitre māsi sitāṣṭamyāṃ na te śokamavāpnuyuḥ // NarP_1,117.3 //
GP12nardp1_u:24887: jyeṣṭhaśukle tathāṣṭamyāṃ yo devīṃ pūjayennaraḥ // NarP_1,117.8 //
GP12nardp1_u:24889: śuklāṣṭamyāṃ tathā'ṣāḍhe snātvā caiva niśāṃbunā // NarP_1,117.9 //
GP12nardp1_u:24893: bhojayitvā tato viprāndatvā svarṇaṃ ca dakṣiṇām // NarP_1,117.11 //
GP12nardp1_u:24894: visṛjya ca tataḥ paścātsvayaṃ bhuñjīta vāgyataḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:24897: kṣīreṇa snāpayitvā ca miṣṭānnaṃ vinivedayet // NarP_1,117.13 //
GP12nardp1_u:24901: upavāsaṃ tu saṃkalpya snātvā kṛtvā ca naityikam // NarP_1,117.15 //
GP12nardp1_u:24903: kṛṣṇaṃ viṣṇuṃ tathānantaṃ govindaṃ garuḍadhvajam // NarP_1,117.16 //
GP12nardp1_u:24908: ādau madhye tathā cānte homaṃ kuryādvidhānataḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:24911: sauvarṇe tāmrapātre vā mṛnmaye veṇupātrake // NarP_1,117.20 //
GP12nardp1_u:24913: haimīṃ ca pratimāṃ kṛtvā pūjayitvā vidhānataḥ // NarP_1,117.21 //
GP12nardp1_u:24915: dātavyā gauḥ savatsā ca vastrālaṅkārabhūṣitā // NarP_1,117.22 //
GP12nardp1_u:24917: tāśca dadyādvidhijñāya svayaṃ vā bhakṣayedvratī // NarP_1,117.23 //
GP12nardp1_u:24919: daśame 'hni tato mūrtiṃ sadravyāṃ guraver'payet // NarP_1,117.24 //
GP12nardp1_u:24921: dadyādeva daśābdaṃ tu kṛtvā vratamanuttamam // NarP_1,117.25 //
GP12nardp1_u:24923: ante kṛṣṇasya sāyujyaṃ labhate nātra saṃśayaḥ // NarP_1,117.26 //
GP12nardp1_u:24927: upavāsī tilaiḥ snāto nadyādau vimale jale // NarP_1,117.28 //
GP12nardp1_u:24929: tanmadhye kalaśaṃ sthāpya tāmrajaṃ vāpi mṛnmayam // NarP_1,117.29 //
GP12nardp1_u:24931: haimīṃ vastrayugācchannāṃ kṛṣṇasya pratimāṃ śubham // NarP_1,117.30 //
GP12nardp1_u:24933: devakīṃ vasudevaṃ ca yaśodāṃ nandameva ca // NarP_1,117.31 //
GP12nardp1_u:24935: tata ārārtikaṃ kṛtvā kṣamāpyānamya bhaktitaḥ // NarP_1,117.32 //
GP12nardp1_u:24938: dhānyākaṃ ca yavānīṃ ca śuṇṭhīṃ khaṇḍaṃ ca nārada /
GP12nardp1_u:24939: sājyaṃ raupye dhṛtaṃ pātre naivedyaṃ vinivedayet // NarP_1,117.34 //
GP12nardp1_u:24945: datvā ca dakṣiṇāṃ tebhyo visṛjettuṣṭamānasaḥ // NarP_1,117.37 //
GP12nardp1_u:24947: gurave dakṣiṇāṃ datvā visṛjyāśrīta ca svayam // NarP_1,117.38 //
GP12nardp1_u:24951: kṛtena yena labhyeta koṭyaikādaśakaṃ phalam // NarP_1,117.40 //
GP12nardp1_u:24955: śakto bhaktaścopavāsaṃ pare 'hni vidhinā tataḥ // NarP_1,117.42 //
GP12nardp1_u:24957: kṛtvā svayaṃ ca bhuñjītaṃ vratamevaṃ samāpayet // NarP_1,117.43 //
GP12nardp1_u:24959: rahasyaṃ goṣṭhajaṃ labdhvā rādhāparikare vaset // NarP_1,117.44 //
GP12nardp1_u:24960: dūrvāṣṭamīvrataṃ cātra kathitaṃ tacca me śṛṇu /
GP12nardp1_u:24961: śucau deśe prajātāyāṃ dvarvāyāṃ dvijasattama // NarP_1,117.45 //
GP12nardp1_u:24962: sthāpya liṅgaṃ tato gandhaiḥ puṣpairdhūpaiśca dīpakaiḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:24969: tataḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya viprānsaṃbhojya tatra vai // NarP_1,117.49 //
GP12nardp1_u:24970: bhuktvā svayaṃ gṛhaṃ gacchedatvā vipreṣu dakṣiṇām /
GP12nardp1_u:24971: phalāni ca praśastāni miṣṭāni surabhīṇi ca // NarP_1,117.50 //
GP12nardp1_u:24972: evaṃ puṇyā pāpaharā nṛṇā dūrvāṣṭamī dvija /
GP12nardp1_u:24974: yā na pūjayate dūrvā nārī mohādyathāvidhi /
GP12nardp1_u:24975: janmāni trīṇi vaidhavyaṃ labhate sā na saṃśayaḥ // NarP_1,117.52 //
GP12nardp1_u:24977: jyeṣṭhā nāmnī tu sā jñeyā pūjitā pāpanāśinī // NarP_1,117.53 //
GP12nardp1_u:24981: tadavighnena me yātu samāptiṃ tvatprasādataḥ // NarP_1,117.55 //
GP12nardp1_u:24982: ityuccārya tato baddhā ḍoraka dakṣiṇe kare /
GP12nardp1_u:24997: pīyūṣadhāma rohiṇyāḥ sahitār'ghyaṃ gṛhāṇa me // NarP_1,117.63 //
GP12nardp1_u:25001: reṇuke trāhi māṃ devi rāmamātaḥ śivaṃ kuru // NarP_1,117.65 //
GP12nardp1_u:25007: candanaṃ tālapatraṃ ca puṣpamālāṃ tathākṣatān // NarP_1,117.68 //
GP12nardp1_u:25008: durvāṃ kausumbhasūtraṃ ca yugaṃ śrīphalameva vā /
GP12nardp1_u:25009: bhakṣyāṇi ca nave śūrpe pratidravyaṃ tu ṣoḍaśa // NarP_1,117.69 //
GP12nardp1_u:25017: etadvrataṃ mahālakṣmyāḥ kṛtvā vipra vidhānataḥ // NarP_1,117.73 //
GP12nardp1_u:25019: eṣāṣokāṣṭamī coktā yasyāṃ pūrṇaṃ ramāvratam // NarP_1,117.74 //
GP12nardp1_u:25022: yatra kutrāpi saṃjātā nātra kāryā vicāraṇā /
GP12nardp1_u:25023: āśvine śuklapakṣe tu proktā vipra mahāṣṭamī // NarP_1,117.76 //
GP12nardp1_u:25025: upavāsaṃ caikabhaktaṃ mahāṣṭamyāṃ vidhāya tu // NarP_1,117.77 //
GP12nardp1_u:25027: ūrjje kṛṣṇādike 'ṣṭamyāṃ karakākhyaṃ vrataṃ smṛtam // NarP_1,117.78 //
GP12nardp1_u:25029: candrodayer'ghadānaṃ ca vidheyaṃ vratibhiḥ sadā // NarP_1,117.79 //
GP12nardp1_u:25031: gopāṣṭamīti saṃproktā kārtike dhavale dale // NarP_1,117.80 //
GP12nardp1_u:25039: vratametannaraḥ kṛtvā nārī vā vidhipūrvakam // NarP_1,117.84 //
GP12nardp1_u:25040: putraṃ sallakṣaṇopetaṃ labhate nātra saṃśayaḥ // NarP_1,117.85 //
GP12nardp1_u:25042: upoṣya jāgaraṃ kṛtvā mahāpāpaiḥ pramucyate // NarP_1,117.86 //
GP12nardp1_u:25047: śuklāṣṭamyāṃ tu pauṣasya śivaṃ sampūjya bhaktitaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:25055: śuklāṣṭamyāṃ phaālgunasya śivaṃ cāpi śivāṃ dvija /
GP12nardp1_u:25059: śītale tvaṃ jaganmātā śītale tvaṃ jagatpitā /
GP12nardp1_u:25060: śītale tvaṃ jagadvātrī śītalāyai namonamaḥ // NarP_1,117.95 //
GP12nardp1_u:25063: śītale śītale cetthaṃ ye japanti jale lthitāḥ //ṭha
GP12nardp1_u:25064: teṣāṃ tu śītalā devī syādvisphoṭakaśāntidā // NarP_1,117.97 //
GP12nardp1_u:25066: tasya varṣaṃ bhavecchāntiḥ śītalāyāḥ prasādataḥ // NarP_1,117.98 //
GP12nardp1_u:25068: śivāṃ vāpiśivaṃ prārcyalabhate vāñchitaṃ phalam // NarP_1,117.99 //
GP12nardp1_u:25069: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne caturthapāde dvādaśamāsasthitāṣṭamīvratakathanaṃ nāma saptadaśādhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:25070: sanātana uvāca atha vakṣyāmi viprendra navamyāste vratāni vai /
GP12nardp1_u:25071: yāni kṛtvā narā loke labhante vāñchitaṃ phalam // NarP_1,118.1 //
GP12nardp1_u:25077: eva yaḥ kurute bhaktyā śrīrāmanavamīvratam // NarP_1,118.4 //
GP12nardp1_u:25078: vidhūya cehapāpāni vraje dviṣṇoḥ paraṃ padam /
GP12nardp1_u:25079: uktaṃ mātṛvrataṃ cātra bhairaveṇa samanvitāḥ // NarP_1,118.5 //
GP12nardp1_u:25081: atraiva bhadrakālo tu yoginīnāṃ mahābalā // NarP_1,118.6 //
GP12nardp1_u:25085: vidhinā sa vimānena devataiḥ saha modate // NarP_1,118.8 //
GP12nardp1_u:25091: āṣāḍhe māsi viprendra yaḥ kuryātpakṣayordvija // NarP_1,118.11 //
GP12nardp1_u:25093: sa bhavedvai valoke tu bhogabhāragdevayānagaḥ // NarP_1,118.12 //
GP12nardp1_u:25095: pakṣayorupavāsaṃ vā kaumārīṃ caṇḍikāṃ yajet // NarP_1,118.13 //
GP12nardp1_u:25099: sa vimānena gacchedvai devīlokaṃ sanātanam // NarP_1,118.15 //
GP12nardp1_u:25100: bhādre tu navamī śuklā nandāhvā parikīrtitā /
GP12nardp1_u:25105: tato niśāyāṃ prāgyāme khaḍgaṃ dhanuriṣūngadām // NarP_1,118.18 //
GP12nardp1_u:25106: śūlaṃ śaktiṃ ca paraśuṃ chirikāṃ carma kheṭakam /
GP12nardp1_u:25107: chatraṃ dhvajaṃ gajaṃ cāśva govṛṣaṃ pustakaṃ tulām // NarP_1,118.19 //
GP12nardp1_u:25109: saṃpūjya mahiṣaṃ tatra bhadrakālyai samālabhet // NarP_1,118.20 //
GP12nardp1_u:25110: evaṃ baliṃ vidhāyātha bhuktvā pakkānna meva ca /
GP12nardp1_u:25111: dvijebhyo dakṣiṇāṃ datvā vrataṃ tatra samāpayet // NarP_1,118.21 //
GP12nardp1_u:25116: devānāṃ ca ṛṣīṇāṃ ca pitṝṇāṃ cāpi nārada /
GP12nardp1_u:25119: svayaṃ bhuktvā ca vihareddvijebhyo dattadakṣiṇaḥ // NarP_1,118.25 //
GP12nardp1_u:25120: evaṃ yaḥ kurute bhaktyā japadānaṃ dvijārcanam /
GP12nardp1_u:25121: homaṃ ca sarvamakṣayyaṃ bhavediti vidhervayaḥ // NarP_1,118.26 //
GP12nardp1_u:25125: pauṣe śuklanavamyāṃ tu mahāmāyāṃ prapūjayet // NarP_1,118.28 //
GP12nardp1_u:25127: māghamāse tu vā śuklā navamī lokapūjitā // NarP_1,118.29 //
GP12nardp1_u:25129: tasyāṃ snānaṃ tathā dānaṃ japo homa upoṣaṇam // NarP_1,118.30 //
GP12nardp1_u:25135: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne caturthapāde dvādaśamāsasthitanavamīvratakathanaṃ nāmāṣṭādaśādhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:25136: sanātana uvāca atha te 'haṃ pravakṣyāmi daśamyā vai vratāni ca /
GP12nardp1_u:25137: yāni kṛtvā naro bhaktyā dharmarājapriyo bhavet // NarP_1,119.1 //
GP12nardp1_u:25147: labhate vaiṣṇavaṃ lokaṃ nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // NarP_1,119.6 //
GP12nardp1_u:25148: jyeṣṭhe śukladaśamyāṃ tu jāhnavī saritāṃ varā /
GP12nardp1_u:25149: samāyātā dharāṃ svargāttasmātsā puṇyadā smṛtā // NarP_1,119.7 //
GP12nardp1_u:25150: jyeṣṭhaḥ śukladalaṃ hasto budhaśca daśamīḥ tithiḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:25153: harate daśa pāpāni tasmāddaśaharaḥ smṛtaḥ // NarP_1,119.9 //
GP12nardp1_u:25154: asyāṃ yo jāhnavīṃ prāpya snāti saṃprītamānasaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:25155: vidhinā jāhnavītoye sa yāti harimandiram // NarP_1,119.10 //
GP12nardp1_u:25157: tasyāṃ snānaṃ japo dānaṃ homo vā svargatipradāḥ // NarP_1,119.11 //
GP12nardp1_u:25159: asyāṃ śivārcanaṃ śastaṃ gandhādyai rupacārakaiḥ // NarP_1,119.12 //
GP12nardp1_u:25160: tatropavāso naktaṃ vā dvijānāṃ bhojanaṃ japaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:25161: hemno dāna ca dhenvādeḥ sarvapāpapraṇāśanam // NarP_1,119.13 //
GP12nardp1_u:25163: vrataṃ daśāvatārākhyaṃ tatra snānaṃ jalāśaye // NarP_1,119.14 //
GP12nardp1_u:25166: matsyaṃ kūrmaṃ varāhaṃ ca narasiṃhaṃ trivikramam /
GP12nardp1_u:25167: rāmaṃ rāmaṃ ca kṛṣṇaṃ ca bauddhaṃ kalkinameva ca // NarP_1,119.16 //
GP12nardp1_u:25171: visṛjya paścādbhuñjīta svayaṃ sveṣṭaiḥ samāhitaḥ // NarP_1,119.18 //
GP12nardp1_u:25179: kinnaṃ dhānyaṃ saraupyaṃ tu dhṛtvā dhautāṃśukāvṛtam // NarP_1,119.22 //
GP12nardp1_u:25183: evaṃ kṛtvā vidhānaṃ tu naro varṣaṃ suravānvitaḥ // NarP_1,119.24 //
GP12nardp1_u:25186: pūrvadikṣu śamīṃ vipra gatvā tanmūlajāṃ mṛdam /
GP12nardp1_u:25188: saṃpūjya tāṃ vidhānena sajjīkṛtya svakaṃ balam /
GP12nardp1_u:25191: manasā kalpitāṃ vāpi svarṇaṃ puṃravaṃśareṇa vai // NarP_1,119.28 //
GP12nardp1_u:25195: dhanaṃ jayaṃ sutān gāśca gajāśvaṃ vāpyajāvikam // NarP_1,119.30 //
GP12nardp1_u:25197: daśamyāṃ kārtike śukle sārvabhaumavrataṃ caret // NarP_1,119.31 //
GP12nardp1_u:25199: daśadikṣu baliṃ dadyād gṛhadvāpi purādbrahiḥ // NarP_1,119.32 //
GP12nardp1_u:25202: yo me pūrvagataḥ pāpmā pāpakeneha karmaṇā /
GP12nardp1_u:25204: yo me vahnigataḥ pāpmā pāpakeneha karmaṇā /
GP12nardp1_u:25206: yo me dakṣagataḥ pāpmā pāpakeneha karmaṇā /
GP12nardp1_u:25207: taṃ yamaḥ pretarājo vai nāśayatvakhileṣṭadaḥ // NarP_1,119.36 //
GP12nardp1_u:25208: yo me nairṛtigaḥ pāpmā pāpakeneha karmaṇā /
GP12nardp1_u:25212: yo me vāyugataḥ pāpmā pāpakeneha karmaṇā /
GP12nardp1_u:25214: yo me saumyagataḥ pāpmā pāpakeneha karmaṇā /
GP12nardp1_u:25216: yo ma īśagataḥ pāpmā pāpakeneha karmaṇā /
GP12nardp1_u:25218: yo maṃ ūrddhvagataḥ pāpmā pāpakeneha karmaṇā /
GP12nardp1_u:25222: ityevaṃ dikṣu daśasu baliṃ datvā samāhitaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:25227: dvādaśābhyarcya saṃbhojya śaktito dakṣiṇāṃ dadet // NarP_1,119.46 //
GP12nardp1_u:25229: yugaṃ svargasukhaṃ bhuktvā sārvabhaumo nṛpo bhavet // NarP_1,119.47 //
GP12nardp1_u:25233: etatkṛtvā vrataṃ vipra hyārogyaṃ prāpya bhūtale // NarP_1,119.49 //
GP12nardp1_u:25235: pauṣe daśamyāṃ śuklāyāṃ viśvedevān samarcayet // NarP_1,119.50 //
GP12nardp1_u:25236: ṛtuṃ dakṣaṃ vasū6nsatyaṃ kālaṃ kāmaṃ muniṃ gurum /
GP12nardp1_u:25237: vipraṃ rāmaṃ ca daśadhā keśavastānsamāsthitaḥ // NarP_1,119.51 //
GP12nardp1_u:25241: dakṣiṇāṃ tāṃ dvijāgryebhyo gurave vā samarpayet // NarP_1,119.53 //
GP12nardp1_u:25242: evaṃ kṛtavidhi ścaikabhakto bhogī vratī bhavet /
GP12nardp1_u:25243: lokadvayasya viprarṣe nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // NarP_1,119.54 //
GP12nardp1_u:25247: ātmā hyāyurmano dakṣo madaḥ prāṇastathaiva ca // NarP_1,119.56 //
GP12nardp1_u:25248: barhiṣmāṃśca gaviṣṭhaśca dattaḥ satyaśca te daśa /
GP12nardp1_u:25261: gṛhāṇārghyaṃ mayā dattaṃ bhaktyā māmanukaṃpaya // NarP_1,119.63 //
GP12nardp1_u:25263: raupyāṃ sudakṣiṇāṃ datvā visṛjyāśnīta ca svayam // NarP_1,119.64 //
GP12nardp1_u:25267: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne caturthapāde dvādaśamāsasthitadaśamīvratanirūpaṇaṃ nāmaikonaviṃśatyadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:25268: sanātana uvāca ekādaśyāṃ tu dalayornirāhāraḥ samāhitaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:25269: nānāpuṣpairmune kṛtvā vicitraṃ maṇḍapaṃ śubham // NarP_1,120.1 //
GP12nardp1_u:25275: rātrau jāgaraṇaṃ kṛtvā yāti viṣṇoḥ paraṃ padam // NarP_1,120.4 //
GP12nardp1_u:25280: datvā ca dakṣiṇāṃ tebhyo visṛjyāśnīta ca svayam ///
GP12nardp1_u:25281: iyaṃ tu kāmadā nāma sarvapātakanāśinī // NarP_1,120.7 //
GP12nardp1_u:25287: sarvapāpa vinirmukto vaiṣṇavaṃ labhate padvam // NarP_1,120.10 //
GP12nardp1_u:25289: snātvā pare 'hni saṃpūjya gandhādyaiḥ puruṣottamam // NarP_1,120.11 //
GP12nardp1_u:25291: jeṣṭhasya kṛṣṇakādaśyāṃ samupoṣya parāṃ nṛpa // NarP_1,120.12 //
GP12nardp1_u:25293: tato dvijāgryānsaṃbhojya datvā tebhyaśca dakṣiṇām // NarP_1,120.13 //
GP12nardp1_u:25295: jyeṣṭhasya śuklaikādaśyāṃ nirjalāṃ samupoṣya tu // NarP_1,120.14 //
GP12nardp1_u:25305: upoṣya tasmin divase vidhivanmaṇḍape śubhe // NarP_1,120.19 //
GP12nardp1_u:25309: tataḥ pañcāmṛtaiḥ snāpya mantraiḥ śuddhajalena ca // NarP_1,120.21 //
GP12nardp1_u:25313: vibuddhe tvayi buddhaṃ ca jagatsarvaṃ carācaram // NarP_1,120.23 //
GP12nardp1_u:25319: tataḥ prabhṛti viprendra gandhādyaiḥ pratyahaṃ yajet // NarP_1,120.26 //
GP12nardp1_u:25325: upacāraiḥ ṣoḍaśa bhistataḥ saṃbhojya vai dvijān // NarP_1,120.29 //
GP12nardp1_u:25326: datvā ca dakṣiṇāṃ tebhyo visṛjyāśnīta bāndhavaiḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:25328: sa sarvakāmāṃllabdhveha yāti viṣṇoḥ paraṃ padam /
GP12nardp1_u:25329: ekādaśyāṃ nabhaḥśukle pavitrāṃ samupoṣya vai // NarP_1,120.31 //
GP12nardp1_u:25332: datvā ca dakṣiṇāṃ tebhyaḥ putraṃ prāpyeha sadguṇam /
GP12nardp1_u:25345: tataḥ prabhāpte dvādaśyāṃ gandhādyairarcya vāmanam // NarP_1,120.39 //
GP12nardp1_u:25347: evaṃ yaḥ kurute vipra padmāvratamanuttamam // NarP_1,120.40 //
GP12nardp1_u:25348: bhuktiṃ prāpyeha muktiṃ tu labhateṃ'te prapañcataḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:25349: iṣasya kṛṣṇaikā daśyāmindirāṃ samupoṣya vai // NarP_1,120.41 //
GP12nardp1_u:25351: viṣṇoḥ prītikaraṃ vipra tataḥ prātarharerdine // NarP_1,120.42 //
GP12nardp1_u:25353: visṛjya dakṣiṇāṃ datvā tāṃstato 'śnīta ca svayam // NarP_1,120.43 //
GP12nardp1_u:25355: pitṝṇāṃ koṭimuddhṛtya yātyante vaiṣṇavaṃ gṛham // NarP_1,120.44 //
GP12nardp1_u:25359: bhaktyā praṇamya visṛjedaśnīyācca svayaṃ tataḥ // NarP_1,120.46 //
GP12nardp1_u:25360: evaṃ yaḥ kurute bhaktyā naraḥ pāśāṅkuśāvratam /
GP12nardp1_u:25361: sa bhuktveha varānbhogānyāti viṣṇoḥ salokatām // NarP_1,120.47 //
GP12nardp1_u:25367: vyomayānena sāṃnidhyaṃ labhate ca ramāpateḥ // NarP_1,120.50 //
GP12nardp1_u:25373: snātvā nityakriyāṃ kṛtvā gadādāmodaraṃ yajet // NarP_1,120.53 //
GP12nardp1_u:25377: evaṃ yaḥ kurute bhaktyā bodhinīvratamādṛtaḥ // NarP_1,120.55 //
GP12nardp1_u:25381: tataḥ saṃbhojya viprāgryāndatvā tebhyaśca dakṣiṇām // NarP_1,120.57 //
GP12nardp1_u:25384: sa vimānaṃ samāruhya yātyante vaiṣṇavaṃ padam /
GP12nardp1_u:25385: mārgasya śuklaikādaśyāṃ mokṣākhyāṃ samupoṣya vai // NarP_1,120.59 //
GP12nardp1_u:25388: visṛjya dakṣiṇāṃ datvā svayaṃ bhuñjīta bāndhavaiḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:25389: evaṃ kṛtvā vrataṃ vipra bhuktvā bhogānihepsitān // NarP_1,120.61 //
GP12nardp1_u:25394: evaṃ kṛtvā vrataṃ vipra saphalāyā vidhānataḥ // NarP_1,120.63 //
GP12nardp1_u:25396: pauṣasya śuklaikādaśyāṃ putradāṃ samupoṣya vai // NarP_1,120.64 //
GP12nardp1_u:25398: tataḥ saṃbhojya viprāgryāndatvā tebhyastu dakṣiṇām // NarP_1,120.65 //
GP12nardp1_u:25400: evaṃ kṛtavrato vipra bhukvā bhogānihepsitān // NarP_1,120.66 //
GP12nardp1_u:25402: māghamya kṛṣṇaikādaśyāṃ ṣaṭtilāṃ samupoṣya vai // NarP_1,120.67 //
GP12nardp1_u:25403: snātvā datvā tarpayitvā hutvā bhuktvā samarcya ca /
GP12nardp1_u:25404: tilaireva dvijaśreṣṭha dvādaśyāṃ prātareva hi // NarP_1,120.68 //
GP12nardp1_u:25407: evaṃ kṛtvā vrataṃ vipra vidhinā susamāhitaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:25411: bhojayitvā dakṣiṇāṃ ca datvā viprānvisṛjya ca /
GP12nardp1_u:25412: svayaṃ bhuñjīta taccheṣaṃ prayato nijabāndhavaiḥ // NarP_1,120.72 //
GP12nardp1_u:25413: ya evaṃ kurute vipra vrataṃ keśavatoṣaṇam /
GP12nardp1_u:25414: sa bhuktveha varānbhogānante viṣṇoḥ padaṃ vrajet // NarP_1,120.73 //
GP12nardp1_u:25418: visṛjya bāndhavaiḥ sārddhaṃ svayamaśnīta vāgyataḥ // NarP_1,120.75 //
GP12nardp1_u:25420: dehānte vaiṣṇavaṃ lokaṃ yāti devaiḥ susatkṛtaḥ // NarP_1,120.76 //
GP12nardp1_u:25426: sitaikādaśyāṃ tapasye vrajedviṣṇoḥ paraṃ padam // NarP_1,120.79 //
GP12nardp1_u:25430: datvā tebhyo visṛjyātha svayaṃ bhuñjīta bāndhavaiḥ // NarP_1,120.81 //
GP12nardp1_u:25432: sa yāti vaiṣṇavaṃ lokaṃ vimānena tu bhāsvatā // NarP_1,120.82 //
GP12nardp1_u:25433: itthaṃ kṛṣṇo tathā śukle vrataṃ caikādaśībhavam /
GP12nardp1_u:25434: mokṣadaṃ kīrtitaṃ vipra nāstyasminsaṃśayaḥ kvacit // NarP_1,120.83 //
GP12nardp1_u:25436: sarvavratottamaṃ vipra tato jñeyaṃ mahāphalam // NarP_1,120.84 //
GP12nardp1_u:25442: daśamyāṃ daśa vastūni varjayedvaiṣṇavaṛ sadā // NarP_1,120.87 //
GP12nardp1_u:25443: dyūtakrīḍāṃ ca nidrāṃ ca tāṃbūlaṃ dantadhāvanam /
GP12nardp1_u:25444: parāpavādaṃ paiśunyaṃ steyaṃ hiṃsāṃ tathā ratim // NarP_1,120.88 //
GP12nardp1_u:25446: kāṃsyaṃ māṃsaṃ surāṃ kṣaudraṃ tailaṃ viṇmlecchabhāṣaṇam // NarP_1,120.89
GP12nardp1_u:25452: iti śrībṛhannāradīya purāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne caturthabhāge dvādaśamāsastitaikādaśīvratakathanaṃ nāma viṃśatyadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:25453: sanātana uvāca atha vratāni dvādaśyāḥ kathayāmi tavānagha /
GP12nardp1_u:25454: yāni kṛtvā naro loke viṣṇoḥ priyataro bhavet // NarP_1,121.1 //
GP12nardp1_u:25467: kāñcanaṃ kāmadevaṃ ca śuktāṃ gāṃ ca payasvinīm /
GP12nardp1_u:25473: svāstṛtāṃ tatra śayyāṃ tu kṛtvātra śrīyutaṃ harim /
GP12nardp1_u:25480: saptajanmasu bhuṅkte ca bhogān lokadvayepsitān // NarP_1,121.14 //
GP12nardp1_u:25492: tabhyo vāsāṃsi daṇḍāṃśca brahmasūtrāṇi mudrikāḥ // NarP_1,121.20 //
GP12nardp1_u:25494: dvādaśyāṃ tu nabhaḥśukle śrīdharaṃ pūjayedvratī // NarP_1,121.21 //
GP12nardp1_u:25496: saṃbhojya dakṣiṇā raupyāṃ datvā natvā visarjjayet // NarP_1,121.22 //
GP12nardp1_u:25498: dvādaśyāṃ nabhasyaśukle vratī saṃpūjya vāmanam // NarP_1,121.23 //
GP12nardp1_u:25500: sauvarṇī dakṣiṇāṃ datvā viṣṇuprītikaro bhavet // NarP_1,121.24 //
GP12nardp1_u:25507: tatra vatsayutāṃ gāṃ tu samālikhya sugandhibhiḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:25516: surabhi tvaṃ jaganmātā nityaṃ viṣṇupade sthitā // NarP_1,121.32 //
GP12nardp1_u:25520: taddine tailapakvaṃ ca sthālīpakvaṃ dvijottama // NarP_1,121.34 //
GP12nardp1_u:25521: gokṣīraṃ goghṛtaṃ caiva dadhi takraṃ ca varjayet /
GP12nardp1_u:25528: dehānte viṣṇusāyujyaṃ labhate nātra saṃśayaḥ // NarP_1,121.38 //
GP12nardp1_u:25532: hutvā tatra samuddīpte raupya dīpikayā mune // NarP_1,121.40 //
GP12nardp1_u:25534: tatraivānugatāṃ lakṣmīṃ brahmāṇīṃ caṇḍikāṃ tathā // NarP_1,121.41 //
GP12nardp1_u:25535: ādityaṃ śaṅkaraṃ gaurīṃ yakṣaṃ gaṇapatiṃ grahān /
GP12nardp1_u:25538: namo jayeti śabdaiśca ghaṇṭāśaṅkhā diniḥsvanaiḥ // NarP_1,121.43 //
GP12nardp1_u:25542: rājacihnāni sarvāṇi cchatrādīni ca nārada // NarP_1,121.45 //
GP12nardp1_u:25551: yeṣāṃ rāṣṭre pure grāme kriyate śāntiruttamā /
GP12nardp1_u:25552: nīrājanābhidhā vipra tadrogā yānti saṃkṣayam // NarP_1,121.50 //
GP12nardp1_u:25554: manobhavastathā prāṇo naro yātaśca vīryavān // NarP_1,121.51 //
GP12nardp1_u:25556: vibhuścāpi prabhuścaiva sādhyā dvādaśa kīrtitāḥ // NarP_1,121.52 //
GP12nardp1_u:25562: dhātāmitror'yamā pūṣā śakroṃ'śo varuṇo bhagaḥ // NarP_1,121.55 //
GP12nardp1_u:25564: pratimāsaṃ tu śuklāyāṃ dvādaśyāmarcya yatnataḥ // NarP_1,121.56 //
GP12nardp1_u:25565: varṣaṃ nayedvratānte tu pratimā dvādaśāpi ca /
GP12nardp1_u:25566: haimīḥ saṃpūjya vidhinā bhojayitvā dvijottamān // NarP_1,121.57 //
GP12nardp1_u:25568: eva vrataṃ naraḥ kṛtvā dvādaśādityasaṃjñakam // NarP_1,121.58 //
GP12nardp1_u:25570: jāyate bhuvi dharmātmā mānuṣye rogavarjitaḥ // NarP_1,121.59 //
GP12nardp1_u:25573: nirañjanaṃ nirā kāraṃ nirdvandvaṃ brahma cāpnuyāt /
GP12nardp1_u:25578: tataḥ samānte tāṃ mūrtiṃ samabhyarcya vidhānataḥ // NarP_1,121.63 //
GP12nardp1_u:25584: iti kṛtvā vrataṃ vipra prīṇayitvā janārdanam // NarP_1,121.66 //
GP12nardp1_u:25585: sauvarṇena vimānena yāti viṣṇoḥ paraṃ padam /
GP12nardp1_u:25590: śoṣayedātape dhṛtvā pātre tāmre 'tha mṛnmaye // NarP_1,121.69 //
GP12nardp1_u:25592: sauvarṇīṃ pratimāṃ viṣṇorniśāyāṃ jāgaraṃ caret // NarP_1,121.70 //
GP12nardp1_u:25594: tataḥ prabhāte dvādaśyāṃ tilapātropari sthitām // NarP_1,121.71 //
GP12nardp1_u:25599: vaiṣṇavyātha ca pūraṇāṃ ca śatamaṣṭottara tataḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:25602: viprebhyo dakṣiṇāṃ śaktyā datvā natvā visarjayet /
GP12nardp1_u:25603: naro vā yadi vā nārī vrataṃ kṛtvaivamādarāt // NarP_1,121.75 //
GP12nardp1_u:25607: pītvā gaśṛṅgavāryādau tāṃ ca kṛtvā pradakṣiṇam // NarP_1,121.77 //
GP12nardp1_u:25613: candanaṃ palikaṃ vastraṃ pañcahastonmitaṃ tanum // NarP_1,121.80 //
GP12nardp1_u:25614: evaṃ tu māsikaṃ dānaṃ kṛtvā prāśya yathākramam /
GP12nardp1_u:25615: gomūtraṃ jalamājyaṃ vā paktvā śākaṃ caturvidham // NarP_1,121.81 //
GP12nardp1_u:25618: evaṃ kṛtavrato varṣaṃ sauvarṇīṃ pratimāṃ raveḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:25619: kṛtvā vai tāmrapātrasthāṃ nyasyābhyarcya vidhānataḥ // NarP_1,121.83 //
GP12nardp1_u:25621: viprāndrādaśa saṃbhojya tebhyo dadyācca dakṣiṇām // NarP_1,121.84 //
GP12nardp1_u:25625: abhyacya vidhivadbhaktyā suvarṇaṃ tanmukhe nyaset // NarP_1,121.86 //
GP12nardp1_u:25631: antye sitāyāṃ dvādaśyāṃ sauvarṇīṃ pratimāṃ hareḥ // NarP_1,121.89 //
GP12nardp1_u:25636: jayā ca vijayā caiva jayantī cāparājitā /
GP12nardp1_u:25637: etā aṣṭau sadopoṣyā dvādaśyaḥ pāpahārikāḥ // NarP_1,121.92 //
GP12nardp1_u:25638: śrīnārada uvāca kīdṛśaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ brahmannetāsāṃ kiṃ phalaṃ tathā /
GP12nardp1_u:25639: tatsarvaṃ me samācakṣva yāścanyāḥ puṇyadāyukāḥ // NarP_1,121.93 //
GP12nardp1_u:25640: sūta uvāca itthaṃ sanātanaḥ pṛṣṭo nāradena dvijottamaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:25641: praśasya bhrātaraṃ prāha mahābhāgavataṃ muniḥ // NarP_1,121.94 //
GP12nardp1_u:25642: sanātana uvāca sādhu pṛṣṭaṃ tvayā bhrātaḥ sādhūnāṃ saṃśayacchidā /
GP12nardp1_u:25643: vakṣye mahādvādaśīnāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ ca phalaṃ pṛthak // NarP_1,121.95 //
GP12nardp1_u:25645: tadā tu trispṛśā nāma dvādaśī sā mahāphalā // NarP_1,121.96 //
GP12nardp1_u:25649: tadā tāṃ saṃparityajya dvādaśīṃ samupoṣayet // NarP_1,121.98 //
GP12nardp1_u:25653: tadā vañjulikākhyāṃ tu tāṃ tyaktvopoṣayetsadā // NarP_1,121.100 //
GP12nardp1_u:25658: kuhūrāke yadā vṛddhe syātāṃ vipra yadā tadā /
GP12nardp1_u:25659: pakṣavarddhanikā nāma dvādaśī sā mahāphalā // NarP_1,121.103 //
GP12nardp1_u:25662: yadā tu dhavale pakṣe dvādaśī syānmadhānvitā //ṭha
GP12nardp1_u:25663: tadā proktā jayā nāma sarvaśatruvināśinī // NarP_1,121.105 //
GP12nardp1_u:25667: tadā sā vijayā nāma tasyāmacedgadādharam // NarP_1,121.107 //
GP12nardp1_u:25671: dvādaśī sā mahāpuṇyā jayantī nāmataḥ smṛtā // NarP_1,121.109 //
GP12nardp1_u:25675: yadā tu syātsite pakṣe dvādaśī jīvabhānvitā // NarP_1,121.111 //
GP12nardp1_u:25681: tadā vratadvayaṃ kāryyaṃ na doṣo 'traikadaivatam // NarP_1,121.114 //
GP12nardp1_u:25683: ūrjje sitāyāṃ dvādaśyāmantyabhe ca vratadvayam // NarP_1,121.115 //
GP12nardp1_u:25686: ekādaśyā vrataṃ nityaṃ dvādaśyāḥ sahitaṃ yataḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:25688: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe bṛhadupākhyāne pūrvabhāge caturthapāde dvādaśamāsasya dvādaśīvratanirūpaṇaṃ nāmaikaviṃśatyadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:25689: sanātana uvāca athātaṛ saṃpravakṣyāmi trayodaśyā vratāni te /
GP12nardp1_u:25690: yāni kṛtvā naro bhaktyā subhago jāyate bhuvi // NarP_1,122.1 //
GP12nardp1_u:25692: kṛtvā saṃpūjya yatnena vījeyavdyajanena ca // NarP_1,122.2 //
GP12nardp1_u:25700: namo mārāya kāmāya kāmadevasya mūrttaye // NarP_1,122.6 //
GP12nardp1_u:25705: evaṃ yaḥ kurute vipra varṣe varṣe mahotsavam /
GP12nardp1_u:25706: vasaṃtasamaye prāpte hṛṣṭaḥ puṣṭaḥ sadaiva saḥ // NarP_1,122.9 //
GP12nardp1_u:25708: madanaṃ hṛdbhavaṃ kāmaṃ manmathaṃ ca ratipriyam // NarP_1,122.10 //
GP12nardp1_u:25712: ajāyā dānamapyuktaṃ snātvā nadyā vidhānataḥ // NarP_1,122.12 //
GP12nardp1_u:25714: bhūyastvanena dānena sa loke naiva jāyate // NarP_1,122.13 //
GP12nardp1_u:25715: yadīyaṃ śaninā yuktā sā mahāvāruṇī smṛtā /
GP12nardp1_u:25717: śubhayogaḥ śatarkṣaṃ ca śanau kāme madhau site /
GP12nardp1_u:25722: evameva vrataṃ kāryaṃ varṣānte gāmalaṅkṛtām // NarP_1,122.17 //
GP12nardp1_u:25726: śvetamandāramarkaṃ vā karavīraṃ ca raktakam // NarP_1,122.19 //
GP12nardp1_u:25729: pūjitā mama daurbhāgyaṃ nāśayantu namo 'stu vaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:25730: itthaṃ yor'cayate bhaktyā varṣe varṣe drumatrayam // NarP_1,122.21 //
GP12nardp1_u:25731: naśyate tasya daurbhāgyaṃ nātra kāryā vicāraṇā /
GP12nardp1_u:25734: haimyau raupyau ca mṛnmapyau yathāśaktyā vidhāya ca // NarP_1,122.23 //
GP12nardp1_u:25737: tataḥ pañcadinaṃ pūjā caikabhaktaṃ vrataṃ tathā /
GP12nardp1_u:25738: tṛtīyadivase prātaḥ snātvā saṃpūjya tau punaḥ // NarP_1,122.25 //
GP12nardp1_u:25740: varṣe varṣe tataḥ paścādvidheyaṃ varṣapañcakam // NarP_1,122.26 //
GP12nardp1_u:25742: itthaṃ naro vā nārī vā kṛtvā vratamidaṃ śubham // NarP_1,122.27 //
GP12nardp1_u:25746: kṛtopavāsā kanyaiva nārī vā dvijasattama // NarP_1,122.29 //
GP12nardp1_u:25747: tāmre vā mṛnmaye vāpi sauvarṇe rājate tathā /
GP12nardp1_u:25750: satakṛtya bhojya pratime dadyāttābhyāṃ sadakṣiṇe // NarP_1,122.31 //
GP12nardp1_u:25754: lakṣmīnārāyaṇaṃ kṛtvā sauvarṇaṃ vāpi rājatam // NarP_1,122.33 //
GP12nardp1_u:25756: pīṭhe vinyasya vastrāḍhyaṃ gandhādyaiḥ paripūjayet // NarP_1,122.34 //
GP12nardp1_u:25758: evaṃ dinatrayaṃ kṛtvā vratānte māsamarcya ca // NarP_1,122.35 //
GP12nardp1_u:25761: tāsāṃ madhye tu yā nandā tasyai dhenvai namo namaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:25763: gāvo mamāgrataḥ santu gāvo me saṃtu pṛṣṭhataḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:25764: gāvo me pārśvataḥ saṃtu gavāṃ madhye vasāmyaham // NarP_1,122.38 //
GP12nardp1_u:25770: haimaṃ hyaśokaṃ nirmāya pūjayitvā vidhānataḥ // NarP_1,122.41 //
GP12nardp1_u:25776: samabhyarcya vidhānena dvijaṃ saṃbhojya dāpayet // NarP_1,122.44 //
GP12nardp1_u:25780: pradoṣe tailadīpaṃ tu prajvālyābhyarcya yatnataḥ // NarP_1,122.46 //
GP12nardp1_u:25782: evaṃ kṛte tu viprendra yamapīḍā na jāyate // NarP_1,122.47 //
GP12nardp1_u:25784: punaḥ snātvā pradoṣe tu vāgyataḥ susamāhitaḥ // NarP_1,122.48 //
GP12nardp1_u:25789: tataḥ stuvīta deveśaṃ śivaṃ nāmnāṃ śatena ca /
GP12nardp1_u:25790: tāni nāmāni kīrtyante sarvābhīṣṭapradāni vai // NarP_1,122.51 //
GP12nardp1_u:25792: kaparddine sureśāya vyomakeśāya vai namaḥ // NarP_1,122.52 //
GP12nardp1_u:25796: vyālapriyāya vyālāya vyālānāṃ pataye namaḥ // NarP_1,122.54 //
GP12nardp1_u:25800: vedagītāya guptāya vedaguhyāya vai namaḥ // NarP_1,122.56 //
GP12nardp1_u:25802: namo jagatpratiṣṭhāya vyomarūpāya vai namaḥ // NarP_1,122.57 //
GP12nardp1_u:25808: trinetrāya trivedāya vedāṅgāya namo namaḥ // NarP_1,122.60 //
GP12nardp1_u:25810: viśvarūpāya viśvāya viśvanāthāya vai namaḥ // NarP_1,122.61 //
GP12nardp1_u:25812: arūpāya virūpāya sūkṣmasūkṣmāya vai namaḥ // NarP_1,122.62 //
GP12nardp1_u:25817: namaḥ prabhāvarūpāya prabhāvārthāya vai namaḥ // NarP_1,122.65 //
GP12nardp1_u:25829: evaṃ kṛte tu vidhivadvratī saubhāgyabhājanaḥ // NarP_1,122.71 //
GP12nardp1_u:25835: prayāge māghamāse tu tryahaṃ snātasya yatphalam /
GP12nardp1_u:25837: tatra snānaṃ japo homo dānaṃ cānantyamaśnute /
GP12nardp1_u:25838: phaālgune tu site pakṣe trayodaśyāmupoṣitaḥ // NarP_1,122.75 //
GP12nardp1_u:25844: tato vratānte tu punaḥ sauvarṇaṃ dhananāyakam // NarP_1,122.78 //
GP12nardp1_u:25851: guruṃ samarcya vastrādyaiḥ pratimāṃ tāṃ nivedayet /
GP12nardp1_u:25852: dvijebhyo dakṣaṇāṃ śaktyā datvā natvā visṛjya ca // NarP_1,122.82 //
GP12nardp1_u:25854: evaṃ kṛte vrate vipra nirdhanaḥ prāpya vaibhavam // NarP_1,122.83 //
GP12nardp1_u:25855: modate bhuvi vikhyāto rājarāja ivāparaḥ // NarP_1,122.84 //
GP12nardp1_u:25856: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne dvādaśamāsasthitatrayodaśīvratakathanaṃ nāma dvāviṃśadadhikaśatatamo
GP12nardp1_u:25858: sanātana uvāca śṛṇu nārada vakṣyāmi caturdaśyā vratāni te /
GP12nardp1_u:25859: yāni kṛtvā naro loke sarvānkāmānavāpnuyāt // NarP_1,123.1 //
GP12nardp1_u:25870: datvā mantraṃ dvijāgryāya bhuñjīta ca pare 'hani /
GP12nardp1_u:25871: evameva tu kṛṣṇāsu sarvāsu dvijasattama // NarP_1,123.7 //
GP12nardp1_u:25875: niśāgame tu saṃpūjya nṛsiṃhaṃ daityasūdanam // NarP_1,123.9 //
GP12nardp1_u:25883: varṣe varṣe sa labhate bhuktabhogo hareḥ padam // NarP_1,123.13 //
GP12nardp1_u:25885: durlabhaṃ vārcanaṃ tatra darśanaṃ pāpanāśanam // NarP_1,123.14 //
GP12nardp1_u:25891: evaṃ yaḥ pūjayetpaiṣṭaṃ liṅgaṃ sarvārthasiddhidam // NarP_1,123.17 //
GP12nardp1_u:25899: śatābhimantritaṃ kṛtvā tato devyai nivedayet // NarP_1,123.21 //
GP12nardp1_u:25905: gandhādyaiḥ prāk samabhyarcyaḥ kārpāsaṃ paṭṭajaṃ tu vā // NarP_1,123.24 //
GP12nardp1_u:25907: tataḥ purāṇamuttārya sūtraṃ kṣiptvā jalāśayeṃ // NarP_1,123.25 //
GP12nardp1_u:25913: suśobhane nyasettatra kalaśaṃ tāmrajaṃ mune // NarP_1,123.28 //
GP12nardp1_u:25915: pītapaṭṭāṃśukācchannāṃ tatra tāṃ vidhinā yajet // NarP_1,123.29 //
GP12nardp1_u:25917: tato homaṃ haviṣyeṇa kṛtvā pūrṇāhutiṃ caret // NarP_1,123.30 //
GP12nardp1_u:25918: śayyāṃ sopaskarāṃ dhenuṃ pratimāṃ ca dvijottama /
GP12nardp1_u:25923: kadalīvratamapyatra tadvidhānaṃ ca me śṛṇu // NarP_1,123.33 //
GP12nardp1_u:25924: naro vā yadi vā nārī raṃbhāmupavanasthitām /
GP12nardp1_u:25927: evaṃ saṃpūjya mantreṇa tataḥ saṃprārthayerdvatī // NarP_1,123.35 //
GP12nardp1_u:25929: śarīrārogyalāvaṇyaṃ dehi devi namo 'stu te // NarP_1,123.36 //
GP12nardp1_u:25930: iti saṃprārthyaṃ kanyāstu catasro vā suvāsinīḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:25932: namaskṛtya nijaṃ gehaṃ samāpya niyamaṃ vrajet /
GP12nardp1_u:25933: evaṃ kṛte vrate vipra labdhvā saubhāgyamuttamam // NarP_1,123.38 //
GP12nardp1_u:25939: tarpaṇaṃ ca gavāṃ grāsaṃ baliṃ caiva śvakākayoḥ // NarP_1,123.41 //
GP12nardp1_u:25941: evaṃ yaḥ kurute vipra śrāddhaṃ saṃpannadakṣiṇam // NarP_1,123.42 //
GP12nardp1_u:25947: sa bhuktveha varānbhogāndivaṃ dharmājñayā vrajet // NarP_1,123.45 //
GP12nardp1_u:25954: snātvā viśveśvaro devo devaiḥ saha munīśvara /
GP12nardp1_u:25955: maṇikarṇika tīrthe ca tripuṇḍraṃ bhasmanā dadhat // NarP_1,123.49 //
GP12nardp1_u:25965: śvetāyāḥ kṣīramuditaṃ raktāyāśca tathā dadhi // NarP_1,123.54 //
GP12nardp1_u:25967: kuśāṃ bunā tataḥ prātaḥ snātvā santarpyaṃ devatāḥ // NarP_1,123.55 //
GP12nardp1_u:25970: yacca bālye kṛtaṃ pāpaṃ kaumāre vārddhake 'pi yat /
GP12nardp1_u:25979: pare 'hni prātarutthāya snātvā somaṃ maheśvaram // NarP_1,123.61 //
GP12nardp1_u:25988: tatsthaṃ dvijātaye dattvā modate divi devavat /
GP12nardp1_u:25993: kṛśarānnaṃ svayaṃ cāpi tadevāśnīta vāgyataḥ // NarP_1,123.68 //
GP12nardp1_u:26001: evaṃ kṛtvā vrataṃ martyo mahādevaprasādataḥ // NarP_1,123.72 //
GP12nardp1_u:26005: evaṃ kṛtvā vrataṃ vipra durgāyāścaikabhojanaḥ // NarP_1,123.74 //
GP12nardp1_u:26009: udyāpane tu sarvāṃsāṃ sāmānyo vidhirucyate // NarP_1,123.76 //
GP12nardp1_u:26013: pātrāṇi yajñasūtrāṇi tāvatyeva hi kalpayet // NarP_1,123.78 //
GP12nardp1_u:26015: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne caturthabhāge dvādaśamāsasthitacaturdaśīvratavarṇanaṃ nāma trayoviṃśatyadhikaśatatamo
GP12nardp1_u:26017: sanātana uvāca atha nārada vakṣyāmi śṛṇu pūrṇāvratāni te /
GP12nardp1_u:26018: yāni kṛtvā naro nārī prāpnuyātsukhasaṃtatim // NarP_1,124.1 //
GP12nardp1_u:26024: śṛtānnamudakuṃbhaṃ ca vaiśākhyāṃ vai dvijottame // NarP_1,124.4 //
GP12nardp1_u:26026: atra kṛṣṇājinaṃ dadyātsakhuraṃ ca saśṛṅgakam // NarP_1,124.5 //
GP12nardp1_u:26030: modate viṣṇu loke hi yāvaccandrārkatārakam // NarP_1,124.7 //
GP12nardp1_u:26032: yaḥ pradadyāddvijāgryebhyaḥ sa na śocati karhicit // NarP_1,124.8 //
GP12nardp1_u:26038: patyā sahāviyogaṃ me vaṭasthe kuru te namaḥ // NarP_1,124.11 //
GP12nardp1_u:26039: iti saprārthya yā nārī bhojayitvā pare 'hani /
GP12nardp1_u:26045: evaṃvidhaṃ hariṃ tatra snātvā pūjāṃ samācaret /
GP12nardp1_u:26053: pūrṇāntaṃ śrāvaṇe māsi gaurīrūpāṃ ca kokilām /
GP12nardp1_u:26058: gandhādyaiḥ pratyahaṃ prārccellikhitāṃ varṇakaiḥ paṭe // NarP_1,124.21 //
GP12nardp1_u:26059: tato vratānte haimīṃ vā tilapiṣṭamayīṃ dvija /
GP12nardp1_u:26062: saṃpūjya dattā viprāya sarvasaukhyakarī bhava // NarP_1,124.23 //
GP12nardp1_u:26064: vastrādidakṣiṇāṃ śaktyā datvā natvā visarjayet // NarP_1,124.24 //
GP12nardp1_u:26071: rakṣāvidhānaṃ ca tathā kartavyaṃ vidhipūrvakam // NarP_1,124.28 //
GP12nardp1_u:26072: siddhārthākṣatarājikāśca vidhṛtā raktāṃśukāṃśe sitāḥ kausuṃbhena ca tantunātha salilaiḥ prakṣālya kāṃsye dhṛtāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:26073: gandhādyairabhipūjya devanikarānsaṃprārthya viṣṇvādikānbadhnīyāddvijahastataḥ pramudito natvā prakoṣṭhe svake //
GP12nardp1_u:26078: kṛte hyasminvrate vipra vārṣikaṃ karmaṃ vaidikam /
GP12nardp1_u:26079: vismṛtaṃ vidhihīnaṃ ca na kṛtaṃ sukṛtaṃ bhavet // NarP_1,124.32 //
GP12nardp1_u:26081: ekabhuktaśca yastāṃ tu śivaṃ saṃpūjya yatnataḥ // NarP_1,124.33 //
GP12nardp1_u:26082: kṛtāñjaliḥ prārthayecchvaḥ kariṣye ca vrataṃ prabho /
GP12nardp1_u:26083: evaṃ vijñāpya devaṃ tu gṛhṇīyādvratamuttamam // NarP_1,124.34 //
GP12nardp1_u:26089: punaḥ saṃpūjya tatraiva rātrau jāgaraṇaṃ caret // NarP_1,124.37 //
GP12nardp1_u:26093: haimā raupyā mṛnmayāśca ghaṭāḥ pañcadaśottamāḥ // NarP_1,124.39 //
GP12nardp1_u:26099: evaṃ kṛtvā vrataṃ caiva umāmāheśvarābhidham // NarP_1,124.42 //
GP12nardp1_u:26109: tena snātvā vidhānena sopavāso jitendriyaḥ // NarP_1,124.47 //
GP12nardp1_u:26117: yāmamātre gate rātryā lakṣmyai tadvinivedayet // NarP_1,124.51 //
GP12nardp1_u:26122: niśīthe carate loke ko jāgartiṃ dharātale /
GP12nardp1_u:26123: tasmai vittaṃ prayacchāmi jāgrate pūjakāya me // NarP_1,124.54 //
GP12nardp1_u:26130: kīṭāḥ pataṅgā maśakāśca vṛkṣā jale sthale ye vicaranti jīvāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:26131: dṛṣṭvā pradīpānnahi te 'pi janminaḥ punaśca muktiṃ hi labhanta eva ca //
GP12nardp1_u:26132: atra candrodaye vipra saṃpūjyāḥ kṛttikāśca ṣaṭ // NarP_1,124.59 //
GP12nardp1_u:26136: evaṃ devānsamabhyarcya dīpo deyo gṛhādbahiḥ // NarP_1,124.61 //
GP12nardp1_u:26139: gavāṃ kṣīreṇa saṃpūrya haimaṃ tatra vinikṣipet /
GP12nardp1_u:26141: mahāmatsyāya ca nama iti mantraṃ samuccaran /
GP12nardp1_u:26145: atra kṛttvā vṛṣotsargaṃ vrataṃ naktaṃ ca nārada /
GP12nardp1_u:26150: purandaraśca somaśca tathā tiṣyo bṛhaspatiḥ // NarP_1,124.68 //
GP12nardp1_u:26156: dṛṣṭvā ca maṅgalaṃ dravyaṃ spṛṣṭvā natvā tator'cayet // NarP_1,124.71 //
GP12nardp1_u:26160: alakṣmīnāśanaṃ caiva modateha paratra ca // NarP_1,124.73 //
GP12nardp1_u:26166: phaālgune pūrṇimāyāṃ tu holikāpūjanaṃ matam // NarP_1,124.76 //
GP12nardp1_u:26170: atastvāṃ pūjayiṣyāmi bhūte bhūtipradā bhava" // NarP_1,124.78 //
GP12nardp1_u:26176: iti jānīhi viprendra loke sthitiranekadhā // NarP_1,124.81 //
GP12nardp1_u:26183: jyeṣṭhāmāyāṃ vrataṃ proktaṃ sāvitryāḥ kasya nārada /
GP12nardp1_u:26185: śucau nabhasi bhādre ca māse pūrṇāntike dvija /
GP12nardp1_u:26192: ūrjjāmāyāṃ dīpadānaṃ devā gāragṛheṣu ca // NarP_1,124.89 //
GP12nardp1_u:26194: samarcanaṃ tathā lakṣmyāḥ svarṇaraupye kṛtākṛte // NarP_1,124.90 //
GP12nardp1_u:26200: pauṣe māghe ca viprendra pitṛśrāddhaṃ phalādhikam // NarP_1,124.93 //
GP12nardp1_u:26202: phaālgune kevalaṃ śrāddhaṃ dvijānāṃ bhojanaṃ tathā // NarP_1,124.94 //
GP12nardp1_u:26204: itthaṃ saṃkṣepataḥ proktaṃ tithikṛtyaṃ mune tava // NarP_1,124.95 //
GP12nardp1_u:26205: sarvatrāpi viśeṣo 'sti sa purāṇāntare sthitaḥ // NarP_1,124.96 //
GP12nardp1_u:26206: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne caturthapāde dvādaśamāsasthitapaurṇamāsya māvāsyāvratakathanaṃ nāma caturviṃśatyadhikaśatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:26207: sūta uvāca ityevamuktvā muninā hi pṛṣṭāste vai kumārāḥ kila nāradena /
GP12nardp1_u:26212: jagmustato jñānaghanasvarūpā natvā purāriṃ svapiturnikāśam // NarP_1,125.3
GP12nardp1_u:26213: tatpādapadme praṇatiṃ vidhāya pitrāpi satkṛtya sabhājitāste /
GP12nardp1_u:26214: labdhvāśiṣo 'dyāpi caranti śaśvallokeṣu tīrthāni ca tīrthabhūtāḥ //
GP12nardp1_u:26218: labdhvā jñānaṃ savijñānaṃ bhṛśaṃ prītamanā hyabhūt // NarP_1,125.6 //
GP12nardp1_u:26220: praṇamya satkṛtaḥ pitrā brahmaṇā niṣasāda ca // NarP_1,125.7 //
GP12nardp1_u:26222: varṇayāmāsa tattvena so 'pi śrutvā mumoda ca // NarP_1,125.8 //
GP12nardp1_u:26236: atha śvetābhrasadṛśe śṛṅge tasya ca bhūbhṛtaḥ // NarP_1,125.15 //
GP12nardp1_u:26242: taṃ dṛṣṭvā nārado viprā bhaktinamrātmakandharaḥ // NarP_1,125.18 //
GP12nardp1_u:26246: athāpṛcchacca kuśalaṃ nāradaṃ jagatāṃ guruḥ // NarP_1,125.20 //
GP12nardp1_u:26247: sa ca prāha prasādena bhavataḥ sarvamasti me /
GP12nardp1_u:26248: sarveṣāṃ yogivaryāṇāṃ śṛṇvatāṃ tatra vāḍavāḥ // NarP_1,125.21 //
GP12nardp1_u:26250: sa śivaḥ sādaraṃ tasya bhaktyā saṃtuṣṭamānasaḥ // NarP_1,125.22 //
GP12nardp1_u:26252: sa labdhvā śāṃbhavaṃ jñānaṃ śaṅkarāllokaśaṅkarāt // NarP_1,125.23 //
GP12nardp1_u:26256: etadvaḥ kīrtitaṃ viprā nāradīyaṃ mahanmayā // NarP_1,125.25 //
GP12nardp1_u:26262: setau kāñcyāṃ kuśasthalyāṃ gaṅgādvāre kuśasthale // NarP_1,125.28 //
GP12nardp1_u:26264: sa labhetsarvaya jñānāṃ tīrthānāṃ ca phalaṃ mahat // NarP_1,125.29 //
GP12nardp1_u:26270: kathitaḥ sarvapāpaghnaḥ paṭhatāṃ śṛṇvatāṃ sadā // NarP_1,125.32 //
GP12nardp1_u:26275: tapasāṃ ca vratānāṃ ca phalānāṃ saṃprakāśakam /
GP12nardp1_u:26276: mantrāṇāṃ caiva yantrāṇāṃ vedāṅgānāṃ vibhāgaśaḥ // NarP_1,125.35 //
GP12nardp1_u:26278: ya etatpaṭhate bhaktyā śṛṇuyādvā samāhitaḥ // NarP_1,125.36 //
GP12nardp1_u:26280: śrutvedaṃ nāradīyaṃ tu purāṇaṃ vedasaṃmitam // NarP_1,125.37 //
GP12nardp1_u:26284: yastu vyākurute viprāḥ purāṇaṃ dharmasaṃgraham // NarP_1,125.39 //
GP12nardp1_u:26286: kāyena manasā vācā dhanādyairapi saṃtatam // NarP_1,125.40 //
GP12nardp1_u:26288: śrutvā purāṇaṃ vidhivaddhomaṃ kṛtvā surārcanam // NarP_1,125.41 //
GP12nardp1_u:26290: dakṣiṇāṃ pradadecchaktyā bhaktyā prīyeta mādhavaḥ // NarP_1,125.42 //
GP12nardp1_u:26291: yathā śreṣṭhā nadī gaṅgā puṣkaraṃ ca saro yathā /
GP12nardp1_u:26292: kāśī purī nago merurdevo nārāyaṇo hariḥ // NarP_1,125.43 //
GP12nardp1_u:26294: mārgo mṛgendraḥ puruṣo 'śvatthaḥ prahlāda ānanam // NarP_1,125.44 //
GP12nardp1_u:26295: uccaiḥ śravā vasaṃtaśca japaḥ śeṣor'yamā dhanuḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:26296: pāvako viṣṇurindraśca kapilo vākpatiḥ kaviḥ // NarP_1,125.45 //
GP12nardp1_u:26300: śāntirastu śivaṃ cāstu sarveṣāṃ vo dvijottamāḥ // NarP_1,125.47 //
GP12nardp1_u:26305: śrutaṃ samyaganuṣṭhāya tatra tasthuśca satriṇaḥ // NarP_1,125.49 //
GP12nardp1_u:26307: sa tu nirviṣamanasā sametya yāgaṃ labhate satamabhīpsitaṃ hi lokam //
GP12nardp1_u:26308: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe bṛhadupākhyāne caturthapāde purāṇamahimāvarṇanaṃ nāma pañcaviṃśottaraśatatamo
GP12nardp1_u:26309: samāptoyaṃ bṛhannāradīyapurāṇasya pūrvabhāgaḥ śrīrādhāmadanamohano jayati tarām
